analyzed: vālmīki rāmāyaṇa
araṇya kāṇḍa
praviśya tu mahā araṇyam daṇḍaka araṇyam ātmavān
dadarśa rāmaḥ durdharṣaḥ tāpasa āśrama maṇḍalam
kuśa cīra parikṣiptam brāhmyā lakṣmyā samāvṛtam
yathā pradīptam durdharśam gagane sūrya maṇḍalam
śaraṇyam sarva bhūtānām su samṛṣṭa ajiram sadā

original: 3.001.003c pūjitaṃ copanṛttaṃ ca nityam apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
analyzed: pūjitam ca upanṛttam ca nityam apsarasām gaṇaiḥ
viśālaiḥ agni śaraṇaiḥ sruc bhāṇḍaiḥ ajinaiḥ kuśaiḥ
samidbhiḥ toya kalaśaiḥ phala mūlaiḥ ca śobhitam

original: 3.001.005a āraṇyaiś ca mahāvṛkṣaiḥ puṇyaiḥ svāduphalair vṛtam
analyzed: āraṇyaiḥ ca mahā vṛkṣaiḥ puṇyaiḥ svādu phalaiḥ vṛtam
bali homa arcitam puṇyam brahmaghoṣa nināditam

original: 3.001.006a puṣpair vanyaiḥ parikṣiptaṃ padminyā ca sapadmayā
analyzed: puṣpaiḥ vanyaiḥ parikṣiptam padminyā ca sa padmayā
phala mūla aśanaiḥ dāntaiḥ cīra kṛṣṇa ajina ambaraiḥ
sūrya vaiśvānara ābhaiḥ ca purāṇaiḥ munibhiḥ vṛtam
puṇyaiḥ a niyata āhāraiḥ śobhitam parama ṛṣibhiḥ
tat brahma bhavana prakhyam brahmaghoṣa nināditam
brahma vidbhiḥ mahābhāgaiḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ upaśobhitam
tat dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ śrīmān tāpasa āśrama maṇḍalam

original: 3.001.009c abhyagacchan mahātejā vijyaṃ kṛtvā mahad dhanuḥ
analyzed: abhyagacchat mahā tejāḥ vijyam kṛtvā mahat dhanuḥ
divya jñāna upapannāḥ te rāmam dṛṣṭvā mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: 3.001.010c abhyagacchaṃs tadā prītā vaidehīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
analyzed: abhyagacchan tadā prītāḥ vaidehīm ca yaśasvinīm

original: 3.001.011a te taṃ somam ivodyantaṃ dṛṣṭvā vai dharmacāriṇaḥ
analyzed: te tam somam iva udyantam dṛṣṭvā vai dharma cāriṇaḥ
maṅgalāni prayuñjānāḥ pratyagṛhṇan dṛḍha vratāḥ
rūpa saṃhananam lakṣmīm saukumāryam su veṣa tām
dadṛśuḥ vismita ākārāḥ rāmasya vana vāsinaḥ

original: 3.001.013a vaidehīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmaṃ netrair animiṣair iva
analyzed: vaidehīm lakṣmaṇam rāmam netraiḥ animiṣaiḥ iva
āścarya bhūtān dadṛśuḥ sarve te vana cāriṇaḥ
atrā enam hi mahābhāgāḥ sarva bhūta hite ratāḥ
atithim parṇa śālāyām rāghavam saṃnyaveśayan
tatas rāmasya satkṛtya vidhinā pāvaka upamāḥ
ājahruḥ te mahābhāgāḥ salilam dharma cāriṇaḥ

original: 3.001.016a mūlaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vanyam āśramaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: mūlam puṣpam phalam vanyam āśramam ca mahātmanaḥ
nivedayītvā dharma jñāḥ tatas prāñjalayaḥ bruvan
dharma pālaḥ janasya asya śaraṇyaḥ ca mahā yaśāḥ

original: 3.001.017c pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca rājā daṇḍadharo guruḥ
analyzed: pūjanīyaḥ ca mānyaḥ ca rājā daṇḍa dharaḥ guruḥ
indrasya eva caturbhāgaḥ prajāḥ rakṣati rāghava

original: 3.001.018c rājā tasmād vanān bhogān bhuṅkte lokanamaskṛtaḥ
analyzed: rājā tasmāt vanān bhogān bhuṅkte loka namaskṛtaḥ
te vayam bhavatā rakṣyāḥ bhavat viṣaya vāsinaḥ

original: 3.001.019c nagarastho vanastho vā tvaṃ no rājā janeśvaraḥ
analyzed: nagara sthaḥ vana sthaḥ vā tvam naḥ rājā janeśvaraḥ
nyasta daṇḍāḥ vayam rājam jita krodhāḥ jita indriyāḥ
rakṣitavyāḥ tvayā śaśvat garbha bhūtāḥ tapodhanāḥ

original: 3.001.021a evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpair vanyaiś ca rāghavam
analyzed: evam uktvā phalaiḥ mūlaiḥ puṣpaiḥ vanyaiḥ ca rāghavam
anyaiḥ ca vividha āhāraiḥ sa lakṣmaṇam apūjayan
tathā anye tāpasāḥ siddhāḥ rāmam vaiśvānara upamāḥ
nyāya vṛttāḥ yathānyāyam tarpayām āsuḥ īśvaram
kṛta ātithyaḥ rāmaḥ tu sūryasya udayanam prati

original: 3.002.001c āmantrya sa munīn sarvān vanam evānvagāhata
analyzed: āmantrya sa munīn sarvān vanam eva anvagāhata
nānā mṛga gaṇa ākīrṇam śārdūla vṛka sevitam
dhvasta vṛkṣa latā gulmam durdarśa salilāśayam
lakṣmaṇa anugataḥ rāmaḥ vana madhyam dadarśa ha
vana madhye tu kākutsthaḥ tasmin ghora mṛga āyute
dadarśa giri śṛṅga ābham puruṣādam mahā svanam
gabhīra akṣam mahā vaktram vikaṭam viṣama udaram
bībhatsam viṣamam dīrgham vikṛtam ghora darśanam
vasānam carma vaiyāghram vasā ārdram rudhira ukṣitam
trāsanam sarva bhūtānām vyādita āsyam iva antakam

original: 3.002.007a trīn siṃhāṃś caturo vyāghrān dvau vṛkau pṛṣatān daśa
analyzed: trīn siṃhān caturaḥ vyāghrān dvau vṛkau pṛṣatān daśa

original: 3.002.007c saviṣāṇaṃ vasādigdhaṃ gajasya ca śiro mahat
analyzed: sa viṣāṇam vasā digdham gajasya ca śiraḥ mahat
avasajyāyase śūle vinadantam mahā svanam

original: 3.002.008c sa rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca maithilīm
analyzed: sa rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇam ca eva sītām dṛṣṭvā ca maithilīm
abhyadhāvat su saṃkruddhaḥ prajāḥ kālaḥ iva antakaḥ

original: 3.002.009c sa kṛtvā bhairavaṃ nādaṃ cālayann iva medinīm
analyzed: sa kṛtvā bhairavam nādam cālayan iva medinīm
aṅgena ādāya vaidehīm apakramya tatas bravīt
yuvām jaṭā cīra dharau sa bhāryau kṣīṇa jīvitau
praviṣṭau daṇḍaka araṇyam śara cāpa asi dhāriṇau

original: 3.002.011c kathaṃ tāpasayor vāṃ ca vāsaḥ pramadayā saha
analyzed: katham tāpasayoḥ vām ca vāsaḥ pramadayā saha
adharma cāriṇau pāpau kau yuvām muni dūṣakau

original: 3.002.012c ahaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ virāgho nāma rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: aham vanam idam durgam virāghaḥ nāma rākṣasaḥ
carāmi sa āyudhaḥ nityam ṛṣi māṃsāni bhakṣayan

original: 3.002.013c iyaṃ nārī varārohā mama bharyā bhaviṣyati
analyzed: iyam nārī vara ārohā mama bharyā bhaviṣyati

original: 3.002.013e yuvayoḥ pāpayoś cāhaṃ pāsyāmi rudhiraṃ mṛdhe
analyzed: yuvayoḥ pāpayoḥ ca aham pāsyāmi rudhiram mṛdhe
tasya evam bruvataḥ dhṛṣṭam virādhasya durātmanaḥ
śrutvā sa garvitam vākyam saṃbhrāntā janakātmajā
sītā prāvepata udvegāt pravāte kadalī yathā

original: 3.002.015a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ sītāṃ virādhāṅkagatāṃ śubhām
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ sītām virādha aṅka gatām śubhām
abravīt lakṣmaṇam vākyam mukhena pariśuṣyatā
paśya saumya narendrasya janakasya ātmasaṃbhavām
mama bhāryām śubha ācārām virādha aṅke praveśitām
atyanta sukha saṃvṛddhām rāja putrīm yaśasvinīm

original: 3.002.017a yad abhipretam asmāsu priyaṃ vara vṛtaṃ ca yat
analyzed: yat abhipretam asmāsu priyam vara vṛtam ca yat

original: 3.002.017c kaikeyyās tu susaṃvṛttaṃ kṣipram adyaiva lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: kaikeyyāḥ tu su saṃvṛttam kṣipram adya eva lakṣmaṇa

original: 3.002.018a yā na tuṣyati rājyena putrārthe dīrghadarśinī
analyzed: yā na tuṣyati rājyena putra arthe dīrgha darśinī
yayā aham sarva bhūtānām hitaḥ prasthāpitaḥ vanam

original: 3.002.018e adyedānīṃ sakāmā sā yā mātā mama madhyamā
analyzed: adyā idānīm sa kāmā sā yā mātā mama madhyamā

original: 3.002.019a parasparśāt tu vaidehyā na duḥkhataram asti me
analyzed: para sparśāt tu vaidehyāḥ na duḥkhataram asti me
pituḥ vināśāt saumitre sva rājya haraṇāt tathā
iti bruvati kākutsthe bāṣpa śoka pariplute

original: 3.002.020c abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddho ruddho nāga iva śvasan
analyzed: abravīt lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddhaḥ ruddhaḥ nāgaḥ iva śvasan

original: 3.002.021a anātha iva bhūtānāṃ nāthas tvaṃ vāsavopamaḥ
analyzed: anāthaḥ iva bhūtānām nāthaḥ tvam vāsava upamaḥ
mayā preṣyeṇa kākutstha kimartham paritapsyase
śareṇa nihatasya adya mayā kruddhena rakṣasaḥ

original: 3.002.022c virādhasya gatāsor hi mahī pāsyati śoṇitam
analyzed: virādhasya gatāsoḥ hi mahī pāsyati śoṇitam

original: 3.002.023a rājyakāme mama krodho bharate yo babhūva ha
analyzed: rājya kāme mama krodhaḥ bharate yaḥ babhūva ha

original: 3.002.023c taṃ virādhe vimokṣyāmi vajrī vajram ivācale
analyzed: tam virādhe vimokṣyāmi vajrī vajram iva acale
mama bhuja bala vega vegitaḥ
patatu śaraḥ sya mahān mahā urasi
vyapanayatu tanoḥ ca jīvitam
patatu tatas ca mahīm vighūrṇitaḥ

original: 3.003.001a athovāca punar vākyaṃ virādhaḥ pūrayan vanam
analyzed: athā uvāca punar vākyam virādhaḥ pūrayan vanam

original: 3.003.001c ātmānaṃ pṛcchate brūtaṃ kau yuvāṃ kva gamiṣyathaḥ
analyzed: ātmānam pṛcchate brūtam kau yuvām kva gamiṣyathaḥ

original: 3.003.002a tam uvāca tato rāmo rākṣasaṃ jvalitānanam
analyzed: tam uvāca tatas rāmaḥ rākṣasam jvalita ānanam
pṛcchantam su mahā tejāḥ ikṣvāku kulam ātmanaḥ
kṣatriyaḥ vṛtta saṃpannau viddhi nau vana gocarau

original: 3.003.003c tvāṃ tu veditum icchāvaḥ kas tvaṃ carasi daṇḍakān
analyzed: tvām tu veditum icchāvaḥ kaḥ tvam carasi daṇḍakān

original: 3.003.004a tam uvāca virādhas tu rāmaṃ satyaparākramam
analyzed: tam uvāca virādhaḥ tu rāmam satya parākramam

original: 3.003.004c hanta vakṣyāmi te rājan nibodha mama rāghava
analyzed: hanta vakṣyāmi te rājan nibodha mama rāghava

original: 3.003.005a putraḥ kila jayasyāhaṃ mātā mama śatahradā
analyzed: putraḥ kila jayasya aham mātā mama śatahradā

original: 3.003.005c virādha iti mām āhuḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvarākṣasāḥ
analyzed: virādhaḥ iti mām āhuḥ pṛthivyām sarva rākṣasāḥ

original: 3.003.006a tapasā cāpi me prāptā brahmaṇo hi prasādajā
analyzed: tapasā ca api me prāptā brahmaṇaḥ hi prasāda jā
śastreṇa avadhya tā loke chedya abhedya tvam eva ca
utsṛjya pramadām enām anapekṣau yathāgatam

original: 3.003.007c tvaramāṇau pālayethāṃ na vāṃ jīvitam ādade
analyzed: tvaramāṇau pālayethām na vām jīvitam ādade
tam rāmaḥ pratyuvāca idam kopa saṃrakta locanaḥ
rākṣasam vikṛta ākāram virādham pāpa cetasam

original: 3.003.009a kṣudra dhik tvāṃ tu hīnārthaṃ mṛtyum anveṣase dhruvam
analyzed: kṣudra dhik tvām tu hīna artham mṛtyum anveṣase dhruvam

original: 3.003.009c raṇe saṃprāpsyase tiṣṭha na me jīvan gamiṣyasi
analyzed: raṇe saṃprāpsyase tiṣṭha na me jīvan gamiṣyasi

original: 3.003.010a tataḥ sajyaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā rāmaḥ suniśitāñ śarān
analyzed: tatas sajyam dhanuḥ kṛtvā rāmaḥ su niśitām śarān
su śīghram abhisaṃdhāya rākṣasam nijaghāna ha
dhanuṣā jyā guṇavatā sapta bāṇān mumoca ha
rukma puṅkhān mahā vegān suparṇa anila tulya gān
te śarīram virādhasya bhittvā barhiṇa vāsasaḥ
nipetuḥ śoṇita ādigdhāḥ dharaṇyām pāvaka upamāḥ
sa vinadya mahā nādam śūlam śakra dhvaja upamam
pragṛhya aśobhata tadā vyātta ānanaḥ iva antakaḥ
tat śūlam vajra saṃkāśam gagane jvalana upamam

original: 3.003.014c dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ ciccheda rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: dvābhyām śarābhyām ciccheda rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtām varaḥ

original: 3.003.015a tasya raudrasya saumitrir bāhuṃ savyaṃ babhañja ha
analyzed: tasya raudrasya saumitriḥ bāhum savyam babhañja ha

original: 3.003.015c rāmas tu dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ tarasā tasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ tu dakṣiṇam bāhum tarasā tasya rakṣasaḥ
sa bhagna bāhuḥ saṃvignaḥ nipapāta āśu rākṣasaḥ
dharaṇyām megha saṃkāśaḥ vajra bhinnaḥ iva acalaḥ
idam provāca kākutstham virādhaḥ puruṣa ṛṣabham

original: 3.003.017a kausalyā suprajās tāta rāmas tvaṃ vidito mayā
analyzed: kausalyā suprajāḥ tāta rāmaḥ tvam viditaḥ mayā

original: 3.003.017c vaidehī ca mahābhāgā lakṣmaṇaś ca mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: vaidehī ca mahābhāgā lakṣmaṇaḥ ca mahā yaśāḥ

original: 3.003.018a abhiśāpād ahaṃ ghorāṃ praviṣṭo rākṣasīṃ tanum
analyzed: abhiśāpāt aham ghorām praviṣṭaḥ rākṣasīm tanum

original: 3.003.018c tumburur nāma gandharvaḥ śapto vaiśvaraṇena hi
analyzed: tumburuḥ nāma gandharvaḥ śaptaḥ vaiśvaraṇena hi

original: 3.003.019a prasādyamānaś ca mayā so 'bravīn māṃ mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: prasādyamānaḥ ca mayā saḥ bravīt mām mahā yaśāḥ

original: 3.003.019c yadā dāśarathī rāmas tvāṃ vadhiṣyati saṃyuge
analyzed: yadā dāśarathiḥ rāmaḥ tvām vadhiṣyati saṃyuge

original: 3.003.020a tadā prakṛtim āpanno bhavān svargaṃ gamiṣyati
analyzed: tadā prakṛtim āpannaḥ bhavān svargam gamiṣyati

original: 3.003.020c iti vaiśravaṇo rājā rambhāsaktam uvāca ha
analyzed: iti vaiśravaṇaḥ rājā rambhā saktam uvāca ha
an upasthīyamānaḥ mām saṃkruddhaḥ vyajahāra ha
tava prasādāt muktaḥ ham abhiśāpāt su dāruṇāt

original: 3.003.021e bhavanaṃ svaṃ gamiṣyāmi svasti vo 'stu paraṃtapa
analyzed: bhavanam svam gamiṣyāmi svasti vaḥ stu paraṃtapa
itas vasati dharma ātmā śarabhaṅgaḥ pratāpavān
adhyardha yojane tāta mahā ṛṣiḥ sūrya saṃnibhaḥ

original: 3.003.023a taṃ kṣipram abhigaccha tvaṃ sa te śreyo vidhāsyati
analyzed: tam kṣipram abhigaccha tvam sa te śreyaḥ vidhāsyati

original: 3.003.023c avaṭe cāpi māṃ rāma nikṣipya kuśalī vraja
analyzed: avaṭe ca api mām rāma nikṣipya kuśalī vraja
rakṣasām gata sattvānām eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: 3.003.024c avaṭe ye nidhīyante teṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
analyzed: avaṭe ye nidhīyante teṣām lokāḥ sanātanāḥ

original: 3.003.025a evam uktvā tu kākutsthaṃ virādhaḥ śarapīḍitaḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tu kākutstham virādhaḥ śara pīḍitaḥ
babhūva svarga saṃprāptaḥ nyasta dehaḥ mahā balaḥ
tam mukta kaṇṭham utkṣipya śaṅku karṇam mahā svanam
virādham prākṣipat śvabhre nadantam bhairava svanam
tatas tu tau kāñcana citra kārmukau
nihatya rakṣaḥ parigṛhya maithilīm
vijahratuḥ tau muditau mahā vane
divi sthitau candra divākarau iva

original: 3.004.001a hatvā tu taṃ bhīmabalaṃ virādhaṃ rākṣasaṃ vane
analyzed: hatvā tu tam bhīma balam virādham rākṣasam vane

original: 3.004.001c tataḥ sītāṃ pariṣvajya samāśvāsya ca vīryavān
analyzed: tatas sītām pariṣvajya samāśvāsya ca vīryavān
abravīt lakṣmaṇām rāmaḥ bhrātaram dīpta tejasam

original: 3.004.002a kaṣṭaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ na ca smo vanagocarāḥ
analyzed: kaṣṭam vanam idam durgam na ca smaḥ vana gocarāḥ
abhigacchāmahe śīghram śarabhaṅgam tapodhanam
āśramam śarabhaṅgasya rāghavaḥ bhijagāma ha
tasya deva prabhāvasya tapasā bhāvita ātmanaḥ
samīpe śarabhaṅgasya dadarśa mahat adbhutam
vibhrājamānam vapuṣā sūrya vaiśvānara upamam
a saṃspṛśantam vasudhām dadarśa vibudha īśvaram
su prabhā ābharaṇam devam virajaḥ mbara dhāriṇam
tadvidhaiḥ eva bahubhiḥ pūjyamānam mahātmabhiḥ
haribhiḥ vājibhiḥ yuktam antarikṣa gatam ratham
dadarśa adūratas tasya taruṇa āditya saṃnibham
pāṇḍura abhra ghana prakhyam candra maṇḍala saṃnibham
apaśyat vimalam chatram citra mālya upaśobhitam
cāmara vyajane ca agrye rukma daṇḍe mahādhane
gṛhīte vana nārībhyām dhūyamāne ca mūrdhani
gandharva amara siddhāḥ ca bahavaḥ parama ṛṣayaḥ
antarikṣa gatam devam vāgbhiḥ agryābhiḥ īḍire

original: 3.004.011a dṛṣṭvā śatakratuṃ tatra rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā śatakratum tatra rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇam abravīt

original: 3.004.011c ye hayāḥ puruhūtasya purā śakrasya naḥ śrutāḥ
analyzed: ye hayāḥ puruhūtasya purā śakrasya naḥ śrutāḥ

original: 3.004.011e antarikṣagatā divyās ta ime harayo dhruvam
analyzed: antarikṣa gatāḥ divyāḥ te ime harayaḥ dhruvam

original: 3.004.012a ime ca puruṣavyāghra ye tiṣṭhanty abhito ratham
analyzed: ime ca puruṣa vyāghra ye tiṣṭhanti abhitas ratham
śatam śatam kuṇḍalinaḥ yuvānaḥ khaḍga pāṇayaḥ
uraḥ deśeṣu sarveṣām hārāḥ jvalana saṃnibhāḥ
rūpam bibhrati saumitre pañcaviṃśati vārṣikam

original: 3.004.014a etad dhi kila devānāṃ vayo bhavati nityadā
analyzed: etat hi kila devānām vayaḥ bhavati nityadā
yathā ime puruṣa vyāghrāḥ dṛśyante priya darśanāḥ

original: 3.004.015a ihaiva saha vaidehyā muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: iha eva saha vaidehyā muhūrtam tiṣṭha lakṣmaṇa

original: 3.004.015c yāvaj janāmy ahaṃ vyaktaṃ ka eṣa dyutimān rathe
analyzed: yāvat janāmi aham vyaktam kaḥ eṣa dyutimān rathe

original: 3.004.016a tam evam uktvā saumitrim ihaiva sthīyatām iti
analyzed: tam evam uktvā saumitrim iha eva sthīyatām iti
abhicakrāma kākutsthaḥ śarabhaṅga āśramam prati
tatas samabhigacchantam prekṣya rāmam śacīpatiḥ
śarabhaṅgam anujñāpya vibudhān idam abravīt

original: 3.004.018a ihopayāty asau rāmo yāvan māṃ nābhibhāṣate
analyzed: iha upayāti asau rāmaḥ yāvat mām na abhibhāṣate

original: 3.004.018c niṣṭhāṃ nayata tāvat tu tato māṃ draṣṭum arhati
analyzed: niṣṭhām nayata tāvat tu tatas mām draṣṭum arhati

original: 3.004.019a jitavantaṃ kṛtārthaṃ ca draṣṭāham acirād imam
analyzed: jitavantam kṛtārtham ca draṣṭā aham acirāt imam

original: 3.004.019c karma hy anena kartavyaṃ mahad anyaiḥ suduṣkaram
analyzed: karma hi anena kartavyam mahat anyaiḥ su duṣkaram

original: 3.004.020a iti vajrī tam āmantrya mānayitvā ca tāpasaṃ
analyzed: iti vajrī tam āmantrya mānayitvā ca tāpasam
rathena hari yuktena yayau divam ariṃdamaḥ
prayāte tu sahasrākṣe rāghavaḥ sa paricchadaḥ
agnihotram upāsīnam śarabhaṅgam upāgamat

original: 3.004.022a tasya pādau ca saṃgṛhya rāmaḥ sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tasya pādau ca saṃgṛhya rāmaḥ sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
niṣeduḥ tad anujñātāḥ labdha vāsāḥ nimantritāḥ

original: 3.004.023a tataḥ śakropayānaṃ tu paryapṛcchat sa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tatas śakra upayānam tu paryapṛcchat sa rāghavaḥ

original: 3.004.023c śarabhaṅgaś ca tat sarvaṃ rāghavāya nyavedayat
analyzed: śarabhaṅgaḥ ca tat sarvam rāghavāya nyavedayat

original: 3.004.024a mām eṣa varado rāma brahmalokaṃ ninīṣati
analyzed: mām eṣa vara daḥ rāma brahma lokam ninīṣati
jitam ugreṇa tapasā duṣprāpam akṛtātmabhiḥ
aham jñātvā nara vyāghra vartamānam adūrataḥ

original: 3.004.025c brahmalokaṃ na gacchāmi tvām adṛṣṭvā priyātithim
analyzed: brahma lokam na gacchāmi tvām a dṛṣṭvā priya atithim
samāgamya gamiṣyāmi tridivam deva sevitam

original: 3.004.026c akṣayā naraśārdūla jitā lokā mayā śubhāḥ
analyzed: akṣayāḥ nara śārdūla jitāḥ lokāḥ mayā śubhāḥ

original: 3.004.026e brāhmyāś ca nākapṛṣṭhyāś ca pratigṛhṇīṣva māmakān
analyzed: brāhmyāḥ ca nāka pṛṣṭhyāḥ ca pratigṛhṇīṣva māmakān
evam uktaḥ nara vyāghraḥ sarva śāstra viśāradaḥ
ṛṣiṇā śarabhaṅgena rāghavaḥ vākyam abravīt
aham eva āhariṣyāmi sarvān lokān mahā mune

original: 3.004.028c āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane
analyzed: āvāsam tu aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane
rāghaveṇa evam uktaḥ tu śakra tulya balena vai
śarabhaṅgaḥ mahā prājñaḥ punar eva abravīt vacaḥ

original: 3.004.030a sutīkṣṇam abhigaccha tvaṃ śucau deśe tapasvinam
analyzed: sutīkṣṇam abhigaccha tvam śucau deśe tapasvinam

original: 3.004.030c ramaṇīye vanoddeśe sa te vāsaṃ vidhāsyati
analyzed: ramaṇīye vana uddeśe sa te vāsam vidhāsyati

original: 3.004.031a eṣa panthā naravyāghra muhūrtaṃ paśya tāta mām
analyzed: eṣa panthāḥ nara vyāghra muhūrtam paśya tāta mām

original: 3.004.031c yāvaj jahāmi gātrāṇi jīrṇaṃ tvacam ivoragaḥ
analyzed: yāvat jahāmi gātrāṇi jīrṇam tvacam iva uragaḥ

original: 3.004.032a tato 'gniṃ sa samādhāya hutvā cājyena mantravit
analyzed: tatas gnim sa samādhāya hutvā ca ājyena mantra vid
śarabhaṅgaḥ mahā tejāḥ praviveśa hutāśanam

original: 3.004.033a tasya romāṇi keśāṃś ca dadāhāgnir mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasya romāṇi keśān ca dadāha agniḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: 3.004.033c jīrṇaṃ tvacaṃ tathāsthīni yac ca māṃsaṃ ca śoṇitam
analyzed: jīrṇam tvacam tathā asthīni yat ca māṃsam ca śoṇitam
sa ca pāvaka saṃkāśaḥ kumāraḥ samapadyata
utthāya agni cayāt tasmāt śarabhaṅgaḥ vyarocata

original: 3.004.035a sa lokān āhitāgnīnām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
analyzed: sa lokān āhitāgnīnām ṛṣīṇām ca mahātmanām
devānām ca vyatikramya brahma lokam vyarohata
sa puṇya karmā bhuvane dvijarṣabhaḥ
pitāmaham sa anucaram dadarśa ha
pitāmahaḥ ca api samīkṣya tam dvijam
nananda su svāgatam iti uvāca ha
śarabhaṅge divam prāpte muni saṃghāḥ samāgatāḥ
abhyagacchanta kākutstham rāmam jvalita tejasam
vaikhānasāḥ vālakhilyāḥ saṃprakṣālāḥ marīcipāḥ

original: 3.005.002c aśmakuṭṭāś ca bahavaḥ patrāhārāś ca tāpasāḥ
analyzed: aśmakuṭṭāḥ ca bahavaḥ patrāhārāḥ ca tāpasāḥ
dantolūkhalinaḥ ca eva tathā eva unmajjakāḥ pare
munayaḥ salila āhārāḥ vāyubhakṣāḥ tathā apare
ākāśanilayāḥ ca eva tathā sthaṇḍilaśāyinaḥ
tathā ūrdhva vāsinaḥ dāntāḥ tathā ārdra paṭa vāsasaḥ
sajapāḥ ca tapaḥ nityāḥ tathā pañcatapaḥ nvitāḥ
sarve brāhmyā śriyā juṣṭāḥ dṛḍha yoga samāhitāḥ
śarabhaṅga āśrame rāmam abhijagmuḥ ca tāpasāḥ

original: 3.005.006a abhigamya ca dharmajñā rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
analyzed: abhigamya ca dharma jñāḥ rāmam dharma bhṛtām varam
ūcuḥ parama dharma jñam ṛṣi saṃghāḥ samāhitāḥ
tvam ikṣvāku kulasya asya pṛthivyāḥ ca mahā rathaḥ

original: 3.005.007c pradhānaś cāsi nāthaś ca devānāṃ maghavān iva
analyzed: pradhānaḥ ca asi nāthaḥ ca devānām maghavān iva

original: 3.005.008a viśrutas triṣu lokeṣu yaśasā vikrameṇa ca
analyzed: viśrutaḥ triṣu lokeṣu yaśasā vikrameṇa ca

original: 3.005.008c pitṛvratatvaṃ satyaṃ ca tvayi dharmaś ca puṣkalaḥ
analyzed: pitṛ vrata tvam satyam ca tvayi dharmaḥ ca puṣkalaḥ
tvām āsādya mahātmānam dharma jñam dharma vatsalam

original: 3.005.009c arthitvān nātha vakṣyāmas tac ca naḥ kṣantum arhasi
analyzed: arthi tvāt nātha vakṣyāmaḥ tat ca naḥ kṣantum arhasi

original: 3.005.010a adhārmas tu mahāṃs tāta bhavet tasya mahīpateḥ
analyzed: adhārmaḥ tu mahān tāta bhavet tasya mahīpateḥ

original: 3.005.010c yo hared baliṣaḍbhāgaṃ na ca rakṣati putravat
analyzed: yaḥ haret bali ṣaṣ bhāgam na ca rakṣati putra vat

original: 3.005.011a yuñjānaḥ svān iva prāṇān prāṇair iṣṭān sutān iva
analyzed: yuñjānaḥ svān iva prāṇān prāṇaiḥ iṣṭān sutān iva
nitya yuktaḥ sadā rakṣan sarvān viṣaya vāsinaḥ

original: 3.005.012a prāpnoti śāśvatīṃ rāma kīrtiṃ sa bahuvārṣikīm
analyzed: prāpnoti śāśvatīm rāma kīrtim sa bahu vārṣikīm

original: 3.005.012c brahmaṇaḥ sthānam āsādya tatra cāpi mahīyate
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ sthānam āsādya tatra ca api mahīyate

original: 3.005.013a yat karoti paraṃ dharmaṃ munir mūlaphalāśanaḥ
analyzed: yat karoti param dharmam muniḥ mūla phala aśanaḥ

original: 3.005.013c tatra rājñaś caturbhāgaḥ prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ
analyzed: tatra rājñaḥ catur bhāgaḥ prajāḥ dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ
saḥ yam brāhmaṇa bhūyiṣṭhaḥ vānaprastha gaṇaḥ mahān

original: 3.005.014c tvan nātho 'nāthavad rāma rākṣasair vadhyate bhṛśam
analyzed: tvat nāthaḥ nātha vat rāma rākṣasaiḥ vadhyate bhṛśam
ehi paśya śarīrāṇi munīnām bhāvitātmanām

original: 3.005.015c hatānāṃ rākṣasair ghorair bahūnāṃ bahudhā vane
analyzed: hatānām rākṣasaiḥ ghoraiḥ bahūnām bahudhā vane
pampā nadī nivāsānām anu mandākinīm api
citrakūṭa ālayānām ca kriyate kadanam mahat

original: 3.005.017a evaṃ vayaṃ na mṛṣyāmo viprakāraṃ tapasvinam
analyzed: evam vayam na mṛṣyāmaḥ viprakāram tapasvinam
kriyamāṇam vane ghoram rakṣobhiḥ bhīma karmabhiḥ

original: 3.005.018a tatas tvāṃ śaraṇārthaṃ ca śaraṇyaṃ samupasthitāḥ
analyzed: tatas tvām śaraṇa artham ca śaraṇyam samupasthitāḥ
paripālaya naḥ rāma vadhyamānān niśācaraiḥ

original: 3.005.019a etac chrutvā tu kākutsthas tāpasānāṃ tapasvinām
analyzed: etat śrutvā tu kākutsthaḥ tāpasānām tapasvinām

original: 3.005.019c idaṃ provāca dharmātmā sarvān eva tapasvinaḥ
analyzed: idam provāca dharma ātmā sarvān eva tapasvinaḥ

original: 3.005.019e naivam arhatha māṃ vaktum ājñāpyo 'haṃ tapasvinam
analyzed: na evam arhatha mām vaktum ājñāpyaḥ ham tapasvinam
bhavatām artha siddhi artham āgataḥ ham yadṛcchayā

original: 3.005.020c tasya me 'yaṃ vane vāso bhaviṣyati mahāphalaḥ
analyzed: tasya me yam vane vāsaḥ bhaviṣyati mahā phalaḥ

original: 3.005.020e tapasvināṃ raṇe śatrūn hantum icchāmi rākṣasān
analyzed: tapasvinām raṇe śatrūn hantum icchāmi rākṣasān
dattvā varam ca api tapodhanānām
dharme dhṛta ātmā sahalakṣmaṇena
tapodhanaiḥ ca api saha ārya vṛttaḥ
sutīṣkṇam eva abhijagāma vīraḥ

original: 3.006.001a rāmas tu sahito bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ tu sahitaḥ bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ
sutīkṣṇasya āśrama padam jagāma saha taiḥ dvijaiḥ

original: 3.006.002a sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ nadīs tīrtva bahūdakāḥ
analyzed: sa gatvā dūram adhvānam nadīḥ tīrtvā bahu udakāḥ
dadarśa vipulam śailam mahā megham iva unnatam

original: 3.006.003a tatas tad ikṣvākuvarau satataṃ vividhair drumaiḥ
analyzed: tatas tat ikṣvāku varau satatam vividhaiḥ drumaiḥ

original: 3.006.003c kānanaṃ tau viviśatuḥ sītayā saha rāghavau
analyzed: kānanam tau viviśatuḥ sītayā saha rāghavau
praviṣṭaḥ tu vanam ghoram bahu puṣpa phala drumam
dadarśa āśramam ekānte cīra mālā pariṣkṛtam
tatra tāpasam āsīnam mala paṅka jaṭā dharam
rāmaḥ sutīkṣṇam vidhivat tapaḥ vṛddham abhāṣata

original: 3.006.006a rāmo 'ham asmi bhagavan bhavantaṃ draṣṭum āgataḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ ham asmi bhagavan bhavantam draṣṭum āgataḥ
tat mā abhivada dharma jña mahā ṛṣe satya vikrama

original: 3.006.007a sa nirīkṣya tato vīraṃ rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
analyzed: sa nirīkṣya tatas vīram rāmam dharma bhṛtām varam

original: 3.006.007c samāśliṣya ca bāhubhyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: samāśliṣya ca bāhubhyām idam vacanam abravīt

original: 3.006.008a svāgataṃ khalu te vīra rāma dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
analyzed: svāgatam khalu te vīra rāma dharma bhṛtām vara
āśramaḥ yam tvayā ākrāntaḥ sa nāthaḥ iva sāmpratam
pratīkṣamāṇaḥ tvām eva na ārohe ham mahā yaśaḥ

original: 3.006.009c devalokam ito vīra dehaṃ tyaktvā mahītale
analyzed: deva lokam itas vīra deham tyaktvā mahī tale
citrakūṭam upādāya rājya bhraṣṭaḥ si me śrutaḥ
iha upayātaḥ kākutsthaḥ deva rājaḥ śatakratuḥ

original: 3.006.010e sarvāṃl lokāñ jitān āha mama puṇyena karmaṇā
analyzed: sarvān lokān jitān āha mama puṇyena karmaṇā
teṣu deva ṛṣi juṣṭeṣu jiteṣu tapasā mayā
mad prasādāt sa bhāryaḥ tvam viharasva sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
tam ugra tapasam dīptam mahā ṛṣim satya vādinam
pratyuvāca ātmavān rāmaḥ brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥ
aham eva āhariṣyāmi svayam lokān mahā mune

original: 3.006.013c āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane
analyzed: āvāsam tu aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane
bhavān sarvatra kuśalaḥ sarva bhūta hite rataḥ
ākhyātaḥ śarabhaṅgena gautamena mahātmanā

original: 3.006.015a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa maharṣir lokaviśrutaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rāmeṇa mahā ṛṣiḥ loka viśrutaḥ
abravīt madhuram vākyam harṣeṇa mahatā āplutaḥ

original: 3.006.016a ayam evāśramo rāma guṇavān ramyatām iha
analyzed: ayam eva āśramaḥ rāma guṇavān ramyatām iha
ṛṣi saṃgha anucaritaḥ sadā mūla phalaiḥ yutaḥ
imam āśramam āgamya mṛga saṃghāḥ mahā yaśāḥ
aṭitvā pratigacchanti lobhayitvā akutobhayāḥ

original: 3.006.018a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya maharṣer lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā vacanam tasya mahā ṛṣeḥ lakṣmaṇa agrajaḥ

original: 3.006.018c uvāca vacanaṃ dhīro vikṛṣya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
analyzed: uvāca vacanam dhīraḥ vikṛṣya sa śaram dhanuḥ
tān aham su mahābhāga mṛga saṃghān samāgatān
hanyām niśita dhāreṇa śareṇa aśani varcasā

original: 3.006.020a bhavāṃs tatrābhiṣajyeta kiṃ syāt kṛcchrataraṃ tataḥ
analyzed: bhavān tatra abhiṣajyeta kim syāt kṛcchrataram tatas

original: 3.006.020c etasminn āśrame vāsaṃ ciraṃ tu na samarthaye
analyzed: etasmin āśrame vāsam ciram tu na samarthaye

original: 3.006.021a tam evam uktvā varadaṃ rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāgamat
analyzed: tam evam uktvā vara dam rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāgamat

original: 3.006.021c anvāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ tatra vāsam akalpayat
analyzed: anvāsya paścimām saṃdhyām tatra vāsam akalpayat
tatas śubham tāpasa bhojyam annam
svayam su tīkṣṇaḥ puruṣa ṛṣabhābhyām
tābhyām su satkṛtya dadau mahātmā
saṃdhyā nivṛttau rajanīm samīkṣya
rāmaḥ tu sahasaumitriḥ sutīkṣṇena abhipūjitaḥ
pariṇamya niśām tatra prabhāte pratyabudhyata

original: 3.007.002a utthāya tu yathākālaṃ rāghavaḥ saha sītayā
analyzed: utthāya tu yathākālam rāghavaḥ saha sītayā
upāspṛśat su śītena jalena utpala gandhinā

original: 3.007.003a atha te 'gniṃ surāṃś caiva vaidehī rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: atha te gnim surān ca eva vaidehī rāma lakṣmaṇau
kālyam vidhivat abhyarcya tapasvi śaraṇe vane
udayantam dinakaram dṛṣṭvā vigata kalmaṣāḥ
sutīkṣṇam abhigamya idam ślakṣṇam vacanam abruvan

original: 3.007.005a sukhoṣitāḥ sma bhagavaṃs tvayā pūjyena pūjitāḥ
analyzed: sukha uṣitāḥ sma bhagavan tvayā pūjyena pūjitāḥ
āpṛcchāmaḥ prayāsyāmaḥ munayaḥ tvarayanti naḥ
tvarāmahe vayam draṣṭum kṛtsnam āśrama maṇḍalam
ṛṣīṇām puṇya śīlānām daṇḍaka araṇya vāsinām
abhyanujñātum icchāmaḥ saha ebhiḥ muni puṅgavaiḥ
dharma nityaiḥ tapaḥ dāntaiḥ viśikhaiḥ iva pāvakaiḥ
a viṣahya ātapaḥ yāvat sūryaḥ na ati virājite
amārgeṇa āgatām lakṣmīm prāpya iva anvaya varjitaḥ

original: 3.007.009a tāvad icchāmahe gantum ity uktvā caraṇau muneḥ
analyzed: tāvat icchāmahe gantum iti uktvā caraṇau muneḥ
vavande sahasaumitriḥ sītayā saha rāghavaḥ
tau saṃspṛśantau caraṇau utthāpya muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 3.007.010c gāḍham āliṅgya sasneham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: gāḍham āliṅgya sa sneham idam vacanam abravīt

original: 3.007.011a ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānaṃ rāma saumitriṇā saha
analyzed: ariṣṭam gaccha panthānam rāma saumitriṇā saha
sītayā ca anayā sārdham chāyayā iva anuvṛttayā
paśya āśrama padam ramyam daṇḍaka araṇya vāsinām
eṣām tapasvinām vīra tapasā bhāvitātmanām
su prājya phala mūlāni puṣpitāni vanāni ca
praśānta mṛga yūthāni śānta pakṣi gaṇāni ca
phulla paṅkaja ṣaḍāni prasanna salilāni ca
kāraṇḍava vikīrṇāni taṭākāni sarāṃsi ca
drakṣyase dṛṣṭi ramyāṇi giri prasravaṇāni ca
ramaṇīyāni araṇyāni mayūra abhirutāni ca

original: 3.007.016a gamyatāṃ vatsa saumitre bhavān api ca gacchatu
analyzed: gamyatām vatsa saumitre bhavān api ca gacchatu

original: 3.007.016c āgantavyaṃ ca te dṛṣṭvā punar evāśramaṃ mama
analyzed: āgantavyam ca te dṛṣṭvā punar eva āśramam mama

original: 3.007.017a evam uktas tathety uktvā kākutsthaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tathā iti uktvā kākutsthaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
pradakṣiṇam munim kṛtā prasthātum upacakrame
tatas śubhatare tūṇī dhanuṣī ca āyata īkṣaṇā

original: 3.007.018c dadau sītā tayor bhrātroḥ khaḍgau ca vimalau tataḥ
analyzed: dadau sītā tayoḥ bhrātroḥ khaḍgau ca vimalau tatas

original: 3.007.019a ābadhya ca śubhe tūṇī cāpe cādāya sasvane
analyzed: ābadhya ca śubhe tūṇī cāpe ca ādāya sasvane

original: 3.007.019c niṣkrāntāv āśramād gantum ubhau tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: niṣkrāntau āśramāt gantum ubhau tau rāma lakṣmaṇau
sutīkṣṇena abhyanujñātam prasthitam raghunandanam

original: 3.008.001c vaidehī snigdhayā vācā bhartāram idam abravīt
analyzed: vaidehī snigdhayā vācā bhartāram idam abravīt

original: 3.008.002a ayaṃ dharmaḥ susūkṣmeṇa vidhinā prāpyate mahān
analyzed: ayam dharmaḥ su sūkṣmeṇa vidhinā prāpyate mahān

original: 3.008.002c nivṛttena ca śakyo 'yaṃ vyasanāt kāmajād iha
analyzed: nivṛttena ca śakyaḥ yam vyasanāt kāma jāt iha

original: 3.008.003a trīṇy eva vyasanāny atra kāmajāni bhavanty uta
analyzed: trīṇi eva vyasanāni atra kāma jāni bhavanti uta

original: 3.008.003c mithyā vākyaṃ paramakaṃ tasmād gurutarāv ubhau
analyzed: mithyā vākyam paramakam tasmāt gurutarau ubhau
para dāra abhigamanam vinā vairam ca raudra tā

original: 3.008.004a mithyāvākyaṃ na te bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati rāghava
analyzed: mithyāvākyam na te bhūtam na bhaviṣyati rāghava
kutas bhilaṣaṇam strīṇām pareṣām dharma nāśanam

original: 3.008.005a tac ca sarvaṃ mahābāho śakyaṃ voḍhuṃ jitendriyaiḥ
analyzed: tat ca sarvam mahā bāho śakyam voḍhum jita indriyaiḥ
tava vaśya indriya tvam ca jānāmi śubha darśana
tṛtīyam yat idam raudram para prāṇa abhihiṃsanam

original: 3.008.006c nirvairaṃ kriyate mohāt tac ca te samupasthitam
analyzed: nirvairam kriyate mohāt tat ca te samupasthitam
pratijñātaḥ tvayā vīra daṇḍaka araṇya vāsinām
ṛṣīṇām rakṣaṇa arthāya vadhaḥ rakṣasām

original: 3.008.008a etannimittaṃ ca vanaṃ daṇḍakā iti viśrutam
analyzed: etad nimittam ca vanam daṇḍakāḥ iti viśrutam
prasthitaḥ tvam saha bhrātrā dhṛta bāṇa śarāsanaḥ

original: 3.008.009a tatas tvāṃ prasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mama cintākulaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: tatas tvām prasthitam dṛṣṭvā mama cintā ākulam manaḥ

original: 3.008.009c tvad vṛttaṃ cintayantyā vai bhaven niḥśreyasaṃ hitam
analyzed: tvat vṛttam cintayantyāḥ vai bhavet niḥśreyasam hitam

original: 3.008.010a na hi me rocate vīra gamanaṃ daṇḍakān prati
analyzed: na hi me rocate vīra gamanam daṇḍakān prati

original: 3.008.010c kāraṇaṃ tatra vakṣyāmi vadantyāḥ śrūyatāṃ mama
analyzed: kāraṇam tatra vakṣyāmi vadantyāḥ śrūyatām mama

original: 3.008.011a tvaṃ hi bāṇadhanuṣpāṇir bhrātrā saha vanaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: tvam hi bāṇa dhanuṣpāṇiḥ bhrātrā saha vanam gataḥ

original: 3.008.011c dṛṣṭvā vanacarān sarvān kaccit kuryāḥ śaravyayam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā vana carān sarvān kaccit kuryāḥ śara vyayam
kṣatriyāṇām iha dhanuḥ hutāśasya indhanāni ca
samīpatas sthitam tejaḥ balam ucchrayate bhṛśam

original: 3.008.013a purā kila mahābāho tapasvī satyavāk śuciḥ
analyzed: purā kila mahā bāho tapasvī satya vāc śuciḥ

original: 3.008.013c kasmiṃś cid abhavat puṇye vane ratamṛgadvije
analyzed: kasmin cit abhavat puṇye vane rata mṛga dvije

original: 3.008.014a tasyaiva tapaso vighnaṃ kartum indraḥ śacīpatiḥ
analyzed: tasya eva tapasaḥ vighnam kartum indraḥ śacīpatiḥ
khaḍga pāṇiḥ atha agacchat āśramam bhaṭa rūpadhṛk

original: 3.008.015a tasmiṃs tad āśramapade nihitaḥ khaḍga uttamaḥ
analyzed: tasmin tat āśrama pade nihitaḥ khaḍgaḥ uttamaḥ

original: 3.008.015c sa nyāsavidhinā dattaḥ puṇye tapasi tiṣṭhataḥ
analyzed: sa nyāsa vidhinā dattaḥ puṇye tapasi tiṣṭhataḥ
sa tat śastram anuprāpya nyāsa rakṣaṇa tatparaḥ

original: 3.008.016c vane tu vicaraty eva rakṣan pratyayam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: vane tu vicarati eva rakṣan pratyayam ātmanaḥ

original: 3.008.017a yatra gacchaty upādātuṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca
analyzed: yatra gacchati upādātum mūlāni ca phalāni ca

original: 3.008.017c na vinā yāti taṃ khaḍgaṃ nyāsarakṣaṇatatparaḥ
analyzed: na vinā yāti tam khaḍgam nyāsa rakṣaṇa tatparaḥ

original: 3.008.018a nityaṃ śastraṃ parivahan krameṇa sa tapodhanaḥ
analyzed: nityam śastram parivahan krameṇa sa tapodhanaḥ

original: 3.008.018c cakāra raudrīṃ svāṃ buddhiṃ tyaktvā tapasi niścayam
analyzed: cakāra raudrīm svām buddhim tyaktvā tapasi niścayam
tatas sa raudra abhirataḥ pramattaḥ dharma karṣitaḥ

original: 3.008.019c tasya śastrasya saṃvāsāj jagāma narakaṃ muniḥ
analyzed: tasya śastrasya saṃvāsāt jagāma narakam muniḥ

original: 3.008.020a snehāc ca bahumānāc ca smāraye tvāṃ na śikṣaye
analyzed: snehāt ca bahu mānāt ca smāraye tvām na śikṣaye

original: 3.008.020c na kathaṃ cana sā kāryā hṛhītadhanuṣā tvayā
analyzed: na katham cana sā kāryā hṛhīta dhanuṣā tvayā

original: 3.008.021a buddhir vairaṃ vinā hantuṃ rākṣasān daṇḍakāśritān
analyzed: buddhiḥ vairam vinā hantum rākṣasān daṇḍaka āśritān

original: 3.008.021c aparādhaṃ vinā hantuṃ lokān vīra na kāmaye
analyzed: aparādham vinā hantum lokān vīra na kāmaye
kṣatriyāṇām tu vīrāṇām vaneṣu niyata ātmanām
dhanuṣā kāryam etāvat ārtānām abhirakṣaṇam

original: 3.008.023a kva ca śastraṃ kva ca vanaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ tapaḥ kva ca
analyzed: kva ca śastram kva ca vanam kva ca kṣātram tapaḥ kva ca

original: 3.008.023c vyāviddham idam asmābhir deśadharmas tu pūjyatām
analyzed: vyāviddham idam asmābhiḥ deśa dharmaḥ tu pūjyatām
tat ārya kaluṣā buddhiḥ jāyate śastra sevanāt

original: 3.008.024c punar gatvā tv ayodhyāyāṃ kṣatradharmaṃ cariṣyasi
analyzed: punar gatvā tu ayodhyāyām kṣatra dharmam cariṣyasi

original: 3.008.025a akṣayā tu bhavet prītiḥ śvaśrū śvaśurayor mama
analyzed: akṣayā tu bhavet prītiḥ śvaśrū śvaśurayoḥ mama

original: 3.008.025c yadi rājyaṃ hi saṃnyasya bhaves tvaṃ nirato muniḥ
analyzed: yadi rājyam hi saṃnyasya bhaveḥ tvam nirataḥ muniḥ

original: 3.008.026a dharmād arthaḥ prabhavati dharmāt prabhavate sukham
analyzed: dharmāt arthaḥ prabhavati dharmāt prabhavate sukham

original: 3.008.026c dharmeṇa labhate sarvaṃ dharmasāram idaṃ jagat
analyzed: dharmeṇa labhate sarvam dharma sāram idam jagat

original: 3.008.027a ātmānaṃ niyamais tais taiḥ karṣayitvā prayatnataḥ
analyzed: ātmānam niyamaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ karṣayitvā prayatnataḥ

original: 3.008.027c prāpyate nipuṇair dharmo na sukhāl labhyate sukham
analyzed: prāpyate nipuṇaiḥ dharmaḥ na sukhāt labhyate sukham

original: 3.008.028a nityaṃ śucimatiḥ saumya cara dharmaṃ tapovane
analyzed: nityam śuci matiḥ saumya cara dharmam tapaḥ vane

original: 3.008.028c sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tubhyaṃ trailokyam api tattvataḥ
analyzed: sarvam hi viditam tubhyam trailokyam api tattvataḥ
strī cāpalāt etat udāhṛtam me

original: dharmaṃ ca vaktuṃ tava kaḥ samarthaḥ
analyzed: dharmam ca vaktum tava kaḥ samarthaḥ
vicārya buddhyā tu saha anujena
yat rocate tat kuru mācireṇa

original: 3.009.001a vākyam etat tu vaidehyā vyāhṛtaṃ bhartṛbhaktayā
analyzed: vākyam etat tu vaidehyāḥ vyāhṛtam bhartṛ bhaktayā

original: 3.009.001c śrutvā dharme sthito rāmaḥ pratyuvācātha maithilīm
analyzed: śrutvā dharme sthitaḥ rāmaḥ pratyuvāca atha maithilīm

original: 3.009.002a hitam uktaṃ tvayā devi snigdhayā sadṛśaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: hitam uktam tvayā devi snigdhayā sadṛśam vacaḥ
kulam vyapadiśantyā ca dharma jñe janakātmaje

original: 3.009.003a kiṃ tu vakṣyāmy ahaṃ devi tvayaivoktam idaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: kim tu vakṣyāmi aham devi tvayā eva uktam idam vacaḥ

original: 3.009.003c kṣatriyair dhāryate cāpo nārtaśabdo bhaved iti
analyzed: kṣatriyaiḥ dhāryate cāpaḥ na ārta śabdaḥ bhavet iti
te ca ārtāḥ daṇḍaka araṇye munayaḥ saṃśita vratāḥ

original: 3.009.004c māṃ sīte svayam āgamya śaraṇyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: mām sīte svayam āgamya śaraṇyāḥ śaraṇam gatāḥ
vasantaḥ dharma niratāḥ vane mūla phala aśanāḥ

original: 3.009.005c na labhante sukhaṃ bhītā rākṣasaiḥ krūrakarmabhiḥ
analyzed: na labhante sukham bhītāḥ rākṣasaiḥ krūra karmabhiḥ

original: 3.009.006a kāle kāle ca niratā niyamair vividhair vane
analyzed: kāle kāle ca niratāḥ niyamaiḥ vividhaiḥ vane
bhakṣyante rākṣasaiḥ bhīmaiḥ nara māṃsa upajīvibhiḥ
te bhakṣyamāṇāḥ munayaḥ daṇḍaka araṇya vāsinaḥ
asmān abhyavapadya iti mām ūcuḥ dvijasattamāḥ

original: 3.009.008a mayā tu vacanaṃ śrutvā teṣām evaṃ mukhāc cyutam
analyzed: mayā tu vacanam śrutvā teṣām evam mukhāt cyutam
kṛtvā caraṇa śuśrūṣām vākyam etat udāhṛtam

original: 3.009.009a prasīdantu bhavanto me hrīr eṣā hi mamātulā
analyzed: prasīdantu bhavantaḥ me hrīḥ eṣā hi mama atulā
yadi īdṛśaiḥ aham vipraiḥ upastheyaiḥ upasthitaḥ

original: 3.009.009e kiṃ karomīti ca mayā vyāhṛtaṃ dvijasaṃnidhau
analyzed: kim karomi iti ca mayā vyāhṛtam dvija saṃnidhau

original: 3.009.010a sarvair eva samāgamya vāg iyaṃ samudāhṛtā
analyzed: sarvaiḥ eva samāgamya vāc iyam samudāhṛtā
rākṣasaiḥ daṇḍaka araṇye bahubhiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ

original: 3.009.010e arditāḥ sma bhṛśaṃ rāma bhavān nas trātum arhati
analyzed: arditāḥ sma bhṛśam rāma bhavān naḥ trātum arhati
homa kāle tu saṃprāpte parva kāleṣu ca anagha
dharṣayanti sma durdharṣāḥ rākṣasāḥ piśita aśanāḥ
rākṣasaiḥ dharṣitānām ca tāpasānām tapasvinām

original: 3.009.012c gatiṃ mṛgayamāṇānāṃ bhavān naḥ paramā gatiḥ
analyzed: gatim mṛgayamāṇānām bhavān naḥ paramā gatiḥ

original: 3.009.013a kāmaṃ tapaḥ prabhāvena śaktā hantuṃ niśācarān
analyzed: kāmam tapaḥ prabhāvena śaktāḥ hantum niśācarān

original: 3.009.013c cirārjitaṃ tu necchāmas tapaḥ khaṇḍayituṃ vayam
analyzed: cira arjitam tu nā icchāmaḥ tapaḥ khaṇḍayitum vayam
bahu vighnam tapaḥ nityam duścaram ca eva rāghava

original: 3.009.014c tena śāpaṃ na muñcāmo bhakṣyamāṇāś ca rākṣasaiḥ
analyzed: tena śāpam na muñcāmaḥ bhakṣyamāṇāḥ ca rākṣasaiḥ
tat ardyamānān rakṣobhiḥ daṇḍaka araṇya vāsibhiḥ

original: 3.009.015c rakṣanas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā tvannāthā hi vayaṃ vane
analyzed: rakṣanaḥ tvam saha bhrātrā tvad nāthāḥ hi vayam vane

original: 3.009.016a mayā caitad vacaḥ śrutvā kārtsnyena paripālanam
analyzed: mayā ca etat vacaḥ śrutvā kārtsnyena paripālanam
ṛṣīṇām daṇḍaka araṇye saṃśrutam janakātmaje

original: 3.009.017a saṃśrutya ca na śakṣyāmi jīvamānaḥ pratiśravam
analyzed: saṃśrutya ca na śakṣyāmi jīvamānaḥ pratiśravam

original: 3.009.017c munīnām anyathā kartuṃ satyam iṣṭaṃ hi me sadā
analyzed: munīnām anyathā kartum satyam iṣṭam hi me sadā

original: 3.009.018a apy ahaṃ jīvitaṃ jahyāṃ tvāṃ vā sīte salakṣmaṇām
analyzed: api aham jīvitam jahyām tvām vā sīte sa lakṣmaṇām

original: 3.009.018c na tu pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya brāhmaṇebhyo viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: na tu pratijñām saṃśrutya brāhmaṇebhyaḥ viśeṣataḥ

original: 3.009.019a tad avaśyaṃ mayā kāryam ṛṣīṇāṃ paripālanam
analyzed: tat avaśyam mayā kāryam ṛṣīṇām paripālanam

original: 3.009.019c anuktenāpi vaidehi pratijñāya tu kiṃ punaḥ
analyzed: an uktena api vaidehi pratijñāya tu kim punar

original: 3.009.020a mama snehāc ca sauhārdād idam uktaṃ tvayā vacaḥ
analyzed: mama snehāt ca sauhārdāt idam uktam tvayā vacaḥ

original: 3.009.020c parituṣṭo 'smy ahaṃ sīte na hy aniṣṭo 'nuśiṣyate
analyzed: parituṣṭaḥ smi aham sīte na hi aniṣṭaḥ nu śiṣyate

original: 3.009.020e sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca kulasya tava śobhane
analyzed: sadṛśam ca anurūpam ca kulasya tava śobhane
iti evam uktvā vacanam mahātmā
sītām priyām maithila rāja putrīm
rāmaḥ dhanuṣmān saha lakṣmaṇena
jagāma ramyāṇi tapovanāni

original: 3.010.001a agrataḥ prayayau rāmaḥ sītā madhye sumadhyamā
analyzed: agratas prayayau rāmaḥ sītā madhye sumadhyamā
pṛṣṭhatas tu dhanuṣpāṇiḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ nujagāma ha

original: 3.010.002a tau paśyamānau vividhāñ śailaprasthān vanāni ca
analyzed: tau paśyamānau vividhām śaila prasthān vanāni ca

original: 3.010.002c nadīś ca vividhā ramyā jagmatuḥ saha sītayā
analyzed: nadīḥ ca vividhāḥ ramyāḥ jagmatuḥ saha sītayā
sārasān cakravākān ca nadī pulina cāriṇaḥ

original: 3.010.003c sarāṃsi ca sapadmāni yutāni jalajaiḥ khagaiḥ
analyzed: sarāṃsi ca sa padmāni yutāni jala jaiḥ khagaiḥ
yūtha baddhān ca pṛṣatān mada unmattān viṣāṇinaḥ

original: 3.010.004c mahiṣāṃś ca varāhāṃś ca gajāṃś ca drumavairiṇaḥ
analyzed: mahiṣān ca varāhān ca gajān ca druma vairiṇaḥ

original: 3.010.005a te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ lambamāne divākare
analyzed: te gatvā dūram adhvānam lambamāne divākare
dadṛśuḥ sahitāḥ ramyam taṭākam yojana āyatam
padma puṣkara saṃbādham gaja yūthaiḥ alaṃkṛtam
sārasaiḥ haṃsa kādambaiḥ saṃkulam jalacāribhiḥ
prasanna salile ramya tasmin sarasi śuśruve

original: 3.010.007c gītavāditranirghoṣo na tu kaś cana dṛśyate
analyzed: gīta vāditra nirghoṣaḥ na tu kaḥ cana dṛśyate

original: 3.010.008a tataḥ kautūhalād rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
analyzed: tatas kautūhalāt rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ ca mahā rathaḥ
munim dharmabhṛtam nāma praṣṭum samupacakrame

original: 3.010.009a idam atyadbhutaṃ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ no mahāmune
analyzed: idam atyadbhutam śrutvā sarveṣām naḥ mahā mune

original: 3.010.009c kautūhalaṃ mahaj jātaṃ kim idaṃ sādhu kathyatām
analyzed: kautūhalam mahat jātam kim idam sādhu kathyatām

original: 3.010.010a tenaivam ukto dharmātmā rāghaveṇa munis tadā
analyzed: tena evam uktaḥ dharma ātmā rāghaveṇa muniḥ tadā
prabhāvam sarasaḥ kṛtsnam ākhyātum upacakrame
idam pañcāpsaraḥ nāma taṭākam sārvakālikam
nirmitam tapasā rāma muninā māṇḍakarṇinā

original: 3.010.012a sa hi tepe tapas tīvraṃ māṇḍakarṇir mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: sa hi tepe tapaḥ tīvram māṇḍakarṇiḥ mahā muniḥ
daśa varṣa sahasrāṇi vāyubhakṣaḥ jalāśraya
tatas pravyathitāḥ sarve devāḥ sa agni purogamāḥ
abruvan vacanam sarve paraspara samāgatāḥ

original: 3.010.013e asmakaṃ kasya cit sthānam eṣa prārthayate muniḥ
analyzed: asmakam kasya cit sthānam eṣa prārthayate muniḥ

original: 3.010.014a tataḥ kartuṃ tapovighnaṃ sarvair devair niyojitāḥ
analyzed: tatas kartum tapaḥ vighnam sarvaiḥ devaiḥ niyojitāḥ
pradhāna apsarasaḥ pañca vidyut calita varcasaḥ
apsarobhiḥ tatas tābhiḥ muniḥ dṛṣṭa parāvaraḥ
nītaḥ madana vaśya tvam surāṇām kārya siddhaye
tāḥ ca eva apsarasaḥ pañcamuneḥ patnī tvam āgatāḥ

original: 3.010.016c taṭāke nirmitaṃ tāsām asminn antarhitaṃ gṛham
analyzed: taṭāke nirmitam tāsām asmin antarhitam gṛham
tatra eva apsarasaḥ pañca nivasantyaḥ yathāsukham
ramayanti tapaḥ yogāt munim yauvanam āsthitam
tāsām saṃkrīḍamānānām eṣa vāditra niḥsvanaḥ
śrūyate bhūṣaṇa unmiśraḥ gīta śabdaḥ manoharaḥ
āścaryam iti tasya etat vacanam bhāvitātmanaḥ
rāghavaḥ pratijagrāha saha bhrātrā mahā yaśāḥ
evam kathayamānasya dadarśa āśrama maṇḍalam
kuśa cīra parikṣiptam nānā vṛkṣa samāvṛtam

original: 3.010.021a praviśya saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca rāghavaḥ
analyzed: praviśya saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca rāghavaḥ

original: 3.010.021c tadā tasmin sa kākutsthaḥ śrīmaty āśramamaṇḍale
analyzed: tadā tasmin sa kākutsthaḥ śrīmati āśrama maṇḍale
uṣitvā su sukham tatra pūrjyamānaḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ
jagāma ca āśramān teṣām paryāyeṇa tapasvinām

original: 3.010.023a yeṣām uṣitavān pūrvaṃ sakāśe sa mahāstravit
analyzed: yeṣām uṣitavān pūrvam sakāśe sa mahā astra vid

original: 3.010.023c kva cit paridaśān māsān ekaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kva cit
analyzed: kva cit paridaśān māsān ekam saṃvatsaram kva cit

original: 3.010.024a kva cic ca caturo māsān pañcaṣaṭ cāparān kva cit
analyzed: kva cit ca caturaḥ māsān pañca ṣaṭ ca aparān kva cit

original: 3.010.024c aparatrādhikān māsān adhyardham adhikaṃ kva cit
analyzed: aparatra adhikān māsān adhyardham adhikam kva cit

original: 3.010.025a trīn māsān aṣṭamāsāṃś ca rāghavo nyavasat sukham
analyzed: trīn māsān aṣṭa māsān ca rāghavaḥ nyavasat sukham

original: 3.010.025c tathā saṃvasatas tasya munīnām āśrameṣu vai
analyzed: tathā saṃvasataḥ tasya munīnām āśrameṣu vai
ramataḥ ca anukulyena yayuḥ saṃvatsarāḥ daśa

original: 3.010.026a parisṛtya ca dharmajño rāghavaḥ saha sītayā
analyzed: parisṛtya ca dharma jñaḥ rāghavaḥ saha sītayā
sutīkṣṇasya āśramam śrīmān punar eva ājagāma ha

original: 3.010.027a sa tam āśramam āgamya munibhiḥ pratipūjitaḥ
analyzed: sa tam āśramam āgamya munibhiḥ pratipūjitaḥ

original: 3.010.027c tatrāpi nyavasad rāmaḥ kaṃ cit kālam ariṃdamaḥ
analyzed: tatra api nyavasat rāmaḥ kam cit kālam ariṃdamaḥ

original: 3.010.028a athāśramastho vinayāt kadā cit taṃ mahāmunim
analyzed: atha āśrama sthaḥ vinayāt kadā cit tam mahā munim

original: 3.010.028c upāsīnaḥ sa kākutsthaḥ sutīkṣṇam idam abravīt
analyzed: upāsīnaḥ sa kākutsthaḥ sutīkṣṇam idam abravīt
asmin araṇye bhagavan agastyaḥ muni sattamaḥ

original: 3.010.029c vasatīti mayā nityaṃ kathāḥ kathayatāṃ śrutam
analyzed: vasati iti mayā nityam kathāḥ kathayatām śrutam

original: 3.010.030a na tu jānāmi taṃ deśaṃ vanasyāsya mahattayā
analyzed: na tu jānāmi tam deśam vanasya asya mahat tayā
kutra āśrama padam puṇyam mahā ṛṣeḥ tasya dhīmataḥ

original: 3.010.031a prasādāt tatra bhavataḥ sānujaḥ saha sītayā
analyzed: prasādāt tatra bhavataḥ sa anujaḥ saha sītayā
agastyam abhigaccheyam abhivādayitum munim
manorathaḥ mahān eṣa hṛdi saṃparivartate

original: 3.010.032c yad ahaṃ taṃ munivaraṃ śuśrūṣeyam api svayam
analyzed: yat aham tam muni varam śuśrūṣeyam api svayam

original: 3.010.033a iti rāmasya sa muniḥ śrutvā dharmātmano vacaḥ
analyzed: iti rāmasya sa muniḥ śrutvā dharma ātmanaḥ vacaḥ
sutīkṣṇaḥ pratyuvāca idam prītaḥ daśaratha ātmajam

original: 3.010.034a aham apy etad eva tvāṃ vaktukāmaḥ salakṣmaṇam
analyzed: aham api etat eva tvām vaktu kāmaḥ sa lakṣmaṇam
agastyam abhigaccha iti sītayā saha rāghava

original: 3.010.035a diṣṭyā tv idānīm arthe 'smin svayam eva bravīṣi mām
analyzed: diṣṭyā tu idānīm arthe smin svayam eva bravīṣi mām

original: 3.010.035c aham ākhyāsi te vatsa yatrāgastyo mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: aham ākhyāsi te vatsa yatra agastyaḥ mahā muniḥ

original: 3.010.036a yojanāny āśramāt tāta yāhi catvāri vai tataḥ
analyzed: yojanāni āśramāt tāta yāhi catvāri vai tatas
dakṣiṇena mahān śrīmān agastya bhrātuḥ āśramaḥ
sthala prāye vana uddeśe pippalī vana śobhite
bahu puṣpa phale ramye nānā śakuni nādite
padminyaḥ vividhāḥ tatra prasanna salilāḥ śivāḥ
haṃsa kāraṇḍava ākīrṇāḥ cakravāka upaśobhitāḥ

original: 3.010.039a tatraikāṃ rajanīm uṣya prabhāte rāma gamyatām
analyzed: tatra ekām rajanīm uṣya prabhāte rāma gamyatām
dakṣiṇām diśam āsthāya vanakhaṇḍasya pārśvatas
tatra agastya āśrama padam gatvā yojanam antaram
ramaṇīye vana uddeśe bahu pādapa saṃvṛte

original: 3.010.040e raṃsyate tatra vaidehī lakṣmaṇaś ca tvayā saha
analyzed: raṃsyate tatra vaidehī lakṣmaṇaḥ ca tvayā saha
sa hi ramyaḥ vana uddeśaḥ bahu pādapa saṃkulaḥ

original: 3.010.041c yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā draṣṭum agastyaṃ taṃ mahāmunim
analyzed: yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā draṣṭum agastyam tam mahā munim
adyā eva gamane buddhim rocayasva mahā yaśaḥ

original: 3.010.042a iti rāmo muneḥ śrutvā saha bhrātrābhivādya ca
analyzed: iti rāmaḥ muneḥ śrutvā saha bhrātrā abhivādya ca
pratasthe gastyam uddiśya sa anujaḥ saha sītayā
paśyan vanāni citrāṇi parvapān ca abhra saṃnibhān
sarāṃsi saritaḥ ca eva pathi mārga vaśa anugāḥ
sutīkṣṇena upadiṣṭena gatvā tena pathā sukham
idam parama saṃhṛṣṭaḥ vākyam lakṣmaṇam abravīt
etat eva āśrama padam nūnam tasya mahātmanaḥ
agastyasya muneḥ bhrātuḥ dṛśyate puṇya karmaṇaḥ

original: 3.010.046a yathā hīme vanasyāsya jñātāḥ pathi sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: yathā hi ime vanasya asya jñātāḥ pathi sahasraśas
saṃnatāḥ phala bhareṇa puṣpa bhāreṇa ca drumāḥ

original: 3.010.047a pippalīnāṃ ca pakvānāṃ vanād asmād upāgataḥ
analyzed: pippalīnām ca pakvānām vanāt asmāt upāgataḥ
gandhaḥ yam pavana utkṣiptaḥ sahasā kaṭuka udayaḥ

original: 3.010.048a tatra tatra ca dṛśyante saṃkṣiptāḥ kāṣṭhasaṃcayāḥ
analyzed: tatra tatra ca dṛśyante saṃkṣiptāḥ kāṣṭha saṃcayāḥ

original: 3.010.048c lūnāś ca pathi dṛśyante darbhā vaidūryavarcasaḥ
analyzed: lūnāḥ ca pathi dṛśyante darbhāḥ vaidūrya varcasaḥ
etat ca vana madhya stham kṛṣṇa abhra śikhara upamam
pāvakasya āśrama sthasya dhūma agram saṃpradṛśyate
vivikteṣu ca tīrtheṣu kṛta snānāḥ dvijātayaḥ
puṣpa upahāram kurvanti kusumaiḥ svayam

original: 3.010.051a tat sutīkṣṇasya vacanaṃ yathā saumya mayā śrutam
analyzed: tat sutīkṣṇasya vacanam yathā saumya mayā śrutam
agastyasya āśramaḥ bhrātuḥ nūnam eṣa bhaviṣyati
nigṛhya tarasā mṛtyum lokānām hita kāmyayā

original: 3.010.052c yasya bhrātrā kṛteyaṃ dik śaraṇyā puṇyakarmaṇā
analyzed: yasya bhrātrā kṛtā iyam diś śaraṇyā puṇya karmaṇā

original: 3.010.053a ihaikadā kila krūro vātāpir api celvalaḥ
analyzed: iha ekadā kila krūraḥ vātāpiḥ api ca ilvalaḥ
bhrātarau sahitau āstām brāhmaṇa ghnau mahā asurau

original: 3.010.054a dhārayan brāhmaṇaṃ rūpam ilvalaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ vadan
analyzed: dhārayan brāhmaṇam rūpam ilvalaḥ saṃskṛtam vadan

original: 3.010.054c āmantrayati viprān sa śrāddham uddiśya nirghṛṇaḥ
analyzed: āmantrayati viprān sa śrāddham uddiśya nirghṛṇaḥ

original: 3.010.055a bhrātaraṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhrātā tatas taṃ meṣarūpiṇam
analyzed: bhrātaram saṃskṛtam bhrātā tatas tam meṣa rūpiṇam

original: 3.010.055c tān dvijān bhojayām āsa śrāddhadṛṣṭena karmaṇā
analyzed: tān dvijān bhojayām āsa śrāddha dṛṣṭena karmaṇā
tatas bhuktavatām teṣām viprāṇām ilvalaḥ bravīt
vātāpe niṣkramasva iti svareṇa mahatā vadan

original: 3.010.057a tato bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā vātāpir meṣavan nadan
analyzed: tatas bhrātuḥ vacaḥ śrutvā vātāpiḥ meṣa vat nadan
bhittvā bhitvā śarīrāṇi brāhmaṇānām viniṣpatat
brāhmaṇānām sahasrāṇi taiḥ evam kāmarūpibhiḥ
vināśitāni saṃhatya nityaśas piśita aśanaiḥ
agastyena tadā devaiḥ prārthitena mahā ṛṣiṇā

original: 3.010.059c anubhūya kila śrāddhe bhakṣitaḥ sa mahāsuraḥ
analyzed: anubhūya kila śrāddhe bhakṣitaḥ sa mahā asuraḥ

original: 3.010.060a tataḥ saṃpannam ity uktvā dattvā hastāvasecanam
analyzed: tatas saṃpannam iti uktvā dattvā hasta avasecanam
bhrātaram niṣkramasva iti ilvalaḥ saḥ bhyabhāṣata

original: 3.010.061a taṃ tathā bhāṣamāṇaṃ tu bhrātaraṃ vipraghātinam
analyzed: tam tathā bhāṣamāṇam tu bhrātaram vipra ghātinam
abravīt prahasan dhīmān agastyaḥ muni sattamaḥ

original: 3.010.062a kuto niṣkramituṃ śaktir mayā jīrṇasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: kutas niṣkramitum śaktiḥ mayā jīrṇasya rakṣasaḥ

original: 3.010.062c bhrātus te meṣa rūpasya gatasya yamasādanam
analyzed: bhrātuḥ te meṣa rūpasya gatasya yama sādanam

original: 3.010.063a atha tasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhrātur nidhanasaṃśritam
analyzed: atha tasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhrātuḥ nidhana saṃśritam
pradharṣayitum ārebhe munim krodhāt niśācaraḥ
saḥ bhyadravat dvijendram tam muninā dīpta tejasā
cakṣuṣā anala kalpena nirdagdhaḥ nidhanam gataḥ
tasya ayam āśramaḥ bhrātuḥ taṭāka vana śobhitaḥ
vipra anukampayā yena karma idam duṣkaram kṛtam
evam kathayamānasya tasya saumitriṇā saha
rāmasya astam gataḥ sūryaḥ saṃdhyā kālaḥ bhyavartata

original: 3.010.067a upāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ saha bhrātrā yathāvidhi
analyzed: upāsya paścimām saṃdhyām saha bhrātrā yathāvidhi
praviveśa āśrama padam tam ṛṣim ca abhyavādayan

original: 3.010.068a samyak pratigṛhītas tu muninā tena rāghavaḥ
analyzed: samyak pratigṛhītaḥ tu muninā tena rāghavaḥ

original: 3.010.068c nyavasat tāṃ niśām ekāṃ prāśya mūlaphalāni ca
analyzed: nyavasat tām niśām ekām prāśya mūla phalāni ca
tasyām rātryām vyatītāyām vimale sūrya maṇḍale
bhrātaram tam agastyasya āmantrayata rāghavaḥ

original: 3.010.070a abhivādaye tvā bhagavan sukham adhyuṣito niśām
analyzed: abhivādaye tvā bhagavan sukham adhyuṣitaḥ niśām

original: 3.010.070c āmantraye tvāṃ gacchāmi guruṃ te draṣṭum agrajam
analyzed: āmantraye tvām gacchāmi gurum te draṣṭum agrajam
gamyatām iti tena uktaḥ jagāma raghunandanaḥ
yathā uddiṣṭena mārgeṇa vanam tat ca avalokayan

original: 3.010.072a nīvārān panasāṃs tālāṃs timiśān vañjulān dhavān
analyzed: nīvārān panasān tālān timiśān vañjulān dhavān

original: 3.010.072c ciribilvān madhūkāṃś ca bilvān api ca tindukān
analyzed: ciribilvān madhūkān ca bilvān api ca tindukān
puṣpitān puṣpita agrābhiḥ latābhiḥ anuveṣṭitān
dadarśa rāmaḥ śataśas tatra kāntāra pādapān
hasti hastaiḥ vimṛditān vānaraiḥ upaśobhitān
mattaiḥ śakuni saṃghaiḥ ca śataśas pratināditān
tatas bravīt samīpa stham rāmaḥ rājīva locanaḥ
pṛṣṭhatas nugatam vīram lakṣmaṇam lakṣmī vardhanam

original: 3.010.076a snigdhapatrā yathā vṛkṣā yathā kṣāntā mṛgadvijāḥ
analyzed: snigdha patrāḥ yathā vṛkṣāḥ yathā kṣāntāḥ mṛga dvijāḥ
āśramaḥ na ati dūra sthaḥ mahā ṛṣeḥ bhāvitātmanaḥ

original: 3.010.077a agastya iti vikhyāto loke svenaiva karmaṇā
analyzed: agastyaḥ iti vikhyātaḥ loke svena eva karmaṇā
āśramaḥ dṛśyate tasya pariśrānta śrama apahaḥ
prājya dhūma ākula vanaḥ cīra mālā pariṣkṛtaḥ
praśānta mṛga yūthaḥ ca nānā śakuni nāditaḥ
nigṛhya tarasā mṛtyum lokānām hita kāmyayā

original: 3.010.079c dakṣiṇā dik kṛtā yena śaraṇyā puṇyakarmaṇā
analyzed: dakṣiṇā diś kṛtā yena śaraṇyā puṇya karmaṇā
tasya idam āśrama padam prabhāvāt yasya rākṣasaiḥ

original: 3.010.080c dig iyaṃ dakṣiṇā trāsād dṛśyate nopabhujyate
analyzed: diś iyam dakṣiṇā trāsāt dṛśyate na upabhujyate

original: 3.010.081a yadā prabhṛti cākrāntā dig iyaṃ puṇyakarmaṇā
analyzed: yadā prabhṛti ca ākrāntā diś iyam puṇya karmaṇā
tadā prabhṛti nirvairāḥ praśāntāḥ rajanīcarāḥ

original: 3.010.082a nāmnā ceyaṃ bhagavato dakṣiṇā dik pradakṣiṇā
analyzed: nāmnā ca iyam bhagavataḥ dakṣiṇā diś pradakṣiṇā
prathitā triṣu lokeṣu durdharṣā krūra karmabhiḥ
mārgam niroddhum satatam bhāskarasya acala uttamaḥ

original: 3.010.083c saṃdeśaṃ pālayaṃs tasya vindhyaśaulo na vardhate
analyzed: saṃdeśam pālayan tasya vindhyaśaulaḥ na vardhate
ayam dīrgha āyuṣaḥ tasya loke viśruta karmaṇaḥ
agastyasya āśramaḥ śrīmān vinīta mṛga sevitaḥ

original: 3.010.085a eṣa lokārcitaḥ sādhur hite nityaṃ rataḥ satām
analyzed: eṣa loka arcitaḥ sādhuḥ hite nityam rataḥ satām
asmān adhigatān eṣa śreyasā yojayiṣyati
ārādhayiṣyāmi atra aham agastyam tam mahā munim

original: 3.010.086c śeṣaṃ ca vanavāsasya saumya vatsyāmy ahaṃ prabho
analyzed: śeṣam ca vana vāsasya saumya vatsyāmi aham prabho

original: 3.010.087a atra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: atra devāḥ sa gandharvāḥ siddhāḥ ca parama ṛṣayaḥ
agastyam niyata āhāram satatam paryupāsate

original: 3.010.088a nātra jīven mṛṣāvādī krūro vā yadi vā śaṭhaḥ
analyzed: na atra jīvet mṛṣāvādī krūraḥ vā yadi vā śaṭhaḥ

original: 3.010.088c nṛśaṃsaḥ kāma vṛtto vā munir eṣa tathāvidhaḥ
analyzed: nṛśaṃsaḥ kāma vṛttaḥ vā muniḥ eṣa tathāvidhaḥ

original: 3.010.089a atra devāś ca yakṣāś ca nāgāś ca patagaiḥ saha
analyzed: atra devāḥ ca yakṣāḥ ca nāgāḥ ca patagaiḥ saha
vasanti niyata āhāraḥ dharmam ārādhayiṣṇavaḥ
atra siddhāḥ mahātmānaḥ vimānaiḥ sūrya saṃnibhaiḥ

original: 3.010.090c tyaktvā dehān navair dehaiḥ svaryātāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: tyaktvā dehāt navaiḥ dehaiḥ svaryātāḥ parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: 3.010.091a yakṣatvam amaratvaṃ ca rājyāni vividhāni ca
analyzed: yakṣa tvam amara tvam ca rājyāni vividhāni ca

original: 3.010.091c atra devāḥ prayacchanti bhūtair ārādhitāḥ śubhaiḥ
analyzed: atra devāḥ prayacchanti bhūtaiḥ ārādhitāḥ śubhaiḥ
āgatāḥ sma āśrama padam saumitre praviśa agratas

original: 3.010.092c nivedayeha māṃ prāptam ṛṣaye saha sītayā
analyzed: nivedaya iha mām prāptam ṛṣaye saha sītayā
sa praviśya āśrama padam lakṣmaṇaḥ rāghava anujaḥ

original: 3.011.001c agastyaśiṣyam āsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: agastya śiṣyam āsādya vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 3.011.002a rājā daśaratho nāma jyeṣṭhas tasya suto balī
analyzed: rājā daśarathaḥ nāma jyeṣṭhaḥ tasya sutaḥ balī

original: 3.011.002c rāmaḥ prāpto muniṃ draṣṭuṃ bhāryayā saha sītayā
analyzed: rāmaḥ prāptaḥ munim draṣṭum bhāryayā saha sītayā

original: 3.011.003a lakṣmaṇo nāma tasyāhaṃ bhrātā tv avarajo hitaḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ nāma tasya aham bhrātā tu avarajaḥ hitaḥ

original: 3.011.003c anukūlaś ca bhaktaś ca yadi te śrotram āgataḥ
analyzed: anukūlaḥ ca bhaktaḥ ca yadi te śrotram āgataḥ

original: 3.011.004a te vayaṃ vanam atyugraṃ praviṣṭāḥ pitṛśāsanāt
analyzed: te vayam vanam ati ugram praviṣṭāḥ pitṛ śāsanāt
draṣṭum icchāmahe sarve bhagavantam nivedyatām
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya tapodhanaḥ
tathā iti uktvā agni śaraṇam praviveśa niveditum

original: 3.011.006a sa praviśya muni śreṣṭhaṃ tapasā duṣpradharṣaṇam
analyzed: sa praviśya muni śreṣṭham tapasā duṣpradharṣaṇam
kṛta añjaliḥ uvāca idam rāma āgamanam añjasā

original: 3.011.007a putrau daśarathasyemau rāmo lakṣmaṇa eva ca
analyzed: putrau daśarathasya imau rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ eva ca
praviṣṭau āśrama padam sītayā saha bhāryayā
draṣṭum bhavantam āyātau śuśrūṣā artham ariṃdamau
yat atra anantaram tat tvam ājñāpayitum arhasi

original: 3.011.009a tataḥ śiṣyād upaśrutya prāptaṃ rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam
analyzed: tatas śiṣyāt upaśrutya prāptam rāmam sa lakṣmaṇam

original: 3.011.009c vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: vaidehīm ca mahābhāgām idam vacanam abravīt

original: 3.011.010a diṣṭyā rāmaś cirasyādya draṣṭuṃ māṃ samupāgataḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā rāmaḥ cirasya adya draṣṭum mām samupāgataḥ

original: 3.011.010c manasā kāṅkṣitaṃ hy asya mayāpy āgamanaṃ prati
analyzed: manasā kāṅkṣitam hi asya mayā api āgamanam prati
gamyatām satkṛtaḥ rāmaḥ sa bhāryaḥ saha lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 3.011.011c praveśyatāṃ samīpaṃ me kiṃ cāsau na praveśitaḥ
analyzed: praveśyatām samīpam me kim ca asau na praveśitaḥ

original: 3.011.012a evam uktas tu muninā dharmajñena mahātmanā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu muninā dharma jñena mahātmanā
abhivādya abravīt śiṣyaḥ tathā iti niyata añjaliḥ

original: 3.011.013a tato niṣkramya saṃbhrāntaḥ śiṣyo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
analyzed: tatas niṣkramya saṃbhrāntaḥ śiṣyaḥ lakṣmaṇam abravīt

original: 3.011.013c kvāsau rāmo muniṃ draṣṭum etu praviśatu svayam
analyzed: kva asau rāmaḥ munim draṣṭum etu praviśatu svayam
tatas gatvā āśrama padam śiṣyeṇa saha lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 3.011.014c darśayām āsa kākutsthaṃ sītāṃ ca janakātmajām
analyzed: darśayām āsa kākutstham sītām ca janakātmajām

original: 3.011.015a taṃ śiṣyaḥ praśritaṃ vākyam agastyavacanaṃ bruvan
analyzed: tam śiṣyaḥ praśritam vākyam agastya vacanam bruvan
prāveśayat yathānyāyam satkāra artham su satkṛtam
praviveśa tatas rāmaḥ sītayā saha lakṣmaṇaḥ
praśānta hariṇa ākīrṇam āśramam hi avalokayan

original: 3.011.017a sa tatra brahmaṇaḥ sthānam agneḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca
analyzed: sa tatra brahmaṇaḥ sthānam agneḥ sthānam tathā eva ca

original: 3.011.017c viṣṇoḥ sthānaṃ mahendrasya sthānaṃ caiva vivasvataḥ
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ sthānam mahā indrasya sthānam ca eva vivasvataḥ

original: 3.011.018a somasthānaṃ bhagasthānaṃ sthānaṃ kauberam eva ca
analyzed: soma sthānam bhaga sthānam sthānam kauberam eva ca

original: 3.011.018c dhātur vidhātuḥ sthānaṃ ca vāyoḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca
analyzed: dhātuḥ vidhātuḥ sthānam ca vāyoḥ sthānam tathā eva ca

original: 3.011.019a tataḥ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto munir apy abhiniṣpatat
analyzed: tatas śiṣyaiḥ parivṛtaḥ muniḥ api abhiniṣpatat
tam dadarśa agratas rāmaḥ munīnām dīpta tejasam
abravīt vacanam vīraḥ lakṣmaṇam lakṣmi vardhanam

original: 3.011.020a eṣa lakṣmaṇa niṣkrāmaty agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: eṣa lakṣmaṇa niṣkrāmati agastyaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
audāryeṇa avagacchāmi nidhānam tapasām imam
evam uktvā mahā bāhuḥ agastyam sūrya varcasam
jagrāha parama prītaḥ tasya pādau paraṃtapaḥ

original: 3.011.022a abhivādya tu dharmātmā tasthau rāmaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: abhivādya tu dharma ātmā tasthau rāmaḥ kṛta añjaliḥ

original: 3.011.022c sītayā saha vaidehyā tadā rāma salakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: sītayā saha vaidehyā tadā rāma sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
pratigṛhya ca kākutstham arcayitvā āsana udakaiḥ

original: 3.011.023c kuśalapraśnam uktvā ca āsyatām iti so 'bravīt
analyzed: kuśalapraśnam uktvā ca āsyatām iti saḥ bravīt

original: 3.011.024a agniṃ hutvā pradāyārghyam atithiṃ pratipūjya ca
analyzed: agnim hutvā pradāya arghyam atithim pratipūjya ca

original: 3.011.024c vānaprasthena dharmeṇa sa teṣāṃ bhojanaṃ dadau
analyzed: vānaprasthena dharmeṇa sa teṣām bhojanam dadau
prathamam ca upaviśya atha dharma jñaḥ muni puṃgavaḥ
uvāca rāmam āsīnam prāñjalim dharma kovidam
anyathā khalu kākutstha tapasvī samudācaran

original: 3.011.026c duḥsākṣīva pare loke svāni māṃsāni bhakṣayet
analyzed: duḥsākṣī iva pare loke svāni māṃsāni bhakṣayet
rājā sarvasya lokasya dharma cārī mahā rathaḥ

original: 3.011.027c pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca bhavān prāptaḥ priyātithiḥ
analyzed: pūjanīyaḥ ca mānyaḥ ca bhavān prāptaḥ priya atithiḥ

original: 3.011.028a evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpaiś cānyaiś ca rāghavam
analyzed: evam uktvā phalaiḥ mūlaiḥ puṣpaiḥ ca anyaiḥ ca rāghavam
pūjayitvā yathākāmam punar eva tatas bravīt
idam divyam mahat cāpam hema vajra vibhūṣitam
vaiṣṇavam puruṣa vyāghra nirmitam viśvakarmaṇā
amoghaḥ sūrya saṃkāśaḥ brahma dattaḥ śara uttamaḥ
dattaḥ mama mahā indreṇa tūṇī ca akṣaya sāyakau

original: 3.011.031a saṃpūrṇau niśitair bāṇair jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ
analyzed: saṃpūrṇau niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ jvaladbhiḥ iva pāvakaiḥ
mahā rājata kośaḥ yam asiḥ hema vibhūṣitaḥ

original: 3.011.032a anena dhanuṣā rāma hatvā saṃkhye mahāsurān
analyzed: anena dhanuṣā rāma hatvā saṃkhye mahā asurān

original: 3.011.032c ājahāra śriyaṃ dīptāṃ purā viṣṇur divaukasām
analyzed: ājahāra śriyam dīptām purā viṣṇuḥ divaukasām

original: 3.011.033a tad dhanus tau ca tūṇīrau śaraṃ khaḍgaṃ ca mānada
analyzed: tat dhanuḥ tau ca tūṇīrau śaram khaḍgam ca mānada
jayāya pratigṛhṇīṣva vajram vajradharaḥ yathā

original: 3.011.034a evam uktvā mahātejāḥ samastaṃ tad varāyudham
analyzed: evam uktvā mahā tejāḥ samastam tat vara āyudham

original: 3.011.034c dattvā rāmāya bhagavān agastyaḥ punar abravīt
analyzed: dattvā rāmāya bhagavān agastyaḥ punar abravīt

original: 3.012.001a rāma prīto 'smi bhadraṃ te parituṣṭo 'smi lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: rāma prītaḥ smi bhadram te parituṣṭaḥ smi lakṣmaṇa

original: 3.012.001c abhivādayituṃ yan māṃ prāptau sthaḥ saha sītayā
analyzed: abhivādayitum yat mām prāptau sthaḥ saha sītayā
adhva śrameṇa vām khedaḥ bādhate pracura śramaḥ
vyaktam utkaṇṭhate ca api maithilī janakātmajā

original: 3.012.003a eṣā hi sukumārī ca duḥkhaiś ca na vimānitā
analyzed: eṣā hi sukumārī ca duḥkhaiḥ ca na vimānitā
prājya doṣam vanam praptā bhartṛ sneha pracoditā

original: 3.012.004a yathaiṣā ramate rāma iha sītā tathā kuru
analyzed: yathā eṣā ramate rāmaḥ iha sītā tathā kuru

original: 3.012.004c duṣkaraṃ kṛtavaty eṣā vane tvām anugacchatī
analyzed: duṣkaram kṛtavatī eṣā vane tvām anugacchatī

original: 3.012.005a eṣā hi prakṛtiḥ strīṇām āsṛṣṭe raghunandana
analyzed: eṣā hi prakṛtiḥ strīṇām āsṛṣṭe raghunandana
sama stham anurajyante viṣama stham tyajanti ca
śatahradānām lola tvam śastrāṇām tīkṣṇa tām tathā
garuḍa anilayoḥ śaighryam anugacchanti yoṣitaḥ

original: 3.012.007a iyaṃ tu bhavato bhāryā doṣair etair vivarjitāḥ
analyzed: iyam tu bhavataḥ bhāryā doṣaiḥ etaiḥ vivarjitāḥ

original: 3.012.007c ślāghyā ca vyapadeśyā ca yathā devī hy arundhatī
analyzed: ślāghyā ca vyapadeśyā ca yathā devī hi arundhatī

original: 3.012.008a alaṃkṛto 'yaṃ deśaś ca yatra saumitriṇā saha
analyzed: alaṃkṛtaḥ yam deśaḥ ca yatra saumitriṇā saha

original: 3.012.008c vaidehyā cānayā rāma vatsyasi tvam ariṃdama
analyzed: vaidehyā ca anayā rāma vatsyasi tvam ariṃdama

original: 3.012.009a evam uktas tu muninā rāghavaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu muninā rāghavaḥ saṃyata añjaliḥ

original: 3.012.009c uvāca praśritaṃ vākyam ṛṣiṃ dīptam ivānalam
analyzed: uvāca praśritam vākyam ṛṣim dīptam iva analam
dhanyaḥ smi anugṛhītaḥ smi yasya me muni puṃgavaḥ
guṇaiḥ sa bhrātṛ bhāryasya vara daḥ parituṣyati

original: 3.012.011a kiṃ tu vyādiśa me deśaṃ sodakaṃ bahukānanam
analyzed: kim tu vyādiśa me deśam sa udakam bahu kānanam
yatra āśrama padam kṛtvā vaseyam nirataḥ sukham

original: 3.012.012a tato 'bravīn muni śreṣṭhaḥ śrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam
analyzed: tatas bravīt muni śreṣṭhaḥ śrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam

original: 3.012.012c dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ dharmātmā dhīro dhīrataraṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: dhyātvā muhūrtam dharma ātmā dhīraḥ dhīrataram vacaḥ
itas dvi yojane tāta bahu mūla phala udakaḥ
deśaḥ bahu mṛgaḥ śrīmān pañcavaṭī abhiviśrutaḥ
tatra gatvā āśrama padam kṛtvā saumitriṇā saha

original: 3.012.014c ramasva tvaṃ pitur vākyaṃ yathoktam anupālayan
analyzed: ramasva tvam pituḥ vākyam yathā uktam anupālayan

original: 3.012.015a vidito hy eṣa vṛttānto mama sarvas tavānagha
analyzed: viditaḥ hi eṣa vṛttāntaḥ mama sarvaḥ tava anagha

original: 3.012.015c tapasaś ca prabhāvena snehād daśarathasya ca
analyzed: tapasaḥ ca prabhāvena snehāt daśarathasya ca

original: 3.012.016a hṛdayasthaś ca te chando vijñātas tapasā mayā
analyzed: hṛdaya sthaḥ ca te chandaḥ vijñātaḥ tapasā mayā

original: 3.012.016c iha vāsaṃ pratijñāya mayā saha tapovane
analyzed: iha vāsam pratijñāya mayā saha tapaḥ vane

original: 3.012.017a ataś ca tvām ahaṃ brūmi gaccha pañcavaṭīm iti
analyzed: atas ca tvām aham brūmi gaccha pañcavaṭīm iti

original: 3.012.017c sa hi ramyo vanoddeśo maithilī tatra raṃsyate
analyzed: sa hi ramyaḥ vana uddeśaḥ maithilī tatra raṃsyate

original: 3.012.018a sa deśaḥ ślāghanīyaś ca nātidūre ca rāghava
analyzed: sa deśaḥ ślāghanīyaḥ ca na ati dūre ca rāghava

original: 3.012.018c godāvaryāḥ samīpe ca maithilī tatra raṃsyate
analyzed: godāvaryāḥ samīpe ca maithilī tatra raṃsyate
prājya mūla phalaiḥ ca eva nānā dvija gaṇaiḥ yutaḥ

original: 3.012.019c viviktaś ca mahābāho puṇyo ramyas tathaiva ca
analyzed: viviktaḥ ca mahā bāho puṇyaḥ ramyaḥ tathā eva ca

original: 3.012.020a bhavān api sadāraś ca śaktaś ca parirakṣaṇe
analyzed: bhavān api sa dāraḥ ca śaktaḥ ca parirakṣaṇe

original: 3.012.020c api cātra vasan rāmas tāpasān pālayiṣyasi
analyzed: api ca atra vasan rāmaḥ tāpasān pālayiṣyasi

original: 3.012.021a etad ālakṣyate vīra madhukānāṃ mahad vanam
analyzed: etat ālakṣyate vīra madhukānām mahat vanam
uttareṇa asya gantavyam nyagrodham abhigacchatā
tatas sthalam upāruhya parvatasya avidūrataḥ
khyātaḥ pañcavaṭī iti eva nitya puṣpita kānanaḥ

original: 3.012.023a agastyenaivam uktas tu rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
analyzed: agastyena evam uktaḥ tu rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
sātkṛtya āmantrayām āsa tam ṛṣim satya vādinam
tau tu tena abhyanujñātau kṛta pāda abhivandanau
tad āśramāt pañcavaṭīm jagmatuḥ saha sītayā
gṛhīta cāpau tu narādhipa ātmajau
viṣakta tūṇī samareṣu a kātarau
yathā upadiṣṭena pathā mahā ṛṣiṇā
prajagmatuḥ pañcavaṭīm samāhitau
atha pañcavaṭīm gacchan antarā raghunandanaḥ
āsasāda mahā kāyam gṛdhram bhīma parākramam

original: 3.013.002a taṃ dṛṣṭvā tau mahābhāgau vanasthaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā tau mahābhāgau vana stham rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 3.013.002c menāte rākṣasaṃ pakṣiṃ bruvāṇau ko bhavān iti
analyzed: menāte rākṣasam pakṣim bruvāṇau kaḥ bhavān iti

original: 3.013.003a sa tau madhurayā vācā saumyayā prīṇayann iva
analyzed: sa tau madhurayā vācā saumyayā prīṇayan iva

original: 3.013.003c uvāca vatsa māṃ viddhi vayasyaṃ pitur ātmanaḥ
analyzed: uvāca vatsa mām viddhi vayasyam pituḥ ātmanaḥ

original: 3.013.004a sa taṃ pitṛsakhaṃ buddhvā pūjayām āsa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: sa tam pitṛ sakham buddhvā pūjayām āsa rāghavaḥ

original: 3.013.004c sa tasya kulam avyagram atha papraccha nāma ca
analyzed: sa tasya kulam avyagram atha papraccha nāma ca

original: 3.013.005a rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā kulam ātmānam eva ca
analyzed: rāmasya vacanam śrutvā kulam ātmānam eva ca
ācacakṣe dvijaḥ tasmai sarva bhūta samudbhavam
pūrva kāle mahā bāho ye prajāpatayaḥ bhavan

original: 3.013.006c tān me nigadataḥ sarvān āditaḥ śṛṇu rāghava
analyzed: tān me nigadataḥ sarvān āditas śṛṇu rāghava
kardamaḥ prathamaḥ teṣām vikṛtaḥ tad anantaram

original: 3.013.007c śeṣaś ca saṃśrayaś caiva bahuputraś ca vīryavān
analyzed: śeṣaḥ ca saṃśrayaḥ ca eva bahuputraḥ ca vīryavān

original: 3.013.008a sthāṇur marīcir atriś ca kratuś caiva mahābalaḥ
analyzed: sthāṇuḥ marīciḥ atriḥ ca kratuḥ ca eva mahā balaḥ

original: 3.013.008c pulastyaś cāṅgirāś caiva pracetāḥ pulahas tathā
analyzed: pulastyaḥ ca aṅgirāḥ ca eva pracetāḥ pulahaḥ tathā
dakṣaḥ vivasvān aparaḥ riṣṭanemiḥ ca rāghava

original: 3.013.009c kaśyapaś ca mahātejās teṣām āsīc ca paścimaḥ
analyzed: kaśyapaḥ ca mahā tejāḥ teṣām āsīt ca paścimaḥ

original: 3.013.010a prajāpates tu dakṣasya babhūvur iti naḥ śrutam
analyzed: prajāpateḥ tu dakṣasya babhūvuḥ iti naḥ śrutam
ṣaṣṭiḥ duhitaraḥ rāma yaśasvinyaḥ mahā yaśaḥ
kaśyapaḥ pratijagrāha tāsām aṣṭau sumadhyamāḥ

original: 3.013.011c aditiṃ ca ditiṃ caiva danūm api ca kālakām
analyzed: aditim ca ditim ca eva danūm api ca kālakām

original: 3.013.012a tāmrāṃ krodhavaśāṃ caiva manuṃ cāpy analām api
analyzed: tāmrām krodhavaśām ca eva manum ca api analām api

original: 3.013.012c tās tu kanyās tataḥ prītaḥ kaśyapaḥ punar abravīt
analyzed: tāḥ tu kanyāḥ tatas prītaḥ kaśyapaḥ punar abravīt

original: 3.013.013a putrāṃs trailokyabhartṝn vai janayiṣyatha mat samān
analyzed: putrān trailokya bhartṝn vai janayiṣyatha mat samān

original: 3.013.013c aditis tan manā rāma ditiś ca danur eva ca
analyzed: aditiḥ tat manāḥ rāma ditiḥ ca danuḥ eva ca

original: 3.013.014a kālakā ca mahābāho śeṣās tv amanaso 'bhavan
analyzed: kālakā ca mahā bāho śeṣāḥ tu amanasaḥ bhavan
adityām jajñire devāḥ trayastriṃśat ariṃdama

original: 3.013.015a ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca paraṃtapa
analyzed: ādityāḥ vasavaḥ rudrāḥ aśvinau ca paraṃtapa

original: 3.013.015c ditis tv ajanayat putrān daityāṃs tāta yaśasvinaḥ
analyzed: ditiḥ tu ajanayat putrān daityān tāta yaśasvinaḥ
teṣām iyam vasumatī purā āsīt sa vana arṇavā

original: 3.013.016c danus tv ajanayat putram aśvagrīvam ariṃdama
analyzed: danuḥ tu ajanayat putram aśvagrīvam ariṃdama
narakam kālakam ca eva kālakā api vyajāyata

original: 3.013.017c krauñcīṃ bhāsīṃ tathā śyenīṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrīṃ tathā śukīm
analyzed: krauñcīm bhāsīm tathā śyenīm dhṛtarāṣṭrīm tathā śukīm
tāmrā api suṣuve kanyāḥ pañca etāḥ loka viśrutāḥ

original: 3.013.018c ulūkāñ janayat krauñcī bhāsī bhāsān vyajāyata
analyzed: ulūkām janayat krauñcī bhāsī bhāsān vyajāyata

original: 3.013.019a śyenī śyenāṃś ca gṛdhrāṃś ca vyajāyata sutejasaḥ
analyzed: śyenī śyenān ca gṛdhrān ca vyajāyata su tejasaḥ

original: 3.013.019c dhṛtarāṣṭrī tu haṃsāṃś ca kalahaṃsāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭrī tu haṃsān ca kalahaṃsān ca sarvaśas

original: 3.013.020a cakravākāṃś ca bhadraṃ te vijajñe sāpi bhāminī
analyzed: cakravākān ca bhadram te vijajñe sā api bhāminī

original: 3.013.020c śukī natāṃ vijajñe tu natāyā vinatā sutā
analyzed: śukī natām vijajñe tu natāyāḥ vinatā sutā
daśa krodha vaśāḥ rāma vijajñe pi ātma saṃbhavāḥ

original: 3.013.021c mṛgīṃ ca mṛgamandāṃ ca harīṃ bhadramadām api
analyzed: mṛgīm ca mṛgamandām ca harīm bhadramadām api

original: 3.013.022a mātaṅgīm atha śārdūlīṃ śvetāṃ ca surabhīṃ tathā
analyzed: mātaṅgīm atha śārdūlīm śvetām ca surabhīm tathā
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpannām surasām kadrukām api

original: 3.013.023a apatyaṃ tu mṛgāḥ sarve mṛgyā naravarottama
analyzed: apatyam tu mṛgāḥ sarve mṛgyāḥ nara vara uttama

original: 3.013.023c ṛṣkāś ca mṛgamandāyāḥ sṛmarāś camarās tathā
analyzed: ṛṣkāḥ ca mṛgamandāyāḥ sṛmarāḥ camarāḥ tathā

original: 3.013.024a tatas tv irāvatīṃ nāma jajñe bhadramadā sutām
analyzed: tatas tu irāvatīm nāma jajñe bhadramadā sutām

original: 3.013.024c tasyās tv airāvataḥ putro lokanātho mahāgajaḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ tu airāvataḥ putraḥ loka nāthaḥ mahāgajaḥ

original: 3.013.025a haryāś ca harayo 'patyaṃ vānarāś ca tapasvinaḥ
analyzed: haryāḥ ca harayaḥ patyam vānarāḥ ca tapasvinaḥ

original: 3.013.025c golāṅgūlāṃś ca śārdūlī vyāghrāṃś cājanayat sutān
analyzed: golāṅgūlān ca śārdūlī vyāghrān ca ajanayat sutān

original: 3.013.026a mātaṅgyās tv atha mātaṅgā apatyaṃ manujarṣabha
analyzed: mātaṅgyāḥ tu atha mātaṅgāḥ apatyam manuja ṛṣabha

original: 3.013.026c diśāgajaṃ tu śvetākṣaṃ śvetā vyajanayat sutam
analyzed: diśāgajam tu śvetākṣam śvetā vyajanayat sutam

original: 3.013.027a tato duhitarau rāma surabhir devy ajāyata
analyzed: tatas duhitarau rāma surabhiḥ devī ajāyata

original: 3.013.027c rohiṇīṃ nāma bhadraṃ te gandharvīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
analyzed: rohiṇīm nāma bhadram te gandharvīm ca yaśasvinīm

original: 3.013.028a rohiṇy ajanayad gā vai gandharvī vājinaḥ sutān
analyzed: rohiṇī ajanayat gāḥ vai gandharvī vājinaḥ sutān

original: 3.013.028c surasājanayan nāgān rāma kadrūś ca pannagān
analyzed: surasā janayat nāgān rāma kadrūḥ ca pannagān
manuḥ manuṣyām janayat kaśyapasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 3.013.029c brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyāñ śūdrāṃś ca manujarṣabha
analyzed: brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyām śūdrān ca manuja ṛṣabha

original: 3.013.030a mukhato brāhmaṇā jātā urasaḥ kṣatriyās tathā
analyzed: mukhataḥ brāhmaṇāḥ jātāḥ urasaḥ kṣatriyāḥ tathā

original: 3.013.030c ūrubhyāṃ jajñire vaiśyāḥ padbhyāṃ śūdrā iti śrutiḥ
analyzed: ūrubhyām jajñire vaiśyāḥ padbhyām śūdrāḥ iti śrutiḥ
sarvān puṇya phalān vṛkṣān analā api vyajāyata

original: 3.013.031c vinatā ca śukī pautrī kadrūś ca surasā svasā
analyzed: vinatā ca śukī pautrī kadrūḥ ca surasā svasā
kadrūḥ nāga sahaskram tu vijajñe dharaṇīdharam

original: 3.013.032c dvau putrau vinatāyās tu garuḍo 'ruṇa eva ca
analyzed: dvau putrau vinatāyāḥ tu garuḍaḥ ruṇaḥ eva ca

original: 3.013.033a tasmāj jāto 'ham aruṇāt saṃpātiś ca mamāgrajaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt jātaḥ ham aruṇāt saṃpātiḥ ca mama agrajaḥ

original: 3.013.033c jaṭāyur iti māṃ viddhi śyenīputram ariṃdama
analyzed: jaṭāyuḥ iti mām viddhi śyenī putram ariṃdama
saḥ ham vāsa sahāyaḥ te bhaviṣyāmi yadi icchasi

original: 3.013.034c sītāṃ ca tāta rakṣiṣye tvayi yāte salakṣmaṇe
analyzed: sītām ca tāta rakṣiṣye tvayi yāte sa lakṣmaṇe
jaṭāyuṣam tu pratipūjya rāghavaḥ
mudā pariṣvajya ca saṃnataḥ bhavat
pituḥ hi śuśrāva sakhi tvam ātmavān
jaṭāyuṣā saṃkathitam punar punar
sa tatra sītām paridāya maithilīm
saha eva tena atibalena pakṣiṇā
jagāma tām pañcavaṭīm sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
ripūn didhakṣam śalabhān iva analaḥ
tatas pañcavaṭīm gatvā nānā vyāla mṛga āyutām
uvāca bhrātaram rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇam dīpta tejasam

original: 3.014.002a āgatāḥ sma yathoddiṣṭam amuṃ deśaṃ maharṣiṇā
analyzed: āgatāḥ sma yathā uddiṣṭam amum deśam mahā ṛṣiṇā
ayam pañcavaṭī deśaḥ saumya puṣpita kānanaḥ

original: 3.014.003a sarvataś cāryatāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kānane nipuṇo hy asi
analyzed: sarvatas cāryatām dṛṣṭiḥ kānane nipuṇaḥ hi asi

original: 3.014.003c āśramaḥ katarasmin no deśe bhavati saṃmataḥ
analyzed: āśramaḥ katarasmin naḥ deśe bhavati saṃmataḥ

original: 3.014.004a ramate yatra vaidehī tvam ahaṃ caiva lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: ramate yatra vaidehī tvam aham ca eva lakṣmaṇa
tādṛśaḥ dṛśyatām deśaḥ saṃnikṛṣṭa jalāśayaḥ
vana rāmaṇyakam yatra jala rāmaṇyakam tathā
saṃnikṛṣṭam ca yatra syāt samidh puṣpa kuśa udakam

original: 3.014.006a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakmaṇaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rāmeṇa lakmaṇaḥ saṃyata añjaliḥ

original: 3.014.006c sītā samakṣaṃ kākutstham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: sītā samakṣam kākutstham idam vacanam abravīt

original: 3.014.007a paravān asmi kākutstha tvayi varṣaśataṃ sthite
analyzed: paravān asmi kākutstha tvayi varṣa śatam sthite

original: 3.014.007c svayaṃ tu rucire deśe kriyatām iti māṃ vada
analyzed: svayam tu rucire deśe kriyatām iti mām vada
su prītaḥ tena vākyena lakṣmaṇasya mahā dyutiḥ
vimṛśan rocayām āsa deśam sarva guṇa anvitam

original: 3.014.009a sa taṃ ruciram ākramya deśam āśramakarmaṇi
analyzed: sa tam ruciram ākramya deśam āśrama karmaṇi

original: 3.014.009c haste gṛhītvā hastena rāmaḥ saumitrim abravīt
analyzed: haste gṛhītvā hastena rāmaḥ saumitrim abravīt

original: 3.014.010a ayaṃ deśaḥ samaḥ śrīmān puṣpitair tarubhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: ayam deśaḥ samaḥ śrīmān puṣpitaiḥ tarubhiḥ vṛtaḥ
iha āśrama padam saumya yathāvat kartum arhasi
iyam āditya saṃkāśaiḥ padmaiḥ surabhi gandhibhiḥ
adūre dṛśyate ramyā padminī padma śobhitā
yathā ākhyātam agastyena muninā bhāvitātmanā

original: 3.014.012c iyaṃ godāvarī ramyā puṣpitais tarubhir vṛtā
analyzed: iyam godāvarī ramyā puṣpitaiḥ tarubhiḥ vṛtā
haṃsa kāraṇḍava ākīrṇā cakravāka upaśobhitā
na ati dūre na ca āsanne mṛga yūtha nipīḍitā
mayūra nāditāḥ ramyāḥ prāṃśavaḥ bahu kandarāḥ

original: 3.014.014c dṛśyante girayaḥ saumya phullais tarubhir āvṛtāḥ
analyzed: dṛśyante girayaḥ saumya phullaiḥ tarubhiḥ āvṛtāḥ

original: 3.014.015a sauvarṇe rājatais tāmrair deśe deśe ca dhātubhiḥ
analyzed: sauvarṇe rājataiḥ tāmraiḥ deśe deśe ca dhātubhiḥ
gavākṣitāḥ iva ābhānti gajāḥ parama bhaktibhiḥ

original: 3.014.016a sālais tālais tamālaiś ca kharjūraiḥ panasāmrakaiḥ
analyzed: sālaiḥ tālaiḥ tamālaiḥ ca kharjūraiḥ panasa āmrakaiḥ
nīvāraiḥ timiśaiḥ ca eva puṃnāgaiḥ ca upaśobhitāḥ

original: 3.014.017a cūtair aśokais tilakaiś campakaiḥ ketakair api
analyzed: cūtaiḥ aśokaiḥ tilakaiḥ campakaiḥ ketakaiḥ api
puṣpa gulma latā upetaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ tarubhiḥ āvṛtāḥ

original: 3.014.018a candanaiḥ syandanair nīpaiḥ panasair lakucair api
analyzed: candanaiḥ syandanaiḥ nīpaiḥ panasaiḥ lakucaiḥ api
dhava aśvakarṇa khadiraiḥ śamī kiṃśuka pāṭalaiḥ

original: 3.014.019a idaṃ puṇyam idaṃ medhyam idaṃ bahumṛgadvijam
analyzed: idam puṇyam idam medhyam idam bahu mṛga dvijam

original: 3.014.019c iha vatsyāma saumitre sārdham etena pakṣiṇā
analyzed: iha vatsyāma saumitre sārdham etena pakṣiṇā

original: 3.014.020a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ para vīra hā
acireṇa āśramam bhrātuḥ cakāra su mahā balaḥ
parṇa śālām su vipulām tatra saṃghāta mṛttikām
su stambhām maskaraiḥ dīrghaiḥ kṛta vaṃśām su śobhanām

original: 3.014.022a sa gatvā lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān nadīṃ godāvarīṃ tadā
analyzed: sa gatvā lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān nadīm godāvarīm tadā

original: 3.014.022c snātvā padmāni cādāya saphalaḥ punar āgataḥ
analyzed: snātvā padmāni ca ādāya sa phalaḥ punar āgataḥ

original: 3.014.023a tataḥ puṣpabaliṃ kṛtvā śāntiṃ ca sa yathāvidhi
analyzed: tatas puṣpa balim kṛtvā śāntim ca sa yathāvidhi

original: 3.014.023c darśayām āsa rāmāya tad āśramapadaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: darśayām āsa rāmāya tat āśrama padam kṛtam

original: 3.014.024a sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtaṃ saumyam āśramaṃ saha sītayā
analyzed: sa tam dṛṣṭvā kṛtam saumyam āśramam saha sītayā
rāghavaḥ parṇa śālāyām harṣam āhārayat param
su saṃhṛṣṭaḥ pariṣvajya bāhubhyām lakṣmaṇam tadā

original: 3.014.025c atisnigdhaṃ ca gāḍhaṃ ca vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
analyzed: ati snigdham ca gāḍham ca vacanam ca idam abravīt

original: 3.014.026a prīto 'smi te mahat karma tvayā kṛtam idaṃ prabho
analyzed: prītaḥ smi te mahat karma tvayā kṛtam idam prabho

original: 3.014.026c pradeyo yannimittaṃ te pariṣvaṅgo mayā kṛtaḥ
analyzed: pradeyaḥ yad nimittam te pariṣvaṅgaḥ mayā kṛtaḥ
bhāva jñena kṛtajñena dharma jñena ca lakṣmaṇa

original: 3.014.027c tvayā putreṇa dharmātmā na saṃvṛttaḥ pitā mama
analyzed: tvayā putreṇa dharma ātmā na saṃvṛttaḥ pitā mama

original: 3.014.028a evaṃ lakṣmaṇam uktvā tu rāghavo lakṣmivardhanaḥ
analyzed: evam lakṣmaṇam uktvā tu rāghavaḥ lakṣmī vardhanaḥ

original: 3.014.028c tasmin deśe bahuphale nyavasat sa sukhaṃ vaśī
analyzed: tasmin deśe bahu phale nyavasat sa sukham vaśī

original: 3.014.029a kaṃ cit kālaṃ sa dharmātmā sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca
analyzed: kaṃ cit kālam sa dharma ātmā sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca
anvāsyamānaḥ nyavasat svarga loke yathā amaraḥ

original: 3.015.001a vasatas tasya tu mukhaṃ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: vasataḥ tasya tu mukham rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
śarad vyapāye hemante ṛtuḥ iṣṭaḥ pravartate

original: 3.015.002a sa kadā cit prabhātāyāṃ śarvaryāṃ raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: sa kadā cit prabhātāyām śarvaryām raghunandanaḥ
prayayau abhiṣeka artham ramyam godāvarīm nadīm

original: 3.015.003a prahvaḥ kalaśahastas taṃ sītayā saha vīryavān
analyzed: prahvaḥ kalaśa hastaḥ tam sītayā saha vīryavān
pṛṣṭhatas nuvrajan bhrātā saumitriḥ idam abravīt

original: 3.015.004a ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāptaḥ priyo yas te priyaṃvada
analyzed: ayam sa kālaḥ saṃprāptaḥ priyaḥ yaḥ te priyaṃvada
alaṃkṛtaḥ iva ābhāti yena saṃvatsaraḥ śubhaḥ
nīhāra paruṣaḥ lokaḥ pṛṣhivī sasya mālinī
jalāni an upabhogyāni subhagaḥ havyavāhanaḥ
pūjābhiḥ abhyarcya pitṛ devatāḥ
kṛta āgrayaṇakāḥ kāle santaḥ vigata kalmaṣāḥ
prājya kāmāḥ janapadāḥ saṃpannatara gorasāḥ
vicaranti mahīpālāḥ yātrā artham vijigīṣavaḥ
sevamāne dṛḍham sūrye diśam antaka sevitām
vihīna tilakā iva strī nā uttarā diś prakāśate
prakṛtyā hima kośa āḍhyaḥ dūra sūryaḥ ca sāmpratam
yathārtha nāmā su vyaktam himavān himavān giriḥ
atyanta sukha saṃcārāḥ madhyāhne sparśataḥ sukhāḥ
divasāḥ subhaga ādityāḥ chāyā salila durbhagāḥ
mṛdu sūryāḥ sa nīhārāḥ paṭu śītāḥ sa mārutāḥ
śūnya araṇyāḥ hima dhvastāḥ divasāḥ bhānti sāmpratam
nivṛtta ākāśa śayanāḥ puṣya nītāḥ hima aruṇāḥ
śītāḥ vṛddhatara āyāmāḥ triyāmāḥ yānti sāmpratam
niḥśvāsa andhaḥ iva ādarśaḥ candramāḥ na prakāśate
jyotsnā tuṣāra malinā paurṇamāsyām na rājate

original: 3.015.014c sīteva cātapa śyāmā lakṣyate na tu śobhate
analyzed: sītā iva ca ātapa śyāmā lakṣyate na tu śobhate
prakṛtyā śītala sparśaḥ hima viddhaḥ ca sāmpratam
pravāti paścimaḥ vāyuḥ kāle dviguṇa śītalaḥ
bāṣpa channān araṇyāni yava godhūmavanti ca
śobhante bhyudite sūrye nadadbhiḥ krauñca sārasaiḥ
kharjūra puṣpa ākṛtibhiḥ śirobhiḥ pūrṇa taṇḍulaiḥ
śobhante kim cit ālambāḥ śālayaḥ kanaka prabhāḥ
mayūkhaiḥ upasarpadbhiḥ hima nīhāra saṃvṛtaiḥ

original: 3.015.018c dūram abhyuditaḥ sūryaḥ śaśāṅka iva lakṣyate
