analyzed: dūram abhyuditaḥ sūryaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ iva lakṣyate
agrāhya vīryaḥ pūrvāhṇe madhyāhne sparśataḥ sukhaḥ

original: 3.015.019c saṃraktaḥ kiṃ cid āpāṇḍur ātapaḥ śobhate kṣitau
analyzed: saṃraktaḥ kim cit āpāṇḍuḥ ātapaḥ śobhate kṣitau
avaśyāya nipātena kim cit praklinna śādvalā
vanānām śobhate bhūmiḥ niviṣṭa taruṇa ātapā
avaśyāya tamaḥ naddhāḥ nīhāra tamasā āvṛtāḥ
prasuptāḥ iva lakṣyante vipuṣpāḥ vana rājayaḥ
bāṣpa saṃchanna salilāḥ ruta vijñeya sārasāḥ
hima ārdra vālukaiḥ tīraiḥ saritaḥ bhānti sāmpratam
tuṣāra patanāt ca eva mṛdu tvāt bhāskarasya ca

original: 3.015.023c śaityād agāgrastham api prāyeṇa rasavaj jalam
analyzed: śaityāt aga agra stham api prāyeṇa rasavat jalam
jarā jarjaritaiḥ parṇaiḥ śīrṇa kesara karṇikaiḥ
nāla śeṣāḥ hima dhvastāḥ na bhānti kamala ākarāḥ
asmin tu puruṣa vyāghra kāle duḥkha samanvitaḥ

original: 3.015.025c tapaś carati dharmātmā tvadbhaktyā bharataḥ pure
analyzed: tapaḥ carati dharma ātmā tvad bhaktyā bharataḥ pure

original: 3.015.026a tyaktvā rājyaṃ ca mānaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca vividhān bahūn
analyzed: tyaktvā rājyam ca mānam ca bhogān ca vividhān bahūn
tapasvī niyata āhāraḥ śete śīte mahī tale

original: 3.015.027a so 'pi velām imāṃ nūnam abhiṣekārtham udyataḥ
analyzed: saḥ pi velām imām nūnam abhiṣeka artham udyataḥ

original: 3.015.027c vṛtaḥ prakṛtibhir nityaṃ prayāti sarayūṃ nadīm
analyzed: vṛtaḥ prakṛtibhiḥ nityam prayāti sarayūm nadīm
atyanta sukha saṃvṛddhaḥ sukumāraḥ hima arditaḥ
katham tu apararātreṣu sarayūm avagāhate
padma patra īkṣaṇaḥ śyāmaḥ śrīmān nirudaraḥ mahān

original: 3.015.029c dharmajñaḥ satyavādī ca hrī niṣedho jitendriyaḥ
analyzed: dharma jñaḥ satya vādī ca hrī niṣedhaḥ jita indriyaḥ
priya abhibhāṣī madhuraḥ dīrgha bāhuḥ ariṃdamaḥ
saṃtyajya vividhān saukhyān āryam sarva ātmanā āśritaḥ

original: 3.015.031a jitaḥ svargas tava bhrātrā bharatena mahātmanā
analyzed: jitaḥ svargaḥ tava bhrātrā bharatena mahātmanā

original: 3.015.031c vanastham api tāpasye yas tvām anuvidhīyate
analyzed: vanastham api tāpasye yaḥ tvām anuvidhīyate

original: 3.015.032a na pitryam anuvarntante mātṛkaṃ dvipadā iti
analyzed: na pitryam anuvarntante mātṛkam dvipadāḥ iti
khyātaḥ loka pravādaḥ yam bharatena anyathā kṛtaḥ

original: 3.015.033a bhartā daśaratho yasyāḥ sādhuś ca bharataḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: bhartā daśarathaḥ yasyāḥ sādhuḥ ca bharataḥ sutaḥ

original: 3.015.033c kathaṃ nu sāmbā kaikeyī tādṛśī krūradarśinī
analyzed: katham nu sā ambā kaikeyī tādṛśī krūra darśinī

original: 3.015.034a ity evaṃ lakṣmaṇe vākyaṃ snehād bruvati dharmike
analyzed: iti evam lakṣmaṇe vākyam snehāt bruvati dharmike
parivādam jananyāḥ tam asahan rāghavaḥ bravīt

original: 3.015.035a na te 'mbā madhyamā tāta garhitavyā kathaṃ cana
analyzed: na te mbā madhyamā tāta garhitavyā katham cana
tām eva ikṣvāku nāthasya bharatasya kathām kuru

original: 3.015.036a niścitāpi hi me buddhir vanavāse dṛḍhavratā
analyzed: niścitā api hi me buddhiḥ vana vāse dṛḍha vratā
bharata sneha saṃtaptā bāliśī kriyate punar

original: 3.015.037a ity evaṃ vilapaṃs tatra prāpya godāvarīṃ nadīm
analyzed: iti evam vilapan tatra prāpya godāvarīm nadīm
cakre bhiṣekam kākutsthaḥ sa anujaḥ saha sītayā

original: 3.015.038a tarpayitvātha salilais te pitṝn daivatāni ca
analyzed: tarpayitvā atha salilaiḥ te pitṝn daivatāni ca

original: 3.015.038c stuvanti smoditaṃ sūryaṃ devatāś ca samāhitāḥ
analyzed: stuvanti sma uditam sūryam devatāḥ ca samāhitāḥ
kṛta abhiṣekaḥ sa rarāja rāmaḥ
sītā dvitīyaḥ saha lakṣmaṇena
kṛta abhiṣekaḥ tu aga rāja putryā
rudraḥ sa nandiḥ bhagavān iva īśaḥ

original: 3.016.001a kṛtābhiṣeko rāmas tu sītā saumitrir eva ca
analyzed: kṛta abhiṣekaḥ rāmaḥ tu sītā saumitriḥ eva ca

original: 3.016.001c tasmād godāvarītīrāt tato jagmuḥ svam āśramam
analyzed: tasmāt godāvarī tīrāt tatas jagmuḥ svam āśramam
āśramam tam upāgamya rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
kṛtvā paurvāhṇikam karma parṇa śālām upāgamat

original: 3.016.003a sa rāmaḥ parṇaśālāyām āsīnaḥ saha sītayā
analyzed: sa rāmaḥ parṇa śālāyām āsīnaḥ saha sītayā
virarāja mahā bāhuḥ citrayā candramāḥ iva

original: 3.016.003e lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cakāra vividhāḥ kathāḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cakāra vividhāḥ kathāḥ
tadā āsīnasya rāmasya kathā saṃsakta cetasaḥ

original: 3.016.004c taṃ deśaṃ rākṣasī kā cid ājagāma yadṛcchayā
analyzed: tam deśam rākṣasī kā cit ājagāma yadṛcchayā

original: 3.016.005a sā tu śūrpaṇakhā nāma daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: sā tu śūrpaṇakhā nāma daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ
bhaginī rāmam āsādya dadarśa tridaśa upamam
siṃha uraskam mahā bāhum padma patra nibha īkṣaṇam
sukumāram mahāsattvam pārthiva vyañjana anvitam
rāmam indīvara śyāmam kandarpa sadṛśa prabham
babhūva indra upamam dṛṣṭvā rākṣasī kāma mohitā
su mukham durmukhī rāmam vṛtta madhyam mahā udarī
viśāla akṣam virūpa akṣī sukeśam tāmra mūrdhajā
priya rūpam virūpā sā su svaram bhairava snavā
taruṇam dāruṇā vṛddhā dakṣiṇam vāma bhāṣiṇī
nyāya vṛttam su durvṛttā priyam apriya darśanā
śarīraja samāviṣṭā rākṣasī rāmam abravīt
jaṭī tāpasa rūpeṇa sa bhāryaḥ

original: 3.016.011c āgatas tvam imaṃ deśaṃ kathaṃ rākṣasasevitam
analyzed: āgataḥ tvam imam deśam katham rākṣasa sevitam

original: 3.016.012a evam uktas tu rākṣasyā śūrpaṇakhyā paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rākṣasyā śūrpaṇakhyā paraṃtapaḥ
ṛju buddhi tayā sarvam ākhyātum upacakrame
āsīt daśarathaḥ nāma rājā tridaśa vikramaḥ

original: 3.016.013c tasyāham agrajaḥ putro rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ
analyzed: tasya aham agrajaḥ putraḥ rāmaḥ nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ

original: 3.016.014a bhrātāyaṃ lakṣmaṇo nāma yavīyān mām anuvrataḥ
analyzed: bhrātā ayam lakṣmaṇaḥ nāma yavīyān mām anuvrataḥ

original: 3.016.014c iyaṃ bhāryā ca vaidehī mama sīteti viśrutā
analyzed: iyam bhāryā ca vaidehī mama sītā iti viśrutā

original: 3.016.015a niyogāt tu narendrasya pitur mātuś ca yantritaḥ
analyzed: niyogāt tu narendrasya pituḥ mātuḥ ca yantritaḥ

original: 3.016.015c dharmārthaṃ dharmakāṅkṣī ca vanaṃ vastum ihāgataḥ
analyzed: dharma artham dharma kāṅkṣī ca vanam vastum iha āgataḥ

original: 3.016.016a tvāṃ tu veditum icchāmi kathyatāṃ kāsi kasya vā
analyzed: tvām tu veditum icchāmi kathyatām kā asi kasya vā

original: 3.016.016c iha vā kiṃnimittaṃ tvam āgatā brūhi tattvataḥ
analyzed: iha vā kiṃnimittam tvam āgatā brūhi tattvataḥ
sā abravīt vacanam śrutvā rākṣasī madana arditā

original: 3.016.017c śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi tattvārthaṃ vacanaṃ mama
analyzed: śrūyatām rāma vakṣyāmi tattva artham vacanam mama
aham śūrpaṇakhā nāma rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī
araṇyam vicarāmi idam ekā sarva bhayaṃkarā

original: 3.016.019a rāvaṇo nāma me bhrātā rākṣaso rākṣaseśvaraḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ nāma me bhrātā rākṣasaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
pravṛddha nidraḥ ca sadā kumbhakarṇaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 3.016.020a vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā na tu rākṣasaceṣṭitaḥ
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ tu dharma ātmā na tu rākṣasa ceṣṭitaḥ
prakhyāta vīryau ca raṇe bhrātarau khara dūṣaṇau
tān aham samatikrāntā rāma tvā apūrva darśanāt
samupetā asmi bhāvena bhartāram puruṣottamam

original: 3.016.021e cirāya bhava bhartā me sītayā kiṃ kariṣyasi
analyzed: cirāya bhava bhartā me sītayā kim kariṣyasi

original: 3.016.022a vikṛtā ca virūpā ca na seyaṃ sadṛśī tava
analyzed: vikṛtā ca virūpā ca na sā iyam sadṛśī tava

original: 3.016.022c aham evānurūpā te bhāryā rūpeṇa paśya mām
analyzed: aham eva anurūpā te bhāryā rūpeṇa paśya mām
imām virūpām asatīm karālām nirṇatodarīm

original: 3.016.023c anena saha te bhrātrā bhakṣayiṣyāmi mānuṣīm
analyzed: anena saha te bhrātrā bhakṣayiṣyāmi mānuṣīm
tatas parvata śṛṅgāṇi vanāni vividhāni ca

original: 3.016.024c paśyan saha mayā kānta daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi
analyzed: paśyan saha mayā kānta daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi

original: 3.016.025a ity evam uktaḥ kākutsthaḥ prahasya madirekṣaṇām
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ kākutsthaḥ prahasya madirā īkṣaṇām
idam vacanam ārebhe vaktum vākya viśāradaḥ
tām tu śūrpaṇakhām rāmaḥ kāma pāśa avapāśitām
sva icchayā ślakṣṇayā vācā smita pūrvam atha abravīt
smi bhavati bhāryā iyam dayitā mama
tvadvidhānām tu nārīṇām su duḥkhā sa sapatna tā

original: 3.017.003a anujas tv eṣa me bhrātā śīlavān priyadarśanaḥ
analyzed: anujaḥ tu eṣa me bhrātā śīlavān priya darśanaḥ

original: 3.017.003c śrīmān akṛtadāraś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān
analyzed: śrīmān a kṛta dāraḥ ca lakṣmaṇaḥ nāma vīryavān
apūrvī bhāryayā ca arthī taruṇaḥ priya darśanaḥ

original: 3.017.004c anurūpaś ca te bhartā rūpasyāsya bhaviṣyati
analyzed: anurūpaḥ ca te bhartā rūpasya asya bhaviṣyati

original: 3.017.005a enaṃ bhaja viśālākṣi bhartāraṃ bhrātaraṃ mama
analyzed: enam bhaja viśāla akṣi bhartāram bhrātaram mama
asapatnā varārohe merum arka prabhā yathā

original: 3.017.006a iti rāmeṇa sā proktā rākṣasī kāmamohitā
analyzed: iti rāmeṇa sā proktā rākṣasī kāma mohitā

original: 3.017.006c visṛjya rāmaṃ sahasā tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt
analyzed: visṛjya rāmam sahasā tatas lakṣmaṇam abravīt

original: 3.017.007a asya rūpasya te yuktā bhāryāhaṃ varavarṇinī
analyzed: asya rūpasya te yuktā bhāryā aham varavarṇinī

original: 3.017.007c mayā saha sukhaṃ sarvān daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi
analyzed: mayā saha sukham sarvān daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi

original: 3.017.008a evam uktas tu saumitrī rākṣasyā vākyakovidaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu saumitriḥ rākṣasyā vākya kovidaḥ

original: 3.017.008c tataḥ śūrpaṇakhīṃ smitvā lakṣmaṇo yuktam abravīt
analyzed: tatas śūrpaṇakhīm smitvā lakṣmaṇaḥ yuktam abravīt

original: 3.017.009a kathaṃ dāsasya me dāsī bhāryā bhavitum icchasi
analyzed: katham dāsasya me dāsī bhāryā bhavitum icchasi
saḥ ham āryeṇa paravān bhātrā kamala varṇinī
samṛddha arthasya siddhārthā mudita amala varṇinī

original: 3.017.010c āryasya tvaṃ viśālākṣi bhāryā bhava yavīyasī
analyzed: āryasya tvam viśāla akṣi bhāryā bhava yavīyasī
etām virūpām asatīm karālām nirṇatodarīm

original: 3.017.011c bhāryāṃ vṛddhāṃ parityajya tvām evaiṣa bhajiṣyati
analyzed: bhāryām vṛddhām parityajya tvām eva eṣa bhajiṣyati

original: 3.017.012a ko hi rūpam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ saṃtyajya varavarṇini
analyzed: kaḥ hi rūpam idam śreṣṭham saṃtyajya varavarṇini
mānuṣeṣu varārohe kuryāt bhāvam vicakṣaṇaḥ
iti sā lakṣmaṇena uktā karālā nirṇata udarī
manyate tat vacaḥ satyam parihāsa avicakṣaṇā
sā rāmam parṇa śālāyām upaviṣṭam paraṃtapam
sītayā saha durdharṣam abravīt kāma mohitā
imām virūpām asatīm karālām nirṇatodarīm

original: 3.017.015c vṛddhāṃ bhāryām avaṣṭabhya na māṃ tvaṃ bahu manyase
analyzed: vṛddhām bhāryām avaṣṭabhya na mām tvam bahu manyase
adyā imām bhakṣayiṣyāmi paśyataḥ tava mānuṣīm
tvayā saha cariṣyāmi niḥsapatnā yathāsukham
iti uktvā mṛgaśāvākṣīm alāta sadṛśa īkṣaṇā
abhyadhāvat su saṃkruddhā mahā ulkā rohiṇīm iva
tām mṛtyu pāśa pratimām āpatantīm mahā balaḥ

original: 3.017.018c nigṛhya rāmaḥ kupitas tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt
analyzed: nigṛhya rāmaḥ kupitaḥ tatas lakṣmaṇam abravīt

original: 3.017.019a krūrair anāryaiḥ saumitre parihāsaḥ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: krūraiḥ anāryaiḥ saumitre parihāsaḥ katham cana

original: 3.017.019c na kāryaḥ paśya vaidehīṃ kathaṃ cit saumya jīvatīm
analyzed: na kāryaḥ paśya vaidehīm katham cit saumya jīvatīm
imām virūpām asatīm ati mattām mahā udarīm
rākṣasīm puruṣa vyāghra virūpayitum arhasi

original: 3.017.021a ity ukto lakṣmaṇas tasyāḥ kruddho rāmasya paśyataḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ tasyāḥ kruddhaḥ rāmasya paśyataḥ
uddhṛtya khaḍgam ciccheda karṇa nāsam mahā balaḥ

original: 3.017.022a nikṛttakarṇanāsā tu visvaraṃ sā vinadya ca
analyzed: nikṛtta karṇa nāsā tu visvaram sā vinadya ca
yathāgatam pradudrāva ghorā śūrpaṇakhā vanam
sā virūpā mahā ghorā rākṣasī śoṇita ukṣitā

original: 3.017.023c nanāda vividhān nādān yathā prāvṛṣi toyadaḥ
analyzed: nanāda vividhān nādān yathā prāvṛṣi toyadaḥ
sā vikṣarantī rudhiram bahudhā ghora darśanā
pragṛhya bāhū garjantī praviveśa mahā vanam
tatas tu sā rākṣasa saṃgha saṃvṛtam
kharam janasthāna gatam virūpitā
upetya tam bhrātaram ugra tejasam
papāta bhūmau gaganāt yathā aśaniḥ
tatas sa bhāryam bhaya moha mūrchitā
sa lakṣmaṇam rāghavam āgatam vanam
virūpaṇam ca ātmani śoṇita ukṣitā
śaśaṃsa sarvam bhaginī kharasya sā

original: 3.018.001a tāṃ tathā patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā virūpāṃ śoṇitokṣitām
analyzed: tām tathā patitām dṛṣṭvā virūpām śoṇita ukṣitām
bhaginīm krodha saṃtaptaḥ kharaḥ papraccha rākṣasaḥ
bala vikrama saṃpannā kāmagā kāmarūpiṇī

original: 3.018.002c imām avasthāṃ nītā tvaṃ kenāntakasamā gatā
analyzed: imām avasthām nītā tvam kena antaka samā gatā
deva gandharva bhūtānām ṛṣīṇām ca mahātmanām

original: 3.018.003c ko 'yam evaṃ mahāvīryas tvāṃ virūpāṃ cakāra ha
analyzed: kaḥ yam evam mahā vīryaḥ tvām virūpām cakāra ha

original: 3.018.004a na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ loke yaḥ kuryān mama vipriyam
analyzed: na hi paśyāmi aham loke yaḥ kuryāt mama vipriyam
antarena sahasrākṣam mahā indram pākaśāsanam
adya aham mārgaṇaiḥ prāṇān ādāsye jīvita antakaiḥ

original: 3.018.005c salile kṣīram āsaktaṃ niṣpibann iva sārasaḥ
analyzed: salile kṣīram āsaktam niṣpiban iva sārasaḥ
nihatasya mayā saṃkhye śara saṃkṛtta marmaṇaḥ

original: 3.018.006c saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ raktaṃ medinī kasya pāsyati
analyzed: sa phenam rudhiram raktam medinī kasya pāsyati

original: 3.018.007a kasya patrarathāḥ kāyān māṃsam utkṛtya saṃgatāḥ
analyzed: kasya patrarathāḥ kāyāt māṃsam utkṛtya saṃgatāḥ
prahṛṣṭāḥ bhakṣayiṣyanti nihatasya mayā raṇe

original: 3.018.008a taṃ na devā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: tam na devāḥ na gandharvāḥ na piśācāḥ na rākṣasāḥ
mayā apakṛṣṭam kṛpaṇam śaktāḥ trātum mahā āhave

original: 3.018.009a upalabhya śanaiḥ saṃjñāṃ taṃ me śaṃsitum arhasi
analyzed: upalabhya śanais saṃjñām tam me śaṃsitum arhasi

original: 3.018.009c yena tvaṃ durvinītena vane vikramya nirjitā
analyzed: yena tvam durvinītena vane vikramya nirjitā

original: 3.018.010a iti bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhasya ca viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: iti bhrātuḥ vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhasya ca viśeṣataḥ

original: 3.018.010c tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā vākyaṃ sabāṣpam idam abravīt
analyzed: tatas śūrpaṇakhā vākyam sa bāṣpam idam abravīt
taruṇau rūpa saṃpannau sukūmārau mahā balau
gandharvarāja pratimau pārthiva vyañjana anvitau

original: 3.018.012c devau vā mānuṣau vā tau na tarkayitum utsahe
analyzed: devau vā mānuṣau vā tau na tarkayitum utsahe
taruṇī rūpa saṃpannā sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitā

original: 3.018.013c dṛṣṭā tatra mayā nārī tayor madhye sumadhyamā
analyzed: dṛṣṭā tatra mayā nārī tayoḥ madhye sumadhyamā

original: 3.018.014a tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ saṃbhūya pramadām adhikṛtya tām
analyzed: tābhyām ubhābhyām saṃbhūya pramadām adhikṛtya tām
imām avasthām nītā aham yathā anāthā asatī tathā

original: 3.018.015a tasyāś cānṛjuvṛttāyās tayoś ca hatayor aham
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca anṛju vṛttāyāḥ tayoḥ ca hatayoḥ aham
sa phenam pātum icchāmi rudhiram raṇa mūrdhani

original: 3.018.016a eṣa me prathamaḥ kāmaḥ kṛtas tāta tvayā bhavet
analyzed: eṣa me prathamaḥ kāmaḥ kṛtaḥ tāta tvayā bhavet

original: 3.018.016c tasyās tayoś ca rudhiraṃ pibeyam aham āhave
analyzed: tasyāḥ tayoḥ ca rudhiram pibeyam aham āhave
iti tasyām bruvāṇāyām caturdaśa mahā balān
vyādideśa kharaḥ kruddhaḥ rākṣasān antaka upamān
mānuṣau śastra saṃpannau cīra kṛṣṇa ajina ambarau
praviṣṭau daṇḍaka araṇyam ghoram pramadayā saha

original: 3.018.019a tau hatvā tāṃ ca durvṛttām upāvartitum arhatha
analyzed: tau hatvā tām ca durvṛttām upāvartitum arhatha

original: 3.018.019c iyaṃ ca rudhiraṃ teṣāṃ bhaginī mama pāsyati
analyzed: iyam ca rudhiram teṣām bhaginī mama pāsyati
manorathaḥ yam iṣṭaḥ syāḥ bhaginyāḥ mama rākṣasāḥ

original: 3.018.020c śīghraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ gatvā tau pramathya svatejasā
analyzed: śīghram saṃpadyatām gatvā tau pramathya sva tejasā
iti pratisamādiṣṭāḥ rākṣasāḥ te caturdaśa

original: 3.018.021c tatra jagmus tayā sārdhaṃ ghanā vāteritā yathā
analyzed: tatra jagmuḥ tayā sārdham ghanāḥ vāta īritāḥ yathā
tatas śūrpaṇakhā ghorā rāghava āśramam āgatā

original: 3.019.001c rakṣasām ācacakṣe tau bhrātarau saha sītayā
analyzed: rakṣasām ācacakṣe tau bhrātarau saha sītayā
te rāmam parṇa śālāyām upaviṣṭam mahā balam

original: 3.019.002c dadṛśuḥ sītayā sārdhaṃ vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ sītayā sārdham vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca

original: 3.019.003a tān dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ śrīmān āgatāṃ tāṃ ca rākṣasīm
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ śrīmān āgatām tām ca rākṣasīm
abravīt bhrātaram rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇam dīpta tejasam
muhūrtam bhava saumitre sītāyāḥ pratyanantaraḥ

original: 3.019.004c imān asyā vadhiṣyāmi padavīm āgatān iha
analyzed: imān asyāḥ vadhiṣyāmi padavīm āgatān iha

original: 3.019.005a vākyam etat tataḥ śrutvā rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
analyzed: vākyam etat tatas śrutvā rāmasya vidita ātmanaḥ
tathā iti lakṣmaṇaḥ vākyam rāmasya pratyapūjayat
rāghavaḥ pi mahat cāpam cāmīkara vibhūṣitam

original: 3.019.006c cakāra sajyaṃ dharmātmā tāni rakṣāṃsi cābravīt
analyzed: cakāra sajyam dharma ātmā tāni rakṣāṃsi ca abravīt
putrau daśarathasya āvām bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau
praviṣṭau sītayā sārdham duścaram daṇḍaka vanam
phala mūla aśanau dāntau tāpasau dharma cāriṇau
vasantau daṇḍaka araṇye kimartham upahiṃsatha
yuṣmān pāpa ātmakān hantum viprakārān mahā vane
ṛṣīṇām tu niyogena prāptaḥ ham sa śarāsanaḥ
tiṣṭhata eva atra saṃtuṣṭāḥ na upasarpitum arhatha

original: 3.019.010c yadi prāṇair ihārtho vo nivartadhvaṃ niśācarāḥ
analyzed: yadi prāṇaiḥ iha arthaḥ vaḥ nivartadhvam niśācarāḥ

original: 3.019.011a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā rākṣasāḥ te caturdaśa
ūcuḥ vācam su saṃkruddhāḥ brahma ghnaḥ śūla pāṇayaḥ
saṃrakta nayanāḥ ghorāḥ rāmam rakta anta locanam
paruṣā madhura ābhāṣam hṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa parākramam

original: 3.019.013a krodham utpādya no bhartuḥ kharasya sumahātmanaḥ
analyzed: krodham utpādya naḥ bhartuḥ kharasya su mahātmanaḥ

original: 3.019.013c tvam eva hāsyase prāṇān adyāsmābhir hato yudhi
analyzed: tvam eva hāsyase prāṇān adya asmābhiḥ hataḥ yudhi

original: 3.019.014a kā hi te śaktir ekasya bahūnāṃ raṇamūrdhani
analyzed: kā hi te śaktiḥ ekasya bahūnām raṇa mūrdhani

original: 3.019.014c asmākam agrataḥ sthātuṃ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave
analyzed: asmākam agratas sthātum kim punar yoddhum āhave
ebhiḥ bāhu prayuktaiḥ naḥ parighaiḥ śūla paṭṭiśaiḥ

original: 3.019.015c prāṇāṃs tyakṣyasi vīryaṃ ca dhanuś ca karapīḍitam
analyzed: prāṇān tyakṣyasi vīryam ca dhanuḥ ca kara pīḍitam

original: 3.019.016a ity evam uktvā saṃrabdhā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
analyzed: iti evam uktvā saṃrabdhāḥ rākṣasāḥ te caturdaśa
udyata āyudha nistriṃśāḥ rāmam eva abhidudruvuḥ

original: 3.019.016e cikṣipus tāni śūlāni rāghavaṃ prati durjayam
analyzed: cikṣipuḥ tāni śūlāni rāghavam prati durjayam
tāni śūlāni kākutsthaḥ samastāni caturdaśa
tāvadbhiḥ eva ciccheda śaraiḥ kāñcana bhūṣaṇaiḥ
tatas paścāt mahā tejāḥ nārācān sūrya saṃnibhān
jagrāha parama kruddhaḥ caturdaśa śilā śitān

original: 3.019.019a gṛhītvā dhanur āyamya lakṣyān uddiśya rākṣasān
analyzed: gṛhītvā dhanuḥ āyamya lakṣyān uddiśya rākṣasān

original: 3.019.019c mumoca rāghavo bāṇān vajrān iva śatakratuḥ
analyzed: mumoca rāghavaḥ bāṇān vajrān iva śatakratuḥ
rukma puṅkhāḥ ca viśikhāḥ pradīptāḥ hema bhūṣaṇāḥ
antarikṣe mahā ulkānām babhūvuḥ tulya varcasaḥ

original: 3.019.021a te bhittvā rakṣasāṃ vegād vakṣāṃsi rudhirāplutāḥ
analyzed: te bhittvā rakṣasām vegāt vakṣāṃsi rudhira āplutāḥ
viniṣpetuḥ tadā bhūmau nyamajjanta aśani svanāḥ

original: 3.019.022a te bhinnahṛdayā bhūmau chinnamūlā iva drumāḥ
analyzed: te bhinna hṛdayāḥ bhūmau chinna mūlāḥ iva drumāḥ
nipetuḥ śoṇita ārdra aṅgāḥ vikṛtāḥ vigata asavaḥ

original: 3.019.023a tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasī krodhamūrchitā
analyzed: tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasī krodha mūrchitā

original: 3.019.023c paritrastā punas tatra vyasṛjad bhairavaṃ ravam
analyzed: paritrastā punar tatra vyasṛjat bhairavam ravam

original: 3.019.024a sā nadantī mahānādaṃ javāc chūrpaṇakhā punaḥ
analyzed: sā nadantī mahā nādam javāt śūrpaṇakhā punar

original: 3.019.024c upagamya kharaṃ sā tu kiṃ cit saṃśuṣka śoṇitā
analyzed: upagamya kharam sā tu kim cit saṃśuṣka śoṇitā
papāta punar eva ārtā sa niryāsā iva vallarī
nipātitān prekṣya raṇe tu rākṣasān
pradhāvitā śūrpaṇakhā punar tatas
vadham ca teṣām nikhilena rakṣasām
śaśaṃsa sarvam bhaginī kharasya sā

original: 3.020.001a sa punaḥ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāc chūrpaṇakhāṃ kharaḥ
analyzed: sa punar patitām dṛṣṭvā krodhāt śūrpaṇakhām kharaḥ

original: 3.020.001c uvāca vyaktatā vācā tām anarthārtham āgatām
analyzed: uvāca vyakta tā vācā tām anartha artham āgatām

original: 3.020.002a mayā tv idānīṃ śūrās te rākṣasā rudhirāśanāḥ
analyzed: mayā tu idānīm śūrāḥ te rākṣasāḥ rudhira aśanāḥ
tvad priya artham vinirdiṣṭāḥ kimartham rudyate punar

original: 3.020.003a bhaktāś caivānuraktāś ca hitāś ca mama nityaśaḥ
analyzed: bhaktāḥ ca eva anuraktāḥ ca hitāḥ ca mama nityaśas

original: 3.020.003c ghnanto 'pi na nihantavyā na na kuryur vaco mama
analyzed: ghnantaḥ pi na nihantavyāḥ na na kuryuḥ vacaḥ mama

original: 3.020.004a kim etac chrotum icchāmi kāraṇaṃ yatkṛte punaḥ
analyzed: kim etat śrotum icchāmi kāraṇam yad kṛte punar

original: 3.020.004c hā nātheti vinardantī sarpavad veṣṭase kṣitau
analyzed: hā nātha iti vinardantī sarpa vat veṣṭase kṣitau

original: 3.020.005a anāthavad vilapasi kiṃ nu nāthe mayi sthite
analyzed: anātha vat vilapasi kim nu nāthe mayi sthite

original: 3.020.005c uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha mā bhaiṣīr vaiklavyaṃ tyajyatām iha
analyzed: uttiṣṭha uttiṣṭha mā bhaiṣīḥ vaiklavyam tyajyatām iha

original: 3.020.006a ity evam uktā durdharṣā khareṇa parisāntvitā
analyzed: iti evam uktā durdharṣā khareṇa parisāntvitā

original: 3.020.006c vimṛjya nayane sāsre kharaṃ bhrātaram abravīt
analyzed: vimṛjya nayane sa asre kharam bhrātaram abravīt

original: 3.020.007a preṣitāś ca tvayā śūrā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
analyzed: preṣitāḥ ca tvayā śūrāḥ rākṣasāḥ te caturdaśa
nihantum rāghavam ghorāḥ mad priya artham sa lakṣmaṇam
te tu rāmeṇa sa amarṣāḥ śūla paṭṭiśa pāṇayaḥ
samare nihatāḥ sarve sāyakaiḥ marma bhedibhiḥ

original: 3.020.009a tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇenaiva mahābalān
analyzed: tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇena eva mahā balān

original: 3.020.009c rāmasya ca mahat karma mahāṃs trāso 'bhavan mama
analyzed: rāmasya ca mahat karma mahān trāsaḥ bhavan mama

original: 3.020.010a sāsmi bhītā samudvignā viṣaṇṇā ca niśācara
analyzed: sā asmi bhītā samudvignā viṣaṇṇā ca niśācara

original: 3.020.010c śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ punaḥ prāptā sarvato bhayadarśinī
analyzed: śaraṇam tvām punar prāptā sarvatas bhaya darśinī
viṣāda nakra adhyuṣite paritrāsa ūrmi mālini

original: 3.020.011c kiṃ māṃ na trāyase magnāṃ vipule śokasāgare
analyzed: kim mām na trāyase magnām vipule śoka sāgare

original: 3.020.012a ete ca nihatā bhūmau rāmeṇa niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: ete ca nihatāḥ bhūmau rāmeṇa niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 3.020.012c ye ca me padavīṃ prāptā rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ
analyzed: ye ca me padavīm prāptāḥ rākṣasāḥ piśita aśanāḥ

original: 3.020.013a mayi te yady anukrośo yadi rakṣaḥsu teṣu ca
analyzed: mayi te yadi anukrośaḥ yadi rakṣaḥsu teṣu ca

original: 3.020.013c rāmeṇa yadi śaktis te tejo vāsti niśācara
analyzed: rāmeṇa yadi śaktiḥ te tejaḥ vā asti niśācara
daṇḍaka araṇya nilayam jahi rākṣasa kaṇṭakam

original: 3.020.014a yadi rāmaṃ mamāmitram adya tvaṃ na vadhiṣyasi
analyzed: yadi rāmam mama amitram adya tvam na vadhiṣyasi
tava ca eva agratas prāṇān tyakṣyāmi nirapatrapā

original: 3.020.015a buddhyāham anupaśyāmi na tvaṃ rāmasya saṃyuge
analyzed: buddhyā aham anupaśyāmi na tvam rāmasya saṃyuge
sthātum pratimukhe śaktaḥ sa cāpasya mahā raṇe
śūra mānī na śūraḥ tvam mithyā āropita vikramaḥ

original: 3.020.016c mānuṣau yan na śaknoṣi hantuṃ tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: mānuṣau yat na śaknoṣi hantum tau rāma lakṣmaṇau
apayāhi jana sthānāt tvaritaḥ saha bāndhavaḥ

original: 3.020.017c niḥsattvasyālpavīryasya vāsas te kīdṛśas tv iha
analyzed: niḥsattvasya alpa vīryasya vāsaḥ te kīdṛśaḥ tu iha
rāma tejaḥ abhibhūtaḥ hi tvam kṣipram vinaśiṣyasi
sa hi tejaḥ samāyuktaḥ rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ

original: 3.020.018e bhrātā cāsya mahāvīryo yena cāsmi virūpitā
analyzed: bhrātā ca asya mahā vīryaḥ yena ca asmi virūpitā

original: 3.021.001a evam ādharṣitaḥ śūraḥ śūrpaṇakhyā kharas tadā
analyzed: evam ādharṣitaḥ śūraḥ śūrpaṇakhyā kharaḥ tadā

original: 3.021.001c uvāca rakṣasāṃ madhye kharaḥ kharataraṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: uvāca rakṣasām madhye kharaḥ kharataram vacaḥ
tava apamāna prabhavaḥ krodhaḥ yam atulaḥ mama
na śakyate dhārayitum lavaṇa ambhaḥ iva utthitam

original: 3.021.003a na rāmaṃ gaṇaye vīryān mānuṣaṃ kṣīṇajīvitam
analyzed: na rāmam gaṇaye vīryāt mānuṣam kṣīṇa jīvitam

original: 3.021.003c ātmā duścaritaiḥ prāṇān hato yo 'dya vimokṣyati
analyzed: ātmā duścaritaiḥ prāṇān hataḥ yaḥ vimokṣyati

original: 3.021.004a bāṣpaḥ saṃhriyatām eṣa saṃbhramaś ca vimucyatām
analyzed: bāṣpaḥ saṃhriyatām eṣa saṃbhramaḥ ca vimucyatām

original: 3.021.004c ahaṃ rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā nayāmi yamasādanam
analyzed: aham rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā nayāmi yama sādanam
paraśvadha hatasya adya manda prāṇasya bhū tale

original: 3.021.005c rāmasya rudhiraṃ raktam uṣṇaṃ pāsyasi rākṣasi
analyzed: rāmasya rudhiram raktam uṣṇam pāsyasi rākṣasi

original: 3.021.006a sā prahṛṣṭvā vacaḥ śrutvā kharasya vadanāc cyutam
analyzed: sā prahṛṣṭvā vacaḥ śrutvā kharasya vadanāt cyutam

original: 3.021.006c praśaśaṃsa punar maurkhyād bhrātaraṃ rakṣasāṃ varam
analyzed: praśaśaṃsa punar maurkhyāt bhrātaram rakṣasām varam

original: 3.021.007a tayā paruṣitaḥ pūrvaṃ punar eva praśaṃsitaḥ
analyzed: tayā paruṣitaḥ pūrvam punar eva praśaṃsitaḥ

original: 3.021.007c abravīd dūṣaṇaṃ nāma kharaḥ senāpatiṃ tadā
analyzed: abravīt dūṣaṇam nāma kharaḥ senāpatim tadā
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi mama citta anuvartinām
rakṣasīm bhīma vegānām samareṣu anivartinām
nīla jīmūta varṇānām ghorāṇām krūra karmaṇām
loka siṃhā vihārāṇām balinām ugra tejasām
teṣām śārdūla darpāṇām mahā āsyānām mahā ojasām
sarva udyogam udīrṇānām rakṣasām saumya kāraya

original: 3.021.011a upasthāpaya me kṣipraṃ rathaṃ saumya dhanūṃṣi ca
analyzed: upasthāpaya me kṣipram ratham saumya dhanūṃṣi ca

original: 3.021.011c śarāṃś ca citrān khaḍgāṃś ca śaktīś ca vividhāḥ śitāḥ
analyzed: śarān ca citrān khaḍgān ca śaktīḥ ca vividhāḥ śitāḥ
agre niryātum icchāmi paulastyānām mahātmanām
vadha artham durvinītasya rāmasya raṇa kovidaḥ
iti tasya bruvāṇasya sūrya varṇam mahā ratham
sat aśvaiḥ śabalaiḥ yuktam ācacakṣe tha dūṣaṇaḥ
tam meru śikhara ākāram tapta kāñcana bhūṣaṇam
hema cakram asaṃbādham vaidūrya maya kūbaram

original: 3.021.015a matsyaiḥ puṣpair drumaiḥ śailaiś candrasūryaiś ca kāñcanaiḥ
analyzed: matsyaiḥ puṣpaiḥ drumaiḥ śailaiḥ candra sūryaiḥ ca kāñcanaiḥ

original: 3.021.015c māṅgalyaiḥ pakṣisaṃghaiś ca tārābhiś ca samāvṛtam
analyzed: māṅgalyaiḥ pakṣi saṃghaiḥ ca tārābhiḥ ca samāvṛtam
dhvaja nistriṃśa saṃpannam kiṅkiṇīka vibhūṣitam
sat aśva yuktam saḥ marṣāt āruroha ratham kharaḥ
niśāmya tam ratha gatam rāakṣasāḥ bhīma vikramāḥ
tasthuḥ saṃparivārya enam dūṣaṇam ca mahā balam
kharaḥ tu tān mahā iṣvāsān ghora carma āyudha dhvajān
niryāta iti abravīt dṛṣṭvā ratha sthaḥ sarva rākṣasān
tatas tat rākṣasam sainyam ghora carma āyudha dhvajam
nirjagāma janasthānāt mahā nādam mahā javam

original: 3.021.020a mudgaraiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ
analyzed: mudgaraiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlaiḥ su tīkṣṇaiḥ ca paraśvadhaiḥ

original: 3.021.020c khaḍgaiś cakraiś ca hastasthair bhrājamānaiś ca tomaraiḥ
analyzed: khaḍgaiḥ cakraiḥ ca hasta sthaiḥ bhrājamānaiḥ ca tomaraiḥ

original: 3.021.021a śaktibhiḥ patighair ghorair atimātraiś ca kārmukaiḥ
analyzed: śaktibhiḥ patighaiḥ ghoraiḥ atimātraiḥ ca kārmukaiḥ
gadā asi musalaiḥ vajraiḥ gṛhītaiḥ bhīma darśanaiḥ
rākṣasānām su ghorāṇām sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
niryātāni janasthānāt khara citta anuvartinām

original: 3.021.023a tāṃs tv abhidravato dṛṣṭvā rākṣasān bhīmavikramān
analyzed: tān tu abhidravataḥ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasān bhīma vikramān

original: 3.021.023c kharasyāpi rathaḥ kiṃ cij jagāma tadanantaram
analyzed: kharasya api rathaḥ kim cit jagāma tad anantaram
tatas tām śabalān aśvān tapta kāñcana bhūṣitān
kharasya matam ājñāya sārathiḥ samacodayat

original: 3.021.025a sa codito rathaḥ śīghraṃ kharasya ripughātinaḥ
analyzed: sa coditaḥ rathaḥ śīghram kharasya ripu ghātinaḥ

original: 3.021.025c śabdenāpūrayām āsa diśaś ca pratiśas tathā
analyzed: śabdena āpūrayām āsa diśaḥ ca pratiśaḥ tathā
pravṛddhamanyuḥ tu kharaḥ kharasvano
ripoḥ vadha artham tvaritaḥ yathā antakaḥ
acūcudat sārathim unnadan punar
mahā balaḥ meghaḥ iva aśma varṣavān

original: 3.022.001a tat prayātaṃ balaṃ ghoram aśivaṃ śoṇitodakam
analyzed: tat prayātam balam ghoram aśivam śoṇita udakam
abhyavarṣat mahā meghaḥ tumulaḥ gardabha aruṇaḥ
nipetuḥ turagāḥ tasya ratha yuktāḥ mahā javāḥ
same puṣpa cite deśe rājamārge yadṛcchayā
śyāmam rudhira paryantam babhūva pariveṣaṇam
alāta cakra pratimam pratigṛhya divākaram
tatas dhvajam upāgamya hema daṇḍam samucchritam
samākramya mahā kāyaḥ tasthau gṛdhraḥ su dāruṇaḥ
janasthāna samīpe ca samākramya khara svanāḥ
visvarān vividhān cakruḥ māṃsādāḥ mṛga pakṣiṇaḥ

original: 3.022.006a vyājahruś ca padīptāyāṃ diśi vai bhairavasvanam
analyzed: vyājahruḥ ca padīptāyām diśi vai bhairava svanam

original: 3.022.006c aśivā yātu dāhānāṃ śivā ghorā mahāsvanāḥ
analyzed: aśivā yātu dāhānām śivāḥ ghorāḥ mahā svanāḥ
prabhinna giri saṃkāśāḥ toya śoṣita dhāriṇaḥ

original: 3.022.007c ākāśaṃ tad anākāśaṃ cakrur bhīmā balāhakāḥ
analyzed: ākāśam tat an ākāśam cakruḥ bhīmāḥ balāhakāḥ
babhūva timiram ghoram uddhatam roma harṣaṇam

original: 3.022.008c diśo vā vidiśo vāpi suvyaktaṃ na cakāśire
analyzed: diśaḥ vā vidiśaḥ vā api su vyaktam na cakāśire
kṣataja ārdra savarṇa ābhā saṃdhyā kālam vinā babhau

original: 3.022.009c kharasyābhimukhaṃ nedus tadā ghorā mṛgāḥ khagāḥ
analyzed: kharasya abhimukham neduḥ tadā ghorāḥ mṛgāḥ khagāḥ
nitya aśiva karāḥ yuddhe śivāḥ ghora nidarśanāḥ
neduḥ balasya abhimukham jvālā udgāribhiḥ ānanaiḥ
kabandhaḥ parigha ābhāsaḥ dṛśyate bhāskara antike
jagrāha sūryam svarbhānuḥ aparvaṇi mahā grahaḥ
pravāti mārutaḥ śīghram niṣprabhaḥ bhūt divākaraḥ

original: 3.022.012c utpetuś ca vinā rātriṃ tārāḥ khadyotasaprabhāḥ
analyzed: utpetuḥ ca vinā rātrim tārāḥ khadyota saprabhāḥ
saṃlīna mīna vihagāḥ nalinyaḥ puṣpa paṅkajāḥ

original: 3.022.013c tasmin kṣaṇe babhūvuś ca vinā puṣpaphalair drumāḥ
analyzed: tasmin kṣaṇe babhūvuḥ ca vinā puṣpa phalaiḥ drumāḥ

original: 3.022.014a uddhūtaś ca vinā vātaṃ reṇur jaladharāruṇaḥ
analyzed: uddhūtaḥ ca vinā vātam reṇuḥ jaladhara aruṇaḥ
vīcīkūcī iti vāśyantaḥ babhūvuḥ tatra sārikāḥ
ulkāḥ ca api sa nirghoṣāḥ nipetuḥ ghora darśanāḥ
pracacāla mahī ca api sa śaila vana kānanā
kharasya ca ratha sthasya nardamānasya dhīmataḥ
prākampata bhujaḥ savyaḥ kharaḥ ca asya avasajjata
sa asrā saṃpadyate dṛṣṭiḥ paśyamānasya sarvatas

original: 3.022.017c lalāṭe ca rujā jātā na ca mohān nyavartata
analyzed: lalāṭe ca rujā jātā na ca mohāt nyavartata
tān samīkṣya mahā utpātān utthitān roma harṣaṇān

original: 3.022.018c abravīd rākṣasān sarvān prahasan sa kharas tadā
analyzed: abravīt rākṣasān sarvān prahasan sa kharaḥ tadā
mahā utpātān imān sarvān utthitān ghora darśanān

original: 3.022.019c na cintayāmy ahaṃ vīryād balavān durbalān iva
analyzed: na cintayāmi aham vīryāt balavān durbalān iva

original: 3.022.020a tārā api śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ pātayeyaṃ nabhastalāt
analyzed: tārāḥ api śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ pātayeyam nabhastalāt
mṛtyum maraṇa dharmeṇa saṃkruddhaḥ yojayāmi aham

original: 3.022.021a rāghavaṃ taṃ balotsiktaṃ bhrātaraṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇam
analyzed: rāghavam tam bala utsiktam bhrātaram ca api lakṣmaṇam
a hatvā sāyakaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ na upāvartitum utsahe

original: 3.022.022a sakāmā bhaginī me 'stu pītvā tu rudhiraṃ tayoḥ
analyzed: sa kāmā bhaginī me stu pītvā tu rudhiram tayoḥ
yat nimittam tu rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya viparyayaḥ

original: 3.022.023a na kva cit prāptapūrvo me saṃyugeṣu parājayaḥ
analyzed: na kva cit prāpta pūrvaḥ me saṃyugeṣu parājayaḥ

original: 3.022.023c yuṣmākam etat pratyakṣaṃ nānṛtaṃ kathayāmy aham
analyzed: yuṣmākam etat pratyakṣam na anṛtam kathayāmi aham
devarājam api kruddhaḥ matta airāvata yāyinam

original: 3.022.024c vajrahastaṃ raṇe hanyāṃ kiṃ punas tau ca mānuṣau
analyzed: vajra hastam raṇe hanyām kim punar tau ca mānuṣau

original: 3.022.025a sā tasya garjitaṃ śrutvā rākṣasasya mahācamūḥ
analyzed: sā tasya garjitam śrutvā rākṣasasya mahā camūḥ
praharṣam atulam lebhe mṛtyu pāśa avapāśitā
sameyuḥ ca mahātmānaḥ yuddha darśana kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: 3.022.026c ṛṣayo devagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ deva gandharvāḥ siddhāḥ ca saha cāraṇaiḥ
sametya ca ūruḥ sahitāḥ te nyāyam puṇya karmaṇaḥ

original: 3.022.027c svasti gobrāhmaṇebhyo 'stu lokānāṃ ye ca saṃmatāḥ
analyzed: svasti go brāhmaṇebhyaḥ stu lokānām ye ca saṃmatāḥ
jayatām rāghavaḥ yuddhe paulastyān rajanīcarān

original: 3.022.028c cakrā hasto yathā yuddhe sarvān asurapuṃgavān
analyzed: cakrā hastaḥ yathā yuddhe sarvān asura puṃgavān

original: 3.022.029a etac cānyac ca bahuśo bruvāṇāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: etat ca anyat ca bahuśas bruvāṇāḥ parama ṛṣayaḥ
dadṛśuḥ vāhinīm teṣām rākṣasānām gata āyuṣām

original: 3.022.030a rathena tu kharo vegāt sainyasyāgrād viniḥsṛtaḥ
analyzed: rathena tu kharaḥ vegāt sainyasya agrāt viniḥsṛtaḥ

original: 3.022.030c taṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ bhūyo rākṣasāś ca viniḥsṛtāḥ
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā rākṣasam bhūyas rākṣasāḥ ca viniḥsṛtāḥ
śyena gāmī pṛthugrīvaḥ yajñaśatruḥ vihaṃgamaḥ
dvādaśā ete mahā vīryāḥ pratasthuḥ abhitas kharam
catvāraḥ ete senā agryāḥ dūṣaṇam pṛṣṭhatas nvayuḥ
sā bhīma vegā samara abhikāmā
su dāruṇā rākṣasa vīra senā
tau rāja putrau sahasā abhyupetā
mālāgrahāṇām iva candra sūryau

original: 3.023.001a āśramaṃ prati yāte tu khare kharaparākrame
analyzed: āśramam prati yāte tu khare khara parākrame

original: 3.023.001c tān evautpātikān rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā dadarśa ha
analyzed: tān eva autpātikān rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā dadarśa ha
tān utpātān mahā ghorān utthitān roma harṣaṇān

original: 3.023.002c prajānām ahitān dṛṣṭvā vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt
analyzed: prajānām ahitān dṛṣṭvā vākyam lakṣmaṇam abravīt
imān paśya mahā bāho sarva bhūta apahāriṇaḥ
samutthitān mahā utpātān saṃhartum sarva rākṣasān
amī rudhira dhārāḥ tu visṛjantaḥ khara svanān
vyomni meghāḥ vivartante paruṣāḥ gardabha aruṇāḥ

original: 3.023.005a sadhūmāś ca śarāḥ sarve mama yuddhābhinandinaḥ
analyzed: sa dhūmāḥ ca śarāḥ sarve mama yuddha abhinandinaḥ
rukma pṛṣṭhāni cāpāni viveṣṭante ca lakṣmaṇa
yādṛśāḥ iha kūjanti pakṣiṇaḥ vana cāriṇaḥ

original: 3.023.006c agrato no bhayaṃ prāptaṃ saṃśayo jīvitasya ca
analyzed: agratas naḥ bhayam prāptam saṃśayaḥ jīvitasya ca

original: 3.023.007a saṃprahāras tu sumahān bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: saṃprahāraḥ tu su mahān bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: 3.023.007c ayam ākhyāti me bāhuḥ sphuramāṇo muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: ayam ākhyāti me bāhuḥ sphuramāṇaḥ muhur muhur

original: 3.023.008a saṃnikarṣe tu naḥ śūra jayaṃ śatroḥ parājayam
analyzed: saṃnikarṣe tu naḥ śūra jayam śatroḥ parājayam

original: 3.023.008c suprabhaṃ ca prasannaṃ ca tava vaktraṃ hi lakṣyate
analyzed: su prabham ca prasannam ca tava vaktram hi lakṣyate

original: 3.023.009a udyatānāṃ hi yuddhārthaṃ yeṣāṃ bhavati lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: udyatānām hi yuddha artham yeṣām bhavati lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 3.023.009c niṣprabhaṃ vadanaṃ teṣāṃ bhavaty āyuḥ parikṣayaḥ
analyzed: niṣprabham vadanam teṣām bhavati āyuḥ parikṣayaḥ
anāgata vidhānam tu kartavyam śubham icchatā
āpadam śaṅkamānena puruṣeṇa vipaścitā
tasmāt gṛhītvā vaidehīm śara pāṇiḥ dhanuḥ dharaḥ
guhām āśraya śailasya durgām pādapa saṃkulām

original: 3.023.012a pratikūlitum icchāmi na hi vākyam idaṃ tvayā
analyzed: pratikūlitum icchāmi na hi vākyam idam tvayā

original: 3.023.012c śāpito mama pādābhyāṃ gamyatāṃ vatsa māciram
analyzed: śāpitaḥ mama pādābhyām gamyatām vatsa māciram

original: 3.023.013a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā

original: 3.023.013c śarān ādāya cāpaṃ ca guhāṃ durgāṃ samāśrayat
analyzed: śarān ādāya cāpam ca guhām durgām samāśrayat

original: 3.023.014a tasmin praviṣṭe tu guhāṃ lakṣmaṇe saha sītayā
analyzed: tasmin praviṣṭe tu guhām lakṣmaṇe saha sītayā

original: 3.023.014c hanta niryuktam ity uktvā rāmaḥ kavacam āviśat
analyzed: hanta niryuktam iti uktvā rāmaḥ kavacam āviśat
sā tena agni nikāśena kavacena vibhūṣitaḥ
babhūva rāmaḥ timire vidhūmaḥ gniḥ iva utthitaḥ

original: 3.023.016a sa cāpam udyamya mahac charān ādāya vīryavān
analyzed: sa cāpam udyamya mahat śarān ādāya vīryavān
babhūva avasthitaḥ tatra jyā svanaiḥ pūrayan diśaḥ

original: 3.023.017a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ
analyzed: tatas devāḥ sa gandharvāḥ siddhāḥ ca saha cāraṇaiḥ
ūcuḥ parama saṃtrastāḥ guhyakāḥ ca parasparam
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasām bhīma karmaṇām

original: 3.023.018c ekaś ca rāmo dharmātmā kathaṃ yuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati
analyzed: ekaḥ ca rāmaḥ dharma ātmā katham yuddham bhaviṣyati
tatas gambhīra nirhrādam ghora varma āyudha dhvajam
anīkam yātudhānānām samantāt pratyadṛśyata
siṃhanādam visṛjatām anyonyam abhigarjatām
cāpāni vispharayatām jṛmbhatām ca api abhīkṣṇaśas
vipraghuṣṭa svanānām ca dundubhīn ca api nighnatām

original: 3.023.021c teṣāṃ sutumulaḥ śabdaḥ pūrayām āsa tad vanam
analyzed: teṣām su tumulaḥ śabdaḥ pūrayām āsa tat vanam
tena śabdena vitrastāḥ śvāpadāḥ vana cāriṇaḥ
dudruvuḥ yatra niḥśabdam pṛṣṭhatas na avalokayan

original: 3.023.023a tat tv anīkaṃ mahāvegaṃ rāmaṃ samupasarpata
analyzed: tat tu anīkam mahā vegam rāmam samupasarpata
ghṛta nānā praharaṇam gambhīram sāgara upamam
cārayan cakṣuḥ sarvatas raṇa paṇḍitaḥ
dadarśa khara sainyam tat yuddha abhimukham udyatam

original: 3.023.025a vitatya ca dhanur bhīmaṃ tūṇyāś coddhṛtya sāyakān
analyzed: vitatya ca dhanuḥ bhīmam tūṇyāḥ ca uddhṛtya sāyakān
krodham āhārayat tīvram vadha artham sarva rakṣasām

original: 3.023.026a duṣprekṣyaḥ so 'bhavat kruddho yugāntāgnir iva jvalan
analyzed: duṣprekṣyaḥ saḥ bhavat kruddhaḥ yugānta agniḥ iva jvalan
tam dṛṣṭvā tejasā āviṣṭam prāvyathan vana devatāḥ

original: 3.023.027a tasya kruddhasya rūpaṃ tu rāmasya dadṛśe tadā
analyzed: tasya kruddhasya rūpam tu rāmasya dadṛśe tadā
dakṣasya iva kratum hantum udyatasya pinākinaḥ
avaṣṭabdha dhanum rāmam kruddham ca ripu ghātinam
dadarśa āśramam āgamya kharaḥ saha puraḥsaraiḥ

original: 3.024.002a taṃ dṛṣṭvā saguṇaṃ cāpam udyamya kharaniḥsvanam
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā sa guṇam cāpam udyamya khara niḥsvanam
rāmasya abhimukham sūtam codyatām iti acodayat
sa kharasya ājñayā sūtaḥ turagān samacodayat

original: 3.024.003c yatra rāmo mahābāhur eko dhunvan dhanuḥ sthitaḥ
analyzed: yatra rāmaḥ mahā bāhuḥ ekaḥ dhunvan dhanuḥ sthitaḥ

original: 3.024.004a taṃ tu niṣpatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te rajanīcarāḥ
analyzed: tam tu niṣpatitam dṛṣṭvā sarve te rajanīcarāḥ
nardamānāḥ mahā nādam sacivāḥ paryavārayan

original: 3.024.005a sa teṣāṃ yātudhānānāṃ madhye rato gataḥ kharaḥ
analyzed: sa teṣām yātudhānānām madhye rataḥ gataḥ kharaḥ
babhūva madhye tārāṇām lohitāṅgaḥ iva uditaḥ

original: 3.024.006a tatas taṃ bhīmadhanvānaṃ kruddhāḥ sarve niśācarāḥ
analyzed: tatas tam bhīma dhanvānam kruddhāḥ sarve niśācarāḥ
rāmam nānāvidhaiḥ śastraiḥ abhyavarṣanta durjayam

original: 3.024.007a mudgarair āyasaiḥ śūlaiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
analyzed: mudgaraiḥ āyasaiḥ śūlaiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
rākṣasāḥ samare rāmam nijaghnuḥ roṣa tatparāḥ
te balāhaka saṃkāśāḥ mahā nādāḥ mahā balāḥ
abhyadhāvanta kākutstham rāmam yuddhe jighāṃsavaḥ

original: 3.024.009a te rāme śaravarṣāṇi vyasṛjan rakṣasāṃ guṇāḥ
analyzed: te rāme śara varṣāṇi vyasṛjan rakṣasām guṇāḥ
śaila indram iva dhārābhiḥ varṣamāṇāḥ mahādhanāḥ

original: 3.024.010a sa taiḥ parivṛto ghorai rāghavo rakṣasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
analyzed: sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ ghoraiḥ rāghavaḥ rakṣasām gaṇaiḥ

original: 3.024.010c tithiṣv iva mahādevo vṛtaḥ pāriṣadāṃ gaṇaiḥ
analyzed: tithiṣu iva mahādevaḥ vṛtaḥ pāriṣadām gaṇaiḥ

original: 3.024.011a tāni muktāni śastrāṇi yātudhānaiḥ sa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tāni muktāni śastrāṇi yātudhānaiḥ sa rāghavaḥ
pratijagrāha viśikhaiḥ nadī oghān iva sāgaraḥ

original: 3.024.012a sa taiḥ praharaṇair ghorair bhinnagātro na vivyathe
analyzed: sa taiḥ praharaṇaiḥ ghoraiḥ bhinna gātraḥ na vivyathe

original: 3.024.012c rāmaḥ pradīptair bahubhir vajrair iva mahācalaḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ pradīptaiḥ bahubhiḥ vajraiḥ iva mahā acalaḥ
sa viddhaḥ kṣataja ādigdhaḥ sarva gātreṣu rāghavaḥ
babhūva rāmaḥ saṃdhyā abhraiḥ divākaraḥ iva āvṛtaḥ
viṣeduḥ deva gandharvāḥ siddhāḥ ca parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: 3.024.014c ekaṃ sahastrair bahubhis tadā dṛṣṭvā samāvṛtam
analyzed: ekam sahastraiḥ bahubhiḥ tadā dṛṣṭvā samāvṛtam
tatas rāmaḥ su saṃkruddhaḥ maṇḍalīkṛta kārmukaḥ
sasarja niśitān sahasraśas
durāvārān durviṣahān kāla pāśa upamān raṇe
mumoca līlayā rāmaḥ kaṅka patrān a jihma gān

original: 3.024.017a te śarāḥ śatrusainyeṣu muktā rāmeṇa līlayā
analyzed: te śarāḥ śatru sainyeṣu muktāḥ rāmeṇa līlayā

original: 3.024.017c ādadū rakṣasāṃ prāṇān pāśāḥ kālakṛtā iva
analyzed: ādaduḥ rakṣasām prāṇān pāśāḥ kāla kṛtāḥ iva

original: 3.024.018a bhittvā rākṣasadehāṃs tāṃs te śarā rudhirāplutāḥ
analyzed: bhittvā rākṣasa dehān tān te śarāḥ rudhira āplutāḥ
antarikṣa gatāḥ rejuḥ dīpta agni sama tejasaḥ
asaṃkhyeyāḥ tu rāmasya sāyakāḥ cāpa maṇḍalāt
viniṣpetuḥ atīva ugrāḥ rakṣaḥ prāṇa apahāriṇaḥ

original: 3.024.020a tair dhanūṃṣi dhvajāgrāṇi varmāṇi ca śirāṃsi ca
analyzed: taiḥ dhanūṃṣi dhvaja agrāṇi varmāṇi ca śirāṃsi ca
bahūn sa hasta ābharaṇān ūrūn kari kara upamān
tatas nālīka nārācaiḥ tīkṣṇa agraiḥ ca vikarṇibhiḥ
bhīmam ārta svaram cakruḥ bhidyamānāḥ niśācarāḥ

original: 3.024.022a tat sainyaṃ niśitair bāṇair arditaṃ marmabhedibhiḥ
analyzed: tat sainyam niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ arditam marma bhedibhiḥ

original: 3.024.022c rāmeṇa na sukhaṃ lebhe śuṣkaṃ vanam ivāgninā
analyzed: rāmeṇa na sukham lebhe śuṣkam vanam iva agninā

original: 3.024.023a ke cid bhīmabalāḥ śūrāḥ śūlān khaḍgān paraśvadhān
analyzed: ke cit bhīma balāḥ śūrāḥ śūlān khaḍgān paraśvadhān
cikṣipuḥ parama kruddhāḥ rāmāya rajanīcarāḥ

original: 3.024.024a tāni bāṇair mahābāhuḥ śastrāṇy āvārya rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tāni bāṇaiḥ mahā bāhuḥ śastrāṇi āvārya rāghavaḥ

original: 3.024.024c jahāra samare prāṇāṃś ciccheda ca śirodharān
analyzed: jahāra samare prāṇān ciccheda ca śirodharān

original: 3.024.025a avaśiṣṭāś ca ye tatra viṣaṇṇāś ca niśācarāḥ
analyzed: avaśiṣṭāḥ ca ye tatra viṣaṇṇāḥ ca niśācarāḥ
kharam eva abhyadhāvanta śaraṇa artham śara arditāḥ

original: 3.024.026a tān sarvān punar ādāya samāśvāsya ca dūṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: tān sarvān punar ādāya samāśvāsya ca dūṣaṇaḥ
abhyadhāvata kākutstham kruddhaḥ rudram iva antakaḥ
nivṛttāḥ tu punar sarve dūṣaṇa āśraya nirbhayāḥ
rāmam eva abhyadhāvanta sāla tāla śilā āyudhāḥ
tat babhūva adbhutam yuddham tumulam roma harṣaṇam

original: 3.024.028c rāmasyāsya mahāghoraṃ punas teṣāṃ ca rakṣasām
analyzed: rāmasya asya mahā ghoram punar teṣām ca rakṣasām

original: 3.025.001a tad drumāṇāṃ śilānāṃ ca varṣaṃ prāṇaharaṃ mahat
analyzed: tat drumāṇām śilānām ca varṣam prāṇa haram mahat
pratijagrāha dharma ātmā rāghavaḥ tīkṣṇa sāyakaiḥ

original: 3.025.002a pratigṛhya ca tad varaṃ nimīlita ivarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: pratigṛhya ca tat varam nimīlitaḥ iva ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 3.025.002c rāmaḥ krodhaṃ paraṃ bheje vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām
analyzed: rāmaḥ krodham param bheje vadha artham sarva rakṣasām
tatas krodha samāviṣṭaḥ pradīptaḥ iva tejasā
śaraiḥ abhyakirat sainyam sarvatas saha dūṣaṇam
tatas senāpatiḥ kruddhaḥ dūṣaṇaḥ śatru dūṣaṇaḥ
jagrāha giri śṛṅga ābham parigham roma harṣaṇam
veṣṭitam kāñcanaiḥ paṭṭaiḥ deva sainya abhimardanam
āyasaiḥ śaṅkubhiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ kīrṇam para vasā ukṣitām
vajra aśani sama sparśam para gopura dāraṇam
tam mahā uraga saṃkāśam pragṛhya parigham raṇe
dūṣaṇaḥ bhyapatat rāmam krūra karmā niśācaraḥ
tasya abhipatamānasya dūṣaṇasya sa rāghavaḥ
dvābhyām śarābhyām ciccheda sa hasta ābharaṇau bhujau
bhraṣṭaḥ tasya mahā kāyaḥ papāta raṇa mūrdhani
parighaḥ chinna hastasya śakra dhvajaḥ iva agratas

original: 3.025.009a sa karābhyāṃ vikīrṇābhyāṃ papāta bhuvi dūṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa karābhyām vikīrṇābhyām papāta bhuvi dūṣaṇaḥ
viṣāṇābhyām viśīrṇābhyām manasvī iva mahā gajaḥ

original: 3.025.010a dṛṣṭvā taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau dūṣaṇaṃ nihataṃ raṇe
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam patitam bhūmau dūṣaṇam nihatam raṇe

original: 3.025.010c sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ sarvabhūtāny apūjayan
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti kākutstham sarva bhūtāni apūjayan
etasmin antare kruddhāḥ trayaḥ senā agra yāyinaḥ
saṃhatya abhyadravan rāmam mṛtyu pāśa avapāśitāḥ
mahā kapālaḥ vipulam śūlam udyamya rākṣasaḥ

original: 3.025.012c sthūlākṣaḥ paṭṭiśaṃ gṛhya pramāthī ca paraśvadham
analyzed: sthūla akṣaḥ paṭṭiśam gṛhya pramāthī ca paraśvadham

original: 3.025.013a dṛṣṭvaivāpatatas tāṃs tu rāghavaḥ sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva āpatataḥ tān tu rāghavaḥ sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ
tīkṣṇa agraiḥ pratijagrāha saṃprāptān atithīn iva
mahākapālasya śiraḥ ciccheda raghunaṅganaḥ
asaṃkhyeyaiḥ tu bāṇa oghaiḥ pramamātha pramāthinam
sthūlākṣasya akṣiṇī tīkṣṇaiḥ pūrayām āsa sāyakaiḥ

original: 3.025.015c sa papāta hato bhūmau viṭapīva mahādrumaḥ
analyzed: sa papāta hataḥ bhūmau viṭapī iva mahā drumaḥ
tatas pāvaka saṃkāśaiḥ hema vajra vibhūṣitaiḥ
jaghana śeṣam tejasvī tasya sainyasya sāyakaiḥ

original: 3.025.017a te rukmapuṅkhā viśikhāḥ sadhūmā iva pāvakāḥ
analyzed: te rukma puṅkhāḥ viśikhāḥ sa dhūmāḥ iva pāvakāḥ

original: 3.025.017c nijaghnus tāni rakṣāṃsi vajrā iva mahādrumān
analyzed: nijaghnuḥ tāni rakṣāṃsi vajrāḥ iva mahā drumān

original: 3.025.018a rakṣasāṃ tu śataṃ rāmaḥ śatenaikena karṇinā
analyzed: rakṣasām tu śatam rāmaḥ śatena ekena karṇinā
sahasram ca sahasreṇa jaghāna raṇa mūrdhani
taiḥ bhinna varma ābharaṇāḥ chinna bhinna śarāsanāḥ
nipetuḥ śoṇita ādigdhāḥ dharaṇyām rajanīcarāḥ
taiḥ mukta keśaiḥ samare patitaiḥ śoṇita ukṣitaiḥ

original: 3.025.020c āstīrṇā vasudhā kṛtsnā mahāvediḥ kuśair iva
analyzed: āstīrṇā vasudhā kṛtsnā mahā vediḥ kuśaiḥ iva
kṣaṇena tu mahā ghoram vanam nihata rākṣasam
babhūva niraya prakhyam māṃsa śoṇita kardamam
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasām bhīma karmaṇām
hatāni ekena rāmeṇa mānuṣeṇa padātinā

original: 3.025.023a tasya sainyasya sarvasya kharaḥ śeṣo mahārathaḥ
analyzed: tasya sainyasya sarvasya kharaḥ śeṣaḥ mahā rathaḥ

original: 3.025.023c rākṣasas triśirāś caiva rāmaś ca ripusūdanaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasaḥ triśirāḥ ca eva rāmaḥ ca ripu sūdanaḥ
tatas tu tat bhīma balam mahā āhave
samīkṣya rāmeṇa hatam balīyasā
rathena rāmam mahatā kharaḥ tatas
samāsasāda indraḥ iva udyata aśaniḥ
kharam tu rāma abhimukham prayāntam vāhinīpatiḥ
rākṣasaḥ triśirāḥ nāma saṃnipatya idam abravīt
mām niyojaya vikrānta saṃnivartasva sāhasāt
paśya rāmam mahā bāhum saṃyuge vinipātitam

original: 3.026.003a pratijānāmi te satyam āyudhaṃ cāham ālabhe
analyzed: pratijānāmi te satyam āyudham ca aham ālabhe
yathā rāmam vadhiṣyāmi vadha arham sarva rakṣasām

original: 3.026.004a ahaṃ vāsya raṇe mṛtyur eṣa vā samare mama
analyzed: aham vā asya raṇe mṛtyuḥ eṣa vā samare mama
vinivartya raṇa utsāham muhūrtam prāśnikaḥ bhava

original: 3.026.005a prahṛṣṭo vā hate rāme janasthānaṃ prayāsyasi
analyzed: prahṛṣṭaḥ vā hate rāme janasthānam prayāsyasi
mayi vā nihate rāmam saṃyugāya upayāsyasi
kharaḥ triśirasā tena mṛtyu lobhāt prasāditaḥ
gaccha yudhya iti anujñātaḥ rāghava abhimukhaḥ yayau
triśirāḥ ca rathena eva vāji yuktena bhāsvatā

original: 3.026.007c abhyadravad raṇe rāmaṃ triśṛṅga iva parvataḥ
analyzed: abhyadravat raṇe rāmam triśṛṅgaḥ iva parvataḥ
śara dhārā samūhān sa mahā meghaḥ iva utsṛjan
vyasṛjat sadṛśam nādam jala ārdrasya iva dundubheḥ
āgacchantam triśirasam rākṣasam prekṣya rāghavaḥ
dhanuṣā pratijagrāha vidhunvan sāyakān śitān

original: 3.026.010a sa saṃprahāras tumulo rāma triśirasor mahān
analyzed: sa saṃprahāraḥ tumulaḥ rāma triśirasoḥ mahān
babhūva atīva balinoḥ siṃha kuñjarayoḥ iva

original: 3.026.011a tatas triśirasā bāṇair lalāṭe tāḍitas tribhiḥ
analyzed: tatas triśirasā bāṇaiḥ lalāṭe tāḍitaḥ tribhiḥ

original: 3.026.011c amarṣī kupito rāmaḥ saṃrabdham idam abravīt
analyzed: amarṣī kupitaḥ rāmaḥ saṃrabdham idam abravīt
aho vikrama śūrasya rākṣasasya īdṛśam balam

original: 3.026.012c puṣpair iva śarair yasya lalāṭe 'smi parikṣataḥ
analyzed: puṣpaiḥ iva śaraiḥ yasya lalāṭe smi parikṣataḥ
mama api pratigṛhṇīṣva śarān cāpa guṇa cyutān

original: 3.026.013a evam uktvā tu saṃrabdhaḥ śarān āśīviṣopamān
analyzed: evam uktvā tu saṃrabdhaḥ śarān āśīviṣa upamān
triśiraḥ vakṣasi kruddhaḥ nijaghāna caturdaśa
caturbhiḥ turagān asya śaraiḥ saṃnata parvabhiḥ
nyapātayata tejasvī caturaḥ tasya vājinaḥ
aṣṭabhiḥ sāyakaiḥ sūtam rathopasthe nyapātayat

original: 3.026.015c rāmaś ciccheda bāṇena dhvajaṃ cāsya samucchritam
analyzed: rāmaḥ ciccheda bāṇena dhvajam ca asya samucchritam
tatas hatarathāt tasmāt utpatantam niśācaram

original: 3.026.016c bibheda rāmas taṃ bāṇair hṛdaye so 'bhavaj jaḍaḥ
analyzed: bibheda rāmaḥ tam bāṇaiḥ hṛdaye saḥ bhavat jaḍaḥ
sāyakaiḥ ca aprameya ātmā sāmarṣaḥ tasya rakṣasaḥ

original: 3.026.017c śirāṃsy apātayat trīṇi vegavadbhis tribhiḥ śataiḥ
analyzed: śirāṃsi apātayat trīṇi vegavadbhiḥ tribhiḥ śataiḥ
sa bhūmau śoṇita udgārī rāma bāṇa abhipīḍitaḥ
nyapatat patitaiḥ pūrvam sva śirobhiḥ niśācaraḥ
hata śeṣāḥ tatas bhagnāḥ rākṣasāḥ khara saṃśrayāḥ

original: 3.026.019c dravanti sma na tiṣṭhanti vyāghratrastā mṛgā iva
analyzed: dravanti sma na tiṣṭhanti vyāghra trastāḥ mṛgāḥ iva

original: 3.026.020a tān kharo dravato dṛṣṭvā nivartya ruṣitaḥ svayam
analyzed: tān kharaḥ dravataḥ dṛṣṭvā nivartya ruṣitaḥ svayam
rāmam eva abhidudrāva rāhuḥ candramasam yathā

original: 3.027.001a nihataṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā raṇe triśirasā saha
analyzed: nihatam dūṣaṇam dṛṣṭvā raṇe triśirasā saha

original: 3.027.001c kharasyāpy abhavat trāso dṛṣṭvā rāmasya vikramam
analyzed: kharasya api abhavat trāsaḥ dṛṣṭvā rāmasya vikramam

original: 3.027.002a sa dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ sainyam aviṣahyaṃ mahābalam
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā rākṣasam sainyam aviṣahyam mahā balam

original: 3.027.002c hatam ekena rāmeṇa dūṣaṇas triśirā api
analyzed: hatam ekena rāmeṇa dūṣaṇaḥ triśirāḥ api

original: 3.027.003a tad balaṃ hatabhūyiṣṭhaṃ vimanāḥ prekṣya rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: tat balam hata bhūyiṣṭham vimanāḥ prekṣya rākṣasaḥ

original: 3.027.003c āsasāda kharo rāmaṃ namucir vāsavaṃ yathā
analyzed: āsasāda kharaḥ rāmam namuciḥ vāsavam yathā
vikṛṣya balavat cāpam nārācān rakta bhojanān

original: 3.027.004c kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya kruddhān āśīviṣān iva
analyzed: kharaḥ cikṣepa rāmāya kruddhān āśīviṣān iva
jyām vidhunvan su bahuśas śikṣayā astrāṇi darśayan

original: 3.027.005c cacāra samare mārgāñ śarai rathagataḥ kharaḥ
analyzed: cacāra samare śaraiḥ ratha gataḥ kharaḥ

original: 3.027.006a sa sarvāś ca diśo bāṇaiḥ pradiśaś ca mahārathaḥ
analyzed: sa sarvāḥ ca diśaḥ bāṇaiḥ pradiśaḥ ca mahā rathaḥ

original: 3.027.006c pūrayām āsa taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo 'pi sumahad dhanuḥ
analyzed: pūrayām āsa tam dṛṣṭvā su mahat dhanuḥ
sa sāyakaiḥ durviṣahaiḥ sa sphuliṅgaiḥ iva agnibhiḥ
nabhaḥ cakāra a vivaram parjanyaḥ iva vṛṣṭibhiḥ
tat babhūva śitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ khara rāma visarjitaiḥ
pari ākāśam an ākāśam sarvatas śara saṃkulam

original: 3.027.009a śarajālāvṛtaḥ sūryo na tadā sma prakāśate
analyzed: śara jāla āvṛtaḥ sūryaḥ na tadā sma prakāśate
anyonya vadha saṃrambhāt ubhayoḥ saṃprayudhyatoḥ
tatas nālīka nārācaiḥ tīkṣṇa agraiḥ ca vikarṇibhiḥ

original: 3.027.010c ājaghāna raṇe rāmaṃ totrair iva mahādvipam
analyzed: ājaghāna raṇe rāmam totraiḥ iva mahā dvipam
tam ratha stham dhanuṣpāṇim rākṣasam paryavasthitam
dadṛśuḥ sarva bhūtāni pāśa hastam iva antakam
tam siṃham iva vikrāntam siṃha vikrānta gāminam

original: 3.027.012c dṛṣṭvā nodvijate rāmaḥ siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā na udvijate rāmaḥ siṃhaḥ kṣudra mṛgam yathā
tatas sūrya nikāśena rathena mahatā kharaḥ

original: 3.027.013c āsasāda raṇe rāmaṃ pataṅga iva pāvakam
analyzed: āsasāda raṇe rāmam pataṅgaḥ iva pāvakam
tatas sya sa śaram cāpam muṣṭideśe mahātmanaḥ
kharaḥ ciccheda rāmasya darśayan pāṇi lāghavam

original: 3.027.015a sa punas tv aparān sapta śarān ādāya varmaṇi
analyzed: sa punar tu aparān sapta śarān ādāya varmaṇi
nijaghāna raṇe kruddhaḥ śakra aśani sama prabhān

original: 3.027.016a tatas tat prahataṃ bāṇaiḥ kharamuktaiḥ suparvabhiḥ
analyzed: tatas tat prahatam bāṇaiḥ khara muktaiḥ su parvabhiḥ
papāta kavacam bhūmau rāmasya āditya varcasaḥ

original: 3.027.017a sa śarair arpitaḥ kruddhaḥ sarvagātreṣu rāghavaḥ
analyzed: sa śaraiḥ arpitaḥ kruddhaḥ sarva gātreṣu rāghavaḥ

original: 3.027.017c rarāja samare rāmo vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan
analyzed: rarāja samare rāmaḥ vidhūmaḥ gniḥ iva jvalan
tatas gambhīra nirhrādam rāmaḥ śatru nibarhaṇaḥ

original: 3.027.018c cakārāntāya sa ripoḥ sajyam anyan mahad dhanuḥ
analyzed: cakāra antāya sa ripoḥ sajyam anyat mahat dhanuḥ

original: 3.027.019a sumahad vaiṣṇavaṃ yat tad atisṛṣṭaṃ maharṣiṇā
analyzed: su mahat vaiṣṇavam yat tat atisṛṣṭam mahā ṛṣiṇā

original: 3.027.019c varaṃ tad dhanur udyamya kharaṃ samabhidhāvata
analyzed: varam tat dhanuḥ udyamya kharam samabhidhāvata
tatas kanaka puṅkhaiḥ tu śaraiḥ saṃnata parvabhiḥ

original: 3.027.020c ciccheda rāmaḥ saṃkruddhaḥ kharasya samare dhvajam
analyzed: ciccheda rāmaḥ saṃkruddhaḥ kharasya samare dhvajam

original: 3.027.021a sa darśanīyo bahudhā vicchinnaḥ kāñcano dhvajaḥ
analyzed: sa darśanīyaḥ bahudhā vicchinnaḥ kāñcanaḥ dhvajaḥ
jagāma dharaṇīm sūryaḥ devatānām iva ājñayā

original: 3.027.022a taṃ caturbhiḥ kharaḥ kruddho rāmaṃ gātreṣu mārgaṇaiḥ
analyzed: tam caturbhiḥ kharaḥ kruddhaḥ rāmam gātreṣu mārgaṇaiḥ

original: 3.027.022c vivyādha hṛdi marmajño mātaṅgam iva tomaraiḥ
analyzed: vivyādha hṛdi marma jñaḥ mātaṅgam iva tomaraiḥ
sa rāmaḥ bahubhiḥ bāṇaiḥ khara kārmuka niḥsṛtaiḥ
viddhaḥ rudhira sikta aṅgaḥ babhūva ruṣitaḥ bhṛśam

original: 3.027.024a sa dhanur dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya paramāhave
analyzed: sa dhanuḥ dhanvinām śreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya parama āhave
mumoca parama iṣvāsaḥ ṣaṭ śarān abhilakṣitān

original: 3.027.025a śirasy ekena bāṇena dvābhyāṃ bāhvor athārpayat
analyzed: śirasi ekena bāṇena dvābhyām bāhvoḥ atha arpayat

original: 3.027.025c tribhiś candrārdhavaktraiś ca vakṣasy abhijaghāna ha
analyzed: tribhiḥ candra ardha vaktraiḥ ca vakṣasi abhijaghāna ha
tatas paścāt mahā tejāḥ nārācān bhāskara upamān
jighāṃsuḥ rākṣasam kruddhaḥ trayodaśa śilā śitān

original: 3.027.027a tato 'sya yugam ekena caturbhiś caturo hayān
analyzed: tatas sya yugam ekena caturbhiḥ caturaḥ hayān

original: 3.027.027c ṣaṣṭhena ca śiraḥ saṃkhye ciccheda kharasāratheḥ
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhena ca śiraḥ saṃkhye ciccheda khara sāratheḥ

original: 3.027.028a tribhis triveṇuṃ balavān dvābhyām akṣaṃ mahābalaḥ
analyzed: tribhiḥ triveṇum balavān dvābhyām akṣam mahā balaḥ

original: 3.027.028c dvādaśena tu bāṇena kharasya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
analyzed: dvādaśena tu bāṇena kharasya sa śaram dhanuḥ
chittvā vajra nikāśena rāghavaḥ prahasan iva
trayodaśena indra samaḥ bibheda samare kharam
prabhagna dhanvā virathaḥ hata aśvaḥ hata sārathiḥ

original: 3.027.029c gadāpāṇir avaplutya tasthau bhūmau kharas tadā
analyzed: gadā pāṇiḥ avaplutya tasthau bhūmau kharaḥ tadā
tat karma rāmasya mahā rathasya
sametya devāḥ ca mahā ṛṣayaḥ ca
apūjayan prāñjalayaḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ
tadā vimāna agra gatāḥ sametāḥ

original: 3.028.001a kharaṃ tu virathaṃ rāmo gadāpāṇim avasthitam
analyzed: kharam tu viratham rāmaḥ gadā pāṇim avasthitam
mṛdupūrvam mahā tejāḥ paruṣam vākyam abravīt
gaja aśva ratha saṃbādhe bale mahati tiṣṭhatā
kṛtam su dāruṇam karma sarva loka jugupsitam
udvejanīyaḥ bhūtānām nṛśaṃsaḥ pāpa karma kṛt

original: 3.028.003c trayāṇām api lokānām īśvaro 'pi na tiṣṭhati
analyzed: trayāṇām api lokānām īśvaraḥ u pi na tiṣṭhati
karma loka viruddham tu kurvāṇam kṣaṇadā cara

original: 3.028.004c tīkṣṇaṃ sarvajano hanti sarpaṃ duṣṭam ivāgatam
analyzed: tīkṣṇam sarva janaḥ hanti sarpam duṣṭam iva āgatam

original: 3.028.005a lobhāt pāpāni kurvāṇaḥ kāmād vā yo na budhyate
analyzed: lobhāt pāpāni kurvāṇaḥ kāmāt vā yaḥ na budhyate

original: 3.028.005c bhraṣṭaḥ paśyati tasyāntaṃ brāhmaṇī karakād iva
analyzed: bhraṣṭaḥ paśyati tasya antam brāhmaṇī karakāt iva
vasataḥ daṇḍaka araṇye tāpasān dharma cāriṇaḥ

original: 3.028.006c kiṃ nu hatvā mahābhāgān phalaṃ prāpsyasi rākṣasa
analyzed: kim nu hatvā mahābhāgān phalam prāpsyasi rākṣasa
na ciram pāpa karmāṇaḥ krūrāḥ loka jugupsitāḥ

original: 3.028.007c aiśvaryaṃ prāpya tiṣṭhanti śīrṇamūlā iva drumāḥ
analyzed: aiśvaryam prāpya tiṣṭhanti śīrṇa mūlāḥ iva drumāḥ

original: 3.028.008a avaśyaṃ labhate kartā phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
analyzed: avaśyam labhate kartā phalam pāpasya karmaṇaḥ

original: 3.028.008c ghoraṃ paryāgate kāle drumaḥ puṣpam ivārtavam
analyzed: ghoram paryāgate kāle drumaḥ puṣpam iva ārtavam

original: 3.028.009a nacirāt prāpyate loke pāpānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalam
analyzed: nacirāt prāpyate loke pāpānām karmaṇām phalam
sa viṣāṇām iva annānām bhuktānām kṣaṇadā cara
pāpam ghoram lokasya apriyam icchatām

original: 3.028.010c aham āsādito rājā prāṇān hantuṃ niśācara
analyzed: aham āsāditaḥ rājā prāṇān hantum niśācara

original: 3.028.011a adya hi tvāṃ mayā muktāḥ śarāḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: adya hi tvām mayā muktāḥ śarāḥ kāñcana bhūṣaṇāḥ
vidārya nipatiṣyanti valmīkam iva pannagāḥ
ye tvayā daṇḍaka araṇye bhakṣitāḥ dharma cāriṇaḥ
tān adya nihataḥ saṃkhye sa sainyaḥ nugamiṣyasi

original: 3.028.013a adya tvāṃ nihataṃ bāṇaiḥ paśyantu paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: adya tvām nihatam bāṇaiḥ paśyantu parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: 3.028.013c nirayasthaṃ vimānasthā ye tvayā hiṃsitāḥ purā
analyzed: niraya stham vimāna sthāḥ ye tvayā hiṃsitāḥ purā

original: 3.028.014a prahara tvaṃ yathākāmaṃ kuru yatnaṃ kulādhama
analyzed: prahara tvam yathākāmam kuru yatnam kula adhama

original: 3.028.014c adya te pātayiṣyāmi śiras tālaphalaṃ yathā
analyzed: adya te pātayiṣyāmi śiraḥ tāla phalam yathā

original: 3.028.015a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa kruddhaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rāmeṇa kruddhaḥ saṃrakta locanaḥ
pratyuvāca tatas rāmam prahasan krodha mūrchitaḥ
prākṛtān rākṣasān hatvā yuddhe daśaratha ātmaja
ātmanā katham ātmānam apraśasyam praśaṃsasi

original: 3.028.017a vikrāntā balavanto vā ye bhavanti nararṣabhāḥ
analyzed: vikrāntāḥ balavantaḥ vā ye bhavanti nara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 3.028.017c kathayanti na te kiṃ cit tejasā svena garvitāḥ
analyzed: kathayanti na te kim cit tejasā svena garvitāḥ
prākṛtāḥ tu akṛtātmānaḥ loke kṣatriya pāṃsanāḥ
nirarthakam vikatthante yathā rāma vikatthase
kulam vyapadiśan vīraḥ samare kaḥ bhidhāsyati

original: 3.028.019c mṛtyukāle hi saṃprāpte svayam aprastave stavam
analyzed: mṛtyu kāle hi saṃprāpte svayam aprastave stavam

original: 3.028.020a sarvathā tu laghutvaṃ te katthanena vidarśitam
analyzed: sarvathā tu laghu tvam te katthanena vidarśitam
suvarṇa pratirūpeṇa taptena iva kuśa agninā

original: 3.028.021a na tu mām iha tiṣṭhantaṃ paśyasi tvaṃ gadādharam
analyzed: na tu mām iha tiṣṭhantam paśyasi tvam gadā dharam
dharādharam iva akampyam parvatam dhātubhiḥ citam

original: 3.028.022a paryāpto 'haṃ gadāpāṇir hantuṃ prāṇān raṇe tava
analyzed: paryāptaḥ ham gadā pāṇiḥ hantum prāṇān raṇe tava
trayāṇām api lokānām pāśa hastaḥ iva antakaḥ

original: 3.028.023a kāmaṃ bahv api vaktavyaṃ tvayi vakṣyāmi na tv aham
analyzed: kāmam bahu api vaktavyam tvayi vakṣyāmi na tu aham

original: 3.028.023c astaṃ gacched dhi savitā yuddhavighras tato bhavet
analyzed: astam gacchet hi savitā yuddha vighraḥ tatas bhavet
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rākṣasānām hatāni te
tvad vināśāt karomi adya teṣām aśru pramārjanam

original: 3.028.025a ity uktvā paramakruddhas tāṃ gadāṃ paramāṅgadām
analyzed: iti uktvā parama kruddhaḥ tām gadām parama aṅgadām

original: 3.028.025c kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya pradīptām aśaniṃ yathā
analyzed: kharaḥ cikṣepa rāmāya pradīptām aśanim yathā
khara bāhu pramuktā sā pradīptā mahatī gadā

original: 3.028.026c bhasmavṛkṣāṃś ca gulmāṃś ca kṛtvāgāt tatsamīpataḥ
analyzed: bhasma vṛkṣān ca gulmān ca kṛtvā āgāt tad samīpatas
tām āpatantīm jvalitām mṛtyu pāśa upamām gadā
antarikṣa gatām rāmaḥ ciccheda bahudhā śaraiḥ

original: 3.028.028a sā viśīrṇā śarair bhinnā papāta dharaṇītale
analyzed: sā viśīrṇā śaraiḥ bhinnā papāta dharaṇī tale
gadā mantra oṣadhi balaiḥ vyālī iva vinipātitā

original: 3.029.001a bhittvā tu tāṃ gadāṃ bāṇai rāghavo dharmavatsalaḥ
analyzed: bhittvā tu tām gadām bāṇaiḥ rāghavaḥ dharma vatsalaḥ

original: 3.029.001c smayamānaḥ kharaṃ vākyaṃ saṃrabdham idam abravīt
analyzed: smayamānaḥ kharam vākyam saṃrabdham idam abravīt
etat te bala sarvasvam darśitam rākṣasa adhama
śakti hīnataraḥ mattaḥ vṛthā tvam upagarjitam
eṣā bāṇa vinirbhinnā gadā bhūmi talam gatā
abhidhāna pragalbhasya tava pratyaya ghātinī
yat tvayā uktam vinaṣṭānām idam aśru pramārjanam

original: 3.029.004c rākṣasānāṃ karomīti mithyā tad api te vacaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasānām karomi iti mithyā tat api te vacaḥ
nīcasya kṣudra śīlasya mithyā vṛttasya rakṣasaḥ
prāṇān apahariṣyāmi garutmān amṛtam yathā
adya te bhinna kaṇṭhasya phena budbuda bhūṣitam
vidāritasya mad bāṇaiḥ mahī pāsyati śoṇitam

original: 3.029.007c svapsyase gāṃ samāśliṣya durlabhāṃ pramadām iva
analyzed: svapsyase gām samāśliṣya durlabhām pramadām iva
pravṛddha nidre śayite tvayi rākṣasa pāṃsane
bhaviṣyanti aśaraṇyānām śaraṇyāḥ daṇḍakāḥ ime
janasthāne hata sthāne tava rākṣasa mat śaraiḥ
nirbhayāḥ vicariṣyanti sarvatas munayaḥ vane
adya viprasariṣyanti rākṣasyaḥ hata bāndhavāḥ
bāṣpa ārdra vadanāḥ dīnāḥ bhayāt anya bhaya āvahāḥ
adya śoka rasajñāḥ tāḥ bhaviṣyanti niśācara

original: 3.029.011c anurūpakulāḥ patnyo yāsāṃ tvaṃ patir īdṛśaḥ
analyzed: anurūpa kulāḥ patnyaḥ yāsām tvam patiḥ īdṛśaḥ
nṛśaṃsa śīla kṣudra ātman nityam brāhmaṇa kaṇṭaka

original: 3.029.012c tvatkṛte śaṅkitair agnau munibhiḥ pātyate haviḥ
analyzed: tvad kṛte śaṅkitaiḥ agnau munibhiḥ pātyate haviḥ

original: 3.029.013a tam evam abhisaṃrabdhaṃ bruvāṇaṃ rāghavaṃ raṇe
analyzed: tam evam abhisaṃrabdham bruvāṇam rāghavam raṇe

original: 3.029.013c kharo nirbhartsayām āsa roṣāt kharatara svanaḥ
analyzed: kharaḥ nirbhartsayām āsa roṣāt kharatara svanaḥ

original: 3.029.014a dṛḍhaṃ khalv avalipto 'si bhayeṣv api ca nirbhayaḥ
analyzed: dṛḍham khalu avaliptaḥ si bhayeṣu api ca nirbhayaḥ

original: 3.029.014c vācyāvācyaṃ tato hi tvaṃ mṛtyuvaśyo na budhyase
analyzed: vācya avācyam tatas hi tvam mṛtyu vaśyaḥ na budhyase
kāla pāśa parikṣiptāḥ bhavanti puruṣāḥ hi ye
kārya akāryam na jānanti te nirasta ṣaṣ indriyāḥ

original: 3.029.016a evam uktvā tato rāmaṃ saṃrudhya bhṛkuṭiṃ tataḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tatas rāmam saṃrudhya bhṛkuṭim tatas
sa dadarśa mahā sālam avidūre niśācaraḥ
raṇe praharaṇasya arthe sarvatas hi avalokayan

original: 3.029.017c sa tam utpāṭayām āsa saṃdṛśya daśanacchadam
analyzed: sa tam utpāṭayām āsa saṃdṛśya daśanacchadam
tam samutkṣipya bāhubhyām vinarditvā mahā balaḥ

original: 3.029.018c rāmam uddiśya cikṣepa hatas tvam iti cābravīt
analyzed: rāmam uddiśya cikṣepa hataḥ tvam iti ca abravīt

original: 3.029.019a tam āpatantaṃ bāṇaughaiś chittvā rāmaḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: tam āpatantam bāṇa oghaiḥ chittvā rāmaḥ pratāpavān

original: 3.029.019c roṣam āhārayat tīvraṃ nihantuṃ samare kharam
analyzed: roṣam āhārayat tīvram nihantum samare kharam
jāta svedaḥ tatas rāmaḥ roṣāt rakta anta locanaḥ
nirbibheda sahasreṇa bāṇānām samare kharam

original: 3.029.021a tasya bāṇāntarād raktaṃ bahu susrāva phenilam
analyzed: tasya bāṇa antarāt raktam bahu susrāva phenilam
gireḥ prasravaṇasya iva toya dhārā parisravaḥ

original: 3.029.022a vihvalaḥ sa kṛto bāṇaiḥ kharo rāmeṇa saṃyuge
analyzed: vihvalaḥ sa kṛtaḥ bāṇaiḥ kharaḥ rāmeṇa saṃyuge
mattaḥ rudhira gandhena tam evā abhyadravat drutam
tam āpatantam saṃrabdham kṛta astraḥ rudhira āplutam
apasarpat pratipadam kim cit tvarita vikramaḥ
tatas pāvaka saṃkāśam badhāya samare śaram
kharasya rāmaḥ jagrāha brahmadaṇḍam iva aparam

original: 3.029.025a sa tad dattaṃ maghavatā surarājena dhīmatā
analyzed: sa tat dattam maghavatā surarājena dhīmatā

original: 3.029.025c saṃdadhe ca sa dharmātmā mumoca ca kharaṃ prati
analyzed: saṃdadhe ca sa dharma ātmā mumoca ca kharam prati
sa vimuktaḥ mahā bāṇaḥ nirghāta sama niḥsvanaḥ
rāmeṇa dhanuḥ udyamya kharasya urasi ca apatat

original: 3.029.027a sa papāta kharo bhūmau dahyamānaḥ śarāgninā
analyzed: sa papāta kharaḥ bhūmau dahyamānaḥ śara agninā
rudreṇa eva vinirdagdhaḥ śveta araṇye yathā andhakaḥ

original: 3.029.028a sa vṛtra iva vajreṇa phenena namucir yathāa
analyzed: sa vṛtraḥ iva vajreṇa phenena namuciḥ yathā a
balaḥ vā indra aśani hataḥ nipapāta hataḥ kharaḥ
tatas rāja ṛṣayaḥ sarve saṃgatāḥ parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: 3.029.029c sabhājya muditā rāmam idaṃ vacanam abruvan
analyzed: sabhājya muditāḥ rāmam idam vacanam abruvan
etad artham mahā tejāḥ mahā indraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ
śarabhaṅga āśramam puṇyam ājagāma puraṃdaraḥ

original: 3.029.031a ānītas tvam imaṃ deśam upāyena maharṣibhiḥ
analyzed: ānītaḥ tvam imam deśam upāyena mahā ṛṣibhiḥ
eṣām vadha artham krūrāṇām rakṣasām pāpa karmaṇām

original: 3.029.032a tad idaṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ tvayā daśarathātmaja
analyzed: tat idam naḥ kṛtam kāryam tvayā daśaratha ātmaja
sukham dharmam cariṣyanti daṇḍakeṣu mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: 3.029.033a etasminn antare vīro lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
analyzed: etasmin antare vīraḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
giri durgāt viniṣkramya saṃviveśa āśramam sukhī

original: 3.029.034a tato rāmas tu vijayī pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ
analyzed: tatas rāmaḥ tu vijayī pūjyamānaḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ
praviveśa āśramam vīraḥ lakṣmaṇena abhivāditaḥ
tam dṛṣṭvā śatru hantāram mahā ṛṣīṇām sukha āvaham
babhūva hṛṣṭā vaidehī bhartāram pariṣasvaje
tatas śūrpaṇakhā dṛṣṭvā sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
hatāni ekena rāmeṇa rakṣasām bhīma karmaṇām

original: 3.030.002a dūṣaṇaṃ ca kharaṃ caiva hataṃ triśirasaṃ raṇe
analyzed: dūṣaṇam ca kharam ca eva hatam triśirasam raṇe
dṛṣṭvā punar mahā nādam nanāda jalada upamā

original: 3.030.003a sā dṛṣṭvā karma rāmasya kṛtam anyaiḥ suduṣkaram
analyzed: sā dṛṣṭvā karma rāmasya kṛtam anyaiḥ su duṣkaram
jagāma parama audvignā laṅkām rāvaṇa pālitām
sa dadarśa vimāna agre rāvaṇam dīpta tejasam
upopaviṣṭam sacivaiḥ marudbhiḥ iva vāsavam
āsīnam sūrya saṃkāśe kāñcane parama āsane
rukma vedi gatam prājyam jvalantam iva pāvakam
deva gandharva bhūtānām ṛṣīṇām ca mahātmanām
ajeyam samare śūram vyātta ānanam iva antakam
deva asura vimardeṣu vajra aśani kṛta vraṇam
airāvata viṣāṇa agraiḥ utkṛṣṭa kiṇa vakṣasam
viṃśadbhujam daśagrīvam darśanīya paricchadam
viśāla vakṣasam vīram rāja lakṣmaṇa lakṣitam
snigdha vaidūrya saṃkāśam tapta kāñcana kuṇḍalam
su bhujam śukla daśanam mahā āsyam parvata upamam
viṣṇu cakra nipātaiḥ ca śataśas deva saṃyuge
āhata aṅgam samastaiḥ ca deva praharaṇaiḥ tathā
akṣobhyāṇām samudrāṇām kṣobhaṇam kṣiprakāriṇam
kṣeptāram parvata agrāṇām surāṇām ca pramardanam
ucchettāram ca dharmāṇām paradāra abhimarśanam
sarva divya astra yoktāram yajña vighna karam sadā

original: 3.030.013a purīṃ bhogavatīṃ gatvā parājitya ca vāsukim
analyzed: purīm bhogavatīm gatvā parājitya ca vāsukim

original: 3.030.013c takṣakasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ parājitya jahāra yaḥ
analyzed: takṣakasya priyām bhāryām parājitya jahāra yaḥ
kailāsam parvatam gatvā vijitya naravāhanam

original: 3.030.014c vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tasya kāmagaṃ vai jahāra yaḥ
analyzed: vimānam puṣpakam tasya kāma gam vai jahāra yaḥ

original: 3.030.015a vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ divyaṃ nalinīṃ nandanaṃ vanam
analyzed: vanam caitraratham divyam nalinīm nandanam vanam
vināśayati yaḥ krodhāt deva udyānāni vīryavān
candra sūryau mahābhāgau uttiṣṭhantau paraṃtapau
nivārayati bāhubhyām yaḥ śaila śikhara upamaḥ
daśa varṣa sahasrāṇi tapaḥ taptvā mahā vane

original: 3.030.017c purā svayambhuve dhīraḥ śirāṃsy upajahāra yaḥ
analyzed: purā dhīraḥ śirāṃsi upajahāra yaḥ
deva dānava gandharva piśāca pataga uragaiḥ

original: 3.030.018c abhayaṃ yasya saṃgrāme mṛtyuto mānuṣād ṛte
analyzed: abhayam yasya saṃgrāme mṛtyutaḥ mānuṣāt ṛte
abhituṣṭam puṇyam adhvareṣu dvijātibhiḥ
havirdhāneṣu yaḥ somam upahanti mahā balaḥ
āpta yajña haram krūram brahma ghnam duṣṭa cāriṇam
karkaśam niranukrośam prajānām ahite ratam
rāvaṇam sarva bhūtānām sarva loka bhaya āvaham

original: 3.030.021a rākṣasī bhrātaraṃ krūraṃ sā dadarśa mahābalam
analyzed: rākṣasī bhrātaram krūram sā dadarśa mahā balam
tam divya vastra ābharaṇam divya mālya upaśobhitam
rākṣasa indram mahābhāgam paulastya kula nandanam
tam abravīt dīpta viśāla locanam
pradarśayitvā bhaya moha mūrchitā
su dāruṇam vākyam abhīta cāriṇī
mahātmanā śūrpaṇakhā virūpitā
tatas śūrpaṇakhā dīnā rāvaṇam loka rāvaṇam
amātya madhye saṃkruddhā paruṣam vākyam abravīt
pramattaḥ kāma bhogeṣu svaira vṛttaḥ niraṅkuśaḥ
samutpannam bhayam ghoram boddhavyam na avabudhyase
saktam grāmyeṣu bhogeṣu kāma vṛttam mahīpatim

original: 3.031.003c lubdhaṃ na bahu manyante śmaśānāgnim iva prajāḥ
analyzed: lubdham na bahu manyante śmaśāna agnim iva prajāḥ

original: 3.031.004a svayaṃ kāryāṇi yaḥ kāle nānutiṣṭhati pārthivaḥ
analyzed: svayam kāryāṇi yaḥ kāle na anutiṣṭhati pārthivaḥ

original: 3.031.004c sa tu vai saha rājyena taiś ca kāryair vinaśyati
analyzed: sa tu vai saha rājyena taiḥ ca kāryaiḥ vinaśyati
ayukta cāram durdarśam asvādhīnam narādhipam

original: 3.031.005c varjayanti narā dūrān nadīpaṅkam iva dvipāḥ
analyzed: varjayanti narāḥ dūrāt nadī paṅkam iva dvipāḥ

original: 3.031.006a ye na rakṣanti viṣayam asvādhīnā narādhipaḥ
analyzed: ye na rakṣanti viṣayam asvādhīnāḥ narādhipaḥ

original: 3.031.006c te na vṛddhyā prakāśante girayaḥ sāgare yathā
analyzed: te na vṛddhyā prakāśante girayaḥ sāgare yathā
ātmavadbhiḥ vigṛhya tvam deva gandharva dānavaiḥ
ayukta cāraḥ capalaḥ katham rājā bhaviṣyasi

original: 3.031.008a yeṣāṃ cāraś ca kośaś ca nayaś ca jayatāṃ vara
analyzed: yeṣām cāraḥ ca kośaḥ ca nayaḥ ca jayatām vara

original: 3.031.008c asvādhīnā narendrāṇāṃ prākṛtais te janaiḥ samāḥ
analyzed: asvādhīnāḥ narendrāṇām prākṛtaiḥ te janaiḥ samāḥ

original: 3.031.009a yasmāt paśyanti dūrasthān sarvān arthān narādhipāḥ
analyzed: yasmāt paśyanti dūra sthān sarvān arthān narādhipāḥ
cāreṇa tasmāt ucyante rājānaḥ dīrgha cakṣuṣaḥ

original: 3.031.010a ayuktacāraṃ manye tvāṃ prākṛtaiḥ sacivair vṛtam
analyzed: ayukta cāram manye tvām prākṛtaiḥ sacivaiḥ vṛtam

original: 3.031.010c svajanaṃ ca janasthānaṃ hataṃ yo nāvabudhyase
analyzed: sva janam ca janasthānam hatam yaḥ na avabudhyase
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasām bhīma karmaṇām

original: 3.031.011c hatāny ekena rāmeṇa kharaś ca sahadūṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: hatāni ekena rāmeṇa kharaḥ ca saha dūṣaṇaḥ

original: 3.031.012a ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām abhayam dattam kṛta kṣemāḥ ca daṇḍakāḥ
dharṣitam ca janasthānam rāmeṇa akliṣṭa karmaṇā

original: 3.031.013a tvaṃ tu lubdhaḥ pramattaś ca parādhīnaś ca rāvaṇa
analyzed: tvam tu lubdhaḥ pramattaḥ ca para adhīnaḥ ca rāvaṇa

original: 3.031.013c viṣaye sve samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ yo nāvabudhyase
analyzed: viṣaye sve samutpannam bhayam yaḥ na avabudhyase
tīkṣṇam alpa pradātāram pramattam garvitam śaṭham
vyasane sarva bhūtāni na abhidhāvanti pārthivam
atimāninam agrāhyam ātma saṃbhāvitam naram
krodhanam vyasane hanti sva janaḥ narādhipam

original: 3.031.016a nānutiṣṭhati kāryāṇi bhayeṣu na bibheti ca
analyzed: na anutiṣṭhati kāryāṇi bhayeṣu na bibheti ca

original: 3.031.016c kṣipraṃ rājyāc cyuto dīnas tṛṇais tulyo bhaviṣyati
analyzed: kṣipram rājyāt cyutaḥ dīnaḥ tṛṇaiḥ tulyaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: 3.031.017a śuṣkakāṣṭhair bhavet kāryaṃ loṣṭair api ca pāṃsubhiḥ
analyzed: śuṣka kāṣṭhaiḥ bhavet kāryam loṣṭaiḥ api ca pāṃsubhiḥ

original: 3.031.017c na tu sthānāt paribhraṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ syād vasudhādhipaiḥ
analyzed: na tu sthānāt paribhraṣṭaiḥ kāryam syāt vasudhādhipaiḥ

original: 3.031.018a upabhuktaṃ yathā vāsaḥ srajo vā mṛditā yathā
analyzed: upabhuktam yathā vāsaḥ srajaḥ vā mṛditāḥ yathā
evam rājyāt paribhraṣṭaḥ nirarthakaḥ

original: 3.031.019a apramattaś ca yo rājā sarvajño vijitendriyaḥ
analyzed: apramattaḥ ca yaḥ rājā sarva jñaḥ vijita indriyaḥ

original: 3.031.019c kṛtajño dharmaśīlaś ca sa rājā tiṣṭhate ciram
analyzed: kṛtajñaḥ dharma śīlaḥ ca sa rājā tiṣṭhate ciram
nayanābhyām prasuptaḥ u pi jāgarti naya cakṣuṣā

original: 3.031.020c vyaktakrodhaprasādaś ca sa rājā pūjyate janaiḥ
analyzed: vyakta krodha prasādaḥ ca sa rājā pūjyate janaiḥ

original: 3.031.021a tvaṃ tu rāvaṇadurbuddhir guṇair etair vivarjitaḥ
analyzed: tvam tu rāvaṇa durbuddhiḥ guṇaiḥ etaiḥ vivarjitaḥ

original: 3.031.021c yasya te 'viditaś cārai rakṣasāṃ sumahān vadhaḥ
analyzed: yasya te viditaḥ cāraiḥ rakṣasām su mahān vadhaḥ
parāvamantā viṣayeṣu saṃgataḥ
ayukta buddhiḥ guṇa doṣa niścaye
vipanna rājyaḥ na cirāt vipatsyate
iti sva doṣān parikīrtitān tayā
samīkṣya buddhyā kṣaṇadācara īśvaraḥ
dhanena darpeṇa balena ca anvitaḥ
vicintayām āsa ciram sa rāvaṇaḥ

original: 3.032.001a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhāṃ kruddhāṃ bruvatīṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: tatas śūrpaṇakhām kruddhām bruvatīm paruṣam vacaḥ
amātya madhye saṃkruddhaḥ paripapraccha rāvaṇaḥ

original: 3.032.002a kaś ca rāmaḥ kathaṃ vīryaḥ kiṃ rūpaḥ kiṃ parākramaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ ca rāmaḥ katham vīryaḥ kim rūpaḥ kim parākramaḥ
kimartham daṇḍaka araṇyam praviṣṭaḥ ca su duścaram

original: 3.032.003a āyudhaṃ kiṃ ca rāmasya nihatā yena rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: āyudham kim ca rāmasya nihatāḥ yena rākṣasāḥ

original: 3.032.003c kharaś ca nihataṃ saṃkhye dūṣaṇas triśirās tathā
analyzed: kharaḥ ca nihatam saṃkhye dūṣaṇaḥ triśirāḥ tathā
iti uktā rākṣasa indreṇa rākṣasī krodha mūrchitā
tatas rāmam yathānyāyam ākhyātum upacakrame
kandarpa sama rūpaḥ ca rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ
śakra cāpa nibham cāpam vikṛṣya kanaka aṅgadam

original: 3.032.006c dīptān kṣipati nārācān sarpān iva mahāviṣān
analyzed: dīptān kṣipati nārācān sarpān iva mahāviṣān

original: 3.032.007a nādadānaṃ śarān ghorān na muñcantaṃ mahābalam
analyzed: na ādadānam śarān ghorān na muñcantam mahā balam

original: 3.032.007c na kārmukaṃ vikarṣantaṃ rāmaṃ paśyāmi saṃyuge
analyzed: na kārmukam vikarṣantam rāmam paśyāmi saṃyuge

original: 3.032.008a hanyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ paśyāmi śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ
analyzed: hanyamānam tu tat sainyam paśyāmi śara vṛṣṭibhiḥ
indreṇa eva uttamam sasyam āhatam tu aśma vṛṣṭibhiḥ
rakṣasām bhīma vīryāṇām sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
nihatāni śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ tena ekena padātinā
ardha adhika muhūrtena kharaḥ ca saha dūṣaṇaḥ

original: 3.032.010c ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām abhayam dattam kṛta kṣemāḥ ca daṇḍakāḥ

original: 3.032.011a ekā kathaṃ cin muktāhaṃ paribhūya mahātmanā
analyzed: ekā katham cit muktā aham paribhūya mahātmanā
strī vadham śaṅkamānena rāmeṇa vidita ātmanā
bhrātā ca asya mahā tejāḥ guṇataḥ tulya vikramaḥ

original: 3.032.012c anuraktaś ca bhaktaś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān
analyzed: anuraktaḥ ca bhaktaḥ ca lakṣmaṇaḥ nāma vīryavān

original: 3.032.013a amarṣī durjayo jetā vikrānto buddhimān balī
analyzed: amarṣī durjayaḥ jetā vikrāntaḥ buddhimān balī

original: 3.032.013c rāmasya dakṣiṇe bāhur nityaṃ prāṇo bahiṣcaraḥ
analyzed: rāmasya dakṣiṇe bāhuḥ nityam prāṇaḥ bahiṣcaraḥ
rāmasya tu viśāla akṣī dharma patnī yaśasvinī
sītā nāma varārohā vaidehī tanu madhyamā

original: 3.032.015a naiva devī na gandharvā na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī
analyzed: nā eva devī na gandharvā na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī
tathārūpā mayā nārī dṛṣṭa pūrvā mahī tale

original: 3.032.016a yasya sītā bhaved bhāryā yaṃ ca hṛṣṭā pariṣvajet
analyzed: yasya sītā bhavet bhāryā yam ca hṛṣṭā pariṣvajet

original: 3.032.016c atijīvet sa sarveṣu lokeṣv api puraṃdarāt
analyzed: atijīvet sa sarveṣu lokeṣu api puraṃdarāt
sā su śīlā vapuḥ ślāghyā rūpeṇa apratimā bhuvi

original: 3.032.017c tavānurūpā bhāryā sā tvaṃ ca tasyās tathā patiḥ
analyzed: tava anurūpā bhāryā sā tvam ca tasyāḥ tathā patiḥ
tām tu vistīrṇa jaghanām pīna uttuṅga payodharām
bhāryā arthe tu tava ānetum udyatā aham varānanām
tām tu dṛṣṭvā adya vaidehīm pūrṇa candra nibha ānanām

original: 3.032.019c manmathasya śarāṇāṃ ca tvaṃ vidheyo bhaviṣyasi
analyzed: manmathasya śarāṇām ca tvam vidheyaḥ bhaviṣyasi

original: 3.032.020a yadi tasyām abhiprāyo bhāryārthe tava jāyate
analyzed: yadi tasyām abhiprāyaḥ bhāryā arthe tava jāyate

original: 3.032.020c śīghram uddhriyatāṃ pādo jayārtham iha dakṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: śīghram uddhriyatām pādaḥ jaya artham iha dakṣiṇaḥ

original: 3.032.021a kuru priyaṃ tathā teṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ rākṣaseśvara
analyzed: kuru priyam tathā teṣām rakṣasām rākṣasa īśvara
vadhāt tasya nṛśaṃsasya rāmasya āśrama vāsinaḥ

original: 3.032.022a taṃ śarair niśitair hatvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
analyzed: tam śaraiḥ niśitaiḥ hatvā lakṣmaṇam ca mahā ratham
hata nāthām sukham sītām yathāvat upabhokṣyase

original: 3.032.023a rocate yadi te vākyaṃ mamaitad rākṣaseśvara
analyzed: rocate yadi te vākyam mama etat rākṣasa īśvara
kriyatām nirviśaṅkena vacanam mama rāghava
niśamya rāmeṇa śaraiḥ a jihma gaiḥ
hatām janasthāna gatān niśācarān

original: 3.032.024c kharaṃ ca buddhvā nihataṃ ca dūṣaṇaṃ;
analyzed: kharam ca buddhvā nihatam ca dūṣaṇam
tvam adya kṛtyam pratipattum arhasi

original: 3.033.001a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā vākyaṃ tac chrutvā romaharṣaṇam
analyzed: tatas śūrpaṇakhā vākyam tat śrutvā roma harṣaṇam

original: 3.033.001c sacivān abhyanujñāya kāryaṃ buddhvā jagāma ha
analyzed: sacivān abhyanujñāya kāryam buddhvā jagāma ha

original: 3.033.002a tat kāryam anugamyātha yathāvad upalabhya ca
analyzed: tat kāryam anugamya atha yathāvat upalabhya ca

original: 3.033.002c doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca saṃpradhārya balābalam
analyzed: doṣāṇām ca guṇānām ca saṃpradhārya balābalam

original: 3.033.003a iti kartavyam ity eva kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: iti kartavyam iti eva kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ

original: 3.033.003c sthirabuddhis tato ramyāṃ yānaśālāṃ jagāma ha
analyzed: sthira buddhiḥ tatas ramyām yāna śālām jagāma ha
yāna śālām tatas gatvā pracchannam rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 3.033.004c sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa rathaḥ saṃyujyatām iti
analyzed: sūtam saṃcodayām āsa rathaḥ saṃyujyatām iti
evam uktaḥ kṣaṇena eva sārathiḥ laghu vikramaḥ
ratham saṃyojayām āsa tasya abhimatam uttamam
kāñcanam ratham āsthāya kāma gam ratna bhūṣitam
piśāca vadanaiḥ yuktam kharaiḥ kanaka bhūṣaṇaiḥ
megha pratima nādena sa tena dhanada anujaḥ
rākṣasa adhipatiḥ śrīmān yayau nadanadīpatim
sa śveta bāla vyasanaḥ śveta chatraḥ daśa ānanaḥ
snigdha vaidūrya saṃkāśaḥ tapta kāñcana bhūṣaṇaḥ
daśa āsyaḥ viṃśati bhujaḥ
tridaśa ariḥ muni indra ghnaḥ daśa śīrṣaḥ iva
kāmagam ratham āsthāya śuśubhe rākṣasa adhipaḥ
vidyut maṇḍalavān meghaḥ sa balākaḥ iva ambare
sa śailam sāgara anūpam vīryavān avalokayan
nānā puṣpa phalaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ anukīrṇam sahasraśas
śīta maṅgala toyābhiḥ padminībhiḥ samantataḥ
viśālaiḥ āśrama padaiḥ vedimadbhiḥ samāvṛtam
kadalī āḍhaki saṃbādham nālikera upaśobhitam

original: 3.033.013c sālais tālais tamālaiś ca tarubhiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ
analyzed: sālaiḥ tālaiḥ tamālaiḥ ca tarubhiḥ ca su puṣpitaiḥ
atyanta niyata āhāraiḥ śobhitam parama ṛṣibhiḥ

original: 3.033.014c nāgaiḥ suparṇair gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiś ca sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: nāgaiḥ suparṇaiḥ gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiḥ ca sahasraśas

original: 3.033.015a jitakāmaiś ca siddhaiś ca cāmaṇaiś copaśobhitam
analyzed: jita kāmaiḥ ca siddhaiḥ ca cāmaṇaiḥ ca upaśobhitam
ājaiḥ vaikhānasaiḥ māṣaiḥ vālakhilyaiḥ marīcipaiḥ
divya ābharaṇa mālyābhiḥ divya rūpābhiḥ āvṛtam
krīḍā rati vidhi jñābhiḥ apsarobhiḥ sahasraśas
sevitam deva patnībhiḥ śrīmatībhiḥ śriyā vṛtam
deva dānava saṃghaiḥ ca caritam tu amṛta āśibhiḥ
haṃsa krauñca plava ākīrṇam sārasaiḥ saṃpraṇāditam
vaidūrya prastaram ramyam snigdham sāgara tejasā
pāṇḍurāṇi viśālāni divya mālya yutāni ca
tūrya gīta abhijuṣṭāni vimānāni samantataḥ
tapasā jita lokānām kāmagāni abhisaṃpatan
gandharva apsarasaḥ ca eva dadarśa dhanada anujaḥ
niryāsa rasa mūlānām candanānām sahasraśas
vanāni paśyan saumyāni ghrāṇa tṛpti karāṇi ca

original: 3.033.022a agarūṇāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vanāny upavanāni ca
analyzed: agarūṇām ca mukhyānām vanāni upavanāni ca

original: 3.033.022c takkolānāṃ ca jātyānāṃ phalānāṃ ca sugandhinām
analyzed: takkolānām ca jātyānām phalānām ca sugandhinām

original: 3.033.023a puṣpāṇi ca tamālasya gulmāni maricasya ca
analyzed: puṣpāṇi ca tamālasya gulmāni maricasya ca
muktānām ca samūhāni śuṣyamāṇāni tīrataḥ
śaṅkhānām prastaram ca eva pravāla nicayam tathā

original: 3.033.024c kāñcanāni ca śailāni rājatāni ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: kāñcanāni ca śailāni rājatāni ca sarvaśas
prasravāṇi manojñāni prasannāni hradāni ca
dhana dhānya upapannāni strī ratnaiḥ āvṛtāni ca
hasti aśva ratha gāḍhāni nagarāṇi avalokayan
tam samam sarvatas snigdham mṛdu saṃsparśa mārutam
anūpam sindhurājasya dadarśa tridiva upamam

original: 3.033.027c tatrāpaśyat sa meghābhaṃ nyagrodham ṛṣibhir vṛtam
analyzed: tatra apaśyat sa megha ābham nyagrodham ṛṣibhiḥ vṛtam

original: 3.033.028a samantād yasya tāḥ śākhāḥ śatayojanam āyatāḥ
analyzed: samantāt yasya tāḥ śākhāḥ śata yojanam āyatāḥ

original: 3.033.028c yasya hastinam ādāya mahākāyaṃ ca kaccapam
analyzed: yasya hastinam ādāya mahā kāyam ca kaccapam
bhakṣa artham garuḍaḥ śākhām ājagāma mahā balaḥ

original: 3.033.029a tasya tāṃ sahasā śākhāṃ bhāreṇa patagottamaḥ
analyzed: tasya tām sahasā śākhām bhāreṇa pataga uttamaḥ
suparṇaḥ parṇa bahulām babhañja atha mahā balaḥ
tatra vaikhānasāḥ māṣāḥ vālakhilyāḥ marīcipāḥ
