original: 3.033.030c ajā babhūvur dhūmrāś ca saṃgatāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: ajāḥ babhūvuḥ dhūmrāḥ ca saṃgatāḥ parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: 3.033.031a teṣāṃ dayārthaṃ garuḍas tāṃ śākhāṃ śatayojanām
analyzed: teṣām dayā artham garuḍaḥ tām śākhām śata yojanām
jagāma ādāya vegena tau ca ubhau gaja kacchapau
eka pādena dharma ātmā bhakṣayitvā tat āmiṣam
niṣāda viṣayam hatvā śākhayā pataga uttamaḥ
praharṣam atulam lebhe mokṣayitvā mahā munīn
sa tena eva praharṣeṇa dviguṇīkṛta vikramaḥ
amṛta ānayana artham vai cakāra matimān matim
ayaḥ jālāni nirmathya bhittvā ratna gṛham varam
mahā indra bhavanāt guptam ājahāra amṛtam tatas
tam mahā ṛṣi gaṇaiḥ juṣṭam suparṇa kṛta lakṣaṇam
nāmnā subhadram nyagrodham dadarśa dhanada anujaḥ

original: 3.033.036a taṃ tu gatvā paraṃ pāraṃ samudrasya nadīpateḥ
analyzed: tam tu gatvā param pāram samudrasya nadīpateḥ
dadarśa āśramam ekānte puṇye ramye vana antare
tatra kṛṣṇa ajina dharam jaṭā valkala dhāriṇam
dadarśa niyata āhāram mārīcam nāma rākṣasam

original: 3.033.038a sa rāvaṇaḥ samāgamya vidhivat tena rakṣasā
analyzed: sa rāvaṇaḥ samāgamya vidhivat tena rakṣasā

original: 3.033.038c tataḥ paścād idaṃ vākyam abravīd vākyakovidaḥ
analyzed: tatas paścāt idam vākyam abravīt vākya kovidaḥ

original: 3.034.001a mārīca śrūyatāṃ tāta vacanaṃ mama bhāṣataḥ
analyzed: mārīca śrūyatām tāta vacanam mama bhāṣataḥ

original: 3.034.001c ārto 'smi mama cārtasya bhavān hi paramā gatiḥ
analyzed: ārtaḥ smi mama ca ārtasya bhavān hi paramā gatiḥ

original: 3.034.002a jānīṣe tvaṃ janasthānaṃ bhrātā yatra kharo mama
analyzed: jānīṣe tvam janasthānam bhrātā yatra kharaḥ mama

original: 3.034.002c dūṣaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ svasā śūrpaṇakhā ca me
analyzed: dūṣaṇaḥ ca mahā bāhuḥ svasā śūrpaṇakhā ca me
triśirāḥ ca mahā tejāḥ rākṣasaḥ piśita aśanaḥ

original: 3.034.003c anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā labdhalakṣā niśācarāḥ
analyzed: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrāḥ labdhalakṣāḥ niśācarāḥ
vasanti mad niyogena adhivāsam ca rākṣasaḥ
bādhamānāḥ mahā araṇye munīn ye dharma cāriṇaḥ
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasām bhīma karmaṇām
śūrāṇām labdhalakṣāṇām khara citta anuvartinām

original: 3.034.006a te tv idānīṃ janasthāne vasamānā mahābalāḥ
analyzed: te tu idānīm janasthāne vasamānāḥ mahā balāḥ

original: 3.034.006c saṃgatāḥ param āyattā rāmeṇa saha saṃyuge
analyzed: saṃgatāḥ param āyattāḥ rāmeṇa saha saṃyuge
tena saṃjāta roṣeṇa rāmeṇa raṇa mūrdhani

original: 3.034.007c anuktvā paruṣaṃ kiṃ cic charair vyāpāritaṃ dhanuḥ
analyzed: an uktvā paruṣam kim cit śaraiḥ vyāpāritam dhanuḥ
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasām bhīma karmaṇām
nihatāni śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ mānuṣeṇa padātinā

original: 3.034.009a kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇaś ca nipātitaḥ
analyzed: kharaḥ ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇaḥ ca nipātitaḥ

original: 3.034.009c hatvā triśirasaṃ cāpi nirbhayā daṇḍakāḥ kṛtāḥ
analyzed: hatvā triśirasam ca api nirbhayāḥ daṇḍakāḥ kṛtāḥ
pitrā nirastaḥ kruddhena sa bhāryaḥ kṣīṇa jīvitaḥ

original: 3.034.010c sa hantā tasya sainyasya rāmaḥ kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ
analyzed: sa hantā tasya sainyasya rāmaḥ kṣatriya pāṃsanaḥ
aśīlaḥ karkaśaḥ tīkṣṇaḥ mūrkhaḥ lubdhaḥ jita indriyaḥ

original: 3.034.011c tyaktadharmas tv adharmātmā bhūtānām ahite rataḥ
analyzed: tyakta dharmaḥ tu adharma ātmā bhūtānām ahite rataḥ

original: 3.034.012a yena vairaṃ vināraṇye sattvam āśritya kevalam
analyzed: yena vairam vinā araṇye sattvam āśritya kevalam
karṇa nāsā apahāreṇa bhaginī me virūpitā
tasya bhāryām janasthānāt sītām sura sutā upamām

original: 3.034.013c ānayiṣyāmi vikramya sahāyas tatra me bhava
analyzed: ānayiṣyāmi vikramya sahāyaḥ tatra me bhava

original: 3.034.014a tvayā hy ahaṃ sahāyena pārśvasthena mahābala
analyzed: tvayā hi aham sahāyena pārśva sthena mahā bala

original: 3.034.014c bhrātṛbhiś ca surān yuddhe samagrān nābhicintaye
analyzed: bhrātṛbhiḥ ca surān yuddhe samagrān na abhicintaye

original: 3.034.015a tat sahāyo bhava tvaṃ me samartho hy asi rākṣasa
analyzed: tat sahāyaḥ bhava tvam me samarthaḥ hi asi rākṣasa

original: 3.034.015c vīrye yuddhe ca darpe ca na hy asti sadṛśas tava
analyzed: vīrye yuddhe ca darpe ca na hi asti sadṛśaḥ tava
etad artham aham prāptaḥ tvad samīpam niśācara

original: 3.034.016c śṛṇu tat karma sāhāyye yat kāryaṃ vacanān mama
analyzed: śṛṇu tat karma sāhāyye yat kāryam vacanāt mama

original: 3.034.017a sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ
analyzed: sauvarṇaḥ tvam mṛgaḥ bhūtvā citraḥ rajata bindubhiḥ

original: 3.034.017c āśrame tasya rāmasya sītāyāḥ pramukhe cara
analyzed: āśrame tasya rāmasya sītāyāḥ pramukhe cara

original: 3.034.018a tvāṃ tu niḥsaṃśayaṃ sītā dṛṣṭvā tu mṛgarūpiṇam
analyzed: tvām tu niḥsaṃśayam sītā dṛṣṭvā tu mṛga rūpiṇam
gṛhyatām iti bhartāram lakṣmaṇam ca abhidhāsyati

original: 3.034.019a tatas tayor apāye tu śūnye sītāṃ yathāsukham
analyzed: tatas tayoḥ apāye tu śūnye sītām yathāsukham
nirābādhaḥ hariṣyāmi rāhuḥ candra prabhām iva
tatas paścāt sukham rāme bhāryā haraṇa karśite
visrabdham prahariṣyāmi kṛtārthena antarātmanā
tasya rāma kathām śrutvā mārīcasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 3.034.021c śuṣkaṃ samabhavad vaktraṃ paritrasto babhūva ca
analyzed: śuṣkam samabhavat vaktram paritrastaḥ babhūva ca
sa rāvaṇam trasta viṣaṇṇa cetāḥ
mahā vane rāma parākrama jñaḥ
kṛtāñjaliḥ tattvam uvāca vākyam

original: hitaṃ ca tasmai hitam ātmanaś ca
analyzed: hitam ca tasmai hitam ātmanaḥ ca
tat śrutvā rākṣasa indrasya vākyam vākya viśāradaḥ
pratyuvāca mahā prājñaḥ mārīcaḥ rākṣaseśvaram
sulabhāḥ puruṣāḥ rājan satatam priya vādinaḥ

original: 3.035.002c apriyasya ca pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ
analyzed: apriyasya ca pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ

original: 3.035.003a na nūnaṃ budhyase rāmaṃ mahāvīryaṃ guṇonnatam
analyzed: na nūnam budhyase rāmam mahā vīryam guṇa unnatam
a yukta cāraḥ capalaḥ mahā indra varuṇa upamam

original: 3.035.004a api svasti bhavet tāta sarveṣāṃ bhuvi rakṣasām
analyzed: api svasti bhavet tāta sarveṣām bhuvi rakṣasām

original: 3.035.004c api rāmo na saṃkruddhaḥ kuryāl lokam arākṣasaṃ
analyzed: api rāmaḥ na saṃkruddhaḥ kuryāt lokam arākṣasam
api te jīvita antāya nā utpannā janakātmajā

original: 3.035.005c api sītā nimittaṃ ca na bhaved vyasanaṃ mahat
analyzed: api sītā nimittam ca na bhavet vyasanam mahat

original: 3.035.006a api tvām īśvaraṃ prāpya kāmavṛttaṃ niraṅkuśam
analyzed: api tvām īśvaram prāpya kāma vṛttam niraṅkuśam

original: 3.035.006c na vinaśyet purī laṅkā tvayā saha sarākṣasā
analyzed: na vinaśyet purī laṅkā tvayā saha sa rākṣasā
tvadvidhaḥ kāma vṛttaḥ hi duḥśīlaḥ pāpa mantritaḥ

original: 3.035.007c ātmānaṃ svajanaṃ rāṣṭraṃ sa rājā hanti durmatiḥ
analyzed: ātmānam sva janam rāṣṭram sa rājā hanti durmatiḥ

original: 3.035.008a na ca pitrā parityakto nāmaryādaḥ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: na ca pitrā parityaktaḥ na amaryādaḥ katham cana

original: 3.035.008c na lubdho na ca duḥśīlo na ca kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ
analyzed: na lubdhaḥ na ca duḥśīlaḥ na ca kṣatriya pāṃsanaḥ
na ca dharma guṇaiḥ hīnaiḥ kausalyā ānanda vardhanaḥ

original: 3.035.009c na ca tīkṣṇo hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca hite rataḥ
analyzed: na ca tīkṣṇaḥ hi bhūtānām sarveṣām ca hite rataḥ
vañcitam pitaram dṛṣṭvā kaikeyyā satya vādinam
kariṣyāmi iti dharma ātmā tatas pravrajitaḥ vanam
kaikeyyāḥ priya kāma artham pituḥ daśarathasya ca

original: 3.035.011c hitvā rājyaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam
analyzed: hitvā rājyam ca bhogān ca praviṣṭaḥ daṇḍaka vanam

original: 3.035.012a na rāmaḥ karkaśas tāta nāvidvān nājitendriyaḥ
analyzed: na rāmaḥ karkaśaḥ tāta na a vidvān na ajita indriyaḥ

original: 3.035.012c anṛtaṃ na śrutaṃ caiva naiva tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
analyzed: anṛtam na śrutam ca eva na eva tvam vaktum arhasi
rāmaḥ vigrahavān dharmaḥ sādhuḥ satya parākramaḥ

original: 3.035.013c rājā sarvasya lokasya devānām iva vāsavaḥ
analyzed: rājā sarvasya lokasya devānām iva vāsavaḥ

original: 3.035.014a kathaṃ tvaṃ tasya vaidehīṃ rakṣitāṃ svena tejasā
analyzed: katham tvam tasya vaidehīm rakṣitām svena tejasā

original: 3.035.014c icchasi prasabhaṃ hartuṃ prabhām iva vivasvataḥ
analyzed: icchasi prasabham hartum prabhām iva vivasvataḥ
śara arciṣam anādhṛṣyam cāpa khaḍga indhanam raṇe

original: 3.035.015c rāmāgniṃ sahasā dīptaṃ na praveṣṭuṃ tvam arhasi
analyzed: rāma agnim sahasā dīptam na praveṣṭum tvam arhasi
dhanuḥ vyādita dīpta āsyam śara arciṣam amarṣaṇam
cāpa bāṇa dharam vīram śatru senā apahāriṇam

original: 3.035.017a rājyaṃ sukhaṃ ca saṃtyajya jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: rājyam sukham ca saṃtyajya jīvitam ca iṣṭam ātmanaḥ
na atyāsādayitum tāta rāma antakam iha arhasi

original: 3.035.018a aprameyaṃ hi tat tejo yasya sā janakātmajā
analyzed: aprameyam hi tat tejaḥ yasya sā janakātmajā

original: 3.035.018c na tvaṃ samarthas tāṃ hartuṃ rāmacāpāśrayāṃ vane
analyzed: na tvam samarthaḥ tām hartum rāma cāpa āśrayām vane
prāṇebhyaḥ pi priyatarā bhāryā nityam anuvratā
dīptasya iva hutāśasya śikhā sītā sumadhyamā

original: 3.035.020a kim udyamaṃ vyartham imaṃ kṛtvā te rākṣasādhipa
analyzed: kim udyamam vyartham imam kṛtvā te rākṣasa adhipa

original: 3.035.020c dṛṣṭaś cet tvaṃ raṇe tena tad antaṃ tava jīvitam
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ ced tvam raṇe tena tat antam tava jīvitam

original: 3.035.020e jīvitaṃ ca sukhaṃ caiva rājyaṃ caiva sudurlabham
analyzed: jīvitam ca sukham ca eva rājyam ca eva su durlabham
sa sarvaiḥ sacivaiḥ sārdham vibhīṣaṇa puraskṛtaiḥ

original: 3.035.021c mantrayitvā tu dharmiṣṭhaiḥ kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: mantrayitvā tu dharmiṣṭhaiḥ kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ

original: 3.035.022a doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca saṃpradhārya balābalam
analyzed: doṣāṇām ca guṇānām ca saṃpradhārya balābalam

original: 3.035.022c ātmanaś ca balaṃ jñātvā rāghavasya ca tattvataḥ
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca balam jñātvā rāghavasya ca tattvataḥ

original: 3.035.022e hitaṃ hi tava niścitya kṣamaṃ tvaṃ kartum arhasi
analyzed: hitam hi tava niścitya kṣamam tvam kartum arhasi

original: 3.035.023a ahaṃ tu manye tava na kṣamaṃ raṇe;
analyzed: aham tu manye tava na kṣamam raṇe
samāgamam kosala rāja sūnunā

original: 3.035.023c idaṃ hi bhūyaḥ śṛṇu vākyam uttamaṃ;
analyzed: idam hi bhūyas śṛṇu vākyam uttamam
kṣamam ca yuktam ca niśācara adhipa

original: 3.036.001a kadā cid apy ahaṃ vīryāt paryaṭan pṛthivīm imām
analyzed: kadā cit api aham vīryāt paryaṭan pṛthivīm imām
balam nāga sahasrasya dhārayan parvata upamaḥ
nīla jīmūta saṃkāśaḥ tapta kāñcana kuṇḍalaḥ
bhayam lokasya janayan kirīṭī parigha āyudhaḥ
vyacaram daṇḍaka araṇyam ṛṣi māṃsāni bhakṣayan
viśvāmitraḥ tha dharma ātmā mad vitrastaḥ mahā muniḥ

original: 3.036.003c svayaṃ gatvā daśarathaṃ narendram idam abravīt
analyzed: svayam gatvā daśaratham narendram idam abravīt

original: 3.036.004a ayaṃ rakṣatu māṃ rāmaḥ parvakāle samāhitaḥ
analyzed: ayam rakṣatu mām rāmaḥ parvakāle samāhitaḥ

original: 3.036.004c mārīcān me bhayaṃ ghoraṃ samutpannaṃ nareśvara
analyzed: mārīcāt me bhayam ghoram samutpannam nareśvara

original: 3.036.005a ity evam ukto dharmātmā rājā daśarathas tadā
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ dharma ātmā rājā daśarathaḥ tadā
pratyuvāca mahābhāgam viśvāmitram mahā munim

original: 3.036.006a ūna ṣoḍaśa varṣo 'yam akṛtāstraś ca rāghavaḥ
analyzed: varṣaḥ yam a kṛta astraḥ ca rāghavaḥ

original: 3.036.006c kāmaṃ tu mama yat sainyaṃ mayā saha gamiṣyati
analyzed: kāmam tu mama yat sainyam mayā saha gamiṣyati
badhiṣyāmi muni śreṣṭha śatrum tava yathā īpsitam

original: 3.036.007a ity evam uktaḥ sa munī rājānaṃ punar abravīt
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ sa muniḥ rājānam punar abravīt

original: 3.036.007c rāmān nānyad balaṃ loke paryāptaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: rāmāt na anyat balam loke paryāptam tasya rakṣasaḥ

original: 3.036.008a bālo 'py eṣa mahātejāḥ samarthas tasya nigrahe
analyzed: bālaḥ pi eṣa mahā tejāḥ samarthaḥ tasya nigrahe

original: 3.036.008c gamiṣye rāmam ādāya svasti te 'stu paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: gamiṣye rāmam ādāya svasti te stu paraṃtapaḥ

original: 3.036.009a ity evam uktvā sa munis tam ādāya nṛpātmajam
analyzed: iti evam uktvā sa muniḥ tam ādāya nṛpa ātmajam
jagāma parama prītaḥ viśvāmitraḥ svam āśramam

original: 3.036.010a taṃ tadā daṇḍakāraṇye yajñam uddiśya dīkṣitam
analyzed: tam tadā daṇḍaka araṇye yajñam uddiśya dīkṣitam
babhūva avasthitaḥ rāmaḥ citram visphārayan dhanuḥ
eka vastra dharaḥ dhanvī śikhī kanaka mālayā
śobhayan daṇḍaka araṇyam dīptena svena tejasā
adṛśyata tadā rāmaḥ bāla candraḥ iva uditaḥ
tatas ham megha saṃkāśaḥ tapta kāñcana kuṇḍalaḥ
balī datta varaḥ darpāt ājagāma tad āśramam
tena dṛṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ ham sahasā eva udyata āyudhaḥ

original: 3.036.014c māṃ tu dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥ sajyam asaṃbhrāntaś cakāra ha
analyzed: mām tu dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥ sajyam asaṃbhrāntaḥ cakāra ha

original: 3.036.015a avajānann ahaṃ mohād bālo 'yam iti rāghavam
analyzed: avajānan aham mohāt bālaḥ yam iti rāghavam
viśvāmitrasya tām vedim adhyadhāvam kṛta tvaraḥ

original: 3.036.016a tena muktas tato bāṇaḥ śitaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
analyzed: tena muktaḥ tatas bāṇaḥ śitaḥ śatru nibarhaṇaḥ
tena aham tāḍitaḥ kṣiptaḥ samudre śata yojane
rāmasya śara vegena nirastaḥ bhrānta cetanaḥ
pātitaḥ ham tadā tena gambhīre sāgara ambhasi

original: 3.036.017e prāpya saṃjñāṃ cirāt tāta laṅkāṃ prati gataḥ purīm
analyzed: prāpya saṃjñām cirāt tāta laṅkām prati gataḥ purīm

original: 3.036.018a evam asmi tadā muktaḥ sahāyās te nipātitāḥ
analyzed: evam asmi tadā muktaḥ sahāyāḥ te nipātitāḥ
a kṛta astreṇa rāmeṇa bālena akliṣṭa karmaṇā

original: 3.036.019a tan mayā vāryamāṇas tvaṃ yadi rāmeṇa vigraham
analyzed: tat mayā vāryamāṇaḥ tvam yadi rāmeṇa vigraham

original: 3.036.019c kariṣyasy āpadaṃ ghorāṃ kṣipraṃ prāpya naśiṣyasi
analyzed: kariṣyasi āpadam ghorām kṣipram prāpya naśiṣyasi
krīḍā rati vidhi jñānām samāja utsava śālinām
rakṣasām ca eva saṃtāpam anartham ca āhariṣyasi
harmya prāsāda saṃbādhām nānā ratna vibhū uṣitām

original: 3.036.021c drakṣyasi tvaṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ vinaṣṭāṃ maithilīkṛte
analyzed: drakṣyasi tvam purīm laṅkām vinaṣṭām maithilī kṛte
a kurvantaḥ pi pāpāni śucayaḥ pāpa saṃśrayāt
para pāpaiḥ vinaśyanti matsyāḥ nāga hrade yathā
divya candana digdha aṅgān divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitān

original: 3.036.023c drakṣyasy abhihatān bhūmau tava doṣāt tu rākṣasān
analyzed: drakṣyasi abhihatān bhūmau tava doṣāt tu rākṣasān
hṛta dārān sa dārān ca daśa vidravataḥ diśaḥ
hata śeṣān aśaraṇān drakṣyasi tvam niśācarān
śara jāla parikṣiptām agni jvālā samāvṛtām
pradagdha bhavanām laṅkām drakṣyasi tvam asaṃśayam
pramadānām sahasrāṇi tava rājan parigrahaḥ
bhava sva dāra nirataḥ sva kulam rakṣa rākṣasa

original: 3.036.027a mānaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca rājyaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam iātmanaḥ
analyzed: mānam vṛddhim ca rājyam ca jīvitam ca iṣṭam

original: 3.036.027c yadīcchasi ciraṃ bhoktuṃ mā kṛthā rāma vipriyam
analyzed: yadi icchasi ciram bhoktum mā kṛthāḥ rāma vipriyam
nivāryamāṇaḥ suhṛdā mayā bhṛśam
prasahya sītām yadi dharṣayiṣyasi
gamiṣyasi kṣīṇa balaḥ sa bāndhavaḥ
yama kṣayam rāma śara ātta jīvitaḥ

original: 3.037.001a evam asmi tadā muktaḥ kathaṃ cit tena saṃyuge
analyzed: evam asmi tadā muktaḥ katham cit tena saṃyuge

original: 3.037.001c idānīm api yad vṛttaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva yad uttaram
analyzed: idānīm api yat vṛttam tat śṛṇuṣva yat uttaram

original: 3.037.002a rākṣasābhyām ahaṃ dvābhyām anirviṇṇas tathā kṛtaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasābhyām aham dvābhyām anirviṇṇaḥ tathā kṛtaḥ
sahitaḥ mṛga rūpābhyām praviṣṭaḥ daṇḍaka vanam
dīpta jihvaḥ mahā kāyaḥ tīkṣṇa śṛṇgaḥ mahā balaḥ
vyacaran daṇḍaka araṇyam māṃsa bhakṣaḥ mahāmṛgaḥ
agnihotreṣu tīrtheṣu caitya vṛkṣeṣu rāvaṇa
atyanta ghoraḥ vyacaran tāpasān tān pradharṣayan
nihatya daṇḍaka araṇye tāpasān dharma cāriṇaḥ

original: 3.037.005c rudhirāṇi pibaṃs teṣāṃ tathā māṃsāni bhakṣayan
analyzed: rudhirāṇi piban teṣām tathā māṃsāni bhakṣayan
ṛṣi māṃsa aśanaḥ krūraḥ trāsayan vana gocarān
tadā rudhira mattaḥ ham vyacaram daṇḍaka vanam
tadā aham daṇḍaka araṇye vicaran dharma dūṣakaḥ

original: 3.037.007c āsādayaṃ tadā rāmaṃ tāpasaṃ dharmam āśritam
analyzed: āsādayam tadā rāmam tāpasam dharmam āśritam

original: 3.037.008a vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
analyzed: vaidehīm ca mahābhāgām lakṣmaṇam ca mahā ratham
tāpasam niyata āhāram sarva bhūta hite ratam
saḥ ham vana gatam rāmam paribhūya mahā balam
tāpasaḥ yam iti jñātvā pūrva vairam anusmaran
abhyadhāvam su saṃkruddhaḥ tīkṣṇa śṛṅgaḥ mṛga ākṛtiḥ
jighāṃsuḥ a kṛta prajñaḥ tam prahāram anusmaran

original: 3.037.011a tena muktās trayo bāṇāḥ śitāḥ śatrunibarhaṇāḥ
analyzed: tena muktāḥ trayaḥ bāṇāḥ śitāḥ śatru nibarhaṇāḥ
vikṛṣya balavat cāpam suparṇa anila tulya gāḥ
te bāṇāḥ vajra saṃkāśāḥ su ghorāḥ rakta bhojanāḥ
ājagmuḥ sahitāḥ sarve trayaḥ saṃnata parvaṇaḥ
parākrama jñaḥ rāmasya śaṭhaḥ dṛṣṭa bhayaḥ purā

original: 3.037.013c samutkrāntas tato muktas tāv ubhau rākṣasau hatau
analyzed: samutkrāntaḥ tatas muktaḥ tau ubhau rākṣasau hatau

original: 3.037.014a śareṇa mukto rāmasya kathaṃ cit prāpya jīvitam
analyzed: śareṇa muktaḥ rāmasya katham cit prāpya jīvitam
iha pravrājitaḥ yuktaḥ tāpasaḥ ham samāhitaḥ
vṛkṣe vṛkṣe hi paśyāmi cīra kṛṣṇa ajina ambaram
rāmam pāśa hastam iva antakam
api rāma sahasrāṇi bhītaḥ paśyāmi rāvaṇa

original: 3.037.016c rāmabhūtam idaṃ sarvam araṇyaṃ pratibhāti me
analyzed: rāma bhūtam idam sarvam araṇyam pratibhāti me

original: 3.037.017a rāmam eva hi paśyāmi rahite rākṣaseśvara
analyzed: rāmam eva hi paśyāmi rahite rākṣasa īśvara
dṛṣṭvā svapna gatam rāmam udbhramāmi vicetanaḥ
rakāra ādīni nāmāni rāma trastasya rāvaṇa

original: 3.037.018c ratnāni ca rathāś caiva trāsaṃ saṃjanayanti me
analyzed: ratnāni ca rathāḥ ca eva trāsam saṃjanayanti me

original: 3.037.019a ahaṃ tasya prabhāvajño na yuddhaṃ tena te kṣamam
analyzed: aham tasya prabhāva jñaḥ na yuddham tena te kṣamam

original: 3.037.019c raṇe rāmeṇa yudhyasva kṣamāṃ vā kuru rākṣasa
analyzed: raṇe rāmeṇa yudhyasva kṣamām vā kuru rākṣasa

original: 3.037.019e na te rāmakathā kāryā yadi māṃ draṣṭum icchasi
analyzed: na te rāma kathā kāryā yadi mām draṣṭum icchasi
idam vacaḥ bandhu hita arthinā mayā
yathā ucyamānam yadi na abhipatsyase
sa bāndhavaḥ tyakṣyasi jīvitam raṇe
hataḥ dya rāmeṇa śaraiḥ a jihma gaiḥ

original: 3.038.001a mārīcena tu tad vākyaṃ kṣamaṃ yuktaṃ ca rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: mārīcena tu tat vākyam kṣamam yuktam ca rāvaṇaḥ
uktaḥ na pratijagrāha martu kāmaḥ iva auṣadham
tam pathya hita vaktāram mārīcam rākṣasa adhipaḥ
abravīt paruṣam vākyam ayuktam kāla coditaḥ

original: 3.038.003a yat kilaitad ayuktārthaṃ mārīca mayi kathyate
analyzed: yat kila etat ayukta artham mārīca mayi kathyate

original: 3.038.003c vākyaṃ niṣphalam atyarthaṃ bījam uptam ivoṣare
analyzed: vākyam niṣphalam atyartham bījam uptam iva ūṣare

original: 3.038.004a tvadvākyair na tu māṃ śakyaṃ bhettuṃ rāmasya saṃyuge
analyzed: tvad vākyaiḥ na tu mām śakyam bhettum rāmasya saṃyuge
pāpa śīlasya mūrkhasya mānuṣasya viśeṣataḥ

original: 3.038.005a yas tyaktvā suhṛdo rājyaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā
analyzed: yaḥ tyaktvā suhṛdaḥ rājyam mātaram pitaram tathā

original: 3.038.005c strīvākyaṃ prākṛtaṃ śrutvā vanam ekapade gataḥ
analyzed: strī vākyam prākṛtam śrutvā vanam eka pade gataḥ

original: 3.038.006a avaśyaṃ tu mayā tasya saṃyuge kharaghātinaḥ
analyzed: avaśyam tu mayā tasya saṃyuge khara ghātinaḥ

original: 3.038.006c prāṇaiḥ priyatarā sītā hartavyā tava saṃnidhau
analyzed: prāṇaiḥ priyatarā sītā hartavyā tava saṃnidhau

original: 3.038.007a evaṃ me niścitā buddhir hṛdi mārīca vartate
analyzed: evam me niścitā buddhiḥ hṛdi mārīca vartate

original: 3.038.007c na vyāvartayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
analyzed: na vyāvartayitum śakyā sa indraiḥ api sura asuraiḥ

original: 3.038.008a doṣaṃ guṇaṃ vā saṃpṛṣṭas tvam evaṃ vaktum arhasi
analyzed: doṣam guṇam vā saṃpṛṣṭaḥ tvam evam vaktum arhasi

original: 3.038.008c apāyaṃ vāpy upāyaṃ vā kāryasyāsya viniścane
analyzed: apāyam vā api upāyam vā kāryasya asya viniścane
saṃpṛṣṭena tu vaktavyam sacivena vipaścitā

original: 3.038.009c udyatāñjalinā rājño ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
analyzed: udyata añjalinā rājñaḥ yaḥ icchet bhūtim ātmanaḥ

original: 3.038.010a vākyam apratikūlaṃ tu mṛdupūrvaṃ śubhaṃ hitam
analyzed: vākyam a pratikūlam tu mṛdupūrvam śubham hitam
upacāreṇa yuktam ca vaktavyaḥ vasudhādhipaḥ

original: 3.038.011a sāvamardaṃ tu yad vākyaṃ mārīca hitam ucyate
analyzed: sa avamardam tu yat vākyam mārīca hitam ucyate
na abhinandati tat rājā māna arhaḥ māna varjitam
pañca rūpāṇi rājānaḥ dhārayanti amita ojasaḥ

original: 3.038.012c agner indrasya somasya yamasya varuṇasya ca
analyzed: agneḥ indrasya somasya yamasya varuṇasya ca

original: 3.038.012e auṣṇyaṃ tathā vikramaṃ ca saumyaṃ daṇḍaṃ prasannatām
analyzed: auṣṇyam tathā vikramam ca saumyam daṇḍam prasanna tām

original: 3.038.013a tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu mānyāḥ pūjyāś ca pārthivāḥ
analyzed: tasmāt sarvāsu avasthāsu mānyāḥ pūjyāḥ ca pārthivāḥ

original: 3.038.013c tvaṃ tu dharmam avijñāya kevalaṃ moham āsthitaḥ
analyzed: tvam tu dharmam a vijñāya kevalam moham āsthitaḥ
abhyāgatam mām daurātmyāt paruṣam vadasi īdṛśam

original: 3.038.014c guṇadoṣau na pṛcchāmi kṣamaṃ cātmani rākṣasa
analyzed: guṇa doṣau na pṛcchāmi kṣamam ca ātmani rākṣasa

original: 3.038.014e asmiṃs tu sa bhavān kṛtye sāhāryyaṃ kartum arhasi
analyzed: asmin tu sa bhavān kṛtye sāhāryyam kartum arhasi

original: 3.038.015a sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ
analyzed: sauvarṇaḥ tvam mṛgaḥ bhūtvā citraḥ rajata bindubhiḥ
pralobhayitvā vaidehīm yatheṣṭam gantum arhasi

original: 3.038.016a tvāṃ tu māyā mṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāñcanaṃ jātavismayā
analyzed: tvām tu māyā mṛgam dṛṣṭvā kāñcanam jāta vismayā

original: 3.038.016c ānayainam iti kṣipraṃ rāmaṃ vakṣyati maithilī
analyzed: ānaya enam iti kṣipram rāmam vakṣyati maithilī

original: 3.038.017a apakrānte ca kākutsthe lakṣmaṇe ca yathāsukham
analyzed: apakrānte ca kākutsthe lakṣmaṇe ca yathāsukham
ānayiṣyāmi vaidehīm sahasrākṣaḥ śacīm iva

original: 3.038.018a evaṃ kṛtvā tv idaṃ kāryaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha rākṣasa
analyzed: evam kṛtvā tu idam kāryam yatheṣṭam gaccha rākṣasa
rājyasya ardham pradāsyāmi mārīca tava suvrata

original: 3.038.019a gaccha saumya śivaṃ mārgaṃ kāryasyāsya vivṛddhaye
analyzed: gaccha saumya śivam mārgam kāryasya asya vivṛddhaye

original: 3.038.019c prāpya sītām ayuddhena vañcayitvā tu rāghavam
analyzed: prāpya sītām ayuddhena vañcayitvā tu rāghavam

original: 3.038.019e laṅkāṃ prati gamiṣyāmi kṛtakāryaḥ saha tvayā
analyzed: laṅkām prati gamiṣyāmi kṛta kāryaḥ saha tvayā

original: 3.038.020a etat kāryam avaśyaṃ me balād api kariṣyasi
analyzed: etat kāryam avaśyam me balāt api kariṣyasi

original: 3.038.020c rājño hi pratikūlastho na jātu sukham edhate
analyzed: rājñaḥ hi pratikūla sthaḥ na jātu sukham edhate
āsādya ā tam jīvita saṃśayaḥ te

original: mṛtyur dhruvo hy adya mayā virudhya
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ dhruvaḥ hi adya mayā virudhya
etat yathāvat parigṛhya buddhyā

original: yad atra pathyaṃ kuru tat tathā tvam
analyzed: yat atra pathyam kuru tat tathā tvam
ājñaptaḥ rāja vat vākyam pratikūlam niśācaraḥ
abravīt paruṣam vākyam mārīcaḥ rākṣasa adhipam
kena ayam upadiṣṭaḥ te vināśaḥ pāpa karmaṇā
sa putrasya sa rāṣṭrasya sa amātyasya niśācara

original: 3.039.003a kas tvayā sukhinā rājan nābhinandati pāpakṛt
analyzed: kaḥ tvayā sukhinā rājan na abhinandati pāpa kṛt
kena idam upadiṣṭam te mṛtyu dvāram upāyataḥ
śatravaḥ tava su vyaktam hīna vīryāḥ niśācara
icchanti tvām vinaśyantam uparuddham balīyasā
kena idam upadiṣṭam te kṣudreṇa ahita vādinā

original: 3.039.005c yas tvām icchati naśyantaṃ svakṛtena niśācara
analyzed: yaḥ tvām icchati naśyantam sva kṛtena niśācara

original: 3.039.006a vadhyāḥ khalu na hanyante sacivās tava rāvaṇa
analyzed: vadhyāḥ khalu na hanyante sacivāḥ tava rāvaṇa

original: 3.039.006c ye tvām utpatham ārūḍhaṃ na nigṛhṇanti sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: ye tvām utpatham ārūḍham na nigṛhṇanti sarvaśas

original: 3.039.007a amātyaiḥ kāmavṛtto hi rājā kāpatham āśritaḥ
analyzed: amātyaiḥ kāma vṛttaḥ hi rājā kāpatham āśritaḥ

original: 3.039.007c nigrāhyaḥ sarvathā sadbhir na nigrāhyo nigṛhyase
analyzed: nigrāhyaḥ sarvathā sadbhiḥ na nigrāhyaḥ nigṛhyase

original: 3.039.008a dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca yaśaś ca jayatāṃ vara
analyzed: dharmam artham ca kāmam ca yaśaḥ ca jayatām vara
svāmi prasādāt sacivāḥ prāpnuvanti niśācara

original: 3.039.009a viparyaye tu tat sarvaṃ vyarthaṃ bhavati rāvaṇa
analyzed: viparyaye tu tat sarvam vyartham bhavati rāvaṇa
vyasanam svāmi vaiguṇyāt prāpnuvanti itare janāḥ

original: 3.039.010a rājamūlo hi dharmaś ca jayaś ca jayatāṃ vara
analyzed: rāja mūlaḥ hi dharmaḥ ca jayaḥ ca jayatām vara
tasmāt sarvāsu avasthāsu rakṣitavyaḥ narādhipaḥ

original: 3.039.011a rājyaṃ pālayituṃ śakyaṃ na tīkṣṇena niśācara
analyzed: rājyam pālayitum śakyam na tīkṣṇena niśācara
na ca api pratikūlena na avinītena rākṣasa

original: 3.039.012a ye tīkṣṇamantrāḥ sacivā bhajyante saha tena vai
analyzed: ye tīkṣṇa mantrāḥ sacivāḥ bhajyante saha tena vai
viṣameṣu rathāḥ śīghram manda sārathayaḥ yathā
bahavaḥ sādhavaḥ loke yukta dharmam anuṣṭhitāḥ
pareṣām aparādhena vinaṣṭāḥ sa paricchadāḥ
svāminā pratikūlena prajāḥ tīkṣṇena rāvaṇa

original: 3.039.014c rakṣyamāṇā na vardhante meṣā gomāyunā yathā
analyzed: rakṣyamāṇāḥ na vardhante meṣāḥ gomāyunā yathā
avaśyam vinaśiṣyanti sarve rāvaṇa rākṣasāḥ

original: 3.039.015c yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ
analyzed: yeṣām tvam karkaśaḥ rājā durbuddhiḥ ajita indriyaḥ

original: 3.039.016a tad idaṃ kākatālīyaṃ ghoram āsāditaṃ tvayā
analyzed: tat idam kākatālīyam ghoram āsāditam tvayā

original: 3.039.016c atra kiṃ śobhanaṃ yat tvaṃ sasainyo vinaśiṣyasi
analyzed: atra kim śobhanam yat tvam sa sainyaḥ vinaśiṣyasi

original: 3.039.017a māṃ nihatya tu rāmo 'sau nacirāt tvāṃ vadhiṣyati
analyzed: mām nihatya tu sau nacirāt tvām vadhiṣyati

original: 3.039.017c anena kṛtakṛtyo 'smi mriye yad ariṇā hataḥ
analyzed: anena kṛtakṛtyaḥ smi mriye yat ariṇā hataḥ

original: 3.039.018a darśanād eva rāmasya hataṃ mām upadhāraya
analyzed: darśanāt eva rāmasya hatam mām upadhāraya

original: 3.039.018c ātmānaṃ ca hataṃ viddhi hṛtvā sītāṃ sabāndhavam
analyzed: ātmānam ca hatam viddhi hṛtvā sītām sa bāndhavam

original: 3.039.019a ānayiṣyāmi cet sītām āśramāt sahito mayā
analyzed: ānayiṣyāmi ced sītām āśramāt sahitaḥ mayā

original: 3.039.019c naiva tvam asi naivāhaṃ naiva laṅkā na rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: na eva tvam asi na eva aham na eva laṅkāḥ na rākṣasāḥ
nivāryamāṇaḥ tu mayā hita eṣiṇā
na mṛṣyase vākyam idam niśācara
pareta kalpāḥ hi gata āyuṣaḥ narā
hitam na gṛhṇanti suhṛdbhiḥ īritam

original: 3.040.001a evam uktvā tu paruṣaṃ mārīco rāvaṇo tataḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tu paruṣam mārīcaḥ rāvaṇaḥ tatas
gacchāva iti abravīt dīnaḥ bhayāt rātriṃcara prabhoḥ
dṛṣṭāḥ ca aham punar tena śara cāpa asi dhāriṇā
madvidha udyata śastreṇa vinaṣṭam jīvitam ca me

original: 3.040.003a kiṃ tu kartuṃ mayā śakyam evaṃ tvayi durātmani
analyzed: kim tu kartum mayā śakyam evam tvayi durātmani

original: 3.040.003c eṣa gacchāmy ahaṃ tāta svasti te 'stu niśācaraḥ
analyzed: eṣa gacchāmi aham tāta svasti te stu niśācaraḥ

original: 3.040.004a prahṛṣṭas tv abhavat tena vacanena sa rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: prahṛṣṭaḥ tu abhavat tena vacanena sa rākṣasaḥ
pariṣvajya su saṃśliṣṭam idam vacanam abravīt

original: 3.040.005a etac chauṇḍīryayuktaṃ te macchabdād iva bhāṣitam
analyzed: etat śauṇḍīrya yuktam te mad śabdāt iva bhāṣitam

original: 3.040.005c idānīm asi mārīcaḥ pūrvam anyo niśācaraḥ
analyzed: idānīm asi mārīcaḥ pūrvam anyaḥ niśācaraḥ
āruhyatām ayam śīghram kha gaḥ ratna vibhūṣitaḥ

original: 3.040.006c mayā saha ratho yuktaḥ piśācavadanaiḥ kharaiḥ
analyzed: mayā saha rathaḥ yuktaḥ piśāca vadanaiḥ kharaiḥ

original: 3.040.007a tato rāvaṇamārīcau vimānam iva taṃ ratham
analyzed: tatas rāvaṇa mārīcau vimānam iva tam ratham
āruhya yayatuḥ śīghram tasmāt āśrama maṇḍalāt

original: 3.040.008a tathaiva tatra paśyantau pattanāni vanāni ca
analyzed: tathā eva tatra paśyantau pattanāni vanāni ca

original: 3.040.008c girīṃś ca saritaḥ sarvā rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca
analyzed: girīn ca saritaḥ sarvāḥ rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca
sametya daṇḍaka araṇyam rāghavasya āśramam tatas
dadarśa saha marīcaḥ rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ
avatīrya rathāt tasmāt tatas kāñcana bhūṣaṇāt

original: 3.040.010c haste gṛhītvā mārīcaṃ rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt
analyzed: haste gṛhītvā mārīcam rāvaṇaḥ vākyam abravīt
etat rāma āśrama padam dṛśyate kadalī vṛtam

original: 3.040.011c kriyatāṃ tat sakhe śīghraṃ yadarthaṃ vayam āgatāḥ
analyzed: kriyatām tat sakhe śīghram yad artham vayam āgatāḥ

original: 3.040.012a sa rāvaṇavacaḥ śrutvā mārīco rākṣasas tadā
analyzed: sa rāvaṇa vacaḥ śrutvā mārīcaḥ rākṣasaḥ tadā
mṛgaḥ bhūtvā śrama dvāri rāmasya vicacāra ha
kim cit abhyunnata grīvaḥ indranīla nibha udaraḥ
madhūka nibha pārśvaḥ ca kañja kiñjalka saṃnibhaḥ
vaidūrya saṃkāśa khuraḥ tanu jaṅghaḥ su saṃhataḥ
indrāyudha savarṇena pucchena ūrdhvam virājitaḥ
manohara snigdha varṇaḥ ratnaiḥ nānāvidhaiḥ vṛtaḥ
kṣaṇena rākṣasaḥ jātaḥ mṛgaḥ parama śobhanaḥ

original: 3.040.017a vanaṃ prajvalayan ramyaṃ rāmāśramapadaṃ ca tat
analyzed: vanam prajvalayan ramyam rāma āśrama padam ca tat

original: 3.040.017c manoharaṃ darśanīyaṃ rūpaṃ kṛtvā sa rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: manoharam darśanīyam rūpam kṛtvā sa rākṣasaḥ
pralobhana artham vaidehyāḥ nānā dhātu vicitritam
vicaran gacchate samyak śādvalāni samantataḥ
rūpya bindu śataiḥ citraḥ bhūtvā ca priya darśanaḥ
kisalayān bhaṅktvā adan vicacāra ha
kadalīgṛhakam gatvā karṇikārān itas tatas
samāśrayat manda gatiḥ sītā saṃdarśanam tadā
rājīva citra pṛṣṭhaḥ sa virarāja mahā mṛgaḥ
rāma āśrama pada abhyāśe vicacāra yathāsukham

original: 3.040.022a punar gatvā nivṛttaś ca vicacāra mṛgottamaḥ
analyzed: punar gatvā nivṛttaḥ ca vicacāra mṛga uttamaḥ
gatvā muhūrtam tvarayā punar pratinivartate

original: 3.040.023a vikrīḍaṃś ca punar bhūmau punar eva niṣīdati
analyzed: vikrīḍan ca punar bhūmau punar eva niṣīdati
āśrama dvāram āgamya mṛga yūthāni gacchati
mṛga yūthaiḥ anugataḥ punar eva nivartate
sītā darśanam ākāṅkṣan rākṣasaḥ mṛga tām gataḥ
paribhramati citrāṇi maṇḍalāni viniṣpatan

original: 3.040.025c samudvīkṣya ca sarve taṃ mṛgā ye 'nye vanecarāḥ
analyzed: samudvīkṣya ca sarve tam mṛgāḥ ye nye vanecarāḥ
upagamya samāghrāya vidravanti diśaḥ daśa

original: 3.040.026c rākṣasaḥ so 'pi tān vanyān mṛgān mṛgavadhe rataḥ
analyzed: rākṣasaḥ saḥ u pi tān vanyān mṛgān mṛga vadhe rataḥ
pracchādana artham bhāvasya na bhakṣayati saṃspṛśan

original: 3.040.027c tasminn eva tataḥ kāle vaidehī śubhalocanā
analyzed: tasmin eva tatas kāle vaidehī śubha locanā
kusuma apacaye vyagrā pādapān atyavartata

original: 3.040.028c karṇikārān aśokāṃś ca cūṭāṃś ca madirekṣaṇā
analyzed: karṇikārān aśokān ca cūṭān ca madirā īkṣaṇā
kusumāni apacinvantī cacāra rucira ānanā
anarhā araṇya vāsasya sā tam ratna mayam mṛgam
muktāmaṇi vicitra aṅgam dadarśa parama aṅganā
tam vai rucira daṇta oṣṭham rūpya dhātu tanūruham
vismaya utphulla nayanā sa sneham samudaikṣata

original: 3.040.031a sa ca tāṃ rāma dayitāṃ paśyan māyāmayo mṛgaḥ
analyzed: sa ca tām rāma dayitām paśyan māyā mayaḥ mṛgaḥ

original: 3.040.031c vicacāra tatas tatra dīpayann iva tad vanam
analyzed: vicacāra tatas tatra dīpayan iva tat vanam
a dṛṣṭa pūrvam dṛṣṭvā tam nānā ratna mayam mṛgam
vismayam paramam sītā jagāma janakātmajā

original: 3.041.001a sā taṃ saṃprekṣya suśroṇī kusumāni vicinvatī
analyzed: sā tam saṃprekṣya su śroṇī kusumāni vicinvatī
hema rājata varṇābhyām pārśvābhyām upaśobhitam
prahṛṣṭā ca anavadya aṅgī mṛṣṭa hāṭaka varṇinī

original: 3.041.002c bhartāram api cākrandal lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sāyudham
analyzed: bhartāram api ca akrandat lakṣmaṇam ca eva sa āyudham
tayā āhūtau nara vyāghrau vaidehyāḥ rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 3.041.003c vīkṣamāṇau tu taṃ deśaṃ tadā dadṛśatur mṛgam
analyzed: vīkṣamāṇau tu tam deśam tadā dadṛśatuḥ mṛgam

original: 3.041.004a śaṅkamānas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
analyzed: śaṅkamānaḥ tu tam dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaḥ rāmam abravīt

original: 3.041.004c tam evainam ahaṃ manye mārīcaṃ rākṣasaṃ mṛgam
analyzed: tam eva enam aham manye mārīcam rākṣasam mṛgam
carantaḥ mṛgayām hṛṣṭāḥ pāpena upādhinā vane
anena nihatāḥ rāma rājānaḥ kāmarūpiṇā

original: 3.041.006a asya māyāvido māyā mṛgarūpam idaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: asya māyā vidaḥ māyā mṛga rūpam idam kṛtam
bhānumat puruṣa vyāghra gandharva pura saṃnibham

original: 3.041.007a mṛgo hy evaṃvidho ratnavicitro nāsti rāghava
analyzed: mṛgaḥ hi evaṃvidhaḥ ratna vicitraḥ na asti rāghava

original: 3.041.007c jagatyāṃ jagatīnātha māyaiṣā hi na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: jagatyām jagatī nātha māyā eṣā hi na saṃśayaḥ
evam bruvāṇam kākutstham prativārya śuci smitā
uvāca sītā saṃhṛṣṭā chadmanā hṛta cetanā
ārya putra abhirāmaḥ sau mṛgaḥ harati me manaḥ
ānaya enam mahā bāho krīḍā artham naḥ bhaviṣyati
iha āśrama pade smākam bahavaḥ puṇya darśanāḥ

original: 3.041.010c mṛgāś caranti sahitāś camarāḥ sṛmarās tathā
analyzed: mṛgāḥ caranti sahitāḥ camarāḥ sṛmarāḥ tathā

original: 3.041.011a ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca vānarāḥ kinarās tathā
analyzed: ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣata saṃghāḥ ca vānarāḥ kinarāḥ tathā
vicaranti mahā bāho rūpa śreṣṭhāḥ mahā balāḥ

original: 3.041.012a na cāsya sadṛśo rājan dṛṣṭapūrvo mṛgaḥ purā
analyzed: na ca asya sadṛśaḥ rājan dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ mṛgaḥ purā
tejasā kṣamayā dīptyā yathā ayam mṛga sattamaḥ
nānā varṇa vicitra aṅgaḥ ratna bindu samācitaḥ
dyotayan vanam avyagram śobhate śaśi saṃnibhaḥ

original: 3.041.014a aho rūpam aho lakṣmīḥ svarasaṃpac ca śobhanā
analyzed: aho rūpam aho lakṣmīḥ svara saṃpad ca śobhanā
mṛgaḥ dbhutaḥ vicitraḥ sau hṛdayam harati iva me

original: 3.041.015a yadi grahaṇam abhyeti jīvann eva mṛgas tava
analyzed: yadi grahaṇam abhyeti jīvan eva mṛgaḥ tava
āścarya bhūtam bhavati vismayam janayiṣyati
samāpta vana vāsānām rājya sthānām ca naḥ punar
antaḥpura vibhūṣā arthaḥ mṛgaḥ eṣa bhaviṣyati
bharatasya arya putrasya śvaśrūṇām mama ca prabho
mṛga rūpam idam divyam vismayam janayiṣyati

original: 3.041.018a jīvan na yadi te 'bhyeti grahaṇaṃ mṛgasattamaḥ
analyzed: jīvan na yadi te bhyeti grahaṇam mṛga sattamaḥ
ajinam nara śārdūla ruciram me bhaviṣyati
nihatasya asya sattvasya jāmbūnada maya tvaci
śaṣpa bṛsyām vinītāyām icchāmi aham upāsitum

original: 3.041.020a kāmavṛttam idaṃ raudraṃ strīṇām asadṛśaṃ matam
analyzed: kāma vṛttam idam raudram strīṇām asadṛśam matam

original: 3.041.020c vapuṣā tv asya sattvasya vismayo janito mama
analyzed: vapuṣā tu asya sattvasya vismayaḥ janitaḥ mama
tena kāñcana roṃṇā tu maṇi pravara śṛṅgiṇā
taruṇa āditya varṇena nakṣatra patha varcasā
babhūva rāghavasya api manaḥ vismayam āgatam

original: 3.041.022a evaṃ sītāvacaḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca mṛgam adbhutam
analyzed: evam sītā vacaḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca mṛgam adbhutam

original: 3.041.022c uvāca rāghavo hṛṣṭo bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: uvāca rāghavaḥ hṛṣṭaḥ bhrātaram lakṣmaṇam vacaḥ

original: 3.041.023a paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyāḥ spṛhāṃ mṛgagatām imām
analyzed: paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyāḥ spṛhām mṛga gatām imām

original: 3.041.023c rūpaśreṣṭhatayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati
analyzed: rūpa śreṣṭha tayā hi eṣa mṛgaḥ na bhaviṣyati
na vane nandana uddeśe na caitraratha saṃśraye

original: 3.041.024c kutaḥ pṛthivyāṃ saumitre yo 'sya kaś cit samo mṛgaḥ
analyzed: kutas pṛthivyām saumitre yaḥ sya kaḥ cit samaḥ mṛgaḥ
pratiloma anulomāḥ ca rucirāḥ romarājayaḥ
śobhante mṛgam āśritya citrāḥ kanaka bindubhiḥ
paśya asya jṛmbhamāṇasya dīptām agni śikhā upamām

original: 3.041.026c jihvāṃ mukhān niḥsarantīṃ meghād iva śatahradām
analyzed: jihvām mukhāt niḥsarantīm meghāt iva śatahradām

original: 3.041.027c kasya nāmānirūpyo 'sau na mano lobhayen mṛgaḥ
analyzed: kasya nāma a nirūpyaḥ sau na manaḥ lobhayet mṛgaḥ

original: 3.041.028a kasya rūpam idaṃ dṛṣṭvā jāmbūnadamaya prabham
analyzed: kasya rūpam idam dṛṣṭvā jāmbūnada maya prabham

original: 3.041.028c nānāratnamayaṃ divyaṃ na mano vismayaṃ vrajet
analyzed: nānā ratna mayam divyam na manaḥ vismayam vrajet

original: 3.041.029a māṃsahetor api mṛgān vihārārthaṃ ca dhanvinaḥ
analyzed: māṃsa hetoḥ api mṛgān vihāra artham ca dhanvinaḥ
ghnanti lakṣmaṇa rājānaḥ mṛgayāyām mahā vane
dhanāni vyavasāyena vicīyante mahā vane
dhātavaḥ vividhāḥ ca api maṇi ratna suvarṇinaḥ

original: 3.041.031a tat sāram akhilaṃ nṝṇāṃ dhanaṃ nicayavardhanam
analyzed: tat sāram akhilam nṝṇām dhanam nicaya vardhanam

original: 3.041.031c manasā cintitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā śukrasya lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: manasā cintitam sarvam yathā śukrasya lakṣmaṇa
arthī yena artha kṛtyena saṃvrajati a vicārayan

original: 3.041.032c tam artham arthaśāstrajñaḥ prāhur arthyāś ca lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: tam artham artha śāstra jñaḥ prāhuḥ arthyāḥ ca lakṣmaṇa
etasya mṛga ratnasya parārdhye kāñcana tvaci
upavekṣyati vaidehī mayā saha sumadhyamā

original: 3.041.034a na kādalī na priyakī na praveṇī na cāvikī
analyzed: na kādalī na priyakī na praveṇī na ca āvikī

original: 3.041.034c bhaved etasya sadṛśī sparśaneneti me matiḥ
analyzed: bhavet etasya sadṛśī sparśanena iti me matiḥ

original: 3.041.035a eṣa caiva mṛgaḥ śrīmān yaś ca divyo nabhaścaraḥ
analyzed: eṣa ca eva mṛgaḥ śrīmān yaḥ ca divyaḥ nabhaḥ caraḥ
ubhau etau mṛgau divyau tārāmṛga mahīmṛgau

original: 3.041.036a yadi vāyaṃ tathā yan māṃ bhaved vadasi lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: yadi vā ayam tathā yat mām bhavet vadasi lakṣmaṇa
māyā eṣā rākṣasasya iti kartavyaḥ sya vadhaḥ mayā
etena hi nṛśaṃsena mārīcena akṛtātmanā
vane vicaratā pūrvam hiṃsitāḥ muni puṃgavāḥ
utthāya bahavaḥ yena mṛgayāyām janādhipāḥ

original: 3.041.038c nihatāḥ parameṣvāsās tasmād vadhyas tv ayaṃ mṛgaḥ
analyzed: nihatāḥ parama iṣvāsāḥ tasmāt vadhyaḥ tu ayam mṛgaḥ
purastāt iha vātāpiḥ paribhūya tapasvinaḥ
udara sthaḥ dvijān hanti śvatarīm iva

original: 3.041.040a sa kadā cic cirāl loke āsasāda mahāmunim
analyzed: sa kadā cit cirāt loke āsasāda mahā munim

original: 3.041.040c agastyaṃ tejasā yuktaṃ bhakṣyas tasya babhūva ha
analyzed: agastyam tejasā yuktam bhakṣyaḥ tasya babhūva ha

original: 3.041.041a samutthāne ca tad rūpaṃ kartukāmaṃ samīkṣya tam
analyzed: samutthāne ca tat rūpam kartu kāmam samīkṣya tam

original: 3.041.041c utsmayitvā tu bhagavān vātāpim idam abravīt
analyzed: utsmayitvā tu bhagavān vātāpim idam abravīt
tvayā a vigaṇya vāta āpe paribhūtāḥ ca tejasā

original: 3.041.042c jīvaloke dvijaśreṣṭhās tasmād asi jarāṃ gataḥ
analyzed: jīva loke dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ tasmāt asi jarām gataḥ

original: 3.041.043a evaṃ tan na bhaved rakṣo vātāpir iva lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: evam tat na bhavet rakṣaḥ vātāpiḥ iva lakṣmaṇa
madvidham dharma nityam jita indriyam

original: 3.041.044a bhaved dhato 'yaṃ vātāpir agastyeneva mā gatiḥ
analyzed: bhavet hataḥ yam vātāpiḥ agastyena iva mā gatiḥ

original: 3.041.044c iha tvaṃ bhava saṃnaddho yantrito rakṣa maithilīm
analyzed: iha tvam bhava saṃnaddhaḥ yantritaḥ rakṣa maithilīm

original: 3.041.045a asyām āyattam asmākaṃ yat kṛtyaṃ raghunandana
analyzed: asyām āyattam asmākam yat kṛtyam raghunandana

original: 3.041.045c aham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi grahīṣyāmy atha vā mṛgam
analyzed: aham enam vadhiṣyāmi grahīṣyāmi atha vā mṛgam

original: 3.041.046a yāvad gacchāmi saumitre mṛgam ānayituṃ drutam
analyzed: yāvat gacchāmi saumitre mṛgam ānayitum drutam
paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehīm mṛga tvaci gata spṛhām

original: 3.041.047a tvacā pradhānayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati
analyzed: tvacā pradhānayā hi eṣa mṛgaḥ na bhaviṣyati
apramattena te bhāvyam āśrama sthena sītayā

original: 3.042.003a taṃ vañcayāno rājendram āpatantaṃ nirīkṣya vai

original: 3.042.010a dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahātejās taṃ hantuṃ kṛtaniścayaḥ

original: 3.042.010c saṃdhāya sudṛḍhe cāpe vikṛṣya balavad balī

original: 3.042.011a tam eva mṛgam uddiśya jvalantam iva pannagam

original: 3.042.013e mriyamāṇas tu mārīco jahau tāṃ kṛtrimāṃ tanum

original: 3.042.014a saṃprāptakālam ājñāya cakāra ca tataḥ svaram

original: 3.042.015c mṛgarūpaṃ tu tat tyaktvā rākṣasaṃ rūpam ātmanaḥ

original: 3.042.017a taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau rākṣasaṃ ghoradarśanam

original: 3.042.018c mamāra rākṣasaḥ so 'yaṃ śrutvā sītā kathaṃ bhavet

original: 3.042.020a tatra rāmaṃ bhayaṃ tīvram āviveśa viṣādajam

original: 3.042.020c rākṣasaṃ mṛgarūpaṃ taṃ hatvā śrutvā ca tat svaram

original: 3.042.021a nihatya pṛṣataṃ cānyaṃ māṃsam ādāya rāghavaḥ

original: 3.043.001a ārtasvaraṃ tu taṃ bhartur vijñāya sadṛśaṃ vane

original: 3.043.002a na hi me jīvitaṃ sthāne hṛdayaṃ vāvatiṣṭhate

original: 3.043.002c krośataḥ paramārtasya śrutaḥ śabdo mayā bhṛśam

original: 3.043.003a ākrandamānaṃ tu vane bhrātaraṃ trātum arhasi

original: 3.043.004a rakṣasāṃ vaśam āpannaṃ siṃhānām iva govṛṣam

original: 3.043.004c na jagāma tathoktas tu bhrātur ājñāya śāsanam
analyzed: na jagāma tathā uktaḥ tu bhrātuḥ ājñāya śāsanam

original: 3.043.005a tam uvāca tatas tatra kupitā janakātmajā

original: 3.043.005c saumitre mitrarūpeṇa bhrātus tvam asi śatruvat

original: 3.043.006a yas tvam asyām avasthāyāṃ bhrātaraṃ nābhipadyase

original: 3.043.006c icchasi tvaṃ vinaśyantaṃ rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇa matkṛte

original: 3.043.007a vyasanaṃ te priyaṃ manye sneho bhrātari nāsti te

original: 3.043.028c nyāyavādī yathā vākyam ukto 'haṃ paruṣaṃ tvayā

original: 3.044.001a tayā paruṣam uktas tu kupito rāghavānujaḥ

original: 3.044.005a tām apaśyat tato bālāṃ rājaputrīṃ yaśasvinīm

original: 3.044.006c samīkṣya na prakampante na pravāti ca mārutaḥ

original: 3.044.010a sa pāpo bhavyarūpeṇa tṛṇaiḥ kūpa ivāvṛtaḥ

original: 3.044.014a tām uttamāṃ trilokānāṃ padmahīnām iva śriyam

original: 3.044.015c kamalānāṃ śubhāṃ mālāṃ padminīva ca bibhratī

original: 3.044.016a hrīḥ śrīḥ kīrtiḥ śubhā lakṣmīr apsarā vā śubhānane

original: 3.044.017a samāḥ śikhariṇaḥ snigdhāḥ pāṇḍurā daśanās tava

etau upacitau vṛttau sahitau saṃpragalbhitau
pīna unnata mukhau kāntau snigdha tāla phala upamau
maṇi praveka ābharaṇau rucirau te payodharau
cāru smite cāru netre vilāsini

original: 3.044.020c mano harasi me rāme nadīkūlam ivāmbhasā
analyzed: manaḥ harasi me rāme nadī kūlam iva ambhasā
kara anta mitam adhyāsi sukeśī saṃhata stanī

original: 3.044.021c naiva devī na gandharvī na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī
analyzed: nā eva devī na gandharvī na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī
na evaṃrūpā mayā nārī dṛṣṭa pūrvā mahī tale

original: 3.044.022c iha vāsaś ca kāntāre cittam unmāthayanti me
analyzed: iha vāsaḥ ca kāntāre cittam unmāthayanti me

original: 3.044.023a sā pratikrāma bhadraṃ te na tvaṃ vastum ihārhasi
analyzed: sā pratikrāma bhadram te na tvam vastum iha arhasi
rākṣasānām ayam vāsaḥ ghorāṇām kāmarūpiṇām
prāsāda agryāṇi ramyāṇi nagara upavanāni ca
saṃpannāni sugandhīni yuktāni ācaritum tvayā

original: 3.044.025a varaṃ mālyaṃ varaṃ pānaṃ varaṃ vastraṃ ca śobhane
analyzed: varam mālyam varam pānam varam vastram ca śobhane

original: 3.044.025c bhartāraṃ ca varaṃ manye tvadyuktam asitekṣaṇe
analyzed: bhartāram ca varam manye tvad yuktam asita īkṣaṇe

original: 3.044.026a kā tvaṃ bhavasi rudrāṇāṃ marutāṃ vā śucismite
analyzed: kā tvam bhavasi rudrāṇām marutām vā śuci smite

original: 3.044.026c vasūnāṃ vā varārohe devatā pratibhāsi me
analyzed: vasūnām vā varārohe devatā pratibhāsi me

original: 3.044.027a neha gacchantī gandharvā na devā na ca kiṃnarāḥ
analyzed: na iha gacchantī gandharvāḥ na devāḥ na ca kiṃnarāḥ

original: 3.044.027c rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāsaḥ kathaṃ nu tvam ihāgatā
analyzed: rākṣasānām ayam vāsaḥ katham nu tvam iha āgatā
iha śākhāmṛgāḥ siṃhāḥ dvīpi vyāghra mṛgāḥ tathā

original: 3.044.028c ṛkṣās tarakṣavaḥ kaṅkāḥ kathaṃ tebhyo na bibhyase
analyzed: ṛkṣāḥ tarakṣavaḥ kaṅkāḥ katham tebhyaḥ na bibhyase
mada anvitānām ghorāṇām kuñjarāṇām tarasvinām

original: 3.044.029c katham ekā mahāraṇye na bibheṣi vanānane
analyzed: katham ekā mahā araṇye na bibheṣi vana ānane

original: 3.044.030a kāsi kasya kutaś ca tvaṃ kiṃnimittaṃ ca daṇḍakān
analyzed: kā asi kasya kutas ca tvam kiṃnimittam ca daṇḍakān
ekā carasi kalyāṇi ghorān rākṣasa sevitān
iti praśastā vaidehī rāvaṇena durātmanā

original: 3.044.031c dvijātiveṣeṇa hi taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam āgatam
analyzed: dvijāti veṣeṇa hi tam dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam āgatam
sarvaiḥ atithi satkāraiḥ pūjayām āsa maithilī
upānīya āsanam pūrvam pādyena abhinimantrya ca

original: 3.044.032c abravīt siddham ity eva tadā taṃ saumyadarśanam
analyzed: abravīt siddham iti eva tadā tam saumya darśanam
dvijāti veṣeṇa samīkṣya maithilī
tam āgatam pātra kusumbha dhāriṇam
aśakyam uddveṣṭum upāya darśanān
nyamantrayat brāhmaṇa vat yathāgatam
iyam bṛsī brāhmaṇa kāmam āsyatām
idam ca pādyam pratigṛhyatām iti
idam ca siddham vana jātam uttamam
tvad artham avyagram iha upabhujyatām
nimantryamāṇaḥ pratipūrṇa bhāṣiṇīm
narendra patnīm prasamīkṣya maithilīm
prahasya tasyāḥ haraṇe dhṛtam manaḥ
samarpayām āsa vadhāya rāvaṇaḥ
tatas su veṣam mṛgayā gatam patim
pratīkṣamāṇā sahalakṣmaṇam tadā
nirīkṣamāṇā haritam dadarśa tat
mahat vanam nā eva tu rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 3.045.001a rāvaṇena tu vaidehī tadā pṛṣṭā jihīrṣuṇā
analyzed: rāvaṇena tu vaidehī tadā pṛṣṭā jihīrṣuṇā
parivrājaka rūpeṇa śaśaṃsa ātmānam ātmanā

original: 3.045.002a brāhmaṇaś cātithiś caiṣa anukto hi śapeta mām
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ ca atithiḥ ca eṣa an uktaḥ hi śapeta mām

original: 3.045.002c iti dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu sītā vacanam abravīt
analyzed: iti dhyātvā muhūrtam tu sītā vacanam abravīt
duhitā janakasya aham maithilasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 3.045.003c sītā nāmnāsmi bhadraṃ te rāmabhāryā dvijottama
analyzed: sītā nāmnā asmi bhadram te rāma bhāryā dvijottama
saṃvatsaram ca adhyuṣitā rāghavasya niveśane
bhuñjānā mānuṣān bhogān sarva kāma samṛddhinī

original: 3.045.005a tataḥ saṃvatsarād ūrdhvaṃ samamanyata me patim
analyzed: tatas saṃvatsarāt ūrdhvam samamanyata me patim
abhiṣecayitum rāmam sametaḥ rāja mantribhiḥ
tasmin saṃbhriyamāṇe tu rāghavasya abhiṣecane

original: 3.045.006c kaikeyī nāma bhartāraṃ mamāryā yācate varam
analyzed: kaikeyī nāma bhartāram mama āryā yācate varam

original: 3.045.007a pratigṛhya tu kaikeyī śvaśuraṃ sukṛtena me
analyzed: pratigṛhya tu kaikeyī śvaśuram sukṛtena me
mama pravrājanam bhartuḥ bharatasya abhiṣecanam
dvau ayācata bhartāram satya saṃdham nṛpa uttamam

original: 3.045.008a nādya bhokṣye na ca svapsye na pāsye 'haṃ kadā cana
analyzed: na adya bhokṣye na ca svapsye na pāsye ham kadā cana

original: 3.045.008c eṣa me jīvitasyānto rāmo yady abhiṣicyate
analyzed: eṣa me jīvitasya antaḥ rāmaḥ yadi abhiṣicyate

original: 3.045.009a iti bruvāṇāṃ kaikeyīṃ śvaśuro me sa mānadaḥ
analyzed: iti bruvāṇām kaikeyīm śvaśuraḥ me sa mānadaḥ

original: 3.045.009c ayācatārthair anvarthair na ca yācñāṃ cakāra sā
analyzed: ayācata arthaiḥ anvarthaiḥ na ca yācñām cakāra sā
mama bhartā mahā tejāḥ vayasā pañcaviṃśakaḥ

original: 3.045.010c rāmeti prathito loke guṇavān satyavāk śuciḥ
analyzed: rāma iti prathitaḥ loke guṇavān satya vāc śuciḥ

original: 3.045.011a abhiṣekāya tu pituḥ samīpaṃ rāmam āgatam
analyzed: abhiṣekāya tu pituḥ samīpam rāmam āgatam

original: 3.045.011c kaikeyī mama bhartāram ity uvāca drutaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: kaikeyī mama bhartāram iti uvāca drutam vacaḥ

original: 3.045.012a tava pitrā samājñaptaṃ mamedaṃ śṛṇu rāghava
analyzed: tava pitrā samājñaptam mama idam śṛṇu rāghava
bharatāya pradātavyam idam rājyam akaṇṭakam

original: 3.045.013a tvayā tu khalu vastavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca
analyzed: tvayā tu khalu vastavyam nava varṣāṇi pañca ca
vane pravraja kākutstha pitaram mocaya anṛtāt

original: 3.045.014a tathety uvāca tāṃ rāmaḥ kaikeyīm akutobhayaḥ
analyzed: tathā iti uvāca tām rāmaḥ kaikeyīm akutobhayaḥ

original: 3.045.014c cakāra tadvacas tasyā mama bhartā dṛḍhavrataḥ
analyzed: cakāra tat vacaḥ tasyāḥ mama bhartā dṛḍha vrataḥ

original: 3.045.015a dadyān na pratigṛhṇīyāt satyabrūyān na cānṛtam
analyzed: dadyāt na pratigṛhṇīyāt na ca anṛtam

original: 3.045.015c etad brāhmaṇa rāmasya vrataṃ dhruvam anuttamam
analyzed: etat brāhmaṇa rāmasya vratam dhruvam anuttamam

original: 3.045.016a tasya bhrātā tu vaimātro lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān
analyzed: tasya bhrātā tu vaimātraḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ nāma vīryavān
rāmasya puruṣa vyāghraḥ sahāyaḥ samare rihā

original: 3.045.017a sa bhrātā lakṣmaṇo nāma dharmacārī dṛḍhavrataḥ
analyzed: sa bhrātā lakṣmaṇaḥ nāma dharma cārī dṛḍha vrataḥ
anvagacchat dhanuṣpāṇiḥ pravrajantam mayā saha

original: 3.045.018a te vayaṃ pracyutā rājyāt kaileyyās tu kṛte trayaḥ
analyzed: te vayam pracyutāḥ rājyāt kaileyyāḥ tu kṛte trayaḥ
vicarāma dvijaśreṣṭha vanam gambhīram ojasā

original: 3.045.019a samāśvasa muhūrtaṃ tu śakyaṃ vastum iha tvayā
analyzed: samāśvasa muhūrtam tu śakyam vastum iha tvayā

original: 3.045.019c āgamiṣyati me bhartā vanyam ādāya puṣkalam
analyzed: āgamiṣyati me bhartā vanyam ādāya puṣkalam

original: 3.045.020a sa tvaṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca kulam ācakṣva tattvataḥ
analyzed: sa tvam nāma ca gotram ca kulam ācakṣva tattvataḥ

original: 3.045.020c ekaś ca daṇḍakāraṇye kimarthaṃ carasi dvija
analyzed: ekaḥ ca daṇḍaka araṇye kimartham carasi dvija
evam bruvatyām sītāyām rāma patnyām mahā balaḥ
pratyuvāca uttaram tīvram rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ
yena vitrāsitāḥ lokāḥ sa deva asura pannagāḥ

original: 3.045.022c ahaṃ sa rāvaṇo nāma sīte rakṣogaṇeśvaraḥ
analyzed: aham sa rāvaṇaḥ nāma sīte rakṣaḥ gaṇa īśvaraḥ
tvām tu kāñcana varṇa ābhām dṛṣṭvā kauśeya vāsinīm
ratim svakeṣu dāreṣu na adhigacchāmi anindite
bahvīnām uttama strīṇām āhṛtānām itas tatas

original: 3.045.024c sarvāsām eva bhadraṃ te mamāgramahiṣī bhava
analyzed: sarvāsām eva bhadram te mama agramahiṣī bhava

original: 3.045.025a laṅkā nāma samudrasya madhye mama mahāpurī
analyzed: laṅkā nāma samudrasya madhye mama mahā purī
sāgareṇa parikṣiptāḥ niviṣṭāḥ giri mūrdhani

original: 3.045.026a tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ vaneṣu vicariṣyasi
analyzed: tatra sīte mayā sārdham vaneṣu vicariṣyasi
na ca asya araṇya vāsasya spṛhayiṣyasi bhāmini
pañca dāsyaḥ sahasrāṇi sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitāḥ

original: 3.045.027c sīte paricariṣyanti bhāryā bhavasi me yadi
analyzed: sīte paricariṣyanti bhāryā bhavasi me yadi
rāvaṇena evam uktā tu kupitā janakātmajā
pratyuvāca anavadya aṅgī tam an ādṛtya rākṣasam
mahā girim iva akampyam mahā indra sadṛśam patim
mahā udadhim iva akṣobhyam aham rāmam anuvratā
mahā bāhum mahā uraskam siṃha vikrānta gāminam
nṛsiṃham siṃha saṃkāśam aham rāmam anuvratā
pūrṇa candra ānanam vīram rāja vatsam jita indriyam
pṛthu kīrtim mahā bāhum aham rāmam anuvratā

original: 3.045.032a tvaṃ punar jambukaḥ siṃhīṃ mām ihecchasi durlabhām
analyzed: tvam punar jambukaḥ siṃhīm mām iha icchasi durlabhām

original: 3.045.032c nāhaṃ śakyā tvayā spraṣṭum ādityasya prabhā yathā
analyzed: na aham śakyā tvayā spraṣṭum ādityasya prabhā yathā

original: 3.045.033a pādapān kāñcanān nūnaṃ bahūn paśyasi mandabhāk
analyzed: pādapān kāñcanān nūnam bahūn paśyasi manda bhāj

original: 3.045.033c rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ yas tvam icchasi rāvaṇa
analyzed: rāghavasya priyām bhāryām yaḥ tvam icchasi rāvaṇa
kṣudhitasya ca siṃhasya mṛga śatroḥ tarasvinaḥ
āśīviṣasya vadanāt daṃṣṭrām ādātum icchasi
mandaram parvata śreṣṭham pāṇinā hartum icchasi

original: 3.045.035c kālakūṭaṃ viṣaṃ pītvā svastimān gantum icchasi
analyzed: kālakūṭam viṣam pītvā svastimān gantum icchasi

original: 3.045.036a akṣisūcyā pramṛjasi jihvayā leḍhi ca kṣuram
analyzed: akṣi sūcyā pramṛjasi jihvayā leḍhi ca kṣuram

original: 3.045.036c rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryām adhigantuṃ tvam icchasi
analyzed: rāghavasya priyām bhāryām adhigantum tvam icchasi

original: 3.045.037a avasajya śilāṃ kaṇṭhe samudraṃ tartum icchasi
analyzed: avasajya śilām kaṇṭhe samudram tartum icchasi

original: 3.045.037c sūryā candramasau cobhau prāṇibhyāṃ hartum icchasi
analyzed: sūryā candramasau ca ubhau prāṇibhyām hartum icchasi

original: 3.045.037e yo rāmasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ pradharṣayitum icchasi
analyzed: yaḥ rāmasya priyām bhāryām pradharṣayitum icchasi
agnim prajvalitam dṛṣṭvā vastreṇa āhartum icchasi

original: 3.045.038c kalyāṇa vṛttāṃ rāmasya yo bhāryāṃ hartum icchasi
analyzed: kalyāṇa vṛttām rāmasya yaḥ bhāryām hartum icchasi
ayaḥ mukhānām śūlānām agre caritum icchasi

original: 3.045.039c rāmasya sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ yo 'dhigantuṃ tvam icchasi
analyzed: rāmasya sadṛśīm bhāryām yaḥ dhigantum tvam icchasi
yat antaram siṃha śṛgālayoḥ vane
yat antaram syandanikā samudrayoḥ
surā agrya sauvīrakayoḥ yat antaram
tat antaram dāśaratheḥ tava eva ca
yat antaram kāñcana sīsa lohayoḥ
yat antaram candana vāri paṅkayoḥ
yat antaram hasti biḍālayoḥ vane
tat antaram daśaratheḥ tava eva ca
yat antaram vāyasa vainateyayoḥ
yat antaram madgu mayūrayoḥ api
yat antaram sārasa gṛdhrayoḥ vane
tat antaram dāśaratheḥ tava eva ca
tasmin sahasrākṣa sama prabhāve
rāme sthite kārmuka bāṇa pāṇau
hṛtā api te ham na jarām gamiṣye
vajram yathā makṣikayā avagīrṇam
iti iva tat vākyam aduṣṭa bhāvā
su dṛṣṭam uktvā rajanīcaram tam
gātra prakampāt vyathitā babhūva
vāta uddhatā sā kadalī iva tanvī
tām vepamānām upalakṣya sītām
sa rāvaṇaḥ mṛtyu sama prabhāvaḥ

original: 3.045.045c kulaṃ balaṃ nāma ca karma cātmanaḥ;
analyzed: kulam balam nāma ca karma ca ātmanaḥ
samācacakṣe bhaya kāraṇa artham
evam bruvatyām sītāyām saṃrabdhaḥ paruṣa akṣaram

original: 3.046.001c lalāṭe bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā rāvaṇaḥ pratyuvāca ha
analyzed: lalāṭe bhrukuṭīm kṛtvā rāvaṇaḥ pratyuvāca ha
bhrātā vaiśravaṇasya aham sāpatnyaḥ varavarṇini

original: 3.046.002c rāvaṇo nāma bhadraṃ te daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ nāma bhadram te daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān
yasya devāḥ sa gandharvāḥ piśāca pataga uragāḥ

original: 3.046.003c vidravanti bhayād bhītā mṛtyor iva sadā prajāḥ
analyzed: vidravanti bhayāt bhītāḥ mṛtyoḥ iva sadā prajāḥ
yena vaiśravaṇaḥ bhrātā vaimātraḥ kāraṇa antare

original: 3.046.004c dvandvam āsāditaḥ krodhād raṇe vikramya nirjitaḥ
analyzed: dvandvam āsāditaḥ krodhāt raṇe vikramya nirjitaḥ
mad bhaya ārtaḥ parityajya svam adhiṣṭhānam ṛddhimat
kailāsam parvata śreṣṭham adhyāste naravāhanaḥ

original: 3.046.006a yasya tat puṣpakaṃ nāma vimānaṃ kāmagaṃ śubham
analyzed: yasya tat puṣpakam nāma vimānam kāma gam śubham

original: 3.046.006c vīryād āvarjitaṃ bhadre yena yāmi vihāyasaṃ
analyzed: vīryāt āvarjitam bhadre yena yāmi vihāyasam
mama saṃjāta roṣasya mukham dṛṣṭvā eva maithili
vidravanti paritrastāḥ surāḥ śakra purogamāḥ

original: 3.046.008a yatra tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ tatra māruto vāti śaṅkitaḥ
analyzed: yatra tiṣṭhāmi aham tatra mārutaḥ vāti śaṅkitaḥ

original: 3.046.008c tīvrāṃśuḥ śiśirāṃśuś ca bhayāt saṃpadyate raviḥ
analyzed: tīvra aṃśuḥ śiśirāṃśuḥ ca bhayāt saṃpadyate raviḥ
niṣkampa patrāḥ taravaḥ nadyaḥ ca stimita udakāḥ

original: 3.046.009c bhavanti yatra yatrāhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi ca carāmi ca
analyzed: bhavanti yatra yatra aham tiṣṭhāmi ca carāmi ca

original: 3.046.010a mama pāre samudrasya laṅkā nāma purī śubhā
analyzed: mama pāre samudrasya laṅkā nāma purī śubhā
saṃpūrṇā rākṣasaiḥ ghoraiḥ yathā indrasya amarāvatī
prākāreṇa parikṣiptā pāṇḍureṇa virājitā
hema kakṣyā purī ramyā toraṇā
hasti aśva ratha saṃbhādhā tūrya nāda vināditā
sarva kāma phalaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ saṃkula udyāna śobhitā

original: 3.046.013a tatra tvaṃ vasatī sīte rājaputri mayā saha
analyzed: tatra tvam vasatī sīte rāja putri mayā saha
na sramiṣyasi nārīṇām mānuṣīṇām manasvini

original: 3.046.014a bhuñjānā mānuṣān bhogān divyāṃś ca varavarṇini
analyzed: bhuñjānāḥ mānuṣān bhogān divyān ca varavarṇini
na smariṣyasi rāmasya mānuṣasya gata āyuṣaḥ

original: 3.046.015a sthāpayitvā priyaṃ putraṃ rājñā daśarathena yaḥ
analyzed: sthāpayitvā priyam putram rājñā daśarathena yaḥ

original: 3.046.015c mandavīryaḥ suto jyeṣṭhas tataḥ prasthāpito vanam
analyzed: manda vīryaḥ sutaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ tatas prasthāpitaḥ vanam
tena kim bhraṣṭa rājyena rāmeṇa gata cetasā
kariṣyasi viśāla akṣi tāpasena tapasvinā
sarva rākṣasa bhartāram kāmāt svayam iha āgatam
na manmatha śara āviṣṭam pratyākhyātum tvam arhasi

original: 3.046.018a pratyākhyāya hi māṃ bhīru paritāpaṃ gamiṣyasi
analyzed: pratyākhyāya hi mām bhīru paritāpam gamiṣyasi
caraṇena abhihatya iva purūravasam urvaśī

original: 3.046.019a evam uktā tu vaidehī kruddhā saṃraktalocanā
analyzed: evam uktā tu vaidehī kruddhā saṃrakta locanā
abravīt paruṣam vākyam rahite rākṣasa adhipam
katham vaiśravaṇam devam sarva bhūta namaskṛtam

original: 3.046.020c bhrātaraṃ vyapadiśya tvam aśubhaṃ kartum icchasi
analyzed: bhrātaram vyapadiśya tvam aśubham kartum icchasi
avaśyam vinaśiṣyanti sarve rāvaṇa rākṣasāḥ

original: 3.046.021c yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ
analyzed: yeṣām tvam karkaśaḥ rājā durbuddhiḥ ajita indriyaḥ

original: 3.046.022a apahṛtya śacīṃ bhāryāṃ śakyam indrasya jīvitum
analyzed: apahṛtya śacīm bhāryām śakyam indrasya jīvitum

original: 3.046.022c na tu rāmasya bhāryāṃ mām apanīyāsti jīvitam
analyzed: na tu rāmasya bhāryām mām apanīya asti jīvitam
jīvet ciram vajradharasya hastāt
chacīm pradhṛṣya apratirūpa rūpām
na mādṛśīm rākṣasa dharṣayitvā
pīta amṛtasya api tava asti mokṣaḥ
sītāyāḥ vacanam śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān

original: 3.047.001c haste hastaṃ samāhatya cakāra sumahad vapuḥ
analyzed: haste hastam samāhatya cakāra su mahat vapuḥ

original: 3.047.002a sa maithilīṃ punar vākyaṃ babhāṣe ca tato bhṛśam
analyzed: sa maithilīm punar vākyam babhāṣe ca tatas bhṛśam
na unmattayā śrutau manye mama vīrya parākramau

original: 3.047.003a udvaheyaṃ bhujābhyāṃ tu medinīm ambare sthitaḥ
analyzed: udvaheyam bhujābhyām tu medinīm ambare sthitaḥ

original: 3.047.003c āpibeyaṃ samudraṃ ca mṛtyuṃ hanyāṃ raṇe sthitaḥ
analyzed: āpibeyam samudram ca mṛtyum hanyām raṇe sthitaḥ

original: 3.047.004a arkaṃ rundhyāṃ śarais tīkṣṇair vibhindyāṃ hi mahītalam
analyzed: arkam rundhyām śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ vibhindyām hi mahī talam

original: 3.047.004c kāmarūpiṇam unmatte paśya māṃ kāmadaṃ patim
analyzed: kāmarūpiṇam unmatte paśya mām kāma dam patim
evam uktavataḥ tasya rāvaṇasya śikhiprabhe
kruddhasya hari paryante rakte netre babhūvatuḥ

original: 3.047.006a sadyaḥ saumyaṃ parityajya bhikṣurūpaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: sadyas saumyam parityajya bhikṣu rūpam sa rāvaṇaḥ
svam rūpam kāla rūpa ābham bheje vaiśravaṇānujaḥ
saṃrakta nayanaḥ śrīmān tapta kāñcana kuṇḍalaḥ
daśa āsyaḥ kārmukī bāṇī babhūva kṣaṇadā caraḥ
sa parivrājaka chadma mahā kāyaḥ vihāya tat
pratipede svakam rūpam rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ
saṃrakta nayanaḥ krodhāt jīmūta nicaya prabhaḥ
rakta ambara dharaḥ tasthau strī ratnam prekṣya maithilīm

original: 3.047.010a sa tām asitakeśāntāṃ bhāskarasya prabhām iva
analyzed: sa tām asita keśāntām bhāskarasya prabhām iva
vasana ābharaṇa upetām maithilīm rāvaṇaḥ bravīt

original: 3.047.011a triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātaṃ yadi bhartāram icchasi
analyzed: triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātam yadi bhartāram icchasi

original: 3.047.011c mām āśraya varārohe tavāhaṃ sadṛśaḥ patiḥ
analyzed: mām āśraya varārohe tava aham sadṛśaḥ patiḥ

original: 3.047.012a māṃ bhajasva cirāya tvam ahaṃ ślāghyas tava priyaḥ
analyzed: mām bhajasva cirāya tvam aham ślāghyaḥ tava priyaḥ

original: 3.047.012c naiva cāhaṃ kva cid bhadre kariṣye tava vipriyam
analyzed: na eva ca aham kva cit bhadre kariṣye tava vipriyam

original: 3.047.012e tyajyatāṃ mānuṣo bhāvo mayi bhāvaḥ praṇīyatām
analyzed: tyajyatām mānuṣaḥ bhāvaḥ mayi bhāvaḥ praṇīyatām
rājyāt cyutam a siddhārtham rāmam parimita āyuṣam
kaiḥ guṇaiḥ anuraktā asi mūḍhe paṇḍita mānini

original: 3.047.014a yaḥ striyā vacanād rājyaṃ vihāya sasuhṛjjanam
analyzed: yaḥ striyāḥ vacanāt rājyam vihāya sa suhṛd janam
asmin vyāla anucarite vane vasati durmatiḥ

original: 3.047.015a ity uktvā maithilīṃ vākyaṃ priyārhāṃ priyavādinīm
analyzed: iti uktvā maithilīm vākyam priya arhām priya vādinīm

original: 3.047.015c jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ budhaḥ khe rohiṇīm iva
analyzed: jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ sītām budhaḥ khe rohiṇīm iva

original: 3.047.016a vāmena sītāṃ padmākṣīṃ mūrdhajeṣu kareṇa saḥ
analyzed: vāmena sītām padma akṣīm mūrdhajeṣu kareṇa saḥ
ūrvoḥ tu dakṣiṇena eva parijagrāha pāṇinā
tam dṛṣṭvā giri śṛṅga ābham tīkṣṇa daṃṣṭram mahā bhujam
prādravat mṛtyu saṃkāśam bhaya ārtāḥ vana devatāḥ

original: 3.047.018a sa ca māyāmayo divyaḥ kharayuktaḥ kharasvanaḥ
analyzed: sa ca māyā mayaḥ divyaḥ khara yuktaḥ khara svanaḥ
pratyadṛśyata hema aṅgaḥ rāvaṇasya mahā rathaḥ

original: 3.047.019a tatas tāṃ paruṣair vākyair abhitarjya mahāsvanaḥ
analyzed: tatas tām paruṣaiḥ vākyaiḥ abhitarjya mahā svanaḥ
aṅkena ādāya vaidehīm ratham āropayat tadā
sā gṛhītā aticukrośa rāvaṇena yaśasvinī

original: 3.047.020c rāmeti sītā duḥkhārtā rāmaṃ dūragataṃ vane
analyzed: rāma iti sītā duḥkha ārtā rāmam dūra gatam vane

original: 3.047.021a tām akāmāṃ sa kāmārtaḥ pannagendravadhūm iva
analyzed: tām akāmām sa kāma ārtaḥ pannaga indra vadhūm iva
viveṣṭamānām ādāya utpapātha atha rāvaṇaḥ
tatas sā rākṣasa indreṇa hriyamāṇā vihāyasā
bhṛśam cukrośa mattā iva bhrānta cittā yathā āturā
hā lakṣmaṇa mahā bāho guru citta prasādaka
hriyamāṇām na jānīṣe rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā

original: 3.047.024a jīvitaṃ sukham arthāṃś ca dharmahetoḥ parityajan
analyzed: jīvitam sukham arthān ca dharma hetoḥ parityajan

original: 3.047.024c hriyamāṇām adharmeṇa māṃ rāghava na paśyasi
analyzed: hriyamāṇām adharmeṇa mām rāghava na paśyasi
nanu nāma avinītānām vinetāsi paraṃtapa

original: 3.047.025c katham evaṃvidhaṃ pāpaṃ na tvaṃ śādhi hi rāvaṇam
analyzed: katham evaṃvidham pāpam na tvam śādhi hi rāvaṇam
nanu sadyas vinītasya dṛśyate karmaṇaḥ phalam

original: 3.047.026c kālo 'py aṅgī bhavaty atra sasyānām iva paktaye
analyzed: kālaḥ u pi aṅgī bhavati atra sasyānām iva paktaye
sa karma kṛtavān etat kāla upahata cetanaḥ
jīvitānta karam ghoram rāmāt vyasanam āpnuhi

original: 3.047.028a hantedānīṃ sakāmā tu kaikeyī bāndhavaiḥ saha
analyzed: hanta idānīm sa kāmā tu kaikeyī bāndhavaiḥ saha
hriyā iyam dharma kāmasya dharma patnī yaśasvinaḥ
āmantraye janasthānam karṇikārān ca puṣpitān

original: 3.047.029c kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: kṣipram rāmāya śaṃsadhvam sītām harati rāvaṇaḥ
mālyavantam śikhariṇam vande prasravaṇam girim

original: 3.047.030c kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: kṣipram rāmāya śaṃsadhvam sītām harati rāvaṇaḥ
haṃsa sārasa saṃghuṣṭām vande godāvarīm nadīm

original: 3.047.031c kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: kṣipram rāmāya śaṃsadhvam sītām harati rāvaṇaḥ

original: 3.047.032a daivatāni ca yānty asmin vane vividhapādape
analyzed: daivatāni ca yānti asmin vane vividha pādape

original: 3.047.032c namaskaromy ahaṃ tebhyo bhartuḥ śaṃsata māṃ hṛtām
analyzed: namaskaromi aham tebhyaḥ bhartuḥ śaṃsata mām hṛtām

original: 3.047.033a yāni kāni cid apy atra sattvāni nivasanty uta
analyzed: yāni kāni cit api atra sattvāni nivasanti uta
sarvāṇi śaraṇam yāmi mṛga pakṣi gaṇān api
hriyamāṇām priyām bhartuḥ prāṇebhyaḥ pi garīyasīm
vivaśā apahṛtā sītā rāvaṇena iti śaṃsata
viditvā mām mahā bāhuḥ amutra api mahā balaḥ
āneṣyati parākramya vaivasvata hṛtām api

original: 3.047.036a rāmāya tu yathātattvaṃ jaṭāyo haraṇaṃ mama
analyzed: rāmāya tu yathātattvam jaṭāyo haraṇam mama

original: 3.047.036c lakṣmaṇāya ca tat sarvam ākhyātavyam aśeṣataḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇāya ca tat sarvam ākhyātavyam aśeṣatas

original: 3.048.001a taṃ śabdam avasuptasya jaṭāyur atha śuśruve
analyzed: tam śabdam avasuptasya jaṭāyuḥ atha śuśruve

original: 3.048.001c niraikṣad rāvaṇaṃ kṣipraṃ vaidehīṃ ca dadarśa saḥ
analyzed: niraikṣat rāvaṇam kṣipram vaidehīm ca dadarśa saḥ
tatas parvata kūṭa ābhaḥ tīkṣṇa tuṇḍaḥ khaga uttamaḥ
vanaspati gataḥ śrīmān vyājahāra śubhām giram
daśagrīva sthitaḥ dharme purāṇe satya saṃśrayaḥ
jaṭāyuḥ nāma nāmnā aham gṛdhra rājaḥ mahā balaḥ
rājā sarvasya lokasya mahā indra varuṇa upamaḥ

original: 3.048.004c lokānāṃ ca hite yukto rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ
analyzed: lokānām ca hite yuktaḥ rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ
tasya eṣā loka nāthasya dharma patnī yaśasvinī

original: 3.048.005c sītā nāma varārohā yāṃ tvaṃ hartum ihecchasi
analyzed: sītā nāma varārohā yām tvam hartum iha icchasi

original: 3.048.006a kathaṃ rājā sthito dharme paradārān parāmṛśet
analyzed: katham rājā sthitaḥ dharme para dārān parāmṛśet
rakṣaṇīyāḥ viśeṣeṇa rāja dārāḥ mahā balaḥ
nivartaya matim nīcām para dāra abhimarśanam

original: 3.048.007a na tat samācared dhīro yat paro 'sya vigarhayet
analyzed: na tat samācaret dhīraḥ yat paraḥ sya vigarhayet
yathā ātmanaḥ tathā anyeṣām dārāḥ rakṣyāḥ vimarśanāt

original: 3.048.008a arthaṃ vā yadi vā kāmaṃ śiṣṭāḥ śāstreṣv anāgatam
analyzed: artham vā yadi vā kāmam śiṣṭāḥ śāstreṣu anāgatam
vyavasyanti anu rājānam dharmam paurastya nandana

original: 3.048.009a rājā dharmaś ca kāmaś ca dravyāṇāṃ cottamo nidhiḥ
analyzed: rājā dharmaḥ ca kāmaḥ ca dravyāṇām ca uttamaḥ nidhiḥ

original: 3.048.009c dharmaḥ śubhaṃ vā pāpaṃ vā rājamūlaṃ pravartate
analyzed: dharmaḥ śubham vā pāpam vā rāja mūlam pravartate

original: 3.048.010a pāpasvabhāvaś capalaḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ rakṣasāṃ vara
analyzed: pāpa svabhāvaḥ capalaḥ katham tvam rakṣasām vara
aiśvaryam abhisaṃprāptaḥ vimānam iva duṣkṛtī

original: 3.048.011a kāmasvabhāvo yo yasya na sa śakyaḥ pramārjitum
analyzed: kāma svabhāvaḥ yaḥ yasya na sa śakyaḥ pramārjitum

original: 3.048.011c na hi duṣṭātmanām ārya mā vasaty ālaye ciram
analyzed: na hi duṣṭa ātmanām ārya mā vasati ālaye ciram

original: 3.048.012a viṣaye vā pure vā te yadā rāmo mahābalaḥ
analyzed: viṣaye vā pure vā te yadā rāmaḥ mahā balaḥ
na aparādhyati dharma ātmā katham tasya aparādhyasi
yadi śūrpaṇakhā hetoḥ janasthāna gataḥ kharaḥ
ativṛttaḥ hataḥ pūrvam rāmeṇa akliṣṭa karmaṇā

original: 3.048.014a atra brūhi yathāsatyaṃ ko rāmasya vyatikramaḥ
analyzed: atra brūhi yathāsatyam kaḥ rāmasya vyatikramaḥ

original: 3.048.014c yasya tvaṃ lokanāthasya hṛtvā bhāryāṃ gamiṣyasi
analyzed: yasya tvam loka nāthasya hṛtvā bhāryām gamiṣyasi

original: 3.048.015a kṣipraṃ visṛja vaidehīṃ mā tvā ghoreṇa cakṣuṣā
analyzed: kṣipram visṛja vaidehīm mā tvā ghoreṇa cakṣuṣā

original: 3.048.015c dahed dahana bhūtena vṛtram indrāśanir yathā
analyzed: dahet dahana bhūtena vṛtram indra aśaniḥ yathā
sarpam āśīviṣam baddhvā vastra ante na avabudhyase

original: 3.048.016c grīvāyāṃ pratimuktaṃ ca kālapāśaṃ na paśyasi
analyzed: grīvāyām pratimuktam ca kālapāśam na paśyasi

original: 3.048.017a sa bhāraḥ saumya bhartavyo yo naraṃ nāvasādayet
analyzed: sa bhāraḥ saumya bhartavyaḥ yaḥ naram na avasādayet

original: 3.048.017c tad annam upabhoktavyaṃ jīryate yad anāmayam
analyzed: tat annam upabhoktavyam jīryate yat anāmayam

original: 3.048.018a yat kṛtvā na bhaved dharmo na kīrtir na yaśo bhuvi
analyzed: yat kṛtvā na bhavet dharmaḥ na kīrtiḥ na yaśaḥ bhuvi

original: 3.048.018c śarīrasya bhavet khedaḥ kas tat karma samācaret
analyzed: śarīrasya bhavet khedaḥ kaḥ tat karma samācaret
ṣaṣṭi varṣa sahasrāṇi mama jātasya rāvaṇa
pitṛpaitāmaham rājyam yathāvat anutiṣṭhataḥ

original: 3.048.020a vṛddho 'haṃ tvaṃ yuvā dhanvī sarathaḥ kavacī śarī
analyzed: vṛddhaḥ ham tvam yuvā dhanvī sa rathaḥ kavacī śarī

original: 3.048.020c tathāpy ādāya vaidehīṃ kuśalī na gamiṣyasi
analyzed: tathā api ādāya vaidehīm kuśalī na gamiṣyasi

original: 3.048.021a na śaktas tvaṃ balād dhartuṃ vaidehīṃ mama paśyataḥ
analyzed: na śaktaḥ tvam balāt dhartum vaidehīm mama paśyataḥ
hetubhiḥ nyāya saṃyuktaiḥ dhruvām veda śrutīm iva

original: 3.048.022a yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa
analyzed: yudhyasva yadi śūraḥ si muhūrtam tiṣṭha rāvaṇa

original: 3.048.022c śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathāpūrvaṃ kharas tathā
analyzed: śayiṣyase hataḥ bhūmau yathāpūrvam kharaḥ tathā
asakṛt saṃyuge yena nihatāḥ daitya dānavāḥ

original: 3.048.023c nacirāc cīravāsās tvāṃ rāmo yudhi vadhiṣyati
analyzed: nacirāt cīra vāsāḥ tvām rāmaḥ yudhi vadhiṣyati

original: 3.048.024a kiṃ nu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ gatau dūraṃ nṛpātmajau
analyzed: kim nu śakyam mayā kartum gatau dūram nṛpa ātmajau

original: 3.048.024c kṣipraṃ tvaṃ naśyase nīca tayor bhīto na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: kṣipram tvam naśyase nīca tayoḥ bhītaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: 3.048.025a na hi me jīvamānasya nayiṣyasi śubhām imām
analyzed: na hi me jīvamānasya nayiṣyasi śubhām imām
sītām kamala patra akṣīm rāmasya mahaṣīm priyām

original: 3.048.026a avaśyaṃ tu mayā kāryaṃ priyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: avaśyam tu mayā kāryam priyam tasya mahātmanaḥ
jīvitena api rāmasya tathā daśarathasya ca

original: 3.048.027a tiṣṭha tiṣṭha daśagrīva muhūrtaṃ paśya rāvaṇa
analyzed: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha daśagrīva muhūrtam paśya rāvaṇa
yuddha ātithyam pradāsyāmi yathāprāṇam niśācara

original: 3.048.027e vṛntād iva phalaṃ tvāṃ tu pātayeyaṃ rathottamāt
analyzed: vṛntāt iva phalam tvām tu pātayeyam ratha uttamāt
iti uktasya yathānyāyam rāvaṇasya jaṭāyuṣā
kruddhasya agni nibhāḥ sarvāḥ rejuḥ viṃśati dṛṣṭayaḥ
saṃrakta nayanaḥ kopāt tapta kāñcana kuṇḍalaḥ
rākṣasa indraḥ bhidudrāva pataga indram amarṣaṇaḥ

original: 3.049.003a sa saṃprahāras tumulas tayos tasmin mahāvane
analyzed: sa saṃprahāraḥ tumulaḥ tayoḥ tasmin mahā vane
babhūva vāta uddhatayoḥ meghayoḥ gagane yathā
tat babhūva adbhutam yuddham gṛdhra rākṣasayoḥ tadā
sapakṣayoḥ mālyavatoḥ mahā parvatayoḥ iva
tatas nālīka nārācaiḥ tīkṣṇa agraiḥ ca vikarṇibhiḥ
abhyavarṣat mahā ghoraiḥ gṛdhra rājam mahā balaḥ
sa tāni śara jālāni gṛdhraḥ patraratha īśvaraḥ
jaṭāyuḥ pratijagrāha rāvaṇa astrāṇi saṃyuge
tasya tīkṣṇa nakhābhyām tu caraṇābhyām mahā balaḥ
cakāra bahudhā gātre vraṇān pataga sattamaḥ
atha krodhāt daśagrīvaḥ jagrāha daśa mārgaṇān
mṛtyu daṇḍa nibhān ghorām śatru mardana kāṅkṣayā

original: 3.049.009a sa tair bāṇair mahāvīryaḥ pūrṇamuktair ajihmagaiḥ
analyzed: sa taiḥ bāṇaiḥ mahā vīryaḥ pūrṇa muktaiḥ a jihma gaiḥ

original: 3.049.009c bibheda niśitais tīkṣṇair gṛdhraṃ ghoraiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ
analyzed: bibheda niśitaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ gṛdhram ghoraiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ
sa rākṣasa rathe paśyam jānakīm bāṣpa locanām
a cintayitvā bāṇān tān rākṣasam samabhidravat
tatas sya sa śaram cāpam muktā maṇi vibhūṣitam
caraṇābhyām mahā tejāḥ babhañja pataga īśvaraḥ
tat ca agni sadṛśam dīptam rāvaṇasya śarāvaram
pakṣābhyām ca mahā tejāḥ vyadhunot pataga īśvaraḥ
kāñcana uraśchadān divyān piśāca vadanān kharān

original: 3.049.013c tāṃś cāsya javasaṃpannāñ jaghāna samare balī
analyzed: tān ca asya java saṃpannām jaghāna samare balī
varam triveṇu saṃpannam kāma gam
maṇi hema vicitra aṅgam babhañja ca mahā ratham
pūrṇa candra pratīkāśam chatram ca vyajanaiḥ saha
sa bhagna dhanvā virathaḥ hata aśvaḥ hata sārathiḥ
aṅkena ādāya vaidehīm papāta bhuvi rāvaṇaḥ
dṛṣṭvā nipatitam bhūmau rāvaṇam bhagna vāhanam

original: 3.049.016c sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni gṛdhrarājam apūjayan
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti bhūtāni gṛdhra rājam apūjayan

original: 3.049.017a pariśrāntaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā jarayā pakṣiyūthapam
analyzed: pariśrāntam tu tam dṛṣṭvā jarayā pakṣi yūthapam

original: 3.049.017c utpapāta punar hṛṣṭo maithilīṃ gṛhya rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: utpapāta punar hṛṣṭaḥ maithilīm gṛhya rāvaṇaḥ
tam prahṛṣṭam nidhāya aṅke gacchantam janakātmajām
gṛdhra rājaḥ samutpatya jaṭāyuḥ idam abravīt
vajra saṃsparśa bāṇasya bhāryām rāmasya rāvaṇa

original: 3.049.019c alpabuddhe harasy enāṃ vadhāya khalu rakṣasām
analyzed: alpabuddhe harasi enām vadhāya khalu rakṣasām
sa mitra bandhuḥ sa amātyaḥ sa balaḥ sa paricchadaḥ
viṣa pānam pibasi etat pipāsitaḥ iva udakam
anubandham a jānantaḥ karmaṇām a vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: 3.049.021c śīghram eva vinaśyanti yathā tvaṃ vinaśiṣyasi
analyzed: śīghram eva vinaśyanti yathā tvam vinaśiṣyasi

original: 3.049.022a baddhas tvaṃ kālapāśena kva gatas tasya mokṣyase
analyzed: baddhaḥ tvam kāla pāśena kva gataḥ tasya mokṣyase

original: 3.049.022c vadhāya baḍiśaṃ gṛhya sāmiṣaṃ jalajo yathā
analyzed: vadhāya baḍiśam gṛhya sa āmiṣam jalajaḥ yathā

original: 3.049.023a na hi jātu durādharṣau kākutsthau tava rāvaṇa
analyzed: na hi jātu durādharṣau kākutsthau tava rāvaṇa
dharṣaṇam ca āśramasya asya kṣamiṣyete tu rāghavau

original: 3.049.024a yathā tvayā kṛtaṃ karma bhīruṇā lokagarhitam
analyzed: yathā tvayā kṛtam karma bhīruṇā loka garhitam
taskara ācaritaḥ mārgaḥ na eṣa vīra niṣevitaḥ

original: 3.049.025a yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa
analyzed: yudhyasva yadi śūraḥ si muhūrtam tiṣṭha rāvaṇa

original: 3.049.025c śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathā bhrātā kharas tathā
analyzed: śayiṣyase hataḥ bhūmau yathā bhrātā kharaḥ tathā
pareta kāle puruṣaḥ yat karma pratipadyate
vināśāya ātmanaḥ dharmyam pratipannaḥ si karma tat

original: 3.049.027a pāpānubandho vai yasya karmaṇaḥ ko nu tat pumān
analyzed: pāpa anubandhaḥ vai yasya karmaṇaḥ kaḥ nu tat pumān
kurvīta loka adhipatiḥ svayambhūḥ bhagavān api

original: 3.049.028a evam uktvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ jaṭāyus tasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā śubham vākyam jaṭāyuḥ tasya rakṣasaḥ
nipapāta bhṛśam pṛṣṭhe daśagrīvasya vīryavān

original: 3.049.029a taṃ gṛhītvā nakhais tīkṣṇair virarāda samantataḥ
analyzed: tam gṛhītvā nakhaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ virarāda samantataḥ
adhirūḍhaḥ gaja ārohi yathā syāt duṣṭa vāraṇam

original: 3.049.030a virarāda nakhair asya tuṇḍaṃ pṛṣṭhe samarpayan
analyzed: virarāda nakhaiḥ asya tuṇḍam pṛṣṭhe samarpayan
keśān ca utpāṭayām āsa nakha pakṣa mukha āyudhaḥ

original: 3.049.031a sa tathā gṛdhrarājena kliśyamāno muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: sa tathā gṛdhra rājena kliśyamānaḥ muhur muhur
amarṣa sphurita oṣṭhaḥ san prākampata sa rākṣasaḥ
saṃpariṣvajya vaidehīm vāmena aṅkena rāvaṇaḥ
talena abhijaghāna ārtaḥ jaṭāyum krodha mūrchitaḥ
jaṭāyuḥ tam atikramya tuṇḍena asya khara adhipaḥ
vāma bāhūn daśa tadā vyapāharat ariṃdamaḥ

original: 3.049.034a tataḥ kruddho daśakrīvaḥ sītām utsṛjya vīryavān
analyzed: tatas kruddhaḥ daśakrīvaḥ sītām utsṛjya vīryavān
muṣṭibhyām caraṇābhyām ca gṛdhra rājam apothayat
tatas muhūrtam saṃgrāmaḥ babhūva atula vīryayoḥ

original: 3.049.035c rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya pakṣiṇāṃ pravarasya ca
analyzed: rākṣasānām ca mukhyasya pakṣiṇām pravarasya ca
tasya vyāyacchamānasya rāmasya arthe rāvaṇaḥ

original: 3.049.036c pakṣau pādau ca pārśvau ca khaḍgam uddhṛtya so 'cchinat
analyzed: pakṣau pādau ca pārśvau ca khaḍgam uddhṛtya saḥ chinat
sa chinna pakṣaḥ sahasā rakṣasā raudra karmaṇā
nipapāta hataḥ gṛdhraḥ dharaṇyām alpa jīvitaḥ

original: 3.049.038a taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau kṣatajārdraṃ jaṭāyuṣam
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā patitam bhūmau kṣataja ārdram jaṭāyuṣam
abhyadhāvata vaidehī sva bandhum iva duḥkhitā
tam nīla jīmūta nikāśa kalpam
su pāṇḍura uraskam udāra vīryam
dadarśa laṅkādhipatiḥ pṛthivyām
jaṭāyuṣam śāntam iva agni dāvam
tatas tu tam patraratham mahī tale
nipātitam rāvaṇa vega marditam
punar pariṣvajya śaśi prabhā ānanā
ruroda sītā janakātmajā tadā
tam alpa jīvitam bhūmau sphurantam rākṣasa adhipaḥ
dadarśa gṛdhram patitam samīpe rāghava āśramāt

original: 3.050.002a sā tu tārādhipamukhī rāvaṇena samīkṣya tam
analyzed: sā tu tārādhipa mukhī rāvaṇena samīkṣya tam
gṛdhra rājam vinihatam vilalāpa su duḥkhitā
nimittam lakṣaṇa jñānam śakuni svara darśanam
avaśyam sukha duḥkheṣu narāṇām pratidṛśyate

original: 3.050.004a na nūnaṃ rāma jānāsi mahad vyasanam ātmajaḥ
analyzed: na nūnam rāma jānāsi mahat vyasanam ātmajaḥ
dhāvanti nūnam kākutstha mad artham mṛga pakṣiṇaḥ

original: 3.050.005a trāhi mām adya kākutstha lakṣmaṇeti varāṅganā
analyzed: trāhi mām adya kākutstha lakṣmaṇa iti vara aṅganā
su saṃtrastā samākrandat śṛṇvatām tu yathā antike
tām kliṣṭa mālya ābharaṇām vilapantīm anātha vat
abhyadhāvata vaidehīm rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 3.050.007a tāṃ latām iva veṣṭantīm āliṅgantīṃ mahādrumān
analyzed: tām latām iva veṣṭantīm āliṅgantīm mahā drumān
muñca muñca iti bahuśas pravadan rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 3.050.008a krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti rāmeṇa rahitāṃ vane
analyzed: krośantīm rāma rāma iti rāmeṇa rahitām vane
jīvitāntāya keśeṣu jagrāha antaka saṃnibhaḥ
pradharṣitāyām vaidehyām babhūva sacarācaram
jagat sarvam amaryādam tamasā andhena saṃvṛtam

original: 3.050.010a dṛṣṭvā sītāṃ parāmṛṣṭāṃ dīnāṃ divyena cakṣuṣā
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sītām parāmṛṣṭām dīnām divyena cakṣuṣā

original: 3.050.010c kṛtaṃ kāryam iti śrīmān vyājahāra pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: kṛtam kāryam iti śrīmān vyājahāra pitāmahaḥ

original: 3.050.011a prahṛṣṭā vyathitāś cāsan sarve te paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: prahṛṣṭāḥ vyathitāḥ ca āsan sarve te parama ṛṣayaḥ
dṛṣṭvā sītām parāmṛṣṭām daṇḍaka araṇya vāsinaḥ

original: 3.050.012a sa tu tāṃ rāma rāmeti rudantīṃ lakṣmaṇeti ca
analyzed: sa tu tām rāma rāma iti rudantīm lakṣmaṇa iti ca
jagāma ākāśam ādāya rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ
tapta ābharaṇa sarva aṅgī pīta kauśeya vāsanī

original: 3.050.013c rarāja rājaputrī tu vidyut saudāmanī yathā
analyzed: rarāja rāja putrī tu vidyut saudāmanī yathā

original: 3.050.014a uddhūtena ca vastreṇa tasyāḥ pītena rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: uddhūtena ca vastreṇa tasyāḥ pītena rāvaṇaḥ
adhikam paribabhrāja giriḥ dīpaḥ iva agninā
tasyāḥ parama kalyāṇyāḥ tāmrāṇi surabhīṇi ca
padma patrāṇi vaidehyāḥ abhyakīryanta rāvaṇam
tasyāḥ kauśeyam uddhūtam ākāśe kanaka prabham
babhau ca āditya rāgeṇa tāmram abhram iva ātape

original: 3.050.017a tasyās tad vimalaṃ vaktram ākāśe rāvaṇāṅkagam
analyzed: tasyāḥ tat vimalam vaktram ākāśe rāvaṇa aṅka gam

original: 3.050.017c na rarāja vinā rāmaṃ vinālam iva paṅkajam
analyzed: na rarāja vinā rāmam vinālam iva paṅkajam

original: 3.050.018a babhūva jaladaṃ nīlaṃ bhittvā candra ivoditaḥ
analyzed: babhūva jaladam nīlam bhittvā candraḥ iva uditaḥ
su lalāṭam su keśāntam padmagarbha ābham avraṇam
śuklaiḥ su vimalaiḥ dantaiḥ prabhāvadbhiḥ alaṃkṛtam
ruditam vyapamṛṣṭa astram candra vat priya darśanam
su nāsam cāru tāmra oṣṭham ākāṣe hāṭaka prabham
rākṣasa indra samādhūtam tasyāḥ tat vacanam śubham

original: 3.050.020c śuśubhe na vinā rāmaṃ divā candra ivoditaḥ
analyzed: śuśubhe na vinā rāmam divā candraḥ iva uditaḥ
sā hema varṇā nīla aṅgam maithilī rākṣasa adhipam

original: 3.050.021c śuśubhe kāñcanī kāñcī nīlaṃ maṇim ivāśritā
analyzed: śuśubhe kāñcanī kāñcī nīlam maṇim iva āśritā
sā padma gaurī hema ābhā rāvaṇam janakātmajā
vidyut ghanam iva āviśya śuśubhe tapta bhūṣaṇā
tasyāḥ bhūṣaṇa ghoṣeṇa vaidehyāḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 3.050.023c babhūva vimalo nīlaḥ saghoṣa iva toyadaḥ
analyzed: babhūva vimalaḥ nīlaḥ sa ghoṣaḥ iva toyadaḥ
uttamāṅga cyutā tasyāḥ puṣpa vṛṣṭiḥ samantataḥ
sītāyāḥ hriyamāṇāyāḥ papāta dharaṇī tale
sā tu rāvaṇa vegena puṣpa vṛṣṭiḥ samantataḥ
samādhūtā daśagrīvam punar eva abhyavartata
abhyavartata puṣpāṇām dhārā vaiśravaṇānujam
nakṣatra mālā vimalāḥ merum nagam iva uttamam
caraṇāt nūpuram bhraṣṭam vaidehyāḥ ratna bhūṣitam
vidyut maṇḍala saṃkāśam papāta madhura svanam
taru pravāla raktā sā nīla aṅgam rākṣasa īśvaram
prāśobhayata vaidehī gajam kaṣyā iva kāñcanī
tām mahā ulkām iva ākāśe dīpyamānām sva tejasā
jahāra ākāśam āviśya sītām vaiśravaṇānujaḥ
tasyāḥ tāni agni varṇāni bhūṣaṇāni mahī tale
sa ghoṣāṇi avakīryanta kṣīṇāḥ tārāḥ iva ambarāt
tasyāḥ stana antarāt bhraṣṭaḥ hāraḥ tārādhipa dyutiḥ

original: 3.050.031c vaidehyā nipatan bhāti gaṅgeva gaganāc cyutā
analyzed: vaidehyāḥ nipatan bhāti gaṅgā iva gaganāt cyutā
utpāta vāta abhihatāḥ nānā dvija gaṇa āyutāḥ

original: 3.050.032c mā bhair iti vidhūtāgrā vyājahrur iva pādapāḥ
analyzed: mā bhaiḥ iti vidhūta agrāḥ vyājahruḥ iva pādapāḥ
nalinyaḥ dhvasta kamalāḥ trasta mīna jale carāḥ

original: 3.050.033c sakhīm iva gatotsāhāṃ śocantīva sma maithilīm
analyzed: sakhīm iva gata utsāhām śocanti iva sma maithilīm
samantāt abhisaṃpatya siṃha vyāghra mṛga dvijāḥ
anvadhāvan tadā roṣāt sītā chāyā anugāminaḥ
jala prapāta asra mukhāḥ śṛṅgaiḥ ucchrita bāhavaḥ
sītāyām hriyamāṇāyām vikrośanti iva parvatāḥ

original: 3.050.036a hriyamāṇāṃ tu vaidehīṃ dṛṣṭvā dīno divākaraḥ
analyzed: hriyamāṇām tu vaidehīm dṛṣṭvā dīnaḥ divākaraḥ
pravidhvasta prabhaḥ śrīmān āsīt pāṇḍura maṇḍalaḥ

original: 3.050.037a nāsti dharmaḥ kutaḥ satyaṃ nārjavaṃ nānṛśaṃsatā
analyzed: na asti dharmaḥ kutas satyam na ārjavam na a nṛśaṃsa tā

original: 3.050.037c yatra rāmasya vaidehīṃ bhāryāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: yatra rāmasya vaidehīm bhāryām harati rāvaṇaḥ
iti sarvāṇi bhūtāni gaṇaśas paryadevayan
vitrastakāḥ dīna mukhāḥ ruruduḥ mṛga potakāḥ
udvīkṣya udvīkṣya nayanaiḥ āsra pāta āvila īkṣaṇāḥ
su pravepita gātrāḥ ca babhūvuḥ vana devatāḥ

original: 3.050.040a vikrośantīṃ dṛḍhaṃ sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhaṃ tathā gatām
analyzed: vikrośantīm dṛḍham sītām dṛṣṭvā duḥkham tathā gatām

original: 3.050.040c tāṃ tu lakṣmaṇa rāmeti krośantīṃ madhurasvarām
analyzed: tām tu lakṣmaṇa rāma iti krośantīm madhura svarām
avekṣamāṇām bahuṣaḥ vaidehīm dharaṇī talam
sa tām ākula keśāntām vipramṛṣṭa viśeṣakām
jahāra ātma vināśāya daśagrīvaḥ manasvinām
tatas tu sā cārudatī śuci smitā
vinākṛtā bandhu janena maithilī
apaśyatī rāghava lakṣmaṇau ubhau
vivarṇa vaktrā bhaya bhāra pīḍitā

original: 3.051.001a kham utpatantaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā maithilī janakātmajā
analyzed: kham utpatantam tam dṛṣṭvā maithilī janakātmajā
duḥkhitā parama udvignā bhaye mahati vartinī
roṣa rodana tāmra akṣī bhīma akṣam rākṣasa adhipam
rudatī karuṇam sītā hriyamāṇā idam abravīt
na vyapatrapase nīca karmaṇā anena rāvaṇa

original: 3.051.003c jñātvā virahitāṃ yo māṃ corayitvā palāyase
analyzed: jñātvā virahitām yaḥ mām corayitvā palāyase

original: 3.051.004a tvayaiva nūnaṃ duṣṭātman bhīruṇā hartum icchatā
analyzed: tvayā eva nūnam duṣṭa ātman bhīruṇā hartum icchatā
mama apavāhitaḥ bhartā mṛga rūpeṇa māyayā

original: 3.051.004e yo hi mām udyatas trātuṃ so 'py ayaṃ vinipātitaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ hi mām udyataḥ trātum saḥ api ayam vinipātitaḥ

original: 3.051.005a paramaṃ khalu te vīryaṃ dṛśyate rākṣasādhama
analyzed: paramam khalu te vīryam dṛśyate rākṣasa adhama

original: 3.051.005c viśrāvya nāmadheyaṃ hi yuddhe nāsti jitā tvayā
