analyzed: viśrāvya nāmadheyam hi yuddhe na asti jitā tvayā

original: 3.051.006a īdṛśaṃ garhitaṃ karma kathaṃ kṛtvā na lajjase
analyzed: īdṛśam garhitam karma katham kṛtvā na lajjase

original: 3.051.006c striyāś ca haraṇaṃ nīca rahite ca parasya ca
analyzed: striyāḥ ca haraṇam nīca rahite ca parasya ca
kathayiṣyanti lokeṣu puruṣāḥ karma kutsitam
su nṛśaṃsam adharmiṣṭham tava śauṇḍīrya māninaḥ

original: 3.051.008a dhik te śauryaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca yat tvayā kathitaṃ tadā
analyzed: dhik te śauryam ca sattvam ca yat tvayā kathitam tadā

original: 3.051.008c kulākrośakaraṃ loke dhik te cāritram īdṛśam
analyzed: kula ākrośa karam loke dhik te cāritram īdṛśam

original: 3.051.009a kiṃ śakyaṃ kartum evaṃ hi yaj javenaiva dhāvasi
analyzed: kim śakyam kartum evam hi yat javena eva dhāvasi

original: 3.051.009c muhūrtam api tiṣṭhasva na jīvan pratiyāsyasi
analyzed: muhūrtam api tiṣṭhasva na jīvan pratiyāsyasi

original: 3.051.010a na hi cakṣuḥpathaṃ prāpya tayoḥ pārthivaputrayoḥ
analyzed: na hi cakṣuḥ patham prāpya tayoḥ pārthiva putrayoḥ

original: 3.051.010c sasainyo 'pi samartaḥs tvaṃ muhūrtam api jīvitum
analyzed: sa sainyaḥ pi sa martaḥ tvam muhūrtam api jīvitum

original: 3.051.011a na tvaṃ tayoḥ śarasparśaṃ soḍhuṃ śaktaḥ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: na tvam tayoḥ śara sparśam soḍhum śaktaḥ katham cana
vane prajvalitasya iva sparśam agneḥ vihaṃgamaḥ

original: 3.051.012a sādhu kṛtvātmanaḥ pathyaṃ sādhu māṃ muñca rāvaṇa
analyzed: sādhu kṛtvā ātmanaḥ pathyam sādhu mām muñca rāvaṇa

original: 3.051.012c matpradharṣaṇaruṣṭo hi bhrātrā saha patir mama
analyzed: mad pradharṣaṇa ruṣṭaḥ hi bhrātrā saha patiḥ mama

original: 3.051.012e vidhāsyati vināśāya tvaṃ māṃ yadi na muñcasi
analyzed: vidhāsyati vināśāya tvam mām yadi na muñcasi

original: 3.051.013a yena tvaṃ vyavasāyena balān māṃ hartum icchasi
analyzed: yena tvam vyavasāyena balāt mām hartum icchasi

original: 3.051.013c vyavasāyaḥ sa te nīca bhaviṣyati nirarthakaḥ
analyzed: vyavasāyaḥ sa te nīca bhaviṣyati nirarthakaḥ

original: 3.051.014a na hy ahaṃ tam apaśyantī bhartāraṃ vibudhopamam
analyzed: na hi aham tam a paśyantī bhartāram vibudha upamam
utsahe śatru vaśa gā prāṇān dhārayitum ciram

original: 3.051.015a na nūnaṃ cātmanaḥ śreyaḥ pathyaṃ vā samavekṣase
analyzed: na nūnam ca ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ pathyam vā samavekṣase
mṛtyu kāle yathā martyaḥ viparītāni sevate

original: 3.051.016a mumūrṣūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ yat pathyaṃ tan na rocate
analyzed: mumūrṣūṇām hi sarveṣām yat pathyam tat na rocate
paśyāmi iva hi kaṇṭhe tvām kāla pāśa avapāśitam

original: 3.051.017a yathā cāsmin bhayasthāne na bibheṣe daśānana
analyzed: yathā ca asmin bhaya sthāne na bibheṣe daśa ānana

original: 3.051.017c vyaktaṃ hiraṇmayān hi tvaṃ saṃpaśyasi mahīruhān
analyzed: vyaktam hiraṇmayān hi tvam saṃpaśyasi mahīruhān
nadīm vaira taṇīm ghorām rudhira ogha nivāhinīm
khaḍga patra vanam ca eva bhīmam paśyasi rāvaṇa
tapta kāñcana puṣpām ca vaidūrya pravara chadām

original: 3.051.019c drakṣyase śālmalīṃ tīkṣṇām āyasaiḥ kaṇṭakaiś citām
analyzed: drakṣyase śālmalīm tīkṣṇām āyasaiḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ citām

original: 3.051.020a na hi tvam īdṛśaṃ kṛtvā tasyālīkaṃ mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: na hi tvam īdṛśam kṛtvā tasya alīkam mahātmanaḥ

original: 3.051.020c dhārituṃ śakṣyasi ciraṃ viṣaṃ pītveva nirghṛṇaḥ
analyzed: dhāritum śakṣyasi ciram viṣam pītvā iva nirghṛṇaḥ
baddhaḥ tvam kāla pāśena durnivāreṇa rāvaṇa

original: 3.051.021c kva gato lapsyase śarma bhartur mama mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: kva gataḥ lapsyase śarma bhartuḥ mama mahātmanaḥ
nimeṣa antara mātreṇa vinā bhrātaram āhave
rākṣasāḥ nihatāḥ yena sahasrāṇi caturdaśa

original: 3.051.023a sa kathaṃ rāghavo vīraḥ sarvāstrakuśalo balī
analyzed: sa katham rāghavaḥ vīraḥ sarva astra kuśalaḥ balī

original: 3.051.023c na tvāṃ hanyāc charais tīkṣṇair iṣṭabhāryāpahāriṇam
analyzed: na tvām hanyāt śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ iṣṭa bhāryā apahāriṇam

original: 3.051.024a etac cānyac ca paruṣaṃ vaidehī rāvaṇāṅkagā
analyzed: etat ca anyat ca paruṣam vaidehī rāvaṇa aṅka gā
bhaya śoka samāviṣṭā karuṇam vilalāpa ha
tathā bhṛśa ārtām bahu ca eva bhāṣiṇīm
vilalāpa pūrvam karuṇam ca bhāminīm
jahāra pāpaḥ taruṇīm viveṣṭatīm
nṛpa ātmajām āgata gātra vepathum

original: 3.052.001a hriyamāṇā tu vaidehī kaṃ cin nātham apaśyatī
analyzed: hriyamāṇā tu vaidehī kam cit nātham apaśyatī
dadarśa giri śṛṅga sthān pañca vānara puṃgavān
teṣām madhye viśāla akṣī kauśeyam kanaka prabham
uttarīyam varārohā śubhāni ābharaṇāni ca

original: 3.052.002e mumoca yadi rāmāya śaṃseyur iti maithilī
analyzed: mumoca yadi rāmāya śaṃseyuḥ iti maithilī

original: 3.052.003a vastram utsṛjya tan madhye vinikṣiptaṃ sabhūṣaṇam
analyzed: vastram utsṛjya tat madhye vinikṣiptam sa bhūṣaṇam

original: 3.052.003c saṃbhramāt tu daśagrīvas tat karma na ca buddhivān
analyzed: saṃbhramāt tu daśagrīvaḥ tat karma na ca buddhivān

original: 3.052.004a piṅgākṣās tāṃ viśālākṣīṃ netrair animiṣair iva
analyzed: piṅga akṣāḥ tām viśāla akṣīm netraiḥ animiṣaiḥ iva
vikrośantīm tadā sītām dadṛśuḥ vānara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 3.052.005a sa ca pampām atikramya laṅkām abhimukhaḥ purīm
analyzed: sa ca pampām atikramya laṅkām abhimukhaḥ purīm
jagāma rudatīm gṛhya maithilīm rākṣaseśvaraḥ

original: 3.052.006a tāṃ jahāra susaṃhṛṣṭo rāvaṇo mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
analyzed: tām jahāra su saṃhṛṣṭaḥ rāvaṇaḥ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
utsaṅgena eva bhujagīm tīkṣṇa daṃṣṭrām mahā viṣām

original: 3.052.007a vanāni saritaḥ śailān sarāṃsi ca vihāyasā
analyzed: vanāni saritaḥ śailān sarāṃsi ca vihāyasā

original: 3.052.007c sa kṣipraṃ samatīyāya śaraś cāpād iva cyutaḥ
analyzed: sa kṣipram samatīyāya śaraḥ cāpāt iva cyutaḥ
timi nakra niketam tu varuṇālayam akṣayam
saritām śaraṇam gatvā samatīyāya sāgaram
saṃbhramāt parivṛtta ūrmiḥ ruddha mīna mahā uragaḥ
vaidehyām hriyamāṇāyām babhūva varuṇālayaḥ
antarikṣa gatāḥ vācaḥ sasṛjuḥ cāraṇāḥ tadā

original: 3.052.010c etad anto daśagrīva iti siddhās tadābruvan
analyzed: etat antaḥ daśagrīvaḥ iti siddhāḥ tadā abruvan

original: 3.052.011a sa tu sītāṃ viveṣṭantīm aṅkenādāya rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa tu sītām viveṣṭantīm aṅkena ādāya rāvaṇaḥ

original: 3.052.011c praviveśa purīṃ laṅkāṃ rūpiṇīṃ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
analyzed: praviveśa purīm laṅkām rūpiṇīm mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
saḥ bhigamya purīm laṅkām suvibhakta mahāpathām
saṃrūḍha kakṣyā bahulam svam antaḥpuram āviśat
tatra tām asitāpāṅgīm śoka moha parāyaṇām

original: 3.052.013c nidadhe rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ mayo māyām ivāsurīm
analyzed: nidadhe rāvaṇaḥ sītām mayaḥ māyām iva asurīm
abravīt ca daśagrīvaḥ piśācīḥ ghora darśanāḥ

original: 3.052.014c yathā naināṃ pumān strī vā sītāṃ paśyaty asaṃmataḥ
analyzed: yathā na enām pumān strī vā sītām paśyati a saṃmataḥ
muktā maṇi suvarṇāni vastrāṇi ābharaṇāni ca

original: 3.052.015c yad yad icchet tad evāsyā deyaṃ macchandato yathā
analyzed: yat yat icchet tat eva asyāḥ deyam mad chandataḥ yathā

original: 3.052.016a yā ca vakṣyati vaidehīṃ vacanaṃ kiṃ cid apriyam
analyzed: yā ca vakṣyati vaidehīm vacanam kim cit apriyam

original: 3.052.016c ajñānād yadi vā jñānān na tasyā jīvitaṃ priyam
analyzed: ajñānāt yadi vā jñānāt na tasyāḥ jīvitam priyam

original: 3.052.017a tathoktvā rākṣasīs tās tu rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: tathā uktvā rākṣasīḥ tāḥ tu rākṣasa indraḥ pratāpavān

original: 3.052.017c niṣkramyāntaḥpurāt tasmāt kiṃ kṛtyam iti cintayan
analyzed: niṣkramya antaḥpurāt tasmāt kim kṛtyam iti cintayan
dadarśa aṣṭau mahā vīryān rākṣasān piśita aśanān

original: 3.052.018a sa tān dṛṣṭvā mahāvīryo varadānena mohitaḥ
analyzed: sa tān dṛṣṭvā mahā vīryaḥ vara dānena mohitaḥ
uvāca etān idam vākyam praśasya bala vīryataḥ
nānā praharaṇāḥ kṣipram itas gacchata sa tvarāḥ
janasthānam hata sthānam bhūta pūrvam khara ālayam
tatra uṣyatām janasthāne śūnye nihata rākṣase

original: 3.052.020c pauruṣaṃ balam āśritya trāsam utsṛjya dūrataḥ
analyzed: pauruṣam balam āśritya trāsam utsṛjya dūratas

original: 3.052.021a balaṃ hi sumahad yan me janasthāne niveśitam
analyzed: balam hi su mahat yat me janasthāne niveśitam
sa dūṣaṇa kharam yuddhe hatam tat rāma sāyakaiḥ
tatas krodhaḥ mama apūrvaḥ dhairyasya upari vardhate

original: 3.052.022c vairaṃ ca sumahaj jātaṃ rāmaṃ prati sudāruṇam
analyzed: vairam ca su mahat jātam rāmam prati su dāruṇam

original: 3.052.023a niryātayitum icchāmi tac ca vairam ahaṃ ripoḥ
analyzed: niryātayitum icchāmi tat ca vairam aham ripoḥ

original: 3.052.023c na hi lapsyāmy ahaṃ nidrām ahatvā saṃyuge ripum
analyzed: na hi lapsyāmi aham nidrām a hatvā saṃyuge ripum

original: 3.052.024a taṃ tv idānīm ahaṃ hatvā kharadūṣaṇaghātinam
analyzed: tam tu idānīm aham hatvā khara dūṣaṇa ghātinam
rāmam śarma upalapsyāmi dhanam labdhvā iva nirdhanaḥ

original: 3.052.025a janasthāne vasadbhis tu bhavadbhī rāmam āśritā
analyzed: janasthāne vasadbhiḥ tu rāmam āśritā
pravṛttiḥ upanetavyā kim karoti iti tattvataḥ

original: 3.052.026a apramādāc ca gantavyaṃ sarvair eva niśācaraiḥ
analyzed: apramādāt ca gantavyam sarvaiḥ eva niśācaraiḥ

original: 3.052.026c kartavyaś ca sadā yatno rāghavasya vadhaṃ prati
analyzed: kartavyaḥ ca sadā yatnaḥ rāghavasya vadham prati
yuṣmākam hi bala jñaḥ ham bahuśas raṇa mūrdhani

original: 3.052.027c ataś cāsmiñ janasthāne mayā yūyaṃ niyojitāḥ
analyzed: atas ca asmin janasthāne mayā yūyam niyojitāḥ
tatas priyam vākyam upetya rākṣasā
mahā artham aṣṭau abhivādya rāvaṇam
vihāya laṅkām sahitāḥ pratasthire
yatas janasthānam alakṣya darśanāḥ
tatas tu sītām upalabhya rāvaṇaḥ
su saṃprahṛṣṭaḥ parigṛhya maithilīm
prasajya rāmeṇa ca vairam uttamam
babhūva mohāt muditaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ
saṃdiśya rākṣasān ghorān ṣṭau mahā balān
ātmānam buddhi vaiklavyāt kṛtakṛtyam amanyata
sa cintayānaḥ vaidehīm kāma bāṇa samarpitaḥ

original: 3.053.002c praviveśa gṛhaṃ ramyaṃ sītāṃ draṣṭum abhitvaran
analyzed: praviveśa gṛham ramyam sītām draṣṭum abhitvaran

original: 3.053.003a sa praviśya tu tadveśma rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: sa praviśya tu tat veśma rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ
apaśyat rākṣasī madhye sītām śoka parāyaṇam
aśru pūrṇa mukhīm dīnām śoka bhāra avapīḍitām
vāyu vegaiḥ iva ākrāntām majjantīm nāvam arṇave
mṛga yūtha paribhraṣṭām mṛgīm śvabhiḥ iva āvṛtām
adhomukha mukhīm dīnām abhyetya ca niśācaraḥ

original: 3.053.006a tāṃ tu śokavaśāṃ dīnām avaśāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: tām tu śoka vaśām dīnām avaśām rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 3.053.006c sa balād darśayām āsa gṛhaṃ devagṛhopamam
analyzed: sa balāt darśayām āsa gṛham devagṛha upamam
strī sahasra niṣevitam
nānā pakṣi gaṇaiḥ juṣṭam nānā ratna samanvitam

original: 3.053.008a kāñcanais tāpanīyaiś ca sphāṭikai rājatais tathā
analyzed: kāñcanaiḥ tāpanīyaiḥ ca sphāṭikaiḥ rājataiḥ tathā
vajra vaidūrya citraiḥ ca stambhaiḥ dṛṣṭi manoharaiḥ
divya dundubhi nirhrādam tapta kāñcana toraṇam

original: 3.053.009c sopānaṃ kāñcanaṃ citram āruroha tayā saha
analyzed: sopānam kāñcanam citram āruroha tayā saha
dāntakāḥ rājatāḥ ca eva gavākṣāḥ priya darśanāḥ
hema jāla āvṛtāḥ ca āsan tatra prāsāda paṅktayaḥ
sudhā maṇi vicitrāṇi bhūmi bhāgāni sarvaśas
daśagrīvaḥ sva bhavane prādarśayata maithilīm
dīrghikāḥ puṣkariṇyaḥ ca nānā puṣpa samāvṛtāḥ
rāvaṇaḥ darśayām āsa sītām śoka parāyaṇām

original: 3.053.013a darśayitvā tu vaidehīṃ kṛtsnaṃ tad bhavanottamam
analyzed: darśayitvā tu vaidehīm kṛtsnam tat bhavana uttamam
uvāca vākyam pāpa ātmā rāvaṇaḥ janakātmajām
daśa rākṣasa koṭyaḥ ca dvāviṃśatiḥ atha aparāḥ

original: 3.053.014c varjayitvā jarā vṛddhān bālāṃś ca rajanīcarān
analyzed: varjayitvā jarā vṛddhān bālān ca rajanīcarān

original: 3.053.015a teṣāṃ prabhur ahaṃ sīte sarveṣāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām
analyzed: teṣām prabhuḥ aham sīte sarveṣām bhīma karmaṇām
sahasram ekam ekasya mama kārya puraḥsaram

original: 3.053.016a yad idaṃ rājyatantraṃ me tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
analyzed: yat idam rājya tantram me tvayi sarvam pratiṣṭhitam

original: 3.053.016c jīvitaṃ ca viśālākṣi tvaṃ me prāṇair garīyasī
analyzed: jīvitam ca viśāla akṣi tvam me prāṇaiḥ garīyasī
bahūnām strī sahasrāṇām mama parigrahaḥ

original: 3.053.017c tāsāṃ tvam īśvarī sīte mama bhāryā bhava priye
analyzed: tāsām tvam īśvarī sīte mama bhāryā bhava priye

original: 3.053.018a sādhu kiṃ te 'nyayā buddhyā rocayasva vaco mama
analyzed: sādhu kim te nyayā buddhyā rocayasva vacaḥ mama
bhajasva mā abhitaptasya prasādam kartum arhasi
parikṣiptā samudreṇa laṅkā iyam śata yojanā

original: 3.053.019c neyaṃ dharṣayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
analyzed: na iyam dharṣayitum śakyā sa indraiḥ api sura asuraiḥ

original: 3.053.020a na deveṣu na yakṣeṣu na gandharveṣu narṣiṣu
analyzed: na deveṣu na yakṣeṣu na gandharveṣu na ṛṣiṣu

original: 3.053.020c ahaṃ paśyāmi lokeṣu yo me vīryasamo bhavet
analyzed: aham paśyāmi lokeṣu yaḥ me vīrya samaḥ bhavet
rājya bhraṣṭena dīnena tāpasena gata āyuṣā
kim kariṣyasi rāmeṇa mānuṣeṇa alpa tejasā

original: 3.053.022a bhajasva sīte mām eva bhartāhaṃ sadṛśas tava
analyzed: bhajasva sīte mām eva bhartā aham sadṛśaḥ tava

original: 3.053.022c yauvanaṃ hy adhruvaṃ bhīru ramasveha mayā saha
analyzed: yauvanam hi adhruvam bhīru ramasva iha mayā saha

original: 3.053.023a darśane mā kṛthā buddhiṃ rāghavasya varānane
analyzed: darśane mā kṛthāḥ buddhim rāghavasya varānane

original: 3.053.023c kāsya śaktir ihāgantum api sīte manorathaiḥ
analyzed: kā asya śaktiḥ iha āgantum api sīte manorathaiḥ

original: 3.053.024a na śakyo vāyur ākāśe pāśair baddhaṃ mahājavaḥ
analyzed: na śakyaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśe pāśaiḥ baddham mahā javaḥ

original: 3.053.024c dīpyamānasya vāpy agner grahītuṃ vimalāṃ śikhām
analyzed: dīpyamānasya vā api agneḥ grahītum vimalām śikhām

original: 3.053.025a trayāṇām api lokānāṃ na taṃ paśyāmi śobhane
analyzed: trayāṇām api lokānām na tam paśyāmi śobhane
vikrameṇa nayet yaḥ tvām mad bāhu paripālitām

original: 3.053.026a laṅkāyāṃ sumahad rājyam idaṃ tvam anupālaya
analyzed: laṅkāyām su mahat rājyam idam tvam anupālaya
abhiṣeka udaka klinnā tuṣṭā ca ramayasva mām

original: 3.053.027a duṣkṛtaṃ yat purā karma vanavāsena tad gatam
analyzed: duṣkṛtam yat purā karma vana vāsena tat gatam

original: 3.053.027c yaś ca te sukṛto dharmas tasyeha phalam āpnuhi
analyzed: yaḥ ca te su kṛtaḥ dharmaḥ tasya iha phalam āpnuhi
iha sarvāṇi mālyāni divya gandhāni maithili

original: 3.053.028c bhūṣaṇāni ca mukhyāni tāni seva mayā saha
analyzed: bhūṣaṇāni ca mukhyāni tāni seva mayā saha

original: 3.053.029a puṣpakaṃ nāma suśroṇi bhrātur vaiśravaṇasya me
analyzed: puṣpakam nāma suśroṇi bhrātuḥ vaiśravaṇasya me

original: 3.053.029c vimānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ca tad vimānaṃ manojavam
analyzed: vimānam ramaṇīyam ca tat vimānam manojavam

original: 3.053.030a tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ viharasva yathāsukham
analyzed: tatra sīte mayā sārdham viharasva yathāsukham
vadanam padma saṃkāśam vimalam cāru darśanam

original: 3.053.031a śokārtaṃ tu varārohe na bhrājati varānane
analyzed: śoka ārtam tu varārohe na bhrājati varānane

original: 3.053.031c alaṃ vrīḍena vaidehi dharmalopa kṛtena te
analyzed: alam vrīḍena vaidehi dharma lopa kṛtena te
ārṣaḥ yam daiva nisyandaḥ yaḥ tvām abhigamiṣyati

original: 3.053.032c etau pādau mayā snigdhau śirobhiḥ paripīḍitau
analyzed: etau pādau mayā snigdhau śirobhiḥ paripīḍitau

original: 3.053.033a prasādaṃ kuru me kṣipraṃ vaśyo dāso 'ham asmi te
analyzed: prasādam kuru me kṣipram vaśyaḥ dāsaḥ ham asmi te

original: 3.053.033c nemāḥ śūnyā mayā vācaḥ śuṣyamāṇena bhāṣitāḥ
analyzed: na imāḥ śūnyāḥ mayā vācaḥ śuṣyamāṇena bhāṣitāḥ

original: 3.053.034a na cāpi rāvaṇaḥ kāṃ cin mūrdhnā strīṃ praṇameta ha
analyzed: na ca api rāvaṇaḥ kām cit mūrdhnā strīm praṇameta ha
evam uktvā daśagrīvaḥ maithilīm janakātmajām
kṛtānta vaśam āpannaḥ mama iyam iti manyate

original: 3.054.001a sā tathoktā tu vaidehī nirbhayā śokakarṣitā
analyzed: sā tathā uktā tu vaidehī nirbhayā śoka karṣitā
tṛṇam antarataḥ kṛtvā rāvaṇam pratyabhāṣata
rājā daśarathaḥ nāma dharma setuḥ iva acalaḥ

original: 3.054.002c satyasandhaḥ parijñāto yasya putraḥ sa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: satya sandhaḥ parijñātaḥ yasya putraḥ sa rāghavaḥ

original: 3.054.003a rāmo nāma sa dharmātmā triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ nāma sa dharma ātmā triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ

original: 3.054.003c dīrghabāhur viśālākṣo daivataṃ sa patir mama
analyzed: dīrgha bāhuḥ viśāla akṣaḥ daivatam sa patiḥ mama
ikṣvākūṇām kule jātaḥ siṃha skandhaḥ mahā dyutiḥ

original: 3.054.004c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā yas te prāṇāṃ hariṣyati
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā yaḥ te prāṇām hariṣyati

original: 3.054.005a pratyakṣaṃ yady ahaṃ tasya tvayā syāṃ dharṣitā balāt
analyzed: pratyakṣam yadi aham tasya tvayā syām dharṣitā balāt

original: 3.054.005c śayitā tvaṃ hataḥ saṃkhye janasthāne yathā kharaḥ
analyzed: śayitā tvam hataḥ saṃkhye janasthāne yathā kharaḥ

original: 3.054.006a ya ete rākṣasāḥ proktā ghorarūpā mahābalāḥ
analyzed: ye ete rākṣasāḥ proktāḥ ghora rūpāḥ mahā balāḥ

original: 3.054.006c rāghave nirviṣāḥ sarve suparṇe pannagā yathā
analyzed: rāghave nirviṣāḥ sarve suparṇe pannagāḥ yathā
tasya jyā vipramuktāḥ te śarāḥ kāñcana bhūṣaṇāḥ
śarīram vidhamiṣyanti gaṅgā kūlam iva ūrmayaḥ

original: 3.054.008a asurair vā surair vā tvaṃ yady avadho 'si rāvaṇa
analyzed: asuraiḥ vā suraiḥ vā tvam yadi avadho si rāvaṇa

original: 3.054.008c utpādya sumahad vairaṃ jīvaṃs tasya na mokṣyase
analyzed: utpādya su mahat vairam jīvan tasya na mokṣyase
sa te jīvita śeṣasya rāghavaḥ ntakaraḥ balī
paśoḥ yūpa gatasya iva jīvitam tava durlabham

original: 3.054.010a yadi paśyet sa rāmas tvāṃ roṣadīptena cakṣuṣā
analyzed: yadi paśyet sa rāmaḥ tvām roṣa dīptena cakṣuṣā

original: 3.054.010c rakṣas tvam adya nirdagdho gaccheḥ sadyaḥ parābhavam
analyzed: rakṣaḥ tvam adya nirdagdhaḥ gaccheḥ sadyas parābhavam

original: 3.054.011a yaś candraṃ nabhaso bhūmau pātayen nāśayeta vā
analyzed: yaḥ candram nabhasaḥ bhūmau pātayet nāśayeta vā

original: 3.054.011c sāgaraṃ śoṣayed vāpi sa sītāṃ mocayed iha
analyzed: sāgaram śoṣayet vā api sa sītām mocayet iha
gata āyuḥ tvam gata śrīkaḥ gata sattvaḥ gata indriyaḥ
laṅkā vaidhavya saṃyuktā tvad kṛtena bhaviṣyati

original: 3.054.013a na te pāpam idaṃ karma sukhodarkaṃ bhaviṣyati
analyzed: na te pāpam idam karma sukha udarkam bhaviṣyati

original: 3.054.013c yāhaṃ nītā vinā bhāvaṃ patipārśvāt tvayā vanāt
analyzed: yā aham nītā vinā bhāvam pati pārśvāt tvayā vanāt

original: 3.054.014a sa hi daivatasaṃyukto mama bhartā mahādyutiḥ
analyzed: sa hi daivata saṃyuktaḥ mama bhartā mahā dyutiḥ

original: 3.054.014c nirbhayo vīryam āśritya śūnye vasati daṇḍake
analyzed: nirbhayaḥ vīryam āśritya śūnye vasati daṇḍake

original: 3.054.015a sa te darpaṃ balaṃ vīryam utsekaṃ ca tathāvidham
analyzed: sa te darpam balam vīryam utsekam ca tathāvidham
apaneṣyati gātrebhyaḥ śara varṣeṇa saṃyuge
yadā vināśaḥ bhūtānām dṛśyate kāla coditaḥ

original: 3.054.016c tadā kārye pramādyanti narāḥ kālavaśaṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: tadā kārye pramādyanti narāḥ kāla vaśam gatāḥ

original: 3.054.017a māṃ pradhṛṣya sa te kālaḥ prāpto 'yaṃ rakṣasādhama
analyzed: mām pradhṛṣya sa te kālaḥ prāptaḥ yam rakṣasā adhama
ātmanaḥ rākṣasānām ca vadhāya antaḥpurasya ca

original: 3.054.018a na śakyā yajñamadhyasthā vediḥ srugbhāṇḍa maṇḍitā
analyzed: na śakyā yajña madhya sthā vediḥ sruc bhāṇḍa maṇḍitā
dvijāti mantra saṃpūtā caṇḍālena avamarditum

original: 3.054.019a idaṃ śarīraṃ niḥsaṃjñaṃ bandha vā ghātayasva vā
analyzed: idam śarīram niḥsaṃjñam bandha vā ghātayasva vā

original: 3.054.019c nedaṃ śarīraṃ rakṣyaṃ me jīvitaṃ vāpi rākṣasa
analyzed: na idam śarīram rakṣyam me jīvitam vā api rākṣasa

original: 3.054.019e na hi śakṣyāmy upakrośaṃ pṛthivyāṃ dātum ātmanaḥ
analyzed: na hi śakṣyāmi upakrośam pṛthivyām dātum ātmanaḥ

original: 3.054.020a evam uktvā tu vaidehī kroddhāt suparuṣaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tu vaidehī su paruṣam vacaḥ

original: 3.054.020c rāvaṇaṃ maithilī tatra punar novāca kiṃ cana
analyzed: rāvaṇam maithilī tatra punar na uvāca kim cana
sītāyāḥ vacanam śrutvā paruṣam roma harṣaṇam
pratyuvāca tatas sītām bhaya saṃdarśanam vacaḥ

original: 3.054.022a śṛṇu maithili madvākyaṃ māsān dvādaśa bhāmini
analyzed: śṛṇu maithili mad vākyam māsān dvādaśa bhāmini
kālena anena na abhyeṣi yadi mām cāru hāsini

original: 3.054.022e tatas tvāṃ prātarāśārthaṃ sūdāś chetsyanti leśaśaḥ
analyzed: tatas tvām prātarāśa artham sūdāḥ chetsyanti leśaśas

original: 3.054.023a ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā paruṣam vākyam rāvaṇaḥ śatru rāvaṇaḥ

original: 3.054.023c rākṣasīś ca tataḥ kruddha idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: rākṣasīḥ ca tatas kruddhaḥ idam vacanam abravīt

original: 3.054.024a śīghram evaṃ hi rākṣasyo vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ
analyzed: śīghram evam hi rākṣasyaḥ vikṛtāḥ ghora darśanāḥ
darpam asyāḥ vineṣyantu māṃsa śoṇita bhojanāḥ

original: 3.054.025a vacanād eva tās tasya vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ
analyzed: vacanāt eva tāḥ tasya vikṛtāḥ ghora darśanāḥ
kṛta prāñjalayaḥ bhūtvā maithilīm paryavārayan

original: 3.054.026a sa tāḥ provāca rājā tu rāvaṇo ghoradarśanaḥ
analyzed: sa tāḥ provāca rājā tu rāvaṇaḥ ghora darśanaḥ
pracālya caraṇa utkarṣaiḥ dārayan iva medinīm
aśoka vanikā madhye maithilī nīyatām iti
tatra iyam rakṣyatām gūḍham uṣmābhiḥ parivāritā

original: 3.054.028a tatraināṃ tarjanair ghoraiḥ punaḥ sāntvaiś ca maithilīm
analyzed: tatra enām tarjanaiḥ ghoraiḥ punar sāntvaiḥ ca maithilīm

original: 3.054.028c ānayadhvaṃ vaśaṃ sarvā vanyāṃ gajavadhūm iva
analyzed: ānayadhvam vaśam sarvāḥ vanyām gaja vadhūm iva
iti pratisamādiṣṭāḥ rākṣasyaḥ rāvaṇena tāḥ
aśoka vanikām jagmuḥ maithilīm parigṛhya tām
sarva kāma phalaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ nānā puṣpa phalaiḥ vṛtām
sarva kāla madaiḥ ca api dvijaiḥ samupasevitām
sā tu śoka parīta aṅgī maithilī janakātmajā

original: 3.054.031c rākṣasī vaśam āpannā vyāghrīṇāṃ hariṇī yathā
analyzed: rākṣasī vaśam āpannā vyāghrīṇām hariṇī yathā

original: 3.054.032a na vindate tatra tu śarma maithilī;
analyzed: na vindate tatra tu śarma maithilī
virūpa netrābhiḥ atīva tarjitā
patim smarantī dayitam ca devaram
vicetanā abhūt bhaya śoka pīḍitā
rākṣasam mṛga rūpeṇa carantam kāmarūpiṇam

original: 3.055.001c nihatya rāmo mārīcaṃ tūrṇaṃ pathi nyavartata
analyzed: nihatya rāmaḥ mārīcam tūrṇam pathi nyavartata
tasya saṃtvaramāṇasya draṣṭu kāmasya maithilīm
krūra svaraḥ tha gomāyuḥ vinanāda asya pṛṣṭhatas

original: 3.055.003a sa tasya svaram ājñāya dāruṇaṃ romaharṣaṇam
analyzed: sa tasya svaram ājñāya dāruṇam roma harṣaṇam
cintayām āsa gomāyoḥ svareṇa pariśaṅkitaḥ

original: 3.055.004a aśubhaṃ bata manye 'haṃ gomāyur vāśyate yathā
analyzed: aśubham bata manye ham gomāyuḥ vāśyate yathā

original: 3.055.004c svasti syād api vaidehyā rākṣasair bhakṣaṇaṃ vinā
analyzed: svasti syāt api vaidehyāḥ rākṣasaiḥ bhakṣaṇam vinā

original: 3.055.005a mārīcena tu vijñāya svaram ālakṣya māmakam
analyzed: mārīcena tu vijñāya svaram ālakṣya māmakam
vikruṣṭam mṛga rūpeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ śṛṇuyāt yadi

original: 3.055.006a sa saumitriḥ svaraṃ śrutvā tāṃ ca hitvātha maithilīm
analyzed: sa saumitriḥ svaram śrutvā tām ca hitvā atha maithilīm
tayā eva prahitaḥ kṣipram mad sakāśam iha eṣyati

original: 3.055.007a rākṣasaiḥ sahitair nūnaṃ sītāyā īpsito vadhaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasaiḥ sahitaiḥ nūnam sītāyāḥ īpsitaḥ vadhaḥ

original: 3.055.007c kāñcanaś ca mṛgo bhūtvā vyapanīyāśramāt tu mām
analyzed: kāñcanaḥ ca mṛgaḥ bhūtvā vyapanīya āśramāt tu mām

original: 3.055.008a dūraṃ nītvā tu mārīco rākṣaso 'bhūc charāhataḥ
analyzed: dūram nītvā tu mārīcaḥ rākṣasaḥ bhūt śara āhataḥ

original: 3.055.008c hā lakṣmaṇa hato 'smīti yad vākyaṃ vyajahāra ha
analyzed: hā lakṣmaṇa hataḥ smi iti yat vākyam vyajahāra ha

original: 3.055.009a api svasti bhaved dvābhyāṃ rahitābhyāṃ mayā vane
analyzed: api svasti bhavet dvābhyām rahitābhyām mayā vane
janasthāna nimittam hi kṛta vairaḥ smi rākṣasaiḥ

original: 3.055.009e nimittāni ca ghorāṇi dṛśyante 'dya bahūni ca
analyzed: nimittāni ca ghorāṇi dṛśyante bahūni ca

original: 3.055.010a ity evaṃ cintayan rāmaḥ śrutvā gomāyuniḥsvanam
analyzed: iti evam cintayan rāmaḥ śrutvā gomāyu niḥsvanam
ātmanaḥ ca apanayanam mṛga rūpeṇa rakṣasā
ājagāma janasthānam rāghavaḥ pariśaṅkitaḥ
tam dīna mānasam dīnam āseduḥ mṛga pakṣiṇaḥ

original: 3.055.011c savyaṃ kṛtvā mahātmānaṃ ghorāṃś ca sasṛjuḥ svarān
analyzed: savyam kṛtvā mahātmānam ghorān ca sasṛjuḥ svarān
tāni dṛṣṭvā nimittāni mahā ghorāṇi rāghavaḥ
tatas lakṣaṇam āyāntam dadarśa vigata prabham
tatas vidūre rāmeṇa samīyāya sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
viṣaṇṇaḥ sa viṣaṇṇena duḥkhitaḥ duḥkha bhāginā

original: 3.055.014a saṃjagarhe 'tha taṃ bhrātā jeṣṭho lakṣmaṇam āgatam
analyzed: saṃjagarhe tha tam bhrātā jeṣṭhaḥ lakṣmaṇam āgatam
vihāya sītām vijane vane rākṣasa sevite

original: 3.055.015a gṛhītvā ca karaṃ savyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: gṛhītvā ca karam savyam lakṣmaṇam raghunandanaḥ
uvāca madhura udarkam idam paruṣam ārta vat

original: 3.055.016a aho lakṣmaṇa garhyaṃ te kṛtaṃ yat tvaṃ vihāya tām
analyzed: aho lakṣmaṇa garhyam te kṛtam yat tvam vihāya tām

original: 3.055.016c sītām ihāgataḥ saumya kaccit svasti bhaved iti
analyzed: sītām iha āgataḥ saumya kaccit svasti bhavet iti

original: 3.055.017a na me 'sti saṃśayo vīra sarvathā janakātmajā
analyzed: na me sti saṃśayaḥ vīra sarvathā janakātmajā
vinaṣṭā bhakṣitā vā āpa rākṣasaiḥ vana cāribhiḥ

original: 3.055.018a aśubhāny eva bhūyiṣṭhaṃ yathā prādurbhavanti me
analyzed: aśubhāni eva bhūyiṣṭham yathā prādurbhavanti me
api lakṣmaṇa sītāyāḥ sāmagryam
idam hi rakṣaḥ mṛga saṃnikāśam
pralobhya mām dūram anuprayātam
hatam katham cit mahatā śrameṇa
sa rākṣasaḥ bhūt mriyamāṇaḥ eva
manaḥ ca me dīnam iha a prahṛṣṭam
cakṣuḥ ca savyam kurute vikāram
asaṃśayam lakṣmaṇa na asti sītā

original: hṛtā mṛtā vā pathi vartate vā
analyzed: hṛtā mṛtā vā pathi vartate vā

original: 3.056.001a sa dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ dīnaṃ śūnye daśarathātmajaḥ
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇam dīnam śūnye daśaratha ātmajaḥ
paryapṛcchata dharma ātmā vaidehīm āgatam vinā

original: 3.056.002a prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ yā mām anujagāma ha
analyzed: prasthitam daṇḍaka araṇyam yā mām anujagāma ha

original: 3.056.002c kva sā lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yāṃ hitvā tvam ihāgataḥ
analyzed: kva sā lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yām hitvā tvam iha āgataḥ
rājya bhraṣṭasya dīnasya daṇḍakān paridhāvataḥ

original: 3.056.003c kva sā duḥkhasahāyā me vaidehī tanumadhyamā
analyzed: kva sā duḥkha sahāyā me vaidehī tanu madhyamā

original: 3.056.004a yāṃ vinā notsahe vīra muhūrtam api jīvitum
analyzed: yām vinā nā utsahe vīra muhūrtam api jīvitum

original: 3.056.004c kva sā prāṇasahāyā me sītā surasutopamā
analyzed: kva sā prāṇa sahāyā me sītā sura sutā upamā

original: 3.056.005a patitvam amarāṇāṃ vā pṛthivyāś cāpi lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: pati tvam amarāṇām vā pṛthivyāḥ ca api lakṣmaṇa
vinā tām tapanīya ābhām na iccheyam janakātmajām

original: 3.056.006a kaccij jīvati vaidehī prāṇaiḥ priyatarā mama
analyzed: kaccit jīvati vaidehī prāṇaiḥ priyatarā mama

original: 3.056.006c kaccit pravrājanaṃ saumya na me mithyā bhaviṣyati
analyzed: kaccit pravrājanam saumya na me mithyā bhaviṣyati

original: 3.056.007a sītānimittaṃ saumitre mṛte mayi gate tvayi
analyzed: sītā nimittam saumitre mṛte mayi gate tvayi

original: 3.056.007c kaccit sakāmā sukhitā kaikeyī sā bhaviṣyati
analyzed: kaccit sa kāmā sukhitā kaikeyī sā bhaviṣyati
sa putra rājyām siddhārthām mṛta putrā tapasvinī

original: 3.056.008c upasthāsyati kausalyā kaccin saumya na kaikayīm
analyzed: upasthāsyati kausalyā kaccit saumya na kaikayīm

original: 3.056.009a yadi jīvati vaidehī gamiṣyāmy āśramaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: yadi jīvati vaidehī gamiṣyāmi āśramam punar

original: 3.056.009c suvṛttā yadi vṛttā sā prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: su vṛttā yadi vṛttā sā prāṇān tyakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa
yadi mām āśrama gatam vaidehī na abhibhāṣate
punar prahasitā sītā vinaśiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa

original: 3.056.011a brūhi lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yadi jīvati vā na vā
analyzed: brūhi lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yadi jīvati vā na vā

original: 3.056.011c tvayi pramatte rakṣobhir bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī
analyzed: tvayi pramatte rakṣobhiḥ bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī

original: 3.056.012a sukumārī ca bālā ca nityaṃ cāduḥkhadarśinī
analyzed: sukumārī ca bālā ca nityam ca aduḥkha darśinī
mad viyogena vaidehī vyaktam śocati durmanāḥ
sarvathā rakṣasā tena jihmena su durātmanā

original: 3.056.013c vadatā lakṣmaṇety uccais tavāpi janitaṃ bhayam
analyzed: vadatā lakṣmaṇa iti uccais tava api janitam bhayam

original: 3.056.014a śrutaś ca śaṅke vaidehyā sa svaraḥ sadṛśo mama
analyzed: śrutaḥ ca śaṅke vaidehyā sa svaraḥ sadṛśaḥ mama

original: 3.056.014c trastayā preṣitas tvaṃ ca draṣṭuṃ māṃ śīghram āgataḥ
analyzed: trastayā preṣitaḥ tvam ca draṣṭum mām śīghram āgataḥ

original: 3.056.015a sarvathā tu kṛtaṃ kaṣṭaṃ sītām utsṛjatā vane
analyzed: sarvathā tu kṛtam kaṣṭam sītām utsṛjatā vane
pratikartum nṛśaṃsānām rakṣasām dattam antaram
duḥkhitāḥ khara ghātena rākṣasāḥ piśita aśanāḥ

original: 3.056.016c taiḥ sītā nihatā ghorair bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: taiḥ sītā nihatāḥ ghoraiḥ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
aho smi vyasane magnaḥ sarvathā ripu nāśana

original: 3.056.017c kiṃ tv idānīṃ kariṣyāmi śaṅke prāptavyam īdṛśam
analyzed: kim tu idānīm kariṣyāmi śaṅke prāptavyam īdṛśam

original: 3.056.018a iti sītāṃ varārohāṃ cintayann eva rāghavaḥ
analyzed: iti sītām varārohām cintayan eva rāghavaḥ
ājagāma janasthānam tvarayā sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
vigarhamāṇaḥ nujam ārta rūpam
kṣudhā śramāt ca eva pipāsayā ca
viniḥśvasam śuṣka mukhaḥ viṣaṇṇaḥ
pratiśrayam prāpya samīkṣya śūnyam
svam āśramam saṃpravigāhya vīro
vihāra deśān anusṛtya kān cit
etat tat iti eva nivāsa bhūmau
prahṛṣṭa romā vyathitaḥ babhūva
atha āśramāt upāvṛttam antarā raghunandanaḥ
paripapraccha saumitrim rāmaḥ duḥkha arditaḥ punar

original: 3.057.002a tam uvāca kimarthaṃ tvam āgato 'pāsya maithilīm
analyzed: tam uvāca kimartham tvam āgataḥ u pāsya maithilīm

original: 3.057.002c yadā sā tava viśvāsād vane viharitā mayā
analyzed: yadā sā tava viśvāsāt vane viharitā mayā

original: 3.057.003a dṛṣṭvaivābhyāgataṃ tvāṃ me maithilīṃ tyajya lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva abhyāgatam tvām me maithilīm tyajya lakṣmaṇa

original: 3.057.003c śaṅkamānaṃ mahat pāpaṃ yat satyaṃ vyathitaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: śaṅkamānam mahat pāpam yat satyam vyathitam manaḥ

original: 3.057.004a sphurate nayanaṃ savyaṃ bāhuś ca hṛdayaṃ ca me
analyzed: sphurate nayanam savyam bāhuḥ ca hṛdayam ca me

original: 3.057.004c dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇa dūre tvāṃ sītāvirahitaṃ pathi
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇa dūre tvām sītā virahitam pathi

original: 3.057.005a evam uktas tu saumitrir lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhalakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu saumitriḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ śubha lakṣaṇaḥ
bhūyas duḥkha samāviṣṭaḥ duḥkhitam rāmam abravīt

original: 3.057.006a na svayaṃ kāmakāreṇa tāṃ tyaktvāham ihāgataḥ
analyzed: na svayam kāmakāreṇa tām tyaktvā aham iha āgataḥ
pracoditaḥ tayā evā ugraiḥ tvad sakāśam iha āgataḥ

original: 3.057.007a āryeṇeva parikruṣṭaṃ hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
analyzed: āryeṇa iva parikruṣṭam hā sīte lakṣmaṇa iti ca

original: 3.057.007c paritrāhīti yad vākyaṃ maithilyās tac chrutiṃ gatam
analyzed: paritrāhi iti yat vākyam maithilyāḥ tat śrutim gatam

original: 3.057.008a sā tam ārtasvaraṃ śrutvā tava snehena maithilī
analyzed: sā tam ārta svaram śrutvā tava snehena maithilī

original: 3.057.008c gaccha gaccheti mām āha rudantī bhayavihvalā
analyzed: gaccha gaccha iti mām āha rudantī bhaya vihvalā
pracodyamānena mayā gaccha iti bahuśas tayā
pratyuktā maithilī vākyam idam tvad pratyaya anvitam

original: 3.057.010a na tat paśyāmy ahaṃ rakṣo yad asya bhayam āvahet
analyzed: na tat paśyāmi aham rakṣaḥ yat asya bhayam āvahet

original: 3.057.010c nirvṛtā bhava nāsty etat kenāpy evam udāhṛtam
analyzed: nirvṛtā bhava nā asti etat kena api evam udāhṛtam

original: 3.057.011a vigarhitaṃ ca nīcaṃ ca katham āryo 'bhidhāsyati
analyzed: vigarhitam ca nīcam ca katham āryaḥ bhidhāsyati

original: 3.057.011c trāhīti vacanaṃ sīte yas trāyet tridaśān api
analyzed: trāhi iti vacanam sīte yaḥ trāyet tridaśān api

original: 3.057.012a kiṃnimittaṃ tu kenāpi bhrātur ālambya me svaram
analyzed: kiṃnimittam tu kena api bhrātuḥ ālambya me svaram

original: 3.057.012c visvaraṃ vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇa trāhi mām iti
analyzed: visvaram vyāhṛtam vākyam lakṣmaṇa trāhi mām iti
na bhavatyā vyathā kāryā kunārī jana sevitā

original: 3.057.013a alaṃ vaiklavyam ālambya svasthā bhava nirutsukā
analyzed: alam vaiklavyam ālambya svasthā bhava nirutsukā

original: 3.057.013c na cāsti triṣu lokeṣu pumān yo rāghavaṃ raṇe
analyzed: na ca asti triṣu lokeṣu pumān yaḥ rāghavam raṇe

original: 3.057.013e jāto vā jāyamāno vā saṃyuge yaḥ parājayet
analyzed: jātaḥ vā jāyamānaḥ vā saṃyuge yaḥ parājayet
evam uktā tu vaidehī parimohita cetanā

original: 3.057.014c uvācāśrūṇi muñcantī dāruṇaṃ mām idaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: uvāca aśrūṇi muñcantī dāruṇam mām idam vacaḥ

original: 3.057.015a bhāvo mayi tavātyarthaṃ pāpa eva niveśitaḥ
analyzed: bhāvaḥ mayi tava atyartham pāpaḥ eva niveśitaḥ

original: 3.057.015c vinaṣṭe bhrātari prāpte na ca tvaṃ mām avāpsyasi
analyzed: vinaṣṭe bhrātari prāpte na ca tvam mām avāpsyasi
saṃketāt bharatena tvam rāmam samanugacchasi
krośantam hi yathā atyartham na enam abhyavapadyase
ripuḥ pracchanna cārī tvam mad artham anugacchasi
rāghavasya antara prepsuḥ tathā enam na abhipadyase

original: 3.057.018a evam ukto hi vaidehyā saṃrabdho raktalocanaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ hi vaidehyā saṃrabdhaḥ rakta locanaḥ
krodhāt prasphuramāṇa oṣṭhaḥ āśramāt abhinirgataḥ
evam bruvāṇam saumitrim rāmaḥ saṃtāpa mohitaḥ

original: 3.057.019c abravīd duṣkṛtaṃ saumya tāṃ vinā yat tvam āgataḥ
analyzed: abravīt duṣkṛtam saumya tām vinā yat tvam āgataḥ

original: 3.057.020a jānann api samarthaṃ māṃ rakṣasāṃ vinivāraṇe
analyzed: jānan api samartham mām rakṣasām vinivāraṇe
anena krodha vākyena maithilyāḥ niḥsṛtaḥ bhavān

original: 3.057.021a na hi te parituṣyāmi tyaktvā yad yāsi maithilīm
analyzed: na hi te parituṣyāmi tyaktvā yat yāsi maithilīm

original: 3.057.021c kruddhāyāḥ paruṣaṃ śrutvā striyā yat tvam ihāgataḥ
analyzed: kruddhāyāḥ paruṣam śrutvā striyāḥ yat tvam iha āgataḥ

original: 3.057.022a sarvathā tv apanītaṃ te sītayā yat pracoditaḥ
analyzed: sarvathā tu apanītam te sītayā yat pracoditaḥ

original: 3.057.022c krodhasya vaśam āgamya nākaroḥ śāsanaṃ mama
analyzed: krodhasya vaśam āgamya na akaroḥ śāsanam mama

original: 3.057.023a asau hi rākṣasaḥ śete śareṇābhihato mayā
analyzed: asau hi rākṣasaḥ śete śareṇa abhihataḥ mayā
mṛga rūpeṇa yena aham āśramāt apavāditaḥ
vikṛṣya cāpam paridhāya sāyakam
salīla bāṇena ca tāḍitaḥ mayā
mārgīm tanum tyajya ca
babhūva keyūra dharaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ
śara āhatena eva tadā ārtayā girā
svaram mama ālambya su dūra saṃśravam
udāhṛtam tat vacanam su dāruṇam
tvam āgataḥ yena vihāya maithilīm
bhṛśam āvrajamānasya tasya adhas vāma locanam

original: 3.058.001c prāsphurac cāskhalad rāmo vepathuś cāsya jāyate
analyzed: prāsphurat ca askhalat rāmaḥ vepathuḥ ca asya jāyate
upālakṣya nimittāni saḥ śubhāni muhur muhur

original: 3.058.002c api kṣemaṃ tu sītāyā iti vai vyājahāra ha
analyzed: api kṣemam tu sītāyāḥ iti vai vyājahāra ha
tvaramāṇaḥ jagāma atha sītā darśana lālasaḥ
śūnyam āvasatham dṛṣṭvā babhūva udvigna mānasaḥ
udbhraman iva vegena vikṣipan raghunandanaḥ
tatra tatra uṭaja sthānam abhivīkṣya samantataḥ

original: 3.058.005a dadarśa parṇaśālāṃ ca rahitāṃ sītayā tadā
analyzed: dadarśa parṇa śālām ca rahitām sītayā tadā

original: 3.058.005c śriyā virahitāṃ dhvastāṃ hemante padminīm iva
analyzed: śriyā virahitām dhvastām hemante padminīm iva
rudantam iva vṛkṣaiḥ ca mlāna puṣpa mṛga dvijam
śriyā vihīnam vidhvastam saṃtyakta vana daivatam
viprakīrṇa ajina kuśam vipraviddha bṛsī kaṭam
dṛṣṭvā śūnya uṭaja sthānam vilalāpa punar punar

original: 3.058.008a hṛtā mṛtā vā naṣṭā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati
analyzed: hṛtā mṛtā vā naṣṭā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati

original: 3.058.008c nilīnāpy atha vā bhīrur atha vā vanam āśritā
analyzed: nilīnā api atha vā bhīruḥ atha vā vanam āśritā

original: 3.058.009a gatā vicetuṃ puṣpāṇi phalāny api ca vā punaḥ
analyzed: gatāḥ vicetum puṣpāṇi phalāni api ca vā punar

original: 3.058.009c atha vā padminīṃ yātā jalārthaṃ vā nadīṃ gatā
analyzed: atha vā padminīm yātā jala artham vā nadīm gatā

original: 3.058.010a yatnān mṛgayamāṇas tu nāsasāda vane priyām
analyzed: yatnāt mṛgayamāṇaḥ tu na āsasāda vane priyām
śoka rakta īkṣaṇaḥ śokāt unmattaḥ iva lakṣyate

original: 3.058.011a vṛkṣād vṛkṣaṃ pradhāvan sa girīṃś cāpi nadīn nadīm
analyzed: vṛkṣāt vṛkṣam pradhāvan sa girīn ca api nadīn nadīm
babhūva vilapan rāmaḥ śoka paṅka arṇava plutaḥ

original: 3.058.012a asti kaccit tvayā dṛṣṭā sā kadambapriyā priyā
analyzed: asti kaccit tvayā dṛṣṭā sā kadamba priyā priyā

original: 3.058.012c kadamba yadi jānīṣe śaṃsa sītāṃ śubhānanām
analyzed: kadamba yadi jānīṣe śaṃsa sītām śubha ānanām
snigdha pallava saṃkāśām pīta kauśeya vāsinīm

original: 3.058.013c śaṃsasva yadi vā dṛṣṭā bilva bilvopamastanī
analyzed: śaṃsasva yadi vā dṛṣṭā bilva bilva upama stanī

original: 3.058.014a atha vārjuna śaṃsa tvaṃ priyāṃ tām arjunapriyām
analyzed: atha vā arjuna śaṃsa tvam priyām tām arjuna priyām

original: 3.058.014c janakasya sutā bhīrur yadi jīvati vā na vā
analyzed: janakasya sutā bhīruḥ yadi jīvati vā na vā

original: 3.058.015a kakubhaḥ kakubhoruṃ tāṃ vyaktaṃ jānāti maithilīm
analyzed: kakubhaḥ kakubha ūrum tām vyaktam jānāti maithilīm
latā pallava puṣpa āḍhyaḥ bhāti hi eṣa vanaspatiḥ

original: 3.058.016a bhramarair upagītaś ca yathā drumavaro hy ayam
analyzed: bhramaraiḥ upagītaḥ ca yathā druma varaḥ hi ayam
eṣa vyaktam vijānāti tilakaḥ tilaka priyām
aśoka śoka apanuda śoka upahata cetasam
tvad nāmānam kuru kṣipram priyā saṃdarśanena mām
yadi tāla tvayā dṛṣṭā pakva tāla phala stanī

original: 3.058.018c kathayasva varārohāṃ kāruṣyaṃ yadi te mayi
analyzed: kathayasva varārohām kāruṣyam yadi te mayi
yadi dṛṣṭā tvayā sītā jambu jāmbūnada prabhā

original: 3.058.019c priyāṃ yadi vijānīṣe niḥśaṅkaṃ kathayasva me
analyzed: priyām yadi vijānīṣe niḥśaṅkam kathayasva me

original: 3.058.020a atha vā mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ mṛga jānāsi maithilīm
analyzed: atha vā mṛgaśāvākṣīm mṛga jānāsi maithilīm
mṛga viprekṣaṇī kāntā mṛgībhiḥ sahitā bhavet

original: 3.058.021a gaja sā gajanāsorur yadi dṛṣṭā tvayā bhavet
analyzed: gaja sā gaja nāsā ūruḥ yadi dṛṣṭā tvayā bhavet

original: 3.058.021c tāṃ manye viditāṃ tubhyam ākhyāhi varavāraṇa
analyzed: tām manye viditām tubhyam ākhyāhi vara vāraṇa

original: 3.058.022a śārdūla yadi sā dṛṣṭā priyā candranibhānanā
analyzed: śārdūla yadi sā dṛṣṭā priyā candra nibha ānanā

original: 3.058.022c maithilī mama visrabdhaḥ kathayasva na te bhayam
analyzed: maithilī mama visrabdhaḥ kathayasva na te bhayam

original: 3.058.023a kiṃ dhāvasi priye nūnaṃ dṛṣṭāsi kamalekṣaṇe
analyzed: kim dhāvasi priye nūnam dṛṣṭā asi kamala īkṣaṇe

original: 3.058.023c vṛkṣeṇācchādya cātmānaṃ kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase
analyzed: vṛkṣeṇa ācchādya ca ātmānam kim mām na pratibhāṣase

original: 3.058.024a tiṣṭha tiṣṭha varārohe na te 'sti karuṇā mayi
analyzed: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha varārohe na te sti karuṇā mayi
na atyartham hāsya śīlā asi kimartham mām upekṣase
pīta kauśeyakena asi sūcitā varavarṇini

original: 3.058.025c dhāvanty api mayā dṛṣṭā tiṣṭha yady asti sauhṛdam
analyzed: dhāvantī api mayā dṛṣṭā tiṣṭha yadi asti sauhṛdam

original: 3.058.026a naiva sā nūnam atha vā hiṃsitā cāruhāsinī
analyzed: nā eva sā nūnam atha vā hiṃsitā cāru hāsinī

original: 3.058.026c kṛcchraṃ prāptaṃ hi māṃ nūnaṃ yathopekṣitum arhati
analyzed: kṛcchram prāptam hi mām nūnam yathā upekṣitum arhati

original: 3.058.027a vyaktaṃ sā bhakṣitā bālā rākṣasaiḥ piśitāśanaiḥ
analyzed: vyaktam sā bhakṣitā bālā rākṣasaiḥ piśita aśanaiḥ
vibhajya aṅgāni sarvāṇi mayā virahitā priyā

original: 3.058.028a nūnaṃ tac chubhadantauṣṭhaṃ mukhaṃ niṣprabhatāṃ gatam
analyzed: nūnam tat śubha danta oṣṭham mukham niṣprabha tām gatam

original: 3.058.028c sā hi campakavarṇābhā grīvā graiveya śobhitā
analyzed: sā hi campaka varṇa ābhā grīvā graiveya śobhitā

original: 3.058.029a komalā vilapantyās tu kāntāyā bhakṣitā śubhā
analyzed: komalā vilapantyāḥ tu kāntāyāḥ bhakṣitā śubhā
nūnam vikṣipyamāṇau tau bāhū pallava komalau
bhakṣitau vepamāna agrau sa hasta ābharaṇa aṅgadau

original: 3.058.030c mayā virahitā bālā rakṣasāṃ bhakṣaṇāya vai
analyzed: mayā virahitā bālā rakṣasām bhakṣaṇāya vai
sārthena iva parityaktā bhakṣitā bahu bāndhavā

original: 3.058.031c hā lakṣmaṇa mahābāho paśyasi tvaṃ priyāṃ kva cit
analyzed: hā lakṣmaṇa mahā bāho paśyasi tvam priyām kva cit

original: 3.058.032a hā priye kva gatā bhadre hā sīteti punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: hā priye kva gatā bhadre hā sītā iti punar punar

original: 3.058.032c ity evaṃ vilapan rāmaḥ paridhāvan vanād vanam
analyzed: iti evam vilapan rāmaḥ paridhāvan vanāt vanam

original: 3.058.033a kva cid udbhramate vegāt kva cid vibhramate balāt
analyzed: kva cit udbhramate vegāt kva cit vibhramate balāt

original: 3.058.033c kva cin matta ivābhāti kāntān veṣaṇatatparaḥ
analyzed: kva cit mattaḥ iva ābhāti kāntān veṣaṇa tatparaḥ

original: 3.058.034a sa vanāni nadīḥ śailān giriprasravaṇāni ca
analyzed: sa vanāni nadīḥ śailān giri prasravaṇāni ca
kānanāni ca vegena bhramati aparisaṃsthitaḥ

original: 3.058.035a tathā sa gatvā vipulaṃ mahad vanaṃ;
analyzed: tathā sa gatvā vipulam mahat vanam

original: parītya sarvaṃ tv atha maithilīṃ prati
analyzed: parītya sarvam tu atha maithilīm prati
a niṣṭhita āśaḥ sa cakāra mārgaṇe
punar priyāyāḥ paramam pariśramam
dṛṣṭa āśrama padam śūnyam rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ

original: 3.059.001c rahitāṃ parṇaśālāṃ ca vidhvastāny āsanāni ca
analyzed: rahitām parṇa śālām ca vidhvastāni āsanāni ca

original: 3.059.002a adṛṣṭvā tatra vaidehīṃ saṃnirīkṣya ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: a dṛṣṭvā tatra vaidehīm saṃnirīkṣya ca sarvaśas

original: 3.059.002c uvāca rāmaḥ prākruśya pragṛhya rucirau bhujau
analyzed: uvāca rāmaḥ prākruśya pragṛhya rucirau bhujau

original: 3.059.003a kva nu lakṣmaṇa vaidehī kaṃ vā deśam ito gatā
analyzed: kva nu lakṣmaṇa vaidehī kam vā deśam itas gatā

original: 3.059.003c kenāhṛtā vā saumitre bhakṣitā kena vā priyā
analyzed: kena āhṛtā vā saumitre bhakṣitā kena vā priyā

original: 3.059.004a vṛṣkeṇāvārya yadi māṃ sīte hasitum icchasi
analyzed: vṛṣkeṇa āvārya yadi mām sīte hasitum icchasi

original: 3.059.004c alaṃ te hasitenādya māṃ bhajasva suduḥkhitam
analyzed: alam te hasitena adya mām bhajasva su duḥkhitam

original: 3.059.005a yaiḥ saha krīḍase sīte viśvastair mṛgapotakaiḥ
analyzed: yaiḥ saha krīḍase sīte viśvastaiḥ mṛga potakaiḥ

original: 3.059.005c ete hīnās tvayā saumye dhyāyanty asrāvilekṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: ete hīnāḥ tvayā saumye dhyāyanti asra āvila īkṣaṇāḥ
mṛtam śokena mahatā sītā āharaṇa jena mām

original: 3.059.006c paraloke mahārājo nūnaṃ drakṣyati me pitā
analyzed: para loke mahā rājaḥ nūnam drakṣyati me pitā

original: 3.059.007a kathaṃ pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya mayā tvam abhiyojitaḥ
analyzed: katham pratijñām saṃśrutya mayā tvam abhiyojitaḥ
a pūrayitvā tam kālam mad sakāśam iha āgataḥ

original: 3.059.008a kāmavṛttam anāryaṃ māṃ mṛṣāvādinam eva ca
analyzed: kāma vṛttam anāryam mām mṛṣāvādinam eva ca

original: 3.059.008c dhik tvām iti pare loke vyaktaṃ vakṣyati me pitā
analyzed: tvām iti pare loke vyaktam vakṣyati me pitā
vivaśam śoka saṃtaptam dīnam bhagna manoratham

original: 3.059.009c mām ihotsṛjya karuṇaṃ kīrtir naram ivānṛjum
analyzed: mām iha utsṛjya karuṇam kīrtiḥ naram iva anṛjum

original: 3.059.010a kva gacchasi varārohe mām utsṛjya sumadhyame
analyzed: kva gacchasi varārohe mām utsṛjya sumadhyame

original: 3.059.010c tvayā virahitaś cāhaṃ mokṣye jīvitam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: tvayā virahitaḥ ca aham mokṣye jīvitam ātmanaḥ
iti iva vilapan rāmaḥ sītā darśana lālasaḥ
na dadarśa su duḥkha ārtaḥ rāghavaḥ janakātmajām
an āsādayamānam tam sītām daśaratha ātmajam

original: 3.059.012c paṅkam āsādya vipulaṃ sīdantam iva kuñjaram
analyzed: paṅkam āsādya vipulam sīdantam iva kuñjaram
lakṣmaṇaḥ rāmam atyartham uvāca hita kāmyayā

original: 3.059.013a mā viṣādaṃ mahābāho kuru yatnaṃ mayā saha
analyzed: mā viṣādam mahā bāho kuru yatnam mayā saha

original: 3.059.013c idaṃ ca hi vanaṃ śūra bahukandaraśobhitam
analyzed: idam ca hi vanam śūra bahu kandara śobhitam
priya kānana saṃcārā vana unmattā ca maithilī

original: 3.059.014c sā vanaṃ vā praviṣṭā syān nalinīṃ vā supuṣpitām
analyzed: sā vanam vā praviṣṭā syāt nalinīm vā su puṣpitām
saritam vā api saṃprāptāḥ mīna vañjura sevitām

original: 3.059.015c vitrāsayitukāmā vā līnā syāt kānane kva cit
analyzed: vitrāsayitu kāmā vā līnā syāt kānane kva cit

original: 3.059.015e jijñāsamānā vaidehī tvāṃ māṃ ca puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: jijñāsamānā vaidehī tvām mām ca puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 3.059.016a tasyā hy anveṣaṇe śrīman kṣipram eva yatāvahe
analyzed: tasyāḥ hi anveṣaṇe śrīman kṣipram eva yatāvahe

original: 3.059.016c vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicinuvo yatra sā janakātmajā
analyzed: vanam sarvam vicinuvaḥ yatra sā janakātmajā

original: 3.059.016e manyase yadi kākutstha mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
analyzed: manyase yadi kākutstha mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ

original: 3.059.017a evam uktas tu sauhārdāl lakṣmaṇena samāhitaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu sauhārdāt lakṣmaṇena samāhitaḥ
saha saumitriṇā rāmaḥ vicetum upacakrame

original: 3.059.017e tau vanāni girīṃś caiva saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca
analyzed: tau vanāni girīn ca eva saritaḥ ca sarāṃsi ca
nikhilena vicinvantau sītām daśaratha ātmajau

original: 3.059.018c tasya śailasya sānūni guhāś ca śikharāṇi ca
analyzed: tasya śailasya sānūni guhāḥ ca śikharāṇi ca
nikhilena vicinvantau na eva tām abhijagmatuḥ

original: 3.059.019c vicitya sarvataḥ śailaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
analyzed: vicitya sarvatas śailam rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇam abravīt

original: 3.059.020a neha paśyāmi saumitre vaidehīṃ parvate śubhe
analyzed: na iha paśyāmi saumitre vaidehīm parvate śubhe
tatas duḥkha abhisaṃtaptaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ vākyam abravīt
vicaran daṇḍaka araṇyam bhrātaram dīpta tejasam
prāpsyasi tvam mahā prājña maithilīm janakātmajām

original: 3.059.022a yathā viṣṇur mahābāhur baliṃ baddhvā mahīm imām
analyzed: yathā viṣṇuḥ mahā bāhuḥ balim baddhvā mahīm imām

original: 3.059.022c evam uktas tu vīreṇa lakṣmaṇena sa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu vīreṇa lakṣmaṇena sa rāghavaḥ
uvāca dīnayā vācā duḥkha abhihata cetanaḥ
vanam sarvam suvicitam padminyaḥ phulla paṅkajāḥ
giriḥ ca ayam mahā prājña bahu kandara nirjharaḥ

original: 3.059.024c na hi paśyāmi vaidehīṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm
analyzed: na hi paśyāmi vaidehīm prāṇebhyaḥ garīyasīm
evam sa vilapan rāmaḥ sītā āharaṇa karśitaḥ
dīnaḥ śoka samāviṣṭaḥ muhūrtam vihvalaḥ bhavat
sa vihvalita sarva aṅgaḥ gata buddhiḥ vicetanaḥ
viṣasāda āturaḥ dīnaḥ niḥśvasya aśītam āyatam

original: 3.059.027a bahuśaḥ sa tu niḥśvasya rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ
analyzed: bahuśas sa tu niḥśvasya rāmaḥ rājīva locanaḥ
hā priyā iti vicukrośa bahuśas bāṣpa gadgadaḥ

original: 3.059.028a taṃ sāntvayām āsa tato lakṣmaṇaḥ priyabāndhavaḥ
analyzed: tam sāntvayām āsa tatas lakṣmaṇaḥ priya bāndhavaḥ
bahu prakāram dharma jñaḥ praśritaḥ praśrita añjaliḥ
an ādṛtya tu tat vākyam lakṣmaṇa oṣṭha puṭa cyutam

original: 3.059.029c apaśyaṃs tāṃ priyāṃ sītāṃ prākrośat sa punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: a paśyan tām priyām sītām prākrośat sa punar punar

original: 3.060.001a sa dīno dīnayā vācā lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt
analyzed: sa dīnaḥ dīnayā vācā lakṣmaṇam vākyam abravīt

original: 3.060.001c śīghraṃ lakṣmaṇa jānīhi gatvā godāvarīṃ nadīm
analyzed: śīghram lakṣmaṇa jānīhi gatvā godāvarīm nadīm

original: 3.060.001e api godāvarīṃ sītā padmāny ānayituṃ gatā
analyzed: api godāvarīm sītā padmāni ānayitum gatā

original: 3.060.002a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ punar eva hi
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ punar eva hi
nadīm godāvarīm ramyām jagāma laghu vikramaḥ

original: 3.060.003a tāṃ lakṣmaṇas tīrthavatīṃ vicitvā rāmam abravīt
analyzed: tām lakṣmaṇaḥ tīrthavatīm vicitvā rāmam abravīt

original: 3.060.003c naināṃ paśyāmi tīrtheṣu krośato na śṛṇoti me
analyzed: na enām paśyāmi tīrtheṣu krośataḥ na śṛṇoti me

original: 3.060.004a kaṃ nu sā deśam āpannā vaidehī kleśanāśinī
analyzed: kam nu sā deśam āpannā vaidehī kleśa nāśinī

original: 3.060.004c na hi taṃ vedmi vai rāma yatra sā tanumadhyamā
analyzed: na hi tam vedmi vai rāma yatra sā tanu madhyamā

original: 3.060.005a lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā dīnaḥ saṃtāpa mohitaḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā dīnaḥ saṃtāpa mohitaḥ
rāmaḥ samabhicakrāma svayam godāvarīm nadīm

original: 3.060.006a sa tām upasthito rāmaḥ kva sītety evam abravīt
analyzed: sa tām upasthitaḥ rāmaḥ kva sītā iti evam abravīt
bhūtāni rākṣasa indreṇa vadha arheṇa hṛtām api

original: 3.060.007c na tāṃ śaśaṃsū rāmāya tathā godāvarī nadī
analyzed: na tām rāmāya tathā godāvarī nadī

original: 3.060.008a tataḥ pracoditā bhūtaiḥ śaṃsāsmai tāṃ priyām iti
analyzed: tatas pracoditā bhūtaiḥ śaṃsa asmai tām priyām iti

original: 3.060.008c na ca sābhyavadat sītāṃ pṛṣṭā rāmeṇa śocitā
analyzed: na ca sā abhyavadat sītām pṛṣṭā rāmeṇa śocitā

original: 3.060.009a rāvaṇasya ca tad rūpaṃ karmāṇi ca durātmanaḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇasya ca tat rūpam karmāṇi ca durātmanaḥ

original: 3.060.009c dhyātvā bhayāt tu vaidehīṃ sā nadī na śaśaṃsa tām
analyzed: dhyātvā bhayāt tu vaidehīm sā nadī na śaśaṃsa tām

original: 3.060.010a nirāśas tu tayā nadyā sītāyā darśane kṛtaḥ
analyzed: nirāśaḥ tu tayā nadyā sītāyāḥ darśane kṛtaḥ
uvāca rāmaḥ saumitrim sītā adarśana karśitaḥ

original: 3.060.011a kiṃ nu lakṣmaṇa vakṣyāmi sametya janakaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: kim nu lakṣmaṇa vakṣyāmi sametya janakam vacaḥ

original: 3.060.011c mātaraṃ caiva vaidehyā vinā tām aham apriyam
analyzed: mātaram ca eva vaidehyā vinā tām aham apriyam

original: 3.060.012a yā me rājyavihīnasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ
analyzed: yāḥ me rājya vihīnasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ

original: 3.060.012c sarvaṃ vyapanayac chokaṃ vaidehī kva nu sā gatā
analyzed: sarvam vyapanayat śokam vaidehī kva nu sā gatā
jñāti pakṣa vihīnasya rāja putrīm apaśyataḥ

original: 3.060.013c manye dīrghā bhaviṣyanti rātrayo mama jāgrataḥ
analyzed: manye dīrghāḥ bhaviṣyanti rātrayaḥ mama jāgrataḥ
godāvarīm janasthānam imam prasravaṇam girim

original: 3.060.014c sarvāṇy anucariṣyāmi yadi sītā hi dṛśyate
analyzed: sarvāṇi anucariṣyāmi yadi sītā hi dṛśyate

original: 3.060.015a evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇau tāv anyonyaṃ bhrātarāv ubhau
analyzed: evam saṃbhāṣamāṇau tau anyonyam bhrātarau ubhau
vasuṃdharāyām patitam puṣpa mārgam a paśyatām

original: 3.060.016a tāṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahītale
analyzed: tām puṣpa vṛṣṭim patitām dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ mahī tale

original: 3.060.016c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vīro duḥkhito duḥkhitaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: uvāca lakṣmaṇam vīraḥ duḥkhitaḥ duḥkhitam vacaḥ
abhijānāmi puṣpāṇi tāni imāmi iha lakṣmaṇa
apinaddhāni vaidehyāḥ mayā dattāni kānane
evam uktvā mahā bāhuḥ lakṣmaṇam puruṣa ṛṣabham

original: 3.060.018c kruddho 'bravīd giriṃ tatra siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā
analyzed: kruddhaḥ bravīt girim tatra siṃhaḥ kṣudra mṛgam yathā

original: 3.060.019a tāṃ hemavarṇāṃ hemābhāṃ sītāṃ darśaya parvata
analyzed: tām hema varṇām hema ābhām sītām darśaya parvata

original: 3.060.019c yāvat sānūni sarvāṇi na te vidhvaṃsayāmy aham
analyzed: yāvat sānūni sarvāṇi na te vidhvaṃsayāmi aham
mama bāṇa agni nirdagdhaḥ bhasmībhūtaḥ bhaviṣyasi
asevyaḥ satatam ca eva nistṛṇa druma pallavaḥ

original: 3.060.021a imāṃ vā saritaṃ cādya śoṣayiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: imām vā saritam ca adya śoṣayiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa

original: 3.060.021c yadi nākhyāti me sītām adya candranibhānanām
analyzed: yadi nā ākhyāti me sītām adya candra nibha ānanām

original: 3.060.022a evaṃ sa ruṣito rāmo didhakṣann iva cakṣuṣā
analyzed: evam sa ruṣitaḥ rāmaḥ didhakṣan iva cakṣuṣā

original: 3.060.022c dadarśa bhūmau niṣkrāntaṃ rākṣasasya padaṃ mahat
analyzed: dadarśa bhūmau niṣkrāntam rākṣasasya padam mahat

original: 3.060.023a sa samīkṣya parikrāntaṃ sītāyā rākṣasasya ca
analyzed: sa samīkṣya parikrāntam sītāyāḥ rākṣasasya ca
saṃbhrānta hṛdayaḥ rāmaḥ śaśaṃsa bhrātaram priyam
paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyāḥ śīrṇāḥ kanaka bindavaḥ

original: 3.060.024c bhūṣaṇānāṃ hi saumitre mālyāni vividhāni ca
analyzed: bhūṣaṇānām hi saumitre mālyāni vividhāni ca
tapta bindu nikāśaiḥ ca citraiḥ kṣataja bindubhiḥ
āvṛtam paśya saumitre sarvatas dharaṇī talam
manye lakṣmaṇa vaidehī rākṣasaiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ

original: 3.060.026c bhittvā bhittvā vibhaktā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati
analyzed: bhittvā bhittvā vibhaktā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati
tasya nimittam vaidehyāḥ dvayoḥ vivadamānayoḥ

original: 3.060.027c babhūva yuddhaṃ saumitre ghoraṃ rākṣasayor iha
analyzed: babhūva yuddham saumitre ghoram rākṣasayoḥ iha
muktāmaṇi citam ca idam tapanīya vibhūṣitam

original: 3.060.028c dharaṇyāṃ patitaṃ saumya kasya bhagnaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
analyzed: dharaṇyām patitam saumya kasya bhagnam mahat dhanuḥ
taruṇa āditya saṃkāśam vaidūrya gulikā citam

original: 3.060.029c viśīrṇaṃ patitaṃ bhūmau kavacaṃ kasya kāñcanam
analyzed: viśīrṇam patitam bhūmau kavacam kasya kāñcanam
chatram śata śalākam ca divya mālya upaśobhitam

original: 3.060.030c bhagnadaṇḍam idaṃ kasya bhūmau saumya nipātitam
analyzed: bhagna daṇḍam idam kasya bhūmau saumya nipātitam
kāñcana uraśchadāḥ ca ime piśāca vadanāḥ kharāḥ

original: 3.060.031c bhīmarūpā mahākāyāḥ kasya vā nihatā raṇe
analyzed: bhīma rūpāḥ mahā kāyāḥ kasya vā nihatāḥ raṇe
dīpta pāvaka saṃkāśaḥ dyutimān samara dhvajaḥ

original: 3.060.032c apaviddhaś ca bhagnaś ca kasya sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
analyzed: apaviddhaḥ ca bhagnaḥ ca kasya sāṃgrāmikaḥ rathaḥ
ratha akṣa mātrāḥ viśikhāḥ tapanīya vibhūṣaṇāḥ
kasya ime bhihatāḥ bāṇāḥ prakīrṇāḥ ghora karmaṇaḥ
vairam śataguṇam paśya mama idam jīvita antakam
su ghora hṛdayaiḥ saumya rākṣasaiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ

original: 3.060.035a hṛtā mṛtā vā sītā hi bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī
analyzed: hṛtā mṛtā vā sītā hi bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī

original: 3.060.035c na dharmas trāyate sītāṃ hriyamāṇāṃ mahāvane
analyzed: na dharmaḥ trāyate sītām hriyamāṇām mahā vane

original: 3.060.036a bhakṣitāyāṃ hi vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: bhakṣitāyām hi vaidehyām hṛtāyām api lakṣmaṇa

original: 3.060.036c ke hi loke priyaṃ kartuṃ śaktāḥ saumya mameśvarāḥ
analyzed: ke hi loke priyam kartum śaktāḥ saumya mama īśvarāḥ
kartāram api lokānām śūram karuṇa vedinam
ajñānāt avamanyeran sarva bhūtāni lakṣmaṇa
mṛdum loka hite yuktam dāntam karuṇa vedinam

original: 3.060.038c nirvīrya iti manyante nūnaṃ māṃ tridaśeśvarāḥ
analyzed: nirvīryaḥ iti manyante nūnam mām tridaśa īśvarāḥ

original: 3.060.039a māṃ prāpya hi guṇo doṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ paśya lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: mām prāpya hi guṇaḥ doṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ paśya lakṣmaṇa
adya eva sarva bhūtānām rakṣasām abhavāya ca
saṃhṛtya eva śaśi jyotsnām mahān sūryaḥ iva uditaḥ

original: 3.060.040a naiva yakṣā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: na eva yakṣāḥ na gandharvāḥ na piśācāḥ na rākṣasāḥ

original: 3.060.040c kiṃnarā vā manuṣyā vā sukhaṃ prāpsyanti lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: kiṃnarāḥ vā manuṣyāḥ vā sukham prāpsyanti lakṣmaṇa
mama astra bāṇa saṃpūrṇam ākāśam paśya lakṣmaṇa
niḥsaṃpātam kariṣyāmi hi adya trailokya cāriṇām
saṃniruddha graha gaṇam āvārita niśākaram
vipranaṣṭa anala marut bhāskara dyuti saṃvṛtam
vinirmathita śaila agram śuṣyamāṇa jalāśayam
dhvasta druma latā gulmam vipraṇāśita sāgaram

original: 3.060.044a na tāṃ kuśalinīṃ sītāṃ pradāsyanti mameśvarāḥ
analyzed: na tām kuśalinīm sītām pradāsyanti mama īśvarāḥ

original: 3.060.044c asmin muhūrte saumitre mama drakṣyanti vikramam
analyzed: asmin muhūrte saumitre mama drakṣyanti vikramam
na ākāśam utpatiṣyanti sarva bhūtāni lakṣmaṇa
mama cāpa guṇān muktaiḥ bāṇa jālaiḥ nirantaram
arditam mama nārācaiḥ dhvasta bhrānta mṛga dvijam
samākulam amaryādam jagat paśya adya lakṣmaṇa
ākarṇapūrṇaiḥ iṣubhiḥ jīva lokam durāvaraiḥ
kariṣye maithilī hetoḥ apiśācam arākṣasam
mama roṣa prayuktānām sāyakānām balam surāḥ
drakṣyanti adya vimuktānām amarṣāt dūra gāminām

original: 3.060.049a naiva devā na daiteyā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: na eva devāḥ na daiteyāḥ na piśācāḥ na rākṣasāḥ
bhaviṣyanti mama krodhāt trailokye vipraṇāśite
deva dānava yakṣāṇām lokāḥ ye rakṣasām api
bahudhā nipatiṣyanti bāṇa oghaiḥ śakulīkṛtāḥ

original: 3.060.050e nirmaryādān imāṃl lokān kariṣyāmy adya sāyakaiḥ
analyzed: nirmaryādān imān lokān kariṣyāmi adya sāyakaiḥ

original: 3.060.051a yathā jarā yathā mṛtyur yathākālo yathāvidhiḥ
analyzed: yathā jarā yathā mṛtyuḥ yathā kālaḥ yathā vidhiḥ
nityam na pratihanyante sarva bhūteṣu lakṣmaṇa
tathā aham krodha saṃyuktaḥ na nivāryaḥ smi asaṃśayam
purā iva me cārudatīm aninditām
diśanti sītām yadi na adya maithilīm
sa deva gandharva manuṣya pannagam
jagat sa śailam parivartayāmi aham
tapyamānam tathā rāmam sītā āharaṇa karśitam
lokānām abhave yuktam sāmvartakam iva analam

original: 3.061.002a vīkṣamāṇaṃ dhanuḥ sajyaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: vīkṣamāṇam dhanuḥ sajyam niḥśvasantam muhur muhur

original: 3.061.002c hantukāmaṃ paśuṃ rudraṃ kruddhaṃ dakṣakratau yathā
analyzed: hantu kāmam paśum rudram kruddham dakṣa kratau yathā

original: 3.061.003a adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ saṃkruddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: a dṛṣṭa pūrvam saṃkruddham dṛṣṭvā rāmam sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
abravīt prāñjaliḥ vākyam mukhena pariśuṣyatā

original: 3.061.004a purā bhūtvā mṛdur dāntaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ
analyzed: purā bhūtvā mṛduḥ dāntaḥ sarva bhūta hite rataḥ

original: 3.061.004c na krodhavaśam āpannaḥ prakṛtiṃ hātum arhasi
analyzed: na krodha vaśam āpannaḥ prakṛtim hātum arhasi

original: 3.061.005a candre lakṣṇīḥ prabhā sūrye gatir vāyau bhuvi kṣamā
analyzed: candre lakṣṇīḥ prabhā sūrye gatiḥ vāyau bhuvi kṣamā

original: 3.061.005c etac ca niyataṃ sarvaṃ tvayi cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ
analyzed: etat ca niyatam sarvam tvayi ca anuttamam yaśaḥ

original: 3.061.006a na tu jānāmi kasyāyaṃ bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
analyzed: na tu jānāmi kasya ayam bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmikaḥ rathaḥ

original: 3.061.006c kena vā kasya vā hetoḥ sāyudhaḥ saparicchadaḥ
analyzed: kena vā kasya vā hetoḥ sa āyudhaḥ sa paricchadaḥ
khura nemi kṣataḥ ca ayam siktaḥ rudhira bindubhiḥ
deśaḥ nivṛtta saṃgrāmaḥ su ghoraḥ pārthiva ātmaja

original: 3.061.008a ekasya tu vimardo 'yaṃ na dvayor vadatāṃ vara
analyzed: ekasya tu vimardaḥ yam na dvayoḥ vadatām vara

original: 3.061.008c na hi vṛttaṃ hi paśyāmi balasya mahataḥ padam
analyzed: na hi vṛttam hi paśyāmi balasya mahataḥ padam

original: 3.061.009a naikasya tu kṛte lokān vināśayitum arhasi
analyzed: na ekasya tu kṛte lokān vināśayitum arhasi
yukta daṇḍāḥ hi mṛdavaḥ praśāntāḥ vasudhā adhipāḥ

original: 3.061.010a sadā tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śaraṇyaḥ paramā gatiḥ
analyzed: sadā tvam sarva bhūtānām śaraṇyaḥ paramā gatiḥ

original: 3.061.010c ko nu dārapraṇāśaṃ te sādhu manyeta rāghava
analyzed: kaḥ nu dāra praṇāśam te sādhu manyeta rāghava
saritaḥ sāgarāḥ śailāḥ deva gandharva dānavāḥ

original: 3.061.011c nālaṃ te vipriyaṃ kartuṃ dīkṣitasyeva sādhavaḥ
analyzed: na alam te vipriyam kartum dīkṣitasya iva sādhavaḥ

original: 3.061.012a yena rājan hṛtā sītā tam anveṣitum arhasi
analyzed: yena rājan hṛtā sītā tam anveṣitum arhasi
mad dvitīyaḥ dhanuṣpāṇiḥ sahāyaiḥ parama ṛṣibhiḥ

original: 3.061.013a samudraṃ ca viceṣyāmaḥ parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
analyzed: samudram ca viceṣyāmaḥ parvatān ca vanāni ca

original: 3.061.013c guhāś ca vividhā ghorā nalinīḥ pārvatīś ca ha
analyzed: guhāḥ ca vividhāḥ ghorāḥ nalinīḥ pārvatīḥ ca ha
deva gandharva lokān ca viceṣyāmaḥ samāhitāḥ
yāvat na adhigamiṣyāmaḥ tava bhāryā apahāriṇam

original: 3.061.015a na cet sāmnā pradāsyanti patnīṃ te tridaśeśvarāḥ
analyzed: na ced sāmnā pradāsyanti patnīm te tridaśa īśvarāḥ
kosala indra tatas paścāt prāpta kālam kariṣyasi
śīlena sāmnā vinayena sītām
nayena na prāpsyasi ced narendra
tatas samutsādaya hema puṅkhaiḥ
mahā indra vajra pratimaiḥ śara oghaiḥ
tam tathā śoka saṃtaptam vilapantam anātha vat
mohena mahatā āviṣṭam paridyūnam acetanam

original: 3.062.002a tataḥ saumitrir āśvāsya muhūrtād iva lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas saumitriḥ āśvāsya muhūrtāt iva lakṣmaṇaḥ
rāmam saṃbodhayām āsa caraṇau ca abhipīḍayan

original: 3.062.003a mahatā tapasā rāma mahatā cāpi karmaṇā
analyzed: mahatā tapasā rāma mahatā ca api karmaṇā
rājñā daśarathena āsīt labdhaḥ mṛtam iva amaraiḥ

original: 3.062.004a tava caiva guṇair baddhas tvadviyogān mahīpatiḥ
analyzed: tava ca eva guṇaiḥ baddhaḥ tvad viyogāt mahīpatiḥ

original: 3.062.004c rājā devatvam āpanno bharatasya yathā śrutam
analyzed: rājā deva tvam āpannaḥ bharatasya yathā śrutam

original: 3.062.005a yadi duḥkham idaṃ prāptaṃ kākutstha na sahiṣyase
analyzed: yadi duḥkham idam prāptam kākutstha na sahiṣyase

original: 3.062.005c prākṛtaś cālpasattvaś ca itaraḥ kaḥ sahiṣyati
analyzed: prākṛtaḥ ca alpa sattvaḥ ca itaraḥ kaḥ sahiṣyati

original: 3.062.006a duḥkhito hi bhavāṃl lokāṃs tejasā yadi dhakṣyate
analyzed: duḥkhitaḥ hi bhavān lokān tejasā yadi dhakṣyate

original: 3.062.006c ārtāḥ prajā naravyāghra kva nu yāsyanti nirvṛtim
analyzed: ārtāḥ prajāḥ nara vyāghra kva nu yāsyanti nirvṛtim
loka svabhāvaḥ eva eṣa yayātiḥ nahuṣātmajaḥ

original: 3.062.007c gataḥ śakreṇa sālokyam anayas taṃ samaspṛśat
analyzed: gataḥ śakreṇa sālokyam anayaḥ tam samaspṛśat

original: 3.062.008a maharṣayo vasiṣṭhas tu yaḥ pitur naḥ purohitaḥ
analyzed: mahā ṛṣayaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ tu yaḥ pituḥ naḥ purohitaḥ

original: 3.062.008c ahnā putraśataṃ jajñe tathaivāsya punar hatam
analyzed: ahnā putra śatam jajñe tathā eva asya punar hatam

original: 3.062.009a yā ceyaṃ jagato mātā devī lokanamaskṛtā
analyzed: yā ca iyam jagataḥ mātā devī loka namaskṛtā

original: 3.062.009c asyāś ca calanaṃ bhūmer dṛśyate satyasaṃśrava
analyzed: asyāḥ ca calanam bhūmeḥ dṛśyate satya saṃśrava

original: 3.062.010a yau cemau jagatāṃ netre yatra sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
analyzed: yau ca imau jagatām netre yatra sarvam pratiṣṭhitam
āditya candrau grahaṇam abhyupetau mahā balau

original: 3.062.011a sumahānty api bhūtāni devāś ca puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: su mahānti api bhūtāni devāḥ ca puruṣa ṛṣabha
na daivasya pramuñcanti sarva bhūtāni dehinaḥ
śakra ādiṣu api deveṣu vartamānau naya anayau

original: 3.062.012c śrūyete naraśārdūla na tvaṃ vyathitum arhasi
analyzed: śrūyete nara śārdūla na tvam vyathitum arhasi

original: 3.062.013a naṣṭāyām api vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api cānagha
analyzed: naṣṭāyām api vaidehyām hṛtāyām api ca anagha

original: 3.062.013c śocituṃ nārhase vīra yathānyaḥ prākṛtas tathā
analyzed: śocitum nā arhase vīra yathā anyaḥ prākṛtaḥ tathā

original: 3.062.014a tvadvidhā hi na śocanti satataṃ satyadarśinaḥ
analyzed: tvadvidhāḥ hi na śocanti satatam satya darśinaḥ
su mahatsu api kṛcchreṣu rāma anirviṇṇa darśaṇāḥ
tattvataḥ hi nara śreṣṭha buddhyā samanucintaya
buddhyā yuktāḥ mahā prājñāḥ vijānanti śubha aśubhe
adṛṣṭa guṇa doṣāṇām adhṛtānām ca karmaṇām

original: 3.062.016c nāntareṇa kriyāṃ teṣāṃ phalam iṣṭaṃ pravartate
analyzed: na antareṇa kriyām teṣām phalam iṣṭam pravartate

original: 3.062.017a mām eva hi purā vīra tvam eva bahuṣo 'nvaśāḥ
analyzed: mām eva hi purā vīra tvam eva bahuṣaḥ nvaśāḥ

original: 3.062.017c anuśiṣyād dhi ko nu tvām api sākṣād bṛhaspatiḥ
analyzed: anuśiṣyāt hi kaḥ nu tvām api sākṣāt bṛhaspatiḥ

original: 3.062.018a buddhiś ca te mahāprājña devair api duranvayā
analyzed: buddhiḥ ca te mahā prājña devaiḥ api duranvayā
śokena abhiprasuptam te jñānam saṃbodhayāmi aham

original: 3.062.019a divyaṃ ca mānuṣaṃ caivam ātmanaś ca parākramam
analyzed: divyam ca mānuṣam ca evam ātmanaḥ ca parākramam
ikṣvāku vṛṣabha avekṣya yatasva dviṣatām badhe
kim te sarva vināśena kṛtena puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 3.062.020c tam eva tu ripuṃ pāpaṃ vijñāyoddhartum arhasi
analyzed: tam eva tu ripum pāpam vijñāya uddhartum arhasi
pūrvajaḥ pi ukta mātraḥ tu lakṣmaṇena subhāṣitam
sāra grāhī mahā sāram pratijagrāha rāghavaḥ
saṃnigṛhya mahā bāhuḥ pravṛddham kopam ātmanaḥ

original: 3.063.002c avaṣṭabhya dhanuś citraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
analyzed: avaṣṭabhya dhanuḥ citram rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇam abravīt

original: 3.063.003a kiṃ kariṣyāvahe vatsa kva vā gacchāva lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: kim kariṣyāvahe vatsa kva vā gacchāva lakṣmaṇa
kena upāyena paśyeyam sītām iti vicintaya

original: 3.063.004a taṃ tathā paritāpārtaṃ lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
analyzed: tam tathā paritāpa ārtam lakṣmaṇaḥ rāmam abravīt

original: 3.063.004c idam eva janasthānaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi
analyzed: idam eva janasthānam tvam anveṣitum arhasi
rākṣasaiḥ bahubhiḥ kīrṇam nānā druma latā yutam
santi iha giri durgāṇi nirdarāḥ kandarāṇi ca
guhāḥ ca vividhāḥ ghorāḥ nānā mṛga gaṇa ākulāḥ
āvāsāḥ kiṃnarāṇām ca gandharva bhavanāni ca

original: 3.063.007a tāni yukto mayā sārdhaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi
analyzed: tāni yuktaḥ mayā sārdham tvam anveṣitum arhasi
tvadvidhaḥ buddhi saṃpannāḥ māhātmānaḥ nara ṛṣabha
āpatsu na prakampante vāyu vegaiḥ iva acalāḥ

original: 3.063.008c ity uktas tad vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicacāra salakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ tat vanam sarvam vicacāra sa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 3.063.009a kruddho rāmaḥ śaraṃ ghoraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram
analyzed: kruddhaḥ rāmaḥ śaram ghoram saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram
tatas parvata kūṭa ābham mahābhāgam dvijottamam
dadarśa patitam bhūmau kṣataja ārdram jaṭāyuṣam

original: 3.063.010c taṃ dṛṣṭvā giriśṛṅgābhaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā giri śṛṅga ābham rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇam abravīt

original: 3.063.010e anena sītā vaidehī bhakṣitā nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: anena sītā vaidehī bhakṣitā na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: 3.063.011a gṛdhrarūpam idaṃ vyaktaṃ rakṣo bhramati kānanam
analyzed: gṛdhra rūpam idam vyaktam rakṣaḥ bhramati kānanam
bhakṣayitvā viśāla akṣīm āste sītām yathāsukham

original: 3.063.011e enaṃ vadhiṣye dīptāgrair ghorair bāṇair ajihmagaiḥ
analyzed: enam vadhiṣye dīpta agraiḥ ghoraiḥ bāṇaiḥ a jihma gaiḥ

original: 3.063.012a ity uktvābhyapatad gṛdhraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram
analyzed: iti uktvā abhyapatat gṛdhram saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram

original: 3.063.012c kruddho rāmaḥ samudrāntāṃ cālayann iva medinīm
analyzed: kruddhaḥ rāmaḥ samudra antām cālayan iva medinīm

original: 3.063.013a taṃ dīnadīnayā vācā saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ vaman
analyzed: tam dīna dīnayā vācā sa phenam rudhiram vaman
abhyabhāṣata pakṣī tu rāmam daśaratha ātmajam
yām oṣadhim iva āyuṣman mahā vane

original: 3.063.014c sā devī mama ca prāṇā rāvaṇenobhayaṃ hṛtam
analyzed: sā devī mama ca prāṇāḥ rāvaṇena ubhayam hṛtam

original: 3.063.015a tvayā virahitā devī lakṣmaṇena ca rāghava
analyzed: tvayā virahitā devī lakṣmaṇena ca rāghava
hriyamāṇā mayā dṛṣṭā rāvaṇena balīyasā

original: 3.063.016a sītām abhyavapan no 'haṃ rāvaṇaś ca raṇe mayā
analyzed: sītām abhyavapat naḥ ham rāvaṇaḥ ca raṇe mayā
vidhvaṃsita ratha chatraḥ pātitaḥ dharaṇī tale

original: 3.063.017a etad asya dhanur bhagnam etad asya śarāvaram
analyzed: etat asya dhanuḥ bhagnam etat asya śarāvaram

original: 3.063.017c ayam asya raṇe rāma bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
analyzed: ayam asya raṇe rāma bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmikaḥ rathaḥ

original: 3.063.018a pariśrāntasya me pakṣau chittvā khaḍgena rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: pariśrāntasya me pakṣau chittvā khaḍgena rāvaṇaḥ
sītām ādāya vaidehīm utpapāta vihāyasam

original: 3.063.018e rakṣasā nihataṃ pūrvma na māṃ hantuṃ tvam arhasi
analyzed: rakṣasā nihatam pūrvma na mām hantum tvam arhasi

original: 3.063.019a rāmas tasya tu vijñāya sītāsaktāṃ priyāṃ kathām
analyzed: rāmaḥ tasya tu vijñāya sītā āsaktām priyām kathām
gṛdhra rājam pariṣvajya ruroda sahalakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 3.063.020a ekam ekāyane durge niḥśvasantaṃ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: ekam ekāyane durge niḥśvasantam katham cana

original: 3.063.020c samīkṣya duḥkhito rāmaḥ saumitrim idam abravīt
analyzed: samīkṣya duḥkhitaḥ rāmaḥ saumitrim idam abravīt

original: 3.063.021a rājyād bhraṃśo vane vāsaḥ sītā naṣṭā hato dvijaḥ
analyzed: rājyāt bhraṃśaḥ vane vāsaḥ sītā naṣṭā hataḥ dvijaḥ
īdṛśī iyam mama alakṣmīḥ nirdahet api pāvakam

original: 3.063.022a saṃpūrṇam api ced adya pratareyaṃ mahodadhim
analyzed: saṃpūrṇam api ced adya pratareyam mahā udadhim

original: 3.063.022c so 'pi nūnaṃ mamālakṣmyā viśuṣyet saritāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: saḥ nūnam mama alakṣmyāḥ viśuṣyet saritām patiḥ
na asti abhāgyataraḥ loke mattaḥ smin sacarācare
yena iyam mahatī prāptā mayā vyasana vāgurā
ayam pitṛ vayasyaḥ me gṛdhra rājaḥ jarā anvitaḥ
śete vinihataḥ bhūmau mama bhāgya viparyayāt

original: 3.063.025a ity evam uktvā bahuśo rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: iti evam uktvā bahuśas rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
jaṭāyuṣam ca pasparśa pitṛ sneham nidarśayan
nikṛtta pakṣam rudhira avasiktam
tam gṛdhra rājam parirabhya rāmaḥ
kva maithili prāṇa samā mama iti
vimucya vācam nipapāta bhūmau

original: 3.064.001a rāmaḥ prekṣya tu taṃ gṛdhraṃ bhuvi raudreṇa pātitam
analyzed: rāmaḥ prekṣya tu tam gṛdhram bhuvi raudreṇa pātitam
saumitrim mitra saṃpannam idam vacanam abravīt
mama ayam nūnam artheṣu yatamānaḥ vihaṃgamaḥ

original: 3.064.002c rākṣasena hataḥ saṃkhye prāṇāṃs tyajati dustyajān
analyzed: rākṣasena hataḥ saṃkhye prāṇān tyajati dustyajān

original: 3.064.003a ayam asya śarīre 'smin prāṇo lakṣmaṇa vidyate
analyzed: ayam asya śarīre smin prāṇaḥ lakṣmaṇa vidyate
tathā svara vihīnaḥ yam viklavam samudīkṣate

original: 3.064.004a jaṭāyo yadi śaknoṣi vākyaṃ vyāharituṃ punaḥ
analyzed: jaṭāyo yadi śaknoṣi vākyam vyāharitum punar

original: 3.064.004c sītām ākhyāhi bhadraṃ te vadham ākhyāhi cātmanaḥ
analyzed: sītām ākhyāhi bhadram te vadham ākhyāhi ca ātmanaḥ

original: 3.064.005a kiṃnimitto 'harat sītāṃ rāvaṇas tasya kiṃ mayā
analyzed: kiṃnimittaḥ harat sītām rāvaṇaḥ tasya kim mayā

original: 3.064.005c aparāddhaṃ tu yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇena hṛtā priyā
analyzed: aparāddham tu yam dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇena hṛtā priyā

original: 3.064.006a kathaṃ tac candrasaṃkāśaṃ mukham āsīn manoharam
analyzed: katham tat candra saṃkāśam mukham āsīt manoharam

original: 3.064.006c sītayā kāni coktāni tasmin kāle dvijottama
analyzed: sītayā kāni ca uktāni tasmin kāle dvijottama

original: 3.064.007a kathaṃvīryaḥ kathaṃrūpaḥ kiṃkarmā sa ca rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: kathaṃvīryaḥ kathaṃrūpaḥ kiṃkarmā sa ca rākṣasaḥ

original: 3.064.007c kva cāsya bhavanaṃ tāta brūhi me paripṛcchataḥ
analyzed: kva ca asya bhavanam tāta brūhi me paripṛcchataḥ
tam udvīkṣya atha dīna ātmā vilapantam anantaram
vācā atisannayā rāmam jaṭāyuḥ idam abravīt
sā hṛtā rākṣasa indreṇa rāvaṇena vihāyasā
māyām āsthāya vipulām vāta durdina saṃkulām

original: 3.064.010a pariśrāntasya me tāta pakṣau chittvā niśācaraḥ
analyzed: pariśrāntasya me tāta pakṣau chittvā niśācaraḥ

original: 3.064.010c sītām ādāya vaidehīṃ prayāto dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ
analyzed: sītām ādāya vaidehīm prayātaḥ dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ

original: 3.064.011a uparudhyanti me prāṇā dṛṣṭir bhramati rāghava
analyzed: uparudhyanti me prāṇāḥ dṛṣṭiḥ bhramati rāghava
paśyāmi vṛkṣān sauvarṇān uśīra kṛta mūrdhajān

original: 3.064.012a yena yāti muhūrtena sītām ādāya rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: yena yāti muhūrtena sītām ādāya rāvaṇaḥ
vipranaṣṭam dhanam kṣipram tat svāmī pratipadyate

original: 3.064.013a vindo nāma muhūrto 'sau sa ca kākutstha nābudhat
analyzed: vindaḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ sau sa ca kākutstha na abudhat

original: 3.064.013c jhaṣavad baḍiśaṃ gṛhya kṣipram eva vinaśyati
analyzed: jhaṣa vat baḍiśam gṛhya kṣipram eva vinaśyati

original: 3.064.014a na ca tvayā vyathā kāryā janakasya sutāṃ prati
analyzed: na ca tvayā vyathā kāryā janakasya sutām prati

original: 3.064.014c vaidehyā raṃsyase kṣipraṃ hatvā taṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇe
analyzed: vaidehyā raṃsyase kṣipram hatvā tam rākṣasam raṇe
asaṃmūḍhasya gṛdhrasya rāmam pratyanubhāṣataḥ
āsyāt susrāva rudhiram mriyamāṇasya sa āmiṣam

original: 3.064.016a putro viśravasaḥ sākṣād bhrātā vaiśravaṇasya ca
analyzed: putraḥ viśravasaḥ sākṣāt bhrātā vaiśravaṇasya ca

original: 3.064.016c ity uktvā durlabhān prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā durlabhān prāṇān mumoca pataga īśvaraḥ
brūhi brūhi iti rāmasya bruvāṇasya kṛta añjaleḥ

original: 3.064.017c tyaktvā śarīraṃ gṛdhrasya jagmuḥ prāṇā vihāyasaṃ
analyzed: tyaktvā śarīram gṛdhrasya jagmuḥ prāṇāḥ vihāyasam

original: 3.064.018a sa nikṣipya śiro bhūmau prasārya caraṇau tadā
analyzed: sa nikṣipya śiraḥ bhūmau prasārya caraṇau tadā

original: 3.064.018c vikṣipya ca śarīraṃ svaṃ papāta dharaṇītale
analyzed: vikṣipya ca śarīram svam papāta dharaṇī tale

original: 3.064.019a taṃ gṛdhraṃ prekṣya tāmrākṣaṃ gatāsum acalopamam
analyzed: tam gṛdhram prekṣya tāmra akṣam gatāsum acala upamam

original: 3.064.019c rāmaḥ subahubhir duḥkhair dīnaḥ saumitrim abravīt
analyzed: rāmaḥ su bahubhiḥ duḥkhaiḥ dīnaḥ saumitrim abravīt

original: 3.064.020a bahūni rakṣasāṃ vāse varṣāṇi vasatā sukham
analyzed: bahūni rakṣasām vāse varṣāṇi vasata sukham
anena daṇḍaka araṇye vicīrṇam iha pakṣiṇā
aneka vārṣikaḥ yaḥ tu cira kālam samutthitaḥ

original: 3.064.021c so 'yam adya hataḥ śete kālo hi duratikramaḥ
analyzed: saḥ yam adya hataḥ śete kālaḥ hi duratikramaḥ

original: 3.064.022a paśya lakṣmaṇa gṛdhro 'yam upakārī hataś ca me
analyzed: paśya lakṣmaṇa gṛdhraḥ yam upakārī hataḥ ca me

original: 3.064.022c sītām abhyavapan no vai rāvaṇena balīyasā
analyzed: sītām abhyavapat na u vai rāvaṇena balīyasā
gṛdhra rājyam parityajya pitṛpaitāmaham mahat

original: 3.064.023c mama hetor ayaṃ prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ
analyzed: mama hetoḥ ayam prāṇān mumoca pataga īśvaraḥ
sarvatra khalu dṛśyante sādhavaḥ dharma cāriṇaḥ
śūrāḥ śaraṇyāḥ saumitre tiryagyoni gateṣu api

original: 3.064.025a sītāharaṇajaṃ duḥkhaṃ na me saumya tathāgatam
analyzed: sītā āharaṇa jam duḥkham na me saumya tathāgatam

original: 3.064.025c yathā vināśo gṛdhrasya matkṛte ca paraṃtapa
analyzed: yathā vināśaḥ gṛdhrasya mad kṛte ca paraṃtapa

original: 3.064.026a rājā daśarathaḥ śrīmān yathā mama mayā yaśāḥ
analyzed: rājā daśarathaḥ śrīmān yathā mama mayā yaśāḥ

original: 3.064.026c pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca tathāyaṃ patageśvaraḥ
analyzed: pūjanīyaḥ ca mānyaḥ ca tathā ayam pataga īśvaraḥ
saumitre hara kāṣṭhāni nirmathiṣyāmi pāvakam
gṛdhra rājam didhakṣāmi mad kṛte nidhanam gatam
nātham pataga lokasya citām āropayāmi aham

original: 3.064.028c imaṃ dhakṣyāmi saumitre hataṃ raudreṇa rakṣasā
analyzed: imam dhakṣyāmi saumitre hatam raudreṇa rakṣasā

original: 3.064.029a yā gatir yajñaśīlānām āhitāgneś ca yā gatiḥ
analyzed: yā gatiḥ yajña śīlānām āhitāgneḥ ca yā gatiḥ

original: 3.064.029c aparāvartināṃ yā ca yā ca bhūmipradāyinām
analyzed: apara āvartinām yā ca yā ca bhūmi pradāyinām

original: 3.064.030a mayā tvaṃ samanujñāto gaccha lokān anuttamān
analyzed: mayā tvam samanujñātaḥ gaccha lokān anuttamān

original: 3.064.030c gṛdhrarāja mahāsattva saṃskṛtaś ca mayā vraja
analyzed: gṛdhra rāja mahā sattva saṃskṛtaḥ ca mayā vraja

original: 3.064.031a evam uktvā citāṃ dīptām āropya patageśvaram
analyzed: evam uktvā citām dīptām āropya pataga īśvaram

original: 3.064.031c dadāha rāmo dharmātmā svabandhum iva duḥkhitaḥ
analyzed: dadāha rāmaḥ dharma ātmā sva bandhum iva duḥkhitaḥ

original: 3.064.032a rāmo 'tha sahasaumitrir vanaṃ yātvā sa vīryavān
analyzed: sahasaumitriḥ vanam yātvā sa vīryavān

original: 3.064.032c sthūlān hatvā mahārohīn anu tastāra taṃ dvijam
analyzed: sthūlān hatvā mahārohīn anu tastāra tam dvijam
rohi māṃsāni ca uddhṛtya peśīkṛtvā mahā yaśāḥ
śakunāya dadau rāmaḥ ramye harita śādvale

original: 3.064.034a yat tat pretasya martyasya kathayanti dvijātayaḥ
analyzed: yat tat pretasya martyasya kathayanti dvijātayaḥ

original: 3.064.034c tat svargagamanaṃ tasya kṣipraṃ rāmo jajāpa ha
analyzed: tat svarga gamanam tasya kṣipram rāmaḥ jajāpa ha
tatas godāvarīm gatvā nadīm nara vara ātmajau

original: 3.064.035c udakaṃ cakratus tasmai gṛdhrarājāya tāv ubhau
analyzed: udakam cakratuḥ tasmai gṛdhra rājāya tau ubhau
sa gṛdhra rājaḥ kṛtavān yaśaskaram
su duṣkaram karma raṇe nipātitaḥ
mahā ṛṣi kalpena ca saṃskṛtaḥ tadā
jagāma puṇyām gatim ātmanaḥ śubhām

original: 3.065.001a kṛtvaivam udakaṃ tasmai prasthitau rāghavau tadā
analyzed: kṛtvā evam udakam tasmai prasthitau rāghavau tadā

original: 3.065.001c avekṣantau vane sītāṃ paścimāṃ jagmatur diśam
analyzed: avekṣantau vane sītām paścimām jagmatuḥ diśam
tām diśam dakṣiṇām gatvā śara cāpa asi dhāriṇau
a viprahatam aikṣvākau panthānam pratipedatuḥ

original: 3.065.003a gulmair vṛkṣaiś ca bahubhir latābhiś ca praveṣṭitam
analyzed: gulmaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ ca bahubhiḥ latābhiḥ ca praveṣṭitam
āvṛtam sarvatas durgam gahanam ghora darśanam

original: 3.065.004a vyatikramya tu vegena gṛhītvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
analyzed: vyatikramya tu vegena gṛhītvā dakṣiṇām diśam
su bhīmam tat mahā araṇyam vyatiyātau mahā balau

original: 3.065.005a tataḥ paraṃ janasthānāt trikrośaṃ gamya rāghavau
analyzed: tatas param janasthānāt tri krośam gamya rāghavau
krauñcāraṇyam viviśatuḥ gahanam tau mahā ojasau
nānā megha ghana prakhyam prahṛṣṭam iva sarvatas
nānā varṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ mṛga pakṣi gaṇaiḥ yutam

original: 3.065.007a didṛkṣamāṇau vaidehīṃ tad vanaṃ tau vicikyatuḥ
analyzed: didṛkṣamāṇau vaidehīm tat vanam tau vicikyatuḥ
tatra tatra avatiṣṭhantau sītā āharaṇa karśitau

original: 3.065.008a lakṣmaṇas tu mahātejāḥ sattvavāñ śīlavāñ śuciḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ tu mahā tejāḥ sattvavān śīlavān śuciḥ
abravīt prāñjaliḥ vākyam bhrātaram dīpta tejasam

original: 3.065.009a spandate me dṛḍhaṃ bāhur udvignam iva me manaḥ
analyzed: spandate me dṛḍham bāhuḥ udvignam iva me manaḥ
prāyaśas ca api aniṣṭāni nimittāni upalakṣaye

original: 3.065.010a tasmāt sajjībhavārya tvaṃ kuruṣva vacanaṃ hitam
analyzed: tasmāt sajjībhava ārya tvam kuruṣva vacanam hitam

original: 3.065.010c mamaiva hi nimittāni sadyaḥ śaṃsanti saṃbhramam
analyzed: mama eva hi nimittāni sadyas śaṃsanti saṃbhramam
eṣa vañculakaḥ nāma pakṣī parama dāruṇaḥ

original: 3.065.011c āvayor vijayaṃ yuddhe śaṃsann iva vinardati
analyzed: āvayoḥ vijayam yuddhe śaṃsan iva vinardati

original: 3.065.012a tayor anveṣator evaṃ sarvaṃ tad vanam ojasā
analyzed: tayoḥ anveṣatoḥ evam sarvam tat vanam ojasā

original: 3.065.012c saṃjajñe vipulaḥ śabdaḥ prabhañjann iva tad vanam
analyzed: saṃjajñe vipulaḥ śabdaḥ prabhañjan iva tat vanam
saṃveṣṭitam iva atyartham gahanam mātariśvanā

original: 3.065.013c vanasya tasya śabdo 'bhūd divam āpūrayann iva
analyzed: vanasya tasya śabdaḥ bhūt divam āpūrayan iva

original: 3.065.014a taṃ śabdaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇas tu rāmaḥ kakṣe sahānujaḥ
analyzed: tam śabdam kāṅkṣamāṇaḥ tu rāmaḥ kakṣe sahānujaḥ
dadarśa su mahā kāyam rākṣasam vipula urasam

original: 3.065.015a āsedatus tatas tatra tāv ubhau pramukhe sthitam
analyzed: āsedatuḥ tatas tatra tau ubhau pramukhe sthitam
vivṛddham aśiraḥ grīvam kabandham udare mukham
romabhiḥ nicitaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ mahā girim iva ucchritam
nīla megha nibham raudram megha stanita niḥsvanam
mahā pakṣmeṇa piṅgena vipulena āyatena ca
ekena urasi ghoreṇa nayanena āśu darśinā
mahā daṃṣṭra upapannam tam lelihānam mahā mukham
bhakṣayantam mahā ghorān ṛkṣa siṃha mṛga dvipān

original: 3.065.019a ghorau bhujau vikurvāṇam ubhau yojanam āyatau
analyzed: ghorau bhujau vikurvāṇam ubhau yojanam āyatau

original: 3.065.019c karābhyāṃ vividhān gṛhya ṛṣkān pakṣigaṇān mṛgān
analyzed: karābhyām vividhān gṛhya ṛṣkān pakṣi gaṇān mṛgān
ākarṣantam vikarṣantam anekān mṛga yūthapān

original: 3.065.020c sthitam āvṛtya panthānaṃ tayor bhrātroḥ prapannayoḥ
analyzed: sthitam āvṛtya panthānam tayoḥ bhrātroḥ prapannayoḥ
atha tau samatikramya krośa mātre dadarśatuḥ
mahāntam dāruṇam bhīmam kabandham bhuja saṃvṛtam

original: 3.065.022a sa mahābāhur atyarthaṃ prasārya vipulau bhujau
analyzed: sa mahā bāhuḥ atyartham prasārya vipulau bhujau

original: 3.065.022c jagrāha sahitāv eva rāghavau pīḍayan balāt
analyzed: jagrāha sahitau eva rāghavau pīḍayan balāt
khaḍginau dṛḍha dhanvānau tigma tejau mahā bhujau
bhrātarau vivaśam prāptau kṛṣyamāṇau mahā balau
tau uvāca mahā bāhuḥ kabandhaḥ dānava uttamaḥ
kau yuvām vṛṣabha skandhau mahā khaḍga dhanuḥ dharau

original: 3.065.025a ghoraṃ deśam imaṃ prāptau mama bhakṣāv upasthitau
analyzed: ghoram deśam imam prāptau mama bhakṣau upasthitau

original: 3.065.025c vadataṃ kāryam iha vāṃ kimarthaṃ cāgatau yuvām
analyzed: vadatam kāryam iha vām kimartham ca āgatau yuvām
imam deśam anuprāptau kṣudhā ārtasya iha tiṣṭhataḥ
sa bāṇa cāpa khaḍgau ca tīkṣṇa śṛṅgau iva ṛṣabhau
mama āsyam anusaṃprāptau durlabham jīvitam punar
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā kabandhasya durātmanaḥ
uvāca lakṣmaṇam rāmaḥ mukhena pariśuṣyatā
kṛcchrāt kṛcchrataram prāpya dāruṇam satya vikrama

original: 3.065.028c vyasanaṃ jīvitāntāya prāptam aprāpya tāṃ priyām
analyzed: vyasanam jīvita antāya prāptam a prāpya tām priyām
kālasya su mahat vīryam sarva bhūteṣu lakṣmaṇa

original: 3.065.029c tvāṃ ca māṃ ca naravyāghra vyasanaiḥ paśya mohitau
analyzed: tvām ca mām ca nara vyāghra vyasanaiḥ paśya mohitau
na atibhāraḥ sti daivasya sarva bhuteṣu lakṣmaṇa

original: 3.065.030a śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrāś ca raṇājire
analyzed: śūrāḥ ca balavantaḥ ca kṛtāstrāḥ ca raṇa ajire
kāla abhipannāḥ sīdanti yathā vāluka setavaḥ
iti bruvāṇaḥ dṛḍha satya vikramaḥ
mahā yaśāḥ dāśarathiḥ pratāpavān
avekṣya saumitrim udagra vikramam
sthirām tadā svām matim ātmanā akarot

original: 3.066.001a tau tu tatra sthitau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: tau tu tatra sthitau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau
bāhu pāśa parikṣiptau kabandhaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 3.066.002a tiṣṭhataḥ kiṃ nu māṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣudhārtaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhau
analyzed: tiṣṭhataḥ kim nu mām dṛṣṭvā kṣudhā ārtam kṣatriya ṛṣabhau
