āhāra artham tu saṃdiṣṭau daivena gata cetasau

original: 3.066.003a tac chrutvā lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ prāptakālaṃ hitaṃ tadā
analyzed: tat śrutvā lakṣmaṇaḥ vākyam prāpta kālam hitam tadā
uvāca ārti samāpannaḥ vikrame kṛta niścayaḥ

original: 3.066.004a tvāṃ ca māṃ ca purā tūrṇam ādatte rākṣasādhamaḥ
analyzed: tvām ca mām ca purā tūrṇam ādatte rākṣasa adhamaḥ

original: 3.066.004c tasmād asibhyām asyāśu bāhū chindāvahe gurū
analyzed: tasmāt asibhyām asya āśu bāhū chindāvahe gurū

original: 3.066.005a tatas tau deśakālajñau khaḍgābhyām eva rāghavau
analyzed: tatas tau deśa kāla jñau khaḍgābhyām eva rāghavau
acchindatām su saṃhṛṣṭau bāhū tasya aṃsa deśayoḥ

original: 3.066.006a dakṣiṇo dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum asaktam asinā tataḥ
analyzed: dakṣiṇaḥ dakṣiṇam bāhum asaktam asinā tatas

original: 3.066.006c ciccheda rāmo vegena savyaṃ vīras tu lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: ciccheda rāmaḥ vegena savyam vīraḥ tu lakṣmaṇaḥ
sa papāta mahā bāhuḥ chinna bāhuḥ mahā svanaḥ

original: 3.066.007c khaṃ ca gāṃ ca diśaś caiva nādayañ jalado yathā
analyzed: kham ca gām ca diśaḥ ca eva nādayam jaladaḥ yathā
sa nikṛttau bhujau dṛṣṭvā śoṇita ogha pariplutaḥ

original: 3.066.008c dīnaḥ papraccha tau vīrau kau yuvām iti dānavaḥ
analyzed: dīnaḥ papraccha tau vīrau kau yuvām iti dānavaḥ
iti tasya bruvāṇasya lakṣmaṇaḥ śubha lakṣaṇaḥ
śaśaṃsa tasya kākutstham kabandhasya mahā balaḥ

original: 3.066.010a ayam ikṣvākudāyādo rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ
analyzed: ayam ikṣvāku dāyādaḥ rāmaḥ nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ

original: 3.066.010c asyaivāvarajaṃ viddhi bhrātaraṃ māṃ ca lakṣmaṇam
analyzed: asya eva avarajam viddhi bhrātaram mām ca lakṣmaṇam
asya deva prabhāvasya vasataḥ vijane vane
rakṣasā apahṛtā bhāryā yām icchantau iha āgatau

original: 3.066.012a tvaṃ tu ko vā kimarthaṃ vā kabandha sadṛśo vane
analyzed: tvam tu kaḥ vā kimartham vā kabandha sadṛśaḥ vane
āsyena urasi dīptena bhagna jaṅghaḥ viceṣṭase

original: 3.066.013a evam uktaḥ kabandhas tu lakṣmaṇenottaraṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ kabandhaḥ tu lakṣmaṇena uttaram vacaḥ
uvāca parama prītaḥ tat indra vacanam smaran

original: 3.066.014a svāgataṃ vāṃ naravyāghrau diṣṭyā paśyāmi cāpy aham
analyzed: svāgatam vām nara vyāghrau diṣṭyā paśyāmi ca api aham

original: 3.066.014c diṣṭyā cemau nikṛttau me yuvābhyāṃ bāhubandhanau
analyzed: diṣṭyā ca imau nikṛttau me yuvābhyām bāhu bandhanau

original: 3.066.015a virūpaṃ yac ca me rūpaṃ prāptaṃ hy avinayād yathā
analyzed: virūpam yat ca me rūpam prāptam hi avinayāt yathā

original: 3.066.015c tan me śṛṇu naravyāghra tattvataḥ śaṃsatas tava
analyzed: tat me śṛṇu nara vyāghra tattvataḥ śaṃsataḥ tava
purā rāma mahā bāho mahā bala parākrama

original: 3.067.001c rūpam āsīn mamācintyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
analyzed: rūpam āsīt mama acintyam triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam

original: 3.067.001e yathā somasya śakrasya sūryasya ca yathā vapuḥ
analyzed: yathā somasya śakrasya sūryasya ca yathā vapuḥ

original: 3.067.002a so 'haṃ rūpam idaṃ kṛtvā lokavitrāsanaṃ mahat
analyzed: saḥ ham rūpam idam kṛtvā loka vitrāsanam mahat

original: 3.067.002c ṛṣīn vanagatān rāma trāsayāmi tatas tataḥ
analyzed: ṛṣīn vana gatān rāma trāsayāmi tatas tatas

original: 3.067.003a tataḥ sthūlaśirā nāma maharṣiḥ kopito mayā
analyzed: tatas sthūlaśirāḥ nāma mahā ṛṣiḥ kopitaḥ mayā
saṃcinvan vividham vanyam rūpeṇa anena dharṣitaḥ
tena aham uktaḥ prekṣya evam ghora śāpa abhidhāyinā

original: 3.067.004c etad eva nṛśaṃsaṃ te rūpam astu vigarhitam
analyzed: etat eva nṛśaṃsam te rūpam astu vigarhitam

original: 3.067.005a sa mayā yācitaḥ kruddhaḥ śāpasyānto bhaved iti
analyzed: sa mayā yācitaḥ kruddhaḥ śāpasya antaḥ bhavet iti
abhiśāpa kṛtasya iti tena idam bhāṣitam vacaḥ

original: 3.067.006a yadā chittvā bhujau rāmas tvāṃ dahed vijane vane
analyzed: yadā chittvā bhujau rāmaḥ tvām dahet vijane vane

original: 3.067.006c tadā tvaṃ prāpsyase rūpaṃ svam eva vipulaṃ śubham
analyzed: tadā tvam prāpsyase rūpam svam eva vipulam śubham

original: 3.067.007a śriyā virājitaṃ putraṃ danos tvaṃ viddhi lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: śriyā virājitam putram danoḥ tvam viddhi lakṣmaṇa

original: 3.067.007c indrakopād idaṃ rūpaṃ prāptam evaṃ raṇājire
analyzed: indra kopāt idam rūpam prāptam evam raṇa ajire
aham hi tapasā ugreṇa pitāmaham atoṣayam

original: 3.067.008c dīrgham āyuḥ sa me prādāt tato māṃ vibhramo 'spṛśat
analyzed: dīrgham āyuḥ sa me prādāt tatas mām spṛśat

original: 3.067.009a dīrgham āyur mayā prāptaṃ kiṃ me śakraḥ kariṣyati
analyzed: dīrgham āyuḥ mayā prāptam kim me śakraḥ kariṣyati

original: 3.067.009c ity evaṃ buddhim āsthāya raṇe śakram adharṣayam
analyzed: iti evam buddhim āsthāya raṇe śakram adharṣayam
tasya bāhu pramuktena vajreṇa śata parvaṇā

original: 3.067.010c sakthinī ca śiraś caiva śarīre saṃpraveśitam
analyzed: sakthinī ca śiraḥ ca eva śarīre saṃpraveśitam

original: 3.067.011a sa mayā yācyamānaḥ sann ānayad yamasādanam
analyzed: sa mayā yācyamānaḥ san ānayat yama sādanam

original: 3.067.011c pitāmahavacaḥ satyaṃ tad astv iti mamābravīt
analyzed: pitāmaha vacaḥ satyam tat astu iti mama abravīt
anāhāraḥ katham śaktaḥ bhagna sakthi śiraḥ mukhaḥ
vajreṇa abhihataḥ kālam su dīrgham api jīvitum

original: 3.067.013a evam uktas tu me śakro bāhū yojanam āyatau
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu me śakraḥ bāhū yojanam āyatau

original: 3.067.013c prādād āsyaṃ ca me kukṣau tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭram akalpayat
analyzed: prādāt āsyam ca me kukṣau tīkṣṇa daṃṣṭram akalpayat
saḥ ham bhujābhyām dīrghābhyām samākṛṣya vanecarān
siṃha dvipa mṛga vyāghrān bhakṣayāmi samantataḥ

original: 3.067.015a sa tu mām abravīd indro yadā rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa tu mām abravīt indraḥ yadā rāmaḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 3.067.015c chetsyate samare bāhū tadā svargaṃ gamiṣyasi
analyzed: chetsyate samare bāhū tadā svargam gamiṣyasi

original: 3.067.016a sa tvaṃ rāmo 'si bhadraṃ te nāham anyena rāghava
analyzed: sa tvam bhadram te na aham anyena rāghava

original: 3.067.016c śakyo hantuṃ yathātattvam evam uktaṃ maharṣiṇā
analyzed: śakyaḥ hantum yathātattvam evam uktam mahā ṛṣiṇā
aham hi mati sācivyam kariṣyāmi nara ṛṣabha
mitram ca eva upadekṣyāmi yuvābhyām saṃskṛtaḥ agninā

original: 3.067.018a evam uktas tu dharmātmā danunā tena rāghavaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu dharma ātmā danunā tena rāghavaḥ
idam jagāda vacanam lakṣmaṇasya upaśṛṇvataḥ

original: 3.067.019a rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā mama bhāryā yaśasvinī
analyzed: rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā mama bhāryā yaśasvinī
niṣkrāntasya janasthānāt saha bhrātrā yathāsukham

original: 3.067.020a nāmamātraṃ tu jānāmi na rūpaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: nāma mātram tu jānāmi na rūpam tasya rakṣasaḥ

original: 3.067.020c nivāsaṃ vā prabhāvaṃ vā vayaṃ tasya na vidmahe
analyzed: nivāsam vā prabhāvam vā vayam tasya na vidmahe
śoka ārtānām anāthānām evam viparidhāvatām

original: 3.067.021c kāruṇyaṃ sadṛśaṃ kartum upakāre ca vartatām
analyzed: kāruṇyam sadṛśam kartum upakāre ca vartatām

original: 3.067.022a kāṣṭhāny ānīya śuṣkāṇi kāle bhagnāni kuñjaraiḥ
analyzed: kāṣṭhāni ānīya śuṣkāṇi kāle bhagnāni kuñjaraiḥ

original: 3.067.022c bhakṣyāmas tvāṃ vayaṃ vīra śvabhre mahati kalpite
analyzed: bhakṣyāmaḥ tvām vayam vīra śvabhre mahati kalpite

original: 3.067.023a sa tvaṃ sītāṃ samācakṣva yena vā yatra vā hṛtā
analyzed: sa tvam sītām samācakṣva yena vā yatra vā hṛtā

original: 3.067.023c kuru kalyāṇam atyarthaṃ yadi jānāsi tattvataḥ
analyzed: kuru kalyāṇam atyartham yadi jānāsi tattvataḥ

original: 3.067.024a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vākyaṃ danur anuttamam
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rāmeṇa vākyam danuḥ anuttamam

original: 3.067.024c provāca kuśalo vaktuṃ vaktāram api rāghavam
analyzed: provāca kuśalaḥ vaktum vaktāram api rāghavam

original: 3.067.025a divyam asti na me jñānaṃ nābhijānāmi maithilīm
analyzed: divyam asti na me jñānam na abhijānāmi maithilīm

original: 3.067.025c yas tāṃ jñāsyati taṃ vakṣye dagdhaḥ svaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tām jñāsyati tam vakṣye dagdhaḥ svam rūpam āsthitaḥ

original: 3.067.026a adagdhasya hi vijñātuṃ śaktir asti na me prabho
analyzed: adagdhasya hi vijñātum śaktiḥ asti na me prabho

original: 3.067.026c rākṣasaṃ taṃ mahāvīryaṃ sītā yena hṛtā tava
analyzed: rākṣasam tam mahā vīryam sītā yena hṛtā tava

original: 3.067.027a vijñānaṃ hi mahad bhraṣṭaṃ śāpadoṣeṇa rāghava
analyzed: vijñānam hi mahat bhraṣṭam śāpa doṣeṇa rāghava
sva kṛtena mayā prāptam rūpam loka vigarhitam

original: 3.067.028a kiṃ tu yāvan na yāty astaṃ savitā śrāntavāhanaḥ
analyzed: kim tu yāvat na yāti astam savitā śrānta vāhanaḥ

original: 3.067.028c tāvan mām avaṭe kṣiptvā daha rāma yathāvidhi
analyzed: tāvat mām avaṭe kṣiptvā daha rāma yathāvidhi
dagdhaḥ tvayā aham avaṭe nyāyena raghunandana

original: 3.067.029c vakṣyāmi tam ahaṃ vīra yas taṃ jñāsyati rākṣasaṃ
analyzed: vakṣyāmi tam aham vīra yaḥ tam jñāsyati rākṣasam

original: 3.067.030a tena sakhyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ nyāyyavṛttena rāghava
analyzed: tena sakhyam ca kartavyam nyāyya vṛttena rāghava
kalpayiṣyati te prītaḥ sāhāyyam laghu vikramaḥ

original: 3.067.031a na hi tasyāsty avijñātaṃ triṣu lokeṣu rāghava
analyzed: na hi tasya asti avijñātam triṣu lokeṣu rāghava

original: 3.067.031c sarvān parisṛto lokān purā vai kāraṇāntare
analyzed: sarvān parisṛtaḥ lokān purā vai kāraṇa antare

original: 3.068.001a evam uktau tu tau vīrau kabandhena nareśvarau
analyzed: evam uktau tu tau vīrau kabandhena nareśvarau
giri pradaram āsādya pāvakam visasarjatuḥ
lakṣmaṇaḥ tu mahā ulkābhiḥ jvalitābhiḥ samantataḥ

original: 3.068.002c citām ādīpayām āsa sā prajajvāla sarvataḥ
analyzed: citām ādīpayām āsa sā prajajvāla sarvatas
tat śarīram kabandhasya ghṛta piṇḍa upamam mahat
medasā pacyamānasya mandam dahati pāvaka

original: 3.068.004a sa vidhūya citām āśu vidhūmo 'gnir ivotthitaḥ
analyzed: sa vidhūya citām āśu vidhūmaḥ gniḥ iva utthitaḥ

original: 3.068.004c araje vāsasī vibhran mālāṃ divyāṃ mahābalaḥ
analyzed: araje vāsasī vibhran mālām divyām mahā balaḥ
tatas citāyāḥ vegena bhāsvaraḥ viraja ambaraḥ
utpapāta āśu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sarva pratyaṅga bhūṣaṇaḥ
vimāne bhāsvare tiṣṭhan haṃsa yukte yaśaskare

original: 3.068.006c prabhayā ca mahātejā diśo daśa virājayan
analyzed: prabhayā ca mahā tejāḥ diśaḥ daśa virājayan
saḥ ntarikṣa gataḥ rāmam kabandhaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 3.068.007c śṛṇu rāghava tattvena yathā sīmām avāpsyasi
analyzed: śṛṇu rāghava tattvena yathā sīmām avāpsyasi

original: 3.068.008a rāma ṣaḍ yuktayo loke yābhiḥ sarvaṃ vimṛśyate
analyzed: rāma ṣaḍ yuktayaḥ loke yābhiḥ sarvam vimṛśyate
parimṛṣṭaḥ daśā antena daśā bhāgena sevyate
daśā bhāga gataḥ hīnaḥ tvam rāma sahalakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 3.068.009c yat kṛte vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ tvayā dārapradharṣaṇam
analyzed: yat kṛte vyasanam prāptam tvayā dāra pradharṣaṇam

original: 3.068.010a tad avaśyaṃ tvayā kāryaḥ sa suhṛt suhṛdāṃ vara
analyzed: tat avaśyam tvayā kāryaḥ sa suhṛd suhṛdām vara

original: 3.068.010c akṛtvā na hi te siddhim ahaṃ paśyāmi cintayan
analyzed: a kṛtvā na hi te siddhim aham paśyāmi cintayan

original: 3.068.011a śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ
analyzed: śrūyatām rāma vakṣyāmi sugrīvaḥ nāma vānaraḥ
bhrātrā nirastaḥ kruddhena vālinā śakra sūnunā
ṛṣyamūke giri vare pampā paryanta śobhite

original: 3.068.012c nivasaty ātmavān vīraś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
analyzed: nivasati ātmavān vīraḥ caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ

original: 3.068.013a vayasyaṃ taṃ kuru kṣipram ito gatvādya rāghava
analyzed: vayasyam tam kuru kṣipram itas gatvā adya rāghava
adrohāya samāgamya dīpyamāne vibhāvasau

original: 3.068.014a na ca te so 'vamantavyaḥ sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ
analyzed: na ca te saḥ vamantavyaḥ sugrīvaḥ vānara adhipaḥ

original: 3.068.014c kṛtajñaḥ kāmarūpī ca sahāyārthī ca vīryavān
analyzed: kṛtajñaḥ kāmarūpī ca sahāya arthī ca vīryavān

original: 3.068.015a śaktau hy adya yuvāṃ kartuṃ kāryaṃ tasya cikīrṣitam
analyzed: śaktau hi adya yuvām kartum kāryam tasya cikīrṣitam

original: 3.068.015c kṛtārtho vākṛtārtho vā kṛtyaṃ tava kariṣyati
analyzed: kṛtārthaḥ vā akṛtārthaḥ vā kṛtyam tava kariṣyati

original: 3.068.016a sa ṛkṣarajasaḥ putraḥ pampām aṭati śaṅkitaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ṛkṣa rajasaḥ putraḥ pampām aṭati śaṅkitaḥ
bhāskarasya aurasaḥ putraḥ vālinā kṛta kilbiṣaḥ
saṃnidhāya āyudham kṣipram ṛṣyamūka ālayam kapim
kuru rāghava satyena vayasyam vana cāriṇam

original: 3.068.018a sa hi sthānāni sarvāṇi kārtsnyena kapikuñjaraḥ
analyzed: sa hi sthānāni sarvāṇi kārtsnyena kapi kuñjaraḥ
nara māṃsa āśinām loke naipuṇyāt adhigacchati

original: 3.068.019a na tasyāviditaṃ loke kiṃ cid asti hi rāghava
analyzed: na tasya aviditam loke kim cit asti hi rāghava
yāvat sūryaḥ pratapati sahasrāṃśuḥ ariṃdama

original: 3.068.020a sa nadīr vipulāñ śailān giridurgāṇi kandarān
analyzed: sa nadīḥ vipulām śailān giri durgāṇi kandarān
anviṣya vānaraiḥ sārdham patnīm te dhik gamiṣyati
vānarān ca mahā kāyān preṣayiṣyati rāghava

original: 3.068.021c diśo vicetuṃ tāṃ sītāṃ tvadviyogena śocatīm
analyzed: diśaḥ vicetum tām sītām tvad viyogena śocatīm
sa meru śṛṅga agra gatām aninditām
praviśya pātāla tale vā āśritām
plavaṃgamānām pravaraḥ tava priyām
nihatya rakṣāṃsi punar pradāsyati
nidarśayitvā rāmāya sītāyāḥ pratipādane

original: 3.069.001c vākyam anvartham arthajñaḥ kabandhaḥ punar abravīt
analyzed: vākyam anvartham artha jñaḥ kabandhaḥ punar abravīt

original: 3.069.002a eṣa rāma śivaḥ panthā yatraite puṣpitā drumāḥ
analyzed: eṣa rāma śivaḥ panthāḥ yatra ete puṣpitāḥ drumāḥ
pratīcīm diśam āśritya prakāśante manoramāḥ

original: 3.069.003c aśvatthāḥ karṇikārāś ca cūtāś cānye ca pādapāḥ
analyzed: aśvatthāḥ karṇikārāḥ ca cūtāḥ ca anye ca pādapāḥ

original: 3.069.004a tān āruhyāthavā bhūmau pātayitvā ca tān balāt
analyzed: tān āruhya athavā bhūmau pātayitvā ca tān balāt
phalāni amṛta kalpāni bhakṣayantau gamiṣyathaḥ

original: 3.069.005a caṅkramantau varān deśāñ śailāc chailaṃ vanād vanam
analyzed: caṅkramantau varān deśām śailāt śailam vanāt vanam

original: 3.069.005c tataḥ puṣkariṇīṃ vīrau pampāṃ nāma gamiṣyathaḥ
analyzed: tatas puṣkariṇīm vīrau pampām nāma gamiṣyathaḥ
aśarkarām avibhraṃśām sama tīrtham aśaivalām
rāma saṃjāta vālūkām kamala utpala śobhitām

original: 3.069.007a tatra haṃsāḥ plavāḥ krauñcāḥ kurarāś caiva rāghava
analyzed: tatra haṃsāḥ plavāḥ krauñcāḥ kurarāḥ ca eva rāghava
valgu svarāḥ nikūjanti pampā salila gocarāḥ
na udvijante narān dṛṣṭvā vadhasya akovidāḥ śubhāḥ
ghṛta piṇḍa upamān sthūlān tān dvijān bhakṣayiṣyathaḥ

original: 3.069.009a rohitān vakratuṇḍāṃś ca nalamīnāṃś ca rāghava
analyzed: rohitān vakratuṇḍān ca nalamīnān ca rāghava

original: 3.069.009c pampāyām iṣubhir matsyāṃs tatra rāma varān hatān
analyzed: pampāyām iṣubhiḥ matsyān tatra rāma varān hatān
nistvakpakṣān ayaḥ taptān akṛśān ekakaṇṭakān
tava bhaktyā samāyuktaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ saṃpradāsyati

original: 3.069.011a bhṛśaṃ te khādato matsyān pampāyāḥ puṣpasaṃcaye
analyzed: bhṛśam te khādataḥ matsyān pampāyāḥ puṣpa saṃcaye
padma gandhi śivam vāri sukha śītam anāmayam
uddhṛtya sa tadā akliṣṭam rūpya sphaṭika saṃnibham
atha puṣkara parṇena lakṣmaṇaḥ pāyayiṣyati
sthūlān giri guhā śayyān varāhān vana cāriṇaḥ

original: 3.069.013c apāṃ lobhād upāvṛttān vṛṣabhān iva nardataḥ
analyzed: apām lobhāt upāvṛttān vṛṣabhān iva nardataḥ

original: 3.069.013e rūpānvitāṃś ca pampāyāṃ drakṣyasi tvaṃ narottama
analyzed: rūpa anvitān ca pampāyām drakṣyasi tvam nara uttama
sāyāhne vicaran rāma viṭapī mālya dhāriṇaḥ

original: 3.069.014c śītodakaṃ ca pampāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā śokaṃ vihāsyasi
analyzed: śīta udakam ca pampāyām dṛṣṭvā śokam vihāsyasi
sumanobhiḥ citān tatra tilakān naktamālakān

original: 3.069.015c utpalāni ca phullāni paṅkajāni ca rāghava
analyzed: utpalāni ca phullāni paṅkajāni ca rāghava

original: 3.069.016a na tāni kaś cin mālyāni tatrāropayitā naraḥ
analyzed: na tāni kaḥ cit mālyāni tatra āropayitā naraḥ
mataṅga śiṣyāḥ tatra āsan ṛṣayaḥ su samāhitaḥ
teṣām bhāra abhitaptānām vanyam āharatām guroḥ

original: 3.069.017c ye prapetur mahīṃ tūrṇaṃ śarīrāt svedabindavaḥ
analyzed: ye prapetuḥ mahīm tūrṇam śarīrāt sveda bindavaḥ

original: 3.069.018a tāni mālyāni jātāni munīnāṃ tapasā tadā
analyzed: tāni mālyāni jātāni munīnām tapasā tadā
sveda bindu samutthāni na vinaśyanti rāghava
teṣām adyā api tatra eva dṛśyate paricāriṇī
śramaṇī śabarī nāma kākutstha cira jīvinī

original: 3.069.020a tvāṃ tu dharme sthitā nityaṃ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtam
analyzed: tvām tu dharme sthitā nityam sarva bhūta namaskṛtam
dṛṣṭvā deva upamam rāma svarga lokam gamiṣyati

original: 3.069.021a tatas tad rāma pampāyās tīram āśritya paścimam
analyzed: tatas tat rāma pampāyāḥ tīram āśritya paścimam
āśrama sthānam atulam guhyam kākutstha paśyasi

original: 3.069.022a na tatrākramituṃ nāgāḥ śaknuvanti tam āśramam
analyzed: na tatra ākramitum nāgāḥ śaknuvanti tam āśramam

original: 3.069.022c ṛṣes tasya mataṅgasya vidhānāt tac ca kānanam
analyzed: ṛṣeḥ tasya mataṅgasya vidhānāt tat ca kānanam
tasmin nandana saṃkāśe deva araṇya upame vane
nānā vihaga saṃkīrṇe raṃsyase rāma nirvṛtaḥ
ṛṣyamūkaḥ tu pampāyāḥ purastāt puṣpita drumaḥ
su duḥkha ārohaṇaḥ nāma śiśunāga abhirakṣitaḥ
udāraḥ brahmaṇā ca eva pūrva kāle vinirmitaḥ

original: 3.069.025a śayānaḥ puruṣo rāma tasya śailasya mūrdhani
analyzed: śayānaḥ puruṣaḥ rāma tasya śailasya mūrdhani

original: 3.069.025c yat svapne labhate vittaṃ tat prabuddho 'dhigacchati
analyzed: yat svapne labhate vittam tat prabuddhaḥ dhigacchati
na tu enam viṣama ācāraḥ pāpa karmā adhirohati

original: 3.069.026c tatraiva praharanty enaṃ suptam ādāya rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: tatra eva praharanti enam suptam ādāya rākṣasāḥ
tatas pi śiśunāgānām ākrandaḥ śrūyate mahān
krīḍatām rāma pampāyām mataṅga araṇya vāsinām
siktāḥ rudhira dhārābhiḥ saṃhatya parama dvipāḥ
pracaranti pṛthak kīrṇāḥ megha varṇāḥ tarasvinaḥ

original: 3.069.029a te tatra pītvā pānīyaṃ vimalaṃ śītam avyayam
analyzed: te tatra pītvā pānīyam vimalam śītam avyayam
nivṛttāḥ saṃvigāhante vanāni vana gocarāḥ

original: 3.069.030a rāma tasya tu śailasya mahatī śobhate guhā
analyzed: rāma tasya tu śailasya mahatī śobhate guhā
śilā pidhānā kākutstha duḥkham ca asyāḥ praveśanam

original: 3.069.031a tasyā guhāyāḥ prāgdvāre mahāñ śītodako hradaḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ guhāyāḥ prāc dvāre mahām śīta udakaḥ hradaḥ
bahu mūla phalaḥ ramyaḥ nānā naga samāvṛtaḥ

original: 3.069.032a tasyāṃ vasati sugrīvaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
analyzed: tasyām vasati sugrīvaḥ caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
kadā cit śikhare tasya parvatasya avatiṣṭhate

original: 3.069.033a kabandhas tv anuśāsyaivaṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: kabandhaḥ tu anuśāsya evam tau ubhau rāma lakṣmaṇau
sragvī bhāskara varṇa ābhaḥ khe vyarocata vīryavān

original: 3.069.034a taṃ tu khasthaṃ mahābhāgaṃ kabandhaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: tam tu kha stham mahābhāgam kabandham rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 3.069.034c prasthitau tvaṃ vrajasveti vākyam ūcatur antikāt
analyzed: prasthitau tvam vrajasva iti vākyam ūcatuḥ antikāt

original: 3.069.035a gamyatāṃ kāryasiddhyartham iti tāv abravīc ca saḥ
analyzed: gamyatām kārya siddhi artham iti tau abravīt ca saḥ

original: 3.069.035c suprītau tāv anujñāpya kabandhaḥ prasthitas tadā
analyzed: su prītau tau anujñāpya kabandhaḥ prasthitaḥ tadā
sa tat kabandhaḥ pratipadya rūpam
vṛtaḥ śriyā bhāskara tulya dehaḥ
nidarśayan rāmam avekṣya kha sthaḥ
sakhyam kuruṣva iti tadā abhyuvāca

original: 3.070.001a tau kabandhena taṃ mārgaṃ pampāyā darśitaṃ vane
analyzed: tau kabandhena tam mārgam pampāyāḥ darśitam vane
ātasthatuḥ diśam gṛhya pratīcīm nṛ vara ātmajau
tau śaileṣu ācita anekān kṣaudra kalpa phala drumān
vīkṣantau jagmatuḥ draṣṭum sugrīvam rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 3.070.003a kṛtvā ca śailapṛṣṭhe tu tau vāsaṃ raghunandanau
analyzed: kṛtvā ca śaila pṛṣṭhe tu tau vāsam raghu nandanau
pampāyāḥ paścimam tīram rāghavau upatasthatuḥ

original: 3.070.004a tau puṣkariṇyāḥ pampāyās tīram āsādya paścimam
analyzed: tau puṣkariṇyāḥ pampāyāḥ tīram āsādya paścimam

original: 3.070.004c apaśyatāṃ tatas tatra śabaryā ramyam āśramam
analyzed: apaśyatām tatas tatra śabaryāḥ ramyam āśramam

original: 3.070.005a tau tam āśramam āsādya drumair bahubhir āvṛtam
analyzed: tau tam āśramam āsādya drumaiḥ bahubhiḥ āvṛtam
su ramyam abhivīkṣantau śabarīm abhyupeyatuḥ

original: 3.070.006a tau tu dṛṣṭvā tadā siddhā samutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: tau tu dṛṣṭvā tadā siddhā samutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 3.070.006c pādau jagrāha rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ
analyzed: pādau jagrāha rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ

original: 3.070.007a tām uvāca tato rāmaḥ śramaṇīṃ saṃśitavratām
analyzed: tām uvāca tatas rāmaḥ śramaṇīm saṃśita vratām

original: 3.070.007c kaccit te nirjitā vighnāḥ kaccit te vardhate tapaḥ
analyzed: kaccit te nirjitāḥ vighnāḥ kaccit te vardhate tapaḥ

original: 3.070.008a kaccit te niyataḥ kopa āhāraś ca tapodhane
analyzed: kaccit te niyataḥ kopaḥ āhāraḥ ca tapodhane

original: 3.070.008c kaccit te niyamāḥ prāptāḥ kaccit te manasaḥ sukham
analyzed: kaccit te niyamāḥ prāptāḥ kaccit te manasaḥ sukham
kaccit te guru śuśrūṣā saphalā cāru bhāṣiṇi

original: 3.070.009a rāmeṇa tāpasī pṛṣṭhā sā siddhā siddhasaṃmatā
analyzed: rāmeṇa tāpasī pṛṣṭhā sā siddhā siddha saṃmatā
śaśaṃsa śabarī vṛddhā rāmāya pratyupasthitā
citrakūṭam tvayi prāpte vimānaiḥ atula prabhaiḥ

original: 3.070.010c itas te divam ārūḍhā yān ahaṃ paryacāriṣam
analyzed: itas te divam ārūḍhāḥ yān aham paryacāriṣam

original: 3.070.011a taiś cāham uktā dharmajñair mahābhāgair maharṣibhiḥ
analyzed: taiḥ ca aham uktā dharma jñaiḥ mahābhāgaiḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ

original: 3.070.011c āgamiṣyati te rāmaḥ supuṇyam imam āśramam
analyzed: āgamiṣyati te rāmaḥ su puṇyam imam āśramam
sa te pratigrahītavyaḥ tithiḥ

original: 3.070.012c taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā varāṃl lokān akṣayāṃs tvaṃ gamiṣyasi
analyzed: tam ca dṛṣṭvā varān lokān akṣayān tvam gamiṣyasi

original: 3.070.013a mayā tu vividhaṃ vanyaṃ saṃcitaṃ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: mayā tu vividham vanyam saṃcitam puruṣa ṛṣabha
tava arthe puruṣa vyāghra pampāyāḥ tīra saṃbhavam

original: 3.070.014a evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā śabaryā śabarīm idam
analyzed: evam uktaḥ sa dharma ātmā śabaryā śabarīm idam

original: 3.070.014c rāghavaḥ prāha vijñāne tāṃ nityam abahiṣkṛtām
analyzed: rāghavaḥ prāha vijñāne tām nityam a bahiṣkṛtām

original: 3.070.015a danoḥ sakāśāt tattvena prabhāvaṃ te mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: danoḥ sakāśāt tattvena prabhāvam te mahātmanaḥ

original: 3.070.015c śrutaṃ pratyakṣam icchāmi saṃdraṣṭuṃ yadi manyase
analyzed: śrutam pratyakṣam icchāmi saṃdraṣṭum yadi manyase

original: 3.070.016a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmavaktrād viniḥsṛtam
analyzed: etat tu vacanam śrutvā rāma vaktrāt viniḥsṛtam

original: 3.070.016c śabarī darśayām āsa tāv ubhau tad vanaṃ mahat
analyzed: śabarī darśayām āsa tau ubhau tat vanam mahat
paśya megha ghana prakhyam mṛga pakṣi samākulam
mataṅga vanam iti eva viśrutam raghunandana

original: 3.070.018a iha te bhāvitātmāno guravo me mahādyute
analyzed: iha te bhāvitātmānaḥ guravaḥ me mahā dyute
juhavān cakrire tīrtham mantravat mantra pūjitam

original: 3.070.019a iyaṃ pratyak sthalī vedī yatra te me susatkṛtāḥ
analyzed: iyam pratyak sthalī vedī yatra te me su satkṛtāḥ
puṣpa upahāram kurvanti śramāt udvepibhiḥ karaiḥ
teṣām tapaḥ prabhāvena paśya adya api raghūttama
dyotayanti diśaḥ sarvāḥ śriyā tula prabhāḥ
a śaknuvadbhiḥ taiḥ gantum upavāsa śrama alasaiḥ
cintite bhyāgatān paśya sametān sapta sāgarān

original: 3.070.022a kṛtābhiṣekais tair nyastā valkalāḥ pādapeṣv iha
analyzed: kṛta abhiṣekaiḥ taiḥ nyastāḥ valkalāḥ pādapeṣu iha
adya api na viśuṣyanti pradeśe raghunandana

original: 3.070.023a kṛtsnaṃ vanam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrotavyaṃ ca śrutaṃ tvayā
analyzed: kṛtsnam vanam idam dṛṣṭam śrotavyam ca śrutam tvayā

original: 3.070.023c tad icchāmy abhyanujñātā tyaktum etat kalevaram
analyzed: tat icchāmi abhyanujñātā tyaktum etat kalevaram

original: 3.070.024a teṣām icchāmy ahaṃ gantuṃ samīpaṃ bhāvitātmanām
analyzed: teṣām icchāmi aham gantum samīpam bhāvitātmanām

original: 3.070.024c munīnām āśraṃmo yeṣām ahaṃ ca paricāriṇī
analyzed: munīnām āśraṃmaḥ yeṣām aham ca paricāriṇī

original: 3.070.025a dharmiṣṭhaṃ tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: dharmiṣṭham tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
anujānāmi gaccha iti prahṛṣṭa vadanaḥ bravīt
anujñātā tu rāmeṇa hutvā ātmānam hutāśane
jvalat pāvaka saṃkāśā svargam eva jagāma sā
yatra te su kṛta ātmānaḥ viharanti mahā ṛṣayaḥ
tat puṇyam śabarī sthānam jagāma ātma samādhinā

original: 3.071.001a divaṃ tu tasyāṃ yātāyāṃ śabaryāṃ svena karmaṇā
analyzed: divam tu tasyām yātāyām śabaryām svena karmaṇā

original: 3.071.001c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ

original: 3.071.002a cintayitvā tu dharmātmā prabhāvaṃ taṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: cintayitvā tu dharma ātmā prabhāvam tam mahātmanām
hita kāriṇam ekāgram lakṣmaṇam rāghavaḥ bravīt
dṛṣṭaḥ yam āśramaḥ saumya bahu āścaryaḥ kṛtātmanām
viśvasta mṛga śārdūlaḥ nānā vihaga sevitaḥ

original: 3.071.004a saptānāṃ ca samudrāṇām eṣu tīrtheṣu lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: saptānām ca samudrāṇām eṣu tīrtheṣu lakṣmaṇa

original: 3.071.004c upaspṛṣṭaṃ ca vidhivat pitaraś cāpi tarpitāḥ
analyzed: upaspṛṣṭam ca vidhivat pitaraḥ ca api tarpitāḥ

original: 3.071.005a pranaṣṭam aśubhaṃ yat tat kalyāṇaṃ samupasthitam
analyzed: pranaṣṭam aśubham yat tat kalyāṇam samupasthitam

original: 3.071.005c tena tv etat prahṛṣṭaṃ me mano lakṣmaṇa saṃprati
analyzed: tena tu etat prahṛṣṭam me manaḥ lakṣmaṇa saṃprati
hṛdaye hi nara vyāghra śubham āvirbhaviṣyati

original: 3.071.006c tad āgaccha gamiṣyāvaḥ pampāṃ tāṃ priyadarśanām
analyzed: tat āgaccha gamiṣyāvaḥ pampām tām priyadarśanām
ṛśyamūkaḥ giriḥ yatra na atidūre prakāśate
yasmin vasati dharma ātmā sugrīvaḥ ṃśumataḥ sutaḥ

original: 3.071.007e nityaṃ vālibhayāt trastaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
analyzed: nityam vāli bhayāt trastaḥ caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ

original: 3.071.008a abhitvare ca taṃ draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ vānararṣabham
analyzed: abhitvare ca tam draṣṭum sugrīvam vānara ṛṣabham

original: 3.071.008c tadadhīnaṃ hi me saumya sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam
analyzed: tad adhīnam hi me saumya sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam

original: 3.071.009a iti bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāmaṃ saumitrir idam abravīt
analyzed: iti bruvāṇam tam rāmam saumitriḥ idam abravīt

original: 3.071.009c gacchāvas tvaritaṃ tatra mamāpi tvarate manaḥ
analyzed: gacchāvaḥ tvaritam tatra mama api tvarate manaḥ

original: 3.071.010a āśramāt tu tatas tasmān niṣkramya sa viśāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: āśramāt tu tatas tasmāt niṣkramya sa viśām patiḥ
ājagāma tatas pampām lakṣmaṇena
samīkṣamāṇaḥ puṣpa āḍhyam sarvatas vipula drumam
koyaṣṭibhiḥ ca arjunakaiḥ śatapatraiḥ ca kīcakaiḥ

original: 3.071.011e etaiś cānyaiś ca vividhair nāditaṃ tad vanaṃ mahat
analyzed: etaiḥ ca anyaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ nāditam tat vanam mahat

original: 3.071.012a sa rāmo vidhivān vṛkṣān sarāṃsi vividhāni ca
analyzed: sa rāmaḥ vidhivān vṛkṣān sarāṃsi vividhāni ca
paśyan kāma abhisaṃtaptaḥ jagāma paramam hradam

original: 3.071.013a sa tām āsādya vai rāmo dūrād udakavāhinīm
analyzed: sa tām āsādya vai rāmaḥ dūrāt udaka vāhinīm
mataṅgasarasam nāma hradam samavagāhata
sa tu śoka samāviṣṭaḥ rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ

original: 3.071.014c viveśa nalinīṃ pampāṃ paṅkajaiś ca samāvṛtām
analyzed: viveśa nalinīm pampām paṅkajaiḥ ca samāvṛtām
tilaka aśoka puṃnāga bakula uddāla kāśinīm
ramya upavana saṃbādhām padma saṃpīḍita udakām
sphaṭika upama toya āḍhyām ślakṣṇa vāluka saṃtatām
matsya kacchapa saṃbādhām tīra stha druma śobhitām
sakhībhiḥ iva yuktābhiḥ latābhiḥ anuveṣṭitām
kiṃnara uraga gandharva yakṣa rākṣasa sevitām
nānā druma latā ākīrṇām śīta vāri nidhim śubhām
padmaiḥ saugandhikaiḥ tāmrām śuklām kumuda maṇḍalaiḥ
nīlām kuvalaya uddhātaiḥ bahu varṇām kuthām iva
aravinda utpalavatīm padma saugandhika āyutām
puṣpita āmravaṇa upetām barhiṇa udghuṣṭa nāditām

original: 3.071.020a sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ pampāṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
analyzed: sa tām dṛṣṭvā tatas pampām rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
vilalāpa ca tejasvī kāmāt daśaratha ātmajaḥ

original: 3.071.021a tilakair bījapūraiś ca vaṭaiḥ śukladrumais tathā
analyzed: tilakaiḥ bījapūraiḥ ca vaṭaiḥ śukladrumaiḥ tathā

original: 3.071.021c puṣpitaiḥ karavīraiś ca puṃnāgaiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ
analyzed: puṣpitaiḥ karavīraiḥ ca puṃnāgaiḥ ca su puṣpitaiḥ
mālatī kunda gulmaiḥ ca bhaṇḍīraiḥ niculaiḥ tathā
aśokaiḥ saptaparṇaiḥ ca ketakaiḥ atimuktakaiḥ
anyaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ pramadā iva upaśobhitām

original: 3.071.023a asyās tīre tu pūrvoktaḥ parvato dhātumaṇḍitaḥ
analyzed: asyāḥ tīre tu pūrva uktaḥ parvataḥ dhātu maṇḍitaḥ
ṛśyamūkaḥ iti khyātaḥ citra puṣpita kānanaḥ

original: 3.071.024a harir ṛkṣarajo nāmnaḥ putras tasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: hariḥ ṛkṣarajaḥ nāmnaḥ putraḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 3.071.024c adhyāste taṃ mahāvīryaḥ sugrīva iti viśrutaḥ
analyzed: adhyāste tam mahā vīryaḥ sugrīvaḥ iti viśrutaḥ
sugrīvam abhigaccha tvam vānara indram nara ṛṣabha

original: 3.071.025c ity uvāca punar vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ satyavikramam
analyzed: iti uvāca punar vākyam lakṣmaṇam satya vikramam
tatas mahat vartma ca dūra saṃkramam
krameṇa gatvā pravilokayan vanam
dadarśa pampām śubha darśa kānanām
aneka nānāvidha pakṣi saṃkulām
